GSP29nystik_u:4: viśvavyāpī viśvaśaktiḥ pinākī viśveśāno viśvakṛd viśvamūrttiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:18: kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ vārttikārambha iti śaṅkāṃ nirācikīrṣuḥ sūtrākāroktāśāstraprayojanānuvādapūrvakaṃ vārttikārambhaprayojanaṃ darśayati-yadakṣapāda iti //
GSP29nystik_u:20_1: na tattvanirṇayāya paryāptamiti uddyotakareṇa svanibandhoddyotena tadapanīyata iti
GSP29nystik_u:21: sūtroktaprayojanānuvādaśca prayojanavacchāstravyutpādanena svanibandhasya prayojanavattāṃ prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgaṃ darśayitum,
GSP29nystik_u:23: atra caikaviśatiprabhedabhinnasya duḥkhasyātyantikī nivṛttiḥ śamaḥ, tasmai /
GSP29nystik_u:25: paramakārūṇiko hi bhagavān muniḥ jagadeva duḥkhapaṅkamagnāmuddidhīrṣuḥ śāstraṃ praṇītavān /
GSP29nystik_u:26: tatra yadi kaścinna pravarteta, kimāyātaṃ śāstrasya?
GSP29nystik_u:29: tapaḥprabhāva eva hi tāddaśasteṣāṃ yata evaṃvidhāḥ pāpmāno vilīyanta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:31: na hi gajānāmudaryaṃ tejo vaṭakāṣṭhamaśitaṃ pacatītyasmadādīnāmapyudaryeṇa tejasā tathā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:33: avigītaśiṣṭācāraparamparaprāptaḥ paramaśiṣṭena vārttikakāreṇa kṛto 'pīṣṭadevatānamaskāro na śāstre niveśitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:36: tatra saṃkṣepataḥ prathamasūtramanūdya tasya tātparyamāha--pramāṇādipadārthatattvajñānānniḥ- śreyasādhigama ityetacchāstrasyādisūtram /
GSP29nystik_u:38: ādigrahaṇena kramaprāptasyaiva prathamaṃ vyākhyānaṃ yuktam na dvitīyāderiti darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:41: pramāṇādipadārthatatvajñānādityatra hi jñāyate 'neneti jñānamiti vyutpatyā tatvajñānaṃ śāstramucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:43: na hi viṣaghnamantravat svarūpamātreṇa tadavivakṣitārthaṃ niḥśreyasaheturiti padārthatatvāvagamakaraṇatayā śāstramapadiśati, na tu svarūpeṇa /
GSP29nystik_u:44: tena śāstrasya niḥśreyase kartavye pramāṇāditatvāvagamo 'vāntaravyāpāra itayuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:46: pratipādakaṃ ca śāstramiti śāstrapramāṇādipadārthatatvayorjñāpyajñāpakabhāvaśca pramāṇādipadārthatatvajñānaniḥśreyasayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvalakṣaṇaśca saṃbandhaḥ sūcito bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:48: patpadārthatattvajñānasya ca yathā niḥśreyasādhigamaṃ pratyupayogaḥ tathāgre nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:56: tasya śāstrasya niḥśreyasādhigamena saha sūtreṇa ghaṭitasya /
GSP29nystik_u:57: kutaścinnimittād vighaṭanaśaṅkāyām anu sūtraghaṭanāyāḥ paścāt sandhasanaṃ ghaṭanam anusandhānam,
GSP29nystik_u:62: tathā hi prameyādīnāṃ tāvatpadārthānāṃ tattvajñānaṃ pramāṇatattvajñānādhīnam /
GSP29nystik_u:63: na hi pramāṇaṃ tattvenānavadhāritaṃ bodhakatvamātraṇa svagocarāvadhāraṇāyālaṃ tāvanmātrasya tadābhāsasādhāraṇyāt,
GSP29nystik_u:68: tathā hi vijñānasca tāvatprāmāṇyaṃ svato vā niścīyate, parato vā? na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:69: na khalu vijñānamānātmasaṃvedanamātmānamapi gṛhṇīyāt, prāgava tatprāmāṇaṇyam /
GSP29nystik_u:70: nāpi vijñānāntaram, tadvijñānamityava gṛhṇīyāt, na punarasyāvyabhicāritvem /
GSP29nystik_u:71: jñānatvamātraṃ ca tadābhāsasādhāraṇamiti na svataḥ prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:77: tacca sarvaṃ svato 'navadhāritaprāmāṇyamākulaṃ sat kathaṃ pūrvaṃ pravartakaṃ jñānamanākulayet?
GSP29nystik_u:78: svato vāsya prāmāṇye kimaparāddhaṃ pravatākajñānena yena tasminnapi tanna syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:79: na ca prāmāṇyaṃ jñāyate svataḥ ityāveditam /
GSP29nystik_u:80: yadā ca saṃvedanaprāmāṇyamaktena krameṇa duradhigamaṃ tadā kaiva kathendriyādīnāmavyabhicārisaṃvedanakāryavyaṅgyapramāṇabhāvānām?
GSP29nystik_u:81: tadeva dṛṣṭārthāḥ pramāṇabhṛtāṃ vyavahārā bhavantu sandehādapi yathātathā,
GSP29nystik_u:82: adṛṣṭārthāstu bahuvittavyāyāyāsasādhyā vaidikā vyavahārā dattajalā/jalayaḥ prasaktāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:83: tasmāt pramāṇādipadārthatattvajñāpanadvāreṇa na śāstraṃ niḥśreyasena saṃbadhyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:100: śāstreṇa tu te nābhidhīyanta iti na niḥśreyasena saṃgatiḥ śāstrasyetvata āha--śāstrasya puruṣaśreyo 'bhidhāyakatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:102: tathāpi sopāyaiva sā atra śreyaḥśabdena vivakṣitā,
GSP29nystik_u:105: śāstraṃ tāvadetat puruṣaśreyaḥ sahopāyenābhidhatta ityanubhavasiddha sadaśakyānuṣṭhānatayāpavaditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:106: sā cedaśakyānuṣṭhānatāpanītā pramāṇata ityādinā saṃhitaṃ niḥśreyasena saha śāstramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:107: śāstrasyetyādi grahaṇakavākyaṃ vivṛṇoti--śāstraṃ punarityādinā upabhogāt prakṣayeṇetyantena /
GSP29nystik_u:114: evaṃ ca kvacit kenacidarthenaikena sūtravākyānāmekavākyatvaṃ samūhaḥ prakaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:118: tadevaṃ śāstrasvarūpaṃ darṃśayitvā nāntareṇa tadarthakathanaṃ puruṣaśreyo 'bhidhāyakatvamasrū sidhyitīti tadarthaṃ kathayati-- tatpadārthā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:119: nanu pramāṇādīnāṃ pratinaramānantyena durjñānatvamiti tadavasthamevānarthakyaṃ śāstrasya prasaktamityata āha -- ṣoḍaśātmānaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:120: ātmā svabhāvaḥ pramāṇādīnāṃ pramāṇatvādisāmānyaviśeṣa iti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:122: āntargaṇikabhedādānantye 'pi svasāmānyaviśeṣaiḥ saṃgṛhītā na durjñānā iti yato 'sya padārthāḥ pramāṇādayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:128: prāmāṇikatve vā pramāṇādeva tatsiddheḥ śāstrasya vaiyarthyamityata āha--pratyakṣeti /
GSP29nystik_u:132: yadyapi prameyamātmādyapavargāntalakṣaṇamāgamikaṃ tathāpyāgamasyāptapraṇetṛkatayā tatrāpi mūlabhūtamanumānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vāstīti pratyakṣānumāne eva darśite /
GSP29nystik_u:133: nanūktaṃ prāmāṇikatve śāstravaiyarthyamityata āha-- tasya viṣaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:134: vyavaharamāṇā api pramāṇairlaukikā vainayikabuddhivirahiṇo naitān padārthān viviñcate /
GSP29nystik_u:135: aviviktāścete na niḥśreyasāya kalpanta iti anadhigatetyaṅktam /
GSP29nystik_u:138: tatra vivakṣitaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ grahītuṃ saṃbhavinaḥ puruṣaprakārān darśayati--puruṣaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:143: vipratipannasya tu sākṣiṇāṃ purato jalpavitaṇḍābhyāṃ viṣyamāṇasya vigalite 'haṅkāre sandigdhasya sa/jātajijñāsasya sāpekṣasya sataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:144: apratipannasyāpi kenacit prakāreṇa sandehamāpādya sāpekṣīkṛtasya pratipādyatā /
GSP29nystik_u:146: asandigdho 'pi tattvapratipādanāya kārūṇikena sandigadhaḥ kṛtvā pratipādyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:148: tathā ca pramātaṇāṃ na pramāṇāntare pravṛttiḥ syādityata āha-- te yadeti /
GSP29nystik_u:149: kañcid viṣayaṃ jijñāsavo yedandriyādyapekṣante, tadā pratyakṣeṇa pratipādyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:157: ihābhimataṃ śreyo nirdhārayituṃ śreyomātrapramārān āha--śreyaḥ punaḥ sukhamahitanivṛttiśca /
GSP29nystik_u:160: na vyāsajya kiṃ tu pratyekamityāha-- dṛṣṭaṃ sukha strakcandanavanitādibhogajanma /
GSP29nystik_u:162: evaṃ ca duḥkhanivṛttirapi śreyo dṛṣṭāmadṛṣṭaṃ ceti yojanīyaṃ cakāralopāt /
GSP29nystik_u:173: yadyapi viṣayaḥ śarīramapi tathāpyanyathāsya duḥkhahetubhāva ityāha śarīramiti śarīrāvacchinna ātmapradeśo duḥkhāyatanamiti śarīraṃ duḥkhāyatanamuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:178: sādhanapāratantyaṃ kṣayitvaṃ kāma iti duḥkhahetavaḥ sakalasukhānasaṅginaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:182_1: prasaṃkhyānaparipākaprabhāvāt paritastattadupabhogabhāginaḥ kāyān nirmāya tatttphalopabhāgāt prakṣiṇoti /
GSP29nystik_u:185: ko hi yogaprabhāvādṛte agastya ica samudraṃ pibati, sa iva ca daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ sṛjati?
GSP29nystik_u:192: iyaṃ tu duḥkhavat sukhasyāpyātyantikī nivṛttiriti kathaṃ śreyaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:193: kathaṃ ca prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgamityata āha--puruṣā rāgādimanta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:195: te hi madhuviṣasaṃpṛktamapyannaṃ madhuratayā āpātaramaṇīyaṃ viṣaviṅgattu mārayatu mā va mīmaradupayu/jmahe tāvadāpātasukham,
GSP29nystik_u:196: ko hi hastagataṃ pādagataṃ karotīti vicintyopabhu/jate /
GSP29nystik_u:198: tena mā bhūdetad rāgādimatāṃ pravṛttyaṅgam, vivekināṃ tu bhaviṣyati /
GSP29nystik_u:205: tadanena prapañcena pramāṇato 'rthapratipattavityādivākyasya tātparyamabhidhāya tadavayavaṃ pravṛttisāmarthyāditi vivarītuṃ bhūmimāracayati--pravṛtterapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:207: na tu vītarāgānām/na hi tatpravṛtterniḥ- śreyasādhgimalakṣaṇaphalasaṃbandho dṛṣṭo niḥśreyasasyālaukikatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:209: pramāṇamanarthakamiti hi vipratiṣiddhamityata āha-- pramāṇaṃ tāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:212: na cāpramāṇe pramāṇābhimāno vinā pramāṇādisādharmyāditi tatsādharmyaṃ pṛcchati--kiṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:215: rajatavijñānamapi purovarti śuklabhāsvaraṃ saddravyaṃ paricchinatti, śuktikājñānamapi /
GSP29nystik_u:216: kevalamekasminnava viṣaye rajatasamāropāpavādābhyāṃ buddhacorvādhakabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:220: tathā ca samarthā pravṛttiranarthavadvacatirekasaṃpannapramāṇasyārthavattve heturityāha--tasyāḥ samarthāyāḥ pravṛtterhetoḥ punaḥ pramāṇasyārthavattvamarthāvyabhicāritvam /
GSP29nystik_u:228: api tu tadarthajātīyasya śreyohetutāmasakṛdupalabhya saṃpratyupalabhyamānasyārthasya tajjātīyatayā śreyohetubhāvānumānasahito viniścayaḥ pravṛttihetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:231: prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ ca śreyohetutānumānanimittavyāptigrahaṇaṃ ca na samarthāṃ pravṛttiṃ vinā,
GSP29nystik_u:232: na ca samarthā pravṛttistābhyāṃ vivaneti parasparāśrayatā /
GSP29nystik_u:234: cadi pūrvaṃ pramāṇato 'rthapratipattiḥ rviniścitirapekṣitopayatānumānasahitā pravṛttisamārthyamantareṇa kimiti pratipadyate niścinoti apekṣitopāya eveti ca toyameveti ceti?
GSP29nystik_u:241: arthapratītyadhīnā tu pravṛttirnārthāvadhāraṇādhīnā, arthasandehādapi prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛtteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:242: no khalūpāyatāvinaścayenāpi pravartamānā na anāgataphale sandihate /
GSP29nystik_u:243_0: tadamī saṃdihānā api pravartamānāḥ pravṛttisamārthyāt pramāṇasya tattvaṃ viniścatya
GSP29nystik_u:246: tasya yādṛśatādṛśasyāpīṣṭatvādiṣṭalakṣaṇatvācca phalasya tatsādhanatvaṃ te parīkṣante /
GSP29nystik_u:254: vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ, phalajñānamapyabhyāsadaśāpannatayā tajjātīyatvena liṅgenāvadhṛtāvyabhicārameva /
GSP29nystik_u:256: na ca saṃpratitanasya phalajñānasya prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇāyedānīmeva pūrvasya phalajñānasya tajjātīyatvena pramāṇyāvadhāraṇe satyanavastheti /
GSP29nystik_u:261: eteṣu ca madhye yatphalajñānaṃ svapnādyupabhogatulyatayā śaṅkitavyabhicāraṃ tadanabhyāsadaśāpannam /
GSP29nystik_u:263: anumānasya tu pravṛttisāmarthyaliṅgajanmano 'nyasya vā nirastasamastavyabhicāraśaṅkasya svata eva prāmāṇyamanumeyāvyabhicāriliṅgasamutthatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:264: na hi liṅgākāra jñānaṃ liṅgaṃ vinā,
GSP29nystik_u:265: na ca liṅgaṃ liṅginaṃ vineti svata eva gṛhītāvyabhicāliṅgasamutthaṃ niṣkampamupapadyate jñānam /
GSP29nystik_u:266: pratyakṣajñānaṃ tvarthādutpadyamānamapi na gṛhītāvyabhicārāt, api tu sattāmātreṇāvasthitāt /
GSP29nystik_u:267: na ca kāraṇāntarāṇyapīndriyādīni asyārthena gṛhītāvyabhicārāṇi na cārthenāvyabhicārāṇi /
GSP29nystik_u:271: kiṃ tu saṅketagrahaṇamātrāt padārthapratyāyanena vākyārthamadhigamayati śabdaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:274: jñānagatatajjātīyatvaliṅgagrāhiṇaśca jñānasya mānasapratyakṣasya tādṛśasyādṛṣṭavyabhicāratayā parito nirastasamastavibhramāśaṅkasya svataḥ prāmāṇyamiti nānavasthā /
GSP29nystik_u:283: utpannamātrakasya hi bālakasya stanaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāgbhavīyastajjātīyāpekṣitānubhavajanitaḥ saṃskāra āvirasti /
GSP29nystik_u:288: evaṃ pūrvasmin pūrvasmin janmanītyanāditayā na bījāṅkuravat parasparāpekṣiteti /
GSP29nystik_u:292: tadanenoktena krameṇa pramāṇato 'rthapratipatāvityasya śāstrānusandhānavākyatva tātparyaṃ ca samāhitam /
GSP29nystik_u:299: tathā ca niḥśreyasaṃ pratyantaraṅgatvāt pramāṇānnyāyāt pravṛttireva balīyasī, na nyāyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:300: tasmāt pravṛttireva vyutpādanīyā na pramāṇaṃ niḥśreyasaheturapi pravṛtterantaraṅgatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:301: tatredabhupatiṣṭhate pramāṇato 'rthapratipattau satyā pravṛtteḥ samārthyaṃ phalenābhisaṃbandho,
GSP29nystik_u:304: etaduktaṃ bhavati, yathāntaraṅgatayā pravṛttirbalīyasī evaṃ mūlakāraṇatayā pramāṇamapi /
GSP29nystik_u:307: tathāpi pramāṇavyutpādanena pravṛttirapi vyutpāditā bhavatīti pramāṇasya vyutpādanamakāri śāstreṇa, na tu pravṛtteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:311: yathā hi pramāṇapratipattyupāyaṃ pratyācakṣāṇaka evaṃ praṣṭāvyo jāyate,
GSP29nystik_u:312: kiṃ bhavān pramāṇena pramāṇajñānopāyaṃ pratyācaṣṭe, apramāṇena veti?
GSP29nystik_u:313: yadi brūyāt pramāṇeneti, sa prativaktavyaḥ, pramāṇajñānopāyamavidvān kathaṃ bhavānevamāheti?
GSP29nystik_u:317: anyathā nāsi laukiko na parīkṣaka ityunmattavadupekṣaṇīyaḥ syā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:318_1: pravṛttisāmarthyāvat pramāṇa yato 'taḥ sarvaḥ pramātā pramāṇenāvagatārthavattvenārthamavadhārya
GSP29nystik_u:321: artho 'rthaśabdaḥ pramāṇato 'rthapratipattāvityatra sthitaḥ padaṃ vāyakaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni tathā /
GSP29nystik_u:325: atra ca heyahānādhigantavyapadaiḥ pramāṇaprameyayorūpādānād gobalīvardanyāyena saṃśayādiṣu nigrahasthānānteṣu śāstrapadaṃ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:330: tatra heyādicaturvarge cāryamāṇatayārthapadasūcite pramāṇādicaturvarge ca pramāṇasya prādhānyapradarśanārthamidaṃ bhāṣyam /
GSP29nystik_u:340: tadetasmāt prādhānyād vivakṣābhedena trivargadvayāt prāguddeśaḥ pramāṇasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:341: etena yadāhureke yadi prādhānyāt prāthamyaṃ tat prameyasyaiva, athoṣāyatvāt tat saṃśayādīnām,
GSP29nystik_u:342: teṣāṃ pramāṇopāyatvāt, kasmācca pramātrādibhyaḥ prāthamyaṃ pramāṇasyeti?
GSP29nystik_u:346: pramāṇādicaturvargastu kathaṃ pradarśita iti pṛcchati--kathaṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:348: tadevaṃ tātparyaṃ vyākhyāyāvayavārthaṃ vyākhyātumupakramate--tadidaṃ vākyāmavayavaśa upanyasya varṇyate vyākhyāyate 'vayavaśa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:349: tatrāsyāvayaveṣu vyākhyātavyeṣu prāthamyāt pramāṇata iti vivṛṇoti--tatreti /
GSP29nystik_u:351: nimittapañcamī cet kasmāt pramāṇāditi nābhihitamityata āha-- asyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:360: yatra dvayorbahūnāṃ vā saṃpalvaḥ pramāṇānāṃ tatraikaikasyāpyasti pratipattisādhanatvaṃ pramāṇasyeti kathayituṃ saṃplavāvasare 'pi pramāṇenetyaṅktam /
GSP29nystik_u:366: kasmāt punaḥ karaṇārtho gamyata ityata āha--pramāṇeneti /
GSP29nystik_u:368: atra ca karaṇabhāvanāntarīyakasya hetubhāvasya pañcamya abhidhānaṃ pramāṇaphalayostādātmyapratiṣedhārtham,
GSP29nystik_u:371: pramāṇaprātipadikalabdhakaraṇatvānuvādaśca pramākārakāntarebhyo 'bhyarhitatvenāsya vyutpādyatvaṃ ca prāthamyaṃ ca yuktamiti darśayituṃ saṃplavamākṣipati--saṃplaveti /
GSP29nystik_u:374: viśiṣṭo bhinno viṣayo yeṣāṃ tāni tathā /
GSP29nystik_u:388: tadidamanādivāsanodbhūtavikalpadhiṣṭhānaṃ vikalpākārasya vā alīkasya vā bāhyatvamanumānagācaro 'bhyupeyam /
GSP29nystik_u:390: yat khalu bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇam, tadanyavyāvṛttiniṣṭhameva yathā amūrtatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:391: tad vijñānādau bhāve śaśaviṣāṇādau cābhāve sādhāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:392: bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇaśca vikalpagocaro 'sti ghaṭo nāsti ghaṭa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:393: yadi punarasādhāraṇo bhāvo bhaved astiśabdo na prayujyeta, punaruktatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:394: nāstīyapi na vaktavyaṃ virodhāt, evamabhāvāsādhāraṇye 'pi vācyam /
GSP29nystik_u:395: na cālīkasya sarvasāmarthyavirahiṇaḥ paramārthasattā svalakṣaṇena sādṛśyaṃ manyate 'nyavyāvṛteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:396: na ca gauriti niyatau buddhivyapadeśau vināścādivyāvṛttim /
GSP29nystik_u:397: tasmāt sāmānyamanyavyāvṛttirūpamabāhyaṃ bāhyabhedāgrahād bāhyatvenāvagāhyamānamanumānaṃ bāhyo pravartayati /
GSP29nystik_u:398: pāramparyeṇa ca bāhyapratibandhād bāhyaṃ prāpayat saṃvādakaṃ sad bhrāntamapi pramātrāśayavaśāt pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:404: na ca sāmānyaviśeṣābhyāmanyadasti prameyāntaraṃ yatraite tat saṃploṣyete ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:406: yathā caitat tathā tatra tatra nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:414: nāsti vaiyarthyamadhigatīnāmāśutaravināśitayā tadgocarādhigatyantarotpādaṃ prati pramāṇāntarasyārthavattvādityata āha--adhigataṃ cārthamadhigamayatā pramāṇeneti /
GSP29nystik_u:416: tathāpyekatarapramāṇajanitārthādhigalibdhajanmanaḥ saṃskārādeva sthāyinastadarthasmṛtisantatisaṃbhāvād adhigamarthamadhigamayatā pramāṇena piṣṭaṃ piṣṭaṃ syāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:423: nāpi svakāraṇabalalabdhajanmāni pramāṇāni dirśito 'yamartho 'nyatamena cāsmāsu pramāṇena,
GSP29nystik_u:425: pramātuścetanatvādayamanayoga iti cet--na, priyatamasya vastuno 'nena bhūyo bhūyaḥ pramitsitatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:427: tasmānna pramātrabhisandhānāt pramāṇasya pravṛttirapravṛttirvārthe, kiṃ tu samārthyot /
GSP29nystik_u:429: cattu pramāṇaṃ pramitsādhīnapravṛtti tadyadi pramātā na vyāpārayet kimāyātaṃ pramāṇasya?
GSP29nystik_u:430: na hi toyamapi pipāsunā na pīyata iti tasya pipāsopaśamanaśaktirapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:433: sa eva cānena sāmagrībhedaḥ pradarśitaḥ anyathā pratyakṣeṇetyādinā /
GSP29nystik_u:435: yadi ca dravyaṃ tvacā gṛhītamiti kṛtaṃ cakṣuṣā,
GSP29nystik_u:439: tathā ca saṃplavavaiyarthye 'pi vyavasthāyāṃ na vaiyarthyamityāha--viṣayāntara iti /
GSP29nystik_u:454: no khalu vikalpayamānaṃ vastvasti, arthakriyāsu vopayujyate //
GSP29nystik_u:461: jñāpakatvena kāryatvena vā kathañcidarthasaṃbandhe saṃskārasyāpi tat samānamiti tasyāpi smṛtirūpopalabdhihetoḥ prāmāṇyaṃ prasaktam /
GSP29nystik_u:463: pramāsādhanaṃ hi pramāṇam na ca smṛtiḥ pramā /
GSP29nystik_u:466: tasmāt taddhetuḥ pramāṇamiti na smṛtihetau prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:467: anadhigatārthagantṛtvaṃ ca dhārāvāhikavijñānānāmadhigatārthagocarāṇāṃ lokaprasiddhapramāṇabhāvānāṃ pramāṇyaṃ vihantīti nādriyamahe /
GSP29nystik_u:470: na cādyenaiva vijñānenopadarśitatvādarthasya pravartitatvāt puruṣasya prāptitvāccottateṣām,
GSP29nystik_u:472: na hi vijñānasyārthaprāpaṇaṃ pravartanādanyat, na ca pravartanamapyarthapradarśanādanyat /
GSP29nystik_u:474: pradarśana ca pūrvavaduttareṣāṃ vijñānāmabhinnamiti kathaṃ pūrvameva vijñānaṃ pramāṇa nottarāṇyapi?
GSP29nystik_u:476: na cātidavīstayā tadarthasya heyatayā tadapi puruṣasyāpekṣitam, tasyopekṣaṇīyārthaviṣayatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:478: upalabdhihetuṃ ca pramāṇaṃ vadatā anadhigatārthagantṛtvaṃ cārthasārūpyaṃ cātmānātmaprakāśanaśaktiśca pramāṇamiti nirastāni bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:480: upalabdhihetuṃ ca pramāṇaṃ vadatā anadhigatārthagantṛtvaṃ cārthasārūpyaṃ cātmānātmaprakāśanaśaktiśca pramāṇamiti nirastāni bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:489: ayamarthaḥ, sarvaḥ karttā karaṇagocaravyāpāro na tu sākṣāt phale vyāpriyate /
GSP29nystik_u:491: tatra siddhaṃ paraśvādi dārūdvaidhībhāvāyodyamyodyamya dārūṇi nipātayan dārū cchinattītyucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:493: kiṃ tu sparśavadvegavataḥ karaṇībhūtasya paraśoḥ saṃyogasyodyamananipātanalakṣaṇastu kartṛvyāpāraḥ paraśugocara eva /
GSP29nystik_u:494: evaṃ svargakāmo 'pi kartā na sākṣāt svarge vyāpriyate, kiṃ tu tatkaraṇaṃ yāgamasiddhaṃ sādhayati /
GSP29nystik_u:497: asiddhaṃ ca tatsannikarṣādi vyāpārayannutpādayan vā karaṇa eva caritārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:498: karaṇaṃ tvindriyādi tatsannikarṣādi vā nānyatra cāritārthamiti sākṣādupalabdhāveva phale vyāpriyate /
GSP29nystik_u:501: indriyameva tu tattatsannikarṣādi vā sākṣāt pramāhetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:502: tataḥ siddhametat na pramātā sākṣāt pramāhetuḥ kartṛtvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:503: yo yaḥ kartā sa sarvo na sākṣāt phalahetuḥ, yathā vraścanayajamānādiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:506: tathā pratyakṣaṃ prameyaṃ na sākṣāt pramāhetuḥ, prameyatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:507: yad yat prameyaṃ vattat sarvaṃ na pramāheturanumeyādivat /
GSP29nystik_u:510: tadidaṃ pramātṛprameyayoḥ pramāṇe caritārthatvamacaritārthatvaṃ ca pramāṇasya,
GSP29nystik_u:512: pramātṛprameye tu phaloddeśena pravṛtte iti taddhetū kathañciditi /
GSP29nystik_u:516: yadā jñānaṃ pramāṇa tadā jñānasya pramāṇasyotvattāvityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:523: artha svarūpamātrameva kārakaṃ kasmānna bhavati, tacca kriyāsaṃbaddhasya purastādapyastītyata
GSP29nystik_u:525: astu tarhi tadīyo 'vāntaravyāpāraḥ pradhānakriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ kārakam,
GSP29nystik_u:526: tasyāpi pradhānakriyāyāṃ nimittatvādityata āha--na ca kriyāmātramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:527: na hi svarūpeṇa devadatto vraścanaḥ, nāpi tadīyo vyāpāra udyamananipātanādirloṣṭhādyāśrarūḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:528: kva tarhi kārakaśabdaḥ pravartata ityata āha--kārakaśabdo hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:530: dvaidhībhāve hi phale pradhānavyāpāre kartuḥ karaṇagocara udyamananipātanādiḥ avāntaravyāpāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:533: tasmādavāntarapradhānavyāpārasaṃpannaṃ kārakamiti sāmānyataḥ prasādhya prakṛte yojayati--pramātṛprameyaśabdau ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:541: tat kasya hetorapacatyapi pākasaṃbandhaṃ pratyasti svarūpśaktirdevadattādāviti?
GSP29nystik_u:542: dvayī hi śaktiḥ kārakāṇāṃ kāryopajananaṃ prati svarūpaṃ ca sahakārigrāmasamavadhānaṃ ca /
GSP29nystik_u:544: satyapi ca svarūpe trekālyavyāpini trekālyayogikāryāsaṃbhave 'pravṛtteḥ traikālyayogikāryopahitamaryādameva svarūpaṃ kārakaśabdānāṃ pravṛtau nimittamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:545: asatyapi pratyutpannapramāhetupramāṇasaṃbandhe pramātṛprameyaśabdayoḥ pravṛttiriti upapannaṃ pramātṛprameyābhyāṃ pramāṇa janyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:546: tat pramāṇamupalabdhisādhanaṃ sākṣāt, na pramātṛprameye iti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:548: sādhākatamāsādhakatamayoḥ sādhakatame kāryasaṃpratyayāt sātiśayatvenodbhūtattvāt tasyetyāha--sādhakatamatvād veti /
GSP29nystik_u:550: uttaram--pramāṇasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ pramāyāḥ kāryasya tadvattā bhāvābhāvavattā sādhakatamārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:552: na tu pramātṛprameyānvayavyatirekānuvidhānamapyasti pramāyā anvayavyatirekayorityata āha--na pramātarīti /
GSP29nystik_u:555: pramātṛprameye hi pramāṇopakṣīṇavṛttinī na pramāyāṃ vyāpriyete /
GSP29nystik_u:557: pramāṇasya vyāpāre tu pramā bhavatyeveti kalpāntaramāha- yadvān vā pramimīte so 'tiśayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:558: pramimīta iti svatantraṃ kartāraṃ daśayati pratipādyāt karaṇād vyavacchettum /
GSP29nystik_u:561: na hi kartā kartṛmān, kiṃ tu pramāṇavān /
GSP29nystik_u:564: pramātā prameyavānapi kvacid bhavet tattantratvāt prameyasya /
GSP29nystik_u:565: na tu prameyavāneva, anumānādiṣu prameyasyātītatvādinā tadvattāvihāt /
GSP29nystik_u:574: setikartavyatākaṃ hi vyāpriyamāṇaṃ karaṇam, na tu cakṣurādisvarūpam /
GSP29nystik_u:576: tacca siddhamasiddha vā pramātṛprameyavyāpārasya paścādeva tathātvena saṃpadyata iti caramabhāvītyucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:578: tathā tantūnāṃ paṭe janayitavye 'ntyāḥ saṃyogabhedā yadanantaraṃ paṭa utpadyata eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:580: yata eva pramāṇaṃ caramabhāvi, ata eva tadanantaraṃ pratipatteḥ pramāyā bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:587: na ca pramātā tadbhedahetuḥ, sya sādhāraṇyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:588: na ca prameyamekasyāpi prameyasya saṃplave sarvapratipattisādhāraṇyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:589: pramāṇāni tu yathāyathaṃ catasṛṣvapi pramitiṣvasādhāraṇānīti bhinnabuddhivyapadeśanibandhanāni /
GSP29nystik_u:595: nāsau pramātrā prameyeṇa vā śakyo viśeṣṭum, tayorapi tadvadeva sādhāraṇyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:597: eve sukhādiprameyāṇāmapi mana evāsādhāraṇaṃ vyavacchedaṅka draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:601: kasmāt punarniṣidhyate pramāṇaviṣayā pratipattirityata āha--yato na pramāṇaviṣayeti /
GSP29nystik_u:612: samarthapravṛttijanikā hi pratipattirnāpramāṇādbhāvatītyarthādeva pramāṇāditi gamyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:615: na caitat sākṣāt pramāṇasya kāryam, kiṃ tvarthapratipatteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:617: arthapratipattistu pramāṇakāryeti samarthā pravṛttiḥ pramāṇakāryā satī pramāṇasyārthavattvamanumāpayati /
GSP29nystik_u:619: anyathā pramāṇamarthavadarthapratipatteḥ masarthapravṛttijanakatvāditi kiṃ kena saṃgatam?
GSP29nystik_u:620: pramāṇasya viśeṣaḥ pramāṇabhāsād vyāvṛttiḥ, tasya jñāpanam /
GSP29nystik_u:621: sa evārtho yasya pramāṇagrahaṇasya tat tathoktam /
GSP29nystik_u:623: tasmādetaduktaṃ bhavati--pramāṇakāryāyā arthaprapitteḥ pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ na tadābhāsakāryāyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:625: tadidamuktam--tad yeha pramāṇena pratipattiḥ sā pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ pratipādayati pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:628: pravṛttisamārthyaṃ pratipadyamānaṃ prāpnuvattat pratipādayati prāpayati pramāṇakāryārthapratipattiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:629: idamapi pramāṇagrahaṇasya prayojanamityāha-- na ca pramāṇagrahaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:633: sarvasya sukhaduḥkhataddhetutvena heyapakṣanikṣepāt upādeyānāṃ pramāṇaśāstrāpavargāṇānāmabhāvaprasaṅgād vyāghātaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:641: na caitanniḥśreyasahetuṃ śāstraṃ praṇayataḥ sūtrakārasya tadanuvartino vā bhāṣyakārasya vivikṣitamityāha--na ca pramāṇādihānaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP29nystik_u:646: na kevalaṃ vyāghātāśakyahānāvivakṣitatvairarthapadena na sarvasaṃgraho 'śakyatvādapi na sarvasaṃgraha ityāha--na saṃvida iti /
GSP29nystik_u:647: sukhaduḥkhataddhetutayā na saṃvido grahaṇaṃ saṃgrahaḥ sarvamadhyapatitāyā api /
GSP29nystik_u:650: na tāvat sarvā eva saṃvidaḥ saṃvidgocarā manoyonayaḥ, saṃvedyā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP29nystik_u:655: na ca sukhaduḥkhe tatreturiti na sarvasaṃgrahaḥ saṃvido 'saṃgrahādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:656: tadevamādivākya vyākhyāya bhāṣyavākyāntaramavatārya tatraikaderśivyākhyānaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati--so 'yaṃ pramāṇārtha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:659: prāṇabhṛdbhedasyāparisaṃkhyeyatvāditi ca hetuḥ śvetaḥ prāsādaḥ kākasya kārṣṇyāditivanna pratijñārthena saṅgacchate ityāha--prāṇabhṛdbhedasya ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:662: kaṇṭakādiviṣayaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ duḥkhotpādaprayojanamevetyetadubhayaṃ parisaṃkhyātuṃ niyantumaśakyamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:663: evaṃ kilātra śaṅkyate, sukhaduḥkhahetubhāvo vastūnāṃ svābhāviko bhavenna vā?
GSP29nystik_u:664: svābhāvikatve nīla iva sarvān pratyarthaḥ sukha iti karabhavanmanuṣyāṇāmapi kaṇṭakaḥ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:667: evaṃ tṛṣṇaja ivāpāṃ suhitasyāpaḥ sukhāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP29nystik_u:670: nivedayiṣye hi kṣaṇabhaṅgādhikāre tathā sthemabhājāmapi vastunāmakramāṇāmapi kramavatsahakārikāraṇasamavadhānavaśādupajanāpāyadharmāṇaḥ kramavanto dharmā bhavantīti, tadihāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:671: yadyapi na jātyā sukhaduḥkhahetubhāvo bhāvanāṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:674: yadyadaniyatakāraṇakaṃ kāryaṃ tatvasarvamaniyatameva, yathā aniyatakālameghodayanibandhanaṃ varṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:677_0: kasmāt punaḥ pramātrādicaturvarge pramāṇasyaivārthavattvamucceta na pramātrādīnāmapītyāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:677_1: bhāṣyamanuvadanneva vyācaṣṭe-- arthavati ca samarthe samyagarthe 'rthāvyabhicāriṇīti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:679: arthasya tu samyaktvamidameva yad yādṛśaḥ pramāṇenopadarśistasya tathātvaṃ na punaranyathābhāva iti /
GSP29nystik_u:681: tadaivaṃ vyākhyānam-- arthavati ca prayojanavati ca yataḥ samarthaṃ śaktaṃ pramāṇa pratipattyādikrameṇa pūrvoktena prayojanaṃ prati,
GSP29nystik_u:682: ataḥ samarthe pramāṇe pramātrādīnyarthavanti prayojanavanti bhavanti,
GSP29nystik_u:683: yatastānyapi pramāṇavadeva samarthāni śaktāni prayojanaṃ pratīti,
GSP29nystik_u:686: nanvanyatamaśabdo bahuṣvanirdhānitaviśeṣamekamāha, na tu sādhakatamamityata āha--pramāraṇāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:688: tad yathā śivikāvahanapakrame puruṣamānayeti puruṣaśabdo viṣṭau /
GSP29nystik_u:689: tadvadihāpi pramātrādiparihāṇyā pramāṇasyārthavattvābhidhānaniyamaprakrama iti pramātrādibhyaḥ pramāṇasya viśeṣo vācya iti tatraivānyatamaśabdo vartate /
GSP29nystik_u:691: tathāpyadṛṣṭe viṣaye na tajjanitaprapittayavyabhicāreṇāvyabhicāraḥ śabdasya pramāṇasya śakyo vijñātum,
GSP29nystik_u:695: adṛṣṭārthaviṣayasya ca caturvargasyehārthavattvena prayojanaṃ dṛṣṭārthe sandehādapi vyavahāra siddheḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:699: svātantryaṃ pṛcchati--kiṃ punaḥ svātantryam, yasyābhisaṃbandhāt svantra iti?
GSP29nystik_u:701: na khalvīpsājihāsayorvā pravṛttau vā svāntryaṃ pramātṛtvam, api tu pramāyārm /
GSP29nystik_u:702: ipsādisvātantryeṇa tu taduttarakālabhāvinā pramāyāṃ svātantryaṃ parvakālābhāvyupalakṣim /
GSP29nystik_u:704: na hi sarvaḥ kartā samastakārakajanyaṃ svargādi vaudanādi vā bhuṅkte ṛtvikpācakādiṣu ca vyabhicāradarśanāt /
GSP29nystik_u:705: kārakasya tu sataḥ kartṛtvottarakālabhāvinī phalopabhoktṛtā kartṛvanāntarīyakatayā dupalakṣayati,
GSP29nystik_u:708: tadabhisandhipūrvakaṃ preṣaṇamadhyeṣaṇaṃ va yuktaṃ tasarvaṃ pacyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:711: kārakābhidhānena sannidhāpitāṃ kriyaṃ taditi sarvānāmnā parāmṛśati /
GSP29nystik_u:712: yasya hi vyāpāraṃ prādhānyena dhāturākhyātapratyayo vābhidhatte sa svatantraḥ kartā /
GSP29nystik_u:713: tathā hi viklidyantīyatra taṇḍulādayaḥ kartāraḥ, pacantītyatra devadattādayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:714: tat kasya hetoḥ? ekatra taṇḍulādervyāpāra upātto 'paratra devadattāderiti /
GSP29nystik_u:719: tasya cetanasya sarvakārakāṇi prati prayoktṛtvam, taiśca kārakairaprayojyatā vā /
GSP29nystik_u:720: acetanasya tu bhāktava kartṛtvaṃ na svābhāvikamiti bhāvaḥ parisamāptipadārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe--tattvaparisamāptiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:723: paryavasānaṃ parisamāptiḥ viniyojyeti vaktavye yogyatāgrahaṇamīpsite 'pi dṛṣṭe vastuni kutaścit pratibandhāt puruṣeṇānupātte mā bhūt tattvāparisamāptiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:724: yadyapi hi tat puruṣeṇānupāttaṃ tathāpyupādānayogyatāpradarśanādasti tattvaparisamāptiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:725: tatpratiṣedhaśca ityatra tacchabdena hānopādānalakṣaṇaṃ viniyogaṃ parāmṛśati //
GSP29nystik_u:734: pṛthivyāpastejovayuriti vā catvāri bhūtānītyādīti na tado vācyāni bhavantītyata āha-- pramāṇaviṣayatvenādhikārāt /
GSP29nystik_u:735: sūtrabhāṣyavākyatadvivaraṇeṣu pramāṇa pramāṇaviṣayaścādhikṛtaḥ na ca saṃkhyādisiddhāntabhedānupātino 'rthāḥ pramāṇaviṣayāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:754: yadi sadasatī samarthe kutastarhi tayormeda ityata āha--svatantreti /
GSP29nystik_u:759: saṃprati sadupalambhakasya pramāṇasyāsadūpalambhakatvaṃ pratipipādayiṣatā bhāṣyakāreṇa pradīpo dṛṣṭānta upanyastaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:762: gopālāṅganā api hi kimatrāsti steno 'smaddhanaṃ vā apavarake na veti sandihānā pradīpamupādāya samantādavalokyāpavarakamastīhāsmaddhanaṃ nāsti stena iti samameva niścinvanti,
GSP29nystik_u:764: tenāgāpālāḍnamā ca paṇḍitarūpebhyaḥ siddhaḥ pradīpo dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:766: anāśrayaṇe hetumāha pradīpena dṛśyamāne hi ghaṭādike 'rthe svatantre nānena samānajātīyaṃ tulyopalambhayogyataṃ dṛśyāntaramasti /
GSP29nystik_u:767: nīlapītau hi parasparābhāvavantau, tena nalīniṣedhe nāvaśyaṃ pītavidhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:768: bhāvābhāvau tu parasparābhāvātmānau, no khalvabhāvābhāvo nāma kaścidanyo bhāvarūpāt /
GSP29nystik_u:772: pradīpena bhāvo 'pi bhaviṣyatīti, tatraiṣa parīkṣakāṇāṃ tarka upatiṣṭhate--yadyabhaviṣayaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:773: tadevaṃ laukikaparīkṣakasaṃmataṃ dṛṣṭāntamupapādya dārṣṭāntike yojayati--eve pramāṇenāpi indriyādinā sati pramīyamāṇe iti /
GSP29nystik_u:778: kasmāt sadbhedā ivāsadbhedā api sūtrakṛtā nocyanta ityata āha--tatra teṣu sadasadbhedeṣu madhye svātantryeṇāsadbhedā na prakāśanta iti nocyante /
GSP29nystik_u:779: niṣedhyaniṣedhādhikāraṇādhīnanirūpaṇatvādasadbhedānāṃ bhāvabhedatantraṃ pramāśanamiti bhāvabhedakathanenaivābhāvabhedā api gamyanta iti noktā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:780: atha vā kathitā eva yeṣāṃ tattvajñānaṃ niḥśreyasopayogi,
GSP29nystik_u:781: yaṃ tu na tathā na teṣāṃ prapañcaḥ anupayuktabhāvaprapañca iva vaktavya ityāha--caturvargānantarbhāvād vā bhāvaprapañcavad abhāvaprapañca iti /
GSP29nystik_u:783: atha niḥśreyasopayogābhāvaḥ kuto 'vagantavya ityata āha--bhāvopadeśādevābhāva upadiṣṭo bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:789: tadevaṃ tātparyaṃ vyākhyāya avayavārthaṃ vyākhyātuṃ bhāṣyaṃ paṭhati--sacca khalu ṣoḍaśadhāvyūḍhamupadekṣyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:790: atra prathame kalpe caśabdo 'vadhāraṇe, khalu śabdaḥ spaṣṭārthe /
GSP29nystik_u:791: tadeva ṣoḍaśadhā vyūḍhamupadekhyate nāsat, tasya sadadhīnaprakāśatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:792: dvitīye tu kalpe pāramārthike caḥ samucce,
GSP29nystik_u:796_0: sūtrasya saprapañca tātparyaṃ vyākhyāya avayavārthaṃ vyācikhyāsunā bhāṣyakāreṇa tāsāṃ
GSP29nystik_u:796_1: khalvāsāṃ sadvidhānāmiti bhāṣyeṇa sūtramavatārya paṭhitaṃ tadasya vārtikakṛt tātparyamāha--ta
GSP29nystik_u:797: ta ete pramāṇādayaḥ sadbhedā niḥśreyasopayogino na gaṅgāvālukādayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:802: bahuvrīhikarmadhārayayorasaṃbhāvāt ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaparigrahe nigrahasthānasyāntyapadārthasya prādhānye vivakṣitārthahānaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:804: anyonyanirapekṣāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ pramāhetubhāvaḥ pramāṇānāmiti hi bahuvacanaprayojanam /
GSP29nystik_u:805: prameyeṣu tu yadyapi prameyatā vāstavī pratyekamasti tathāpyapavargahetubhāvena prameyatā samudāye samāpyate, na tu pratyekam /
GSP29nystik_u:806: ātmādīnāmanyamatasyāpyatattvajñāne saṃsārānanivṛtteriti yadeva hi nirdeśa vacanabhedasya prayojanam,
GSP29nystik_u:809: pramāṇādīnāmiti vibhaktyarthavyākhyānaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ paṭhitvā pṛcchati--kaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:813: kārakagrahaṇena ca tannāntarīyakatayā pradhānakriyāpyānīteti vivaraṇe sāpi darśitā /
GSP29nystik_u:814: yadyapi svasvāmibhāvādāvapi saṃbandhe 'ntargataḥ kriyākārakasaṃbandho 'sti saṃbandhamātrasya kriyāgarbhatvāt tannāntarīyakatvācca kārakasya,
GSP29nystik_u:822: iṣusthityā yathā tadbhāvapratiṣedha iṣobhāvo dharmo gatiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:825: evamatrāpi na pramāṇaprameyādimātramacyate tattvagrahaṇenāpi tvarthāntaraṃ teṣveva yat yat samāropitaṃ rūpamanyathātvamiti yāvat tat pratiṣidhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:830: tena gati mattvamarthāntaramiṣornabhavatītyasminnarthe iṣoḥ sthitiriti prayujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:832: pramāṇadibhyo 'narthāntarasya tattvasya ca iṣoranarthāntarasya gatyabhāvasya cāsiddheḥ / yathā ca bhāvātirikto 'bhāvastathā kṣaṇabhaṅgādhikāre nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:838: sā ca dvayī svrūpalakṣaṇā sahakārisākalyalakṣaṇā ca,
GSP29nystik_u:840: śakteśca bhāvatvena bhavitṛnirūpaṇādhīnanirūpaṇatvād bhaviturapi nirūpaṇaṃ bhavatītyuktam //
GSP29nystik_u:842: takrijñadṛṣṭaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ grahītuṃ dṛṣṭamatiprasaṅgāpādanena dūṣayati--eve ca kṛtveti /
GSP29nystik_u:845: yadyapi niḥśreyasapadamabhimatamātravāci pramāṇāditattvajñānasya ca dṛṣṭamapi niḥśreyasaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:854: tasya āgamānumānasahakāriṇā kāraṇābhāvena kāryābhāvānumānamevātrārthe pramāṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:855: ye tu vaiyātyāt manyeran padārthatattvajñānamātrameva paraniḥśreyasaheturiti, yathāhuḥ---
GSP29nystik_u:856: eko bhāvastattvato yena dṛṣṭāḥ, sarve bhāvāstattvatastena dṛṣṭāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:858: na hi bhāvānāṃ tattvamanyadataḥ pratyakṣaviṣayīkṛtād rūpāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:859: mokṣamāṇā iti, sani muco 'karmakasya guṇo vā iti guṇābhyāsalopau /
GSP29nystik_u:863: kimarthamātmādasūtreṇa dvādaśaiva prameyāṇi nādhikāni na nyūnāni cetyavadhāryate sūtrakārerṇa?
GSP29nystik_u:864: tasmāt tadeva sākṣādupayoti niḥśreyase na padārthamātramityāha--prameyāvadhāraṇārthāyāṃ cotrarasūtraprikriyāyāmakuśalaḥ sūtrakāraḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:866: tasmād yadyupapattiḥ yadi ca sūtrakārabhimatasubhayathāpi prameyatattvaparijñānaṃ parasya niḥśreyasasya hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:868: atha kiṃ tattvajñānasyātmādiviṣayasyādṛṣṭa eva ko 'pi sāmarthyātiśayo yataḥ paraniḥśreyasotpādaḥ, maivam /
GSP29nystik_u:870: dṛṣṭayaiva dvāretyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ-- taccaitaditi niḥśreyasahetubhāvābhidhānasya anu paścāt udyate anūdyate /
GSP29nystik_u:882: na kevalaṃ heyādhigantavyabhedena dvādaśavidra prameyaṃ darśayataḥ tadviṣayatattvajñānāya ca sopakaraṇanyāyābhidhānapramāṇavyutpādakaṃ śāstraṃ praṇayataḥ sūtrakārasya saṃmatam,
GSP29nystik_u:884: tatra saṃśayādīnāṃ pṛthagvacanamanarthakam ityādi codyabhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭesaṃśayādyagrahaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:894: sa cāyaṃ kiṃsviditi vastuvimarśamātramanavadhāraṇajñānaṃ saṃśaya iti bhāṣyam /
GSP29nystik_u:896: saṃśayastāvaditi jñānamavadhāraṇaṃ pratyaya iti paryāyā iti manvānaścādayati--anavadhāraṇātmaka iti /
GSP29nystik_u:898: api tu tidvaśeṣaviścayavacanaḥ kiṃsviditi dolāyamānasyobhayakoṭispṛśaḥ pratyayasyārthe 'navadhāraṇātmakasyāpi pratyātmaṃ mānasena pratyakṣeṇāvadhāryamāṇatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:901: tatra nānapalabdhe ityādi bhāṣyamavatārayituṃ pṛcchati-- sa kathaṃ nyāyasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:902: yadi nyāyasyāṅga saṃśayo bhavet, so 'pi vyutpādyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:908: tasyāśrayo viṣaya upalabdha ucyamāno nirṇota eva vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:909: sandigdhe hi tasmin hetuḥ sandigdhāśrayatayā asiddhaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:914: samāmanyataḥ parvatamātramupalabdhaṃ nirṇotam, tadviśeṣastu vahnimattvādiranirṇīta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:916: upalabdho nirṇota iti hi sāmānādhikaraṇyāt samānaviṣayatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP29nystik_u:918: sāmānyaviśeṣabhedena tu vyāghātaṃ pariharan sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na samarthayasa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:921: ya eva sāmānyo nirṇotaḥ, sa eva viśeṣato 'nirṇoto 'pi saṃbhavatīti na vyāghāta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:923: na hi kariṇi dṛṣṭe cītkāreṇa tamanumīme pekṣāvanta iti //
GSP29nystik_u:930: tatra kāma itīcchāmātraṃ vocyate, kāminīviṣayo vā rāgaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:931: pūrvasmina kalpe kāma ityevāstu kṛtaṃ dharmādibhaḥ, sarveṣāmeva kāmyamānatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:934: tasmādayuktamediti manvāna āha-- vayaṃ tu paśyāma iti /
GSP29nystik_u:935: sukhasyāptyā duḥkhasya hānyā viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇaṃ pratyayamupalakṣamati /
GSP29nystik_u:937: tathāpi sukhaduḥkhāptitahānyoreva kartuḥ pravṛttiprasaṅgo na tatsādhane,
GSP29nystik_u:938: na hyanyadvijānāti icchati ca karoti cānyaditi ghaṭate, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:939: na ca phalaṃ puruṣapravṛttigocaraḥ, tatsādhanaṃ tu tadgocaraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:950: tenopāyajñānasya sākṣāt puruṣapravṛttihetuvam, phalasya tvīpsitamasyodyeśatayeti sarvaṃ sundaram /
GSP29nystik_u:951: tadāśrayaśca nyāyaḥ pravartate iti bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe--tadidaṃ prayojanaṃ nyāyasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:957: na jātu niṣprayojanā kākadantādau parīkṣāmārabhante prekṣāvanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:962: nanvevamapi nīyate prāpyate vivakṣitārthasiddhiraneneti vyupattyā pratyakṣādi pratyekaṃ nyāyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:968: parīkṣitu tu liṅga pancāvayavopapannamanumeyapratyayaphalaṃ bhāvayatyeva, na tvatumeyārthaparīkṣā /
GSP29nystik_u:979: na tadvirodha iti pradarśanārthaṃ bhāṣyamanubhāṣya tātparyāṃ vyācaṣṭe--prayakṣāgameti /
GSP29nystik_u:980: kathaṃ punaranena bhāṣyeṇa taducyata ityata āha--yadihānumāneneti /
GSP29nystik_u:986: sa khalu tādṛśaḥ pañcāvayavaprayogo lābhapūjākhyātikāmaiḥ paṇḍitavya/janairūpavarṇyamānaḥ pratyavāyāya,
GSP29nystik_u:988: tadevaṃ samudāyato bhaṣyaṃ vyākhyāyavayavavibhāgāya paṭhati-yat punaranumānamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:992: na cet, tata eve tarhi tadanumānābhāsamiti kṛtaṃ pratyakṣavirodhena /
GSP29nystik_u:1001: na ca sapakṣāsapakṣāvevānvayavyatirekāgamyāvinābhāvadarśanaviṣayau na pakṣa iti sāmpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:1002: yadi hi pakṣaṃ vihāya bahireva sapakṣāsapakṣayoravinābhāvo gamyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:1003: tadā bahirvyāptimātrabalena pakṣadharmo 'pi heturna pakṣe sādhyaṃ sādhayet /
GSP29nystik_u:1007: evaṃ ca siddhaḥ pakṣe 'pi vyabhicāraḥ sādhanadharmasyetyanaikāntikatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:1010: na hyasti saṃbhavo rūpatrayasaṃpannaṃ viruddhaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1014: sa caivaṃ pravartate--yo yaḥ kṛtakaḥ sa sarvo 'nuṣṇo yathā ghaṭadiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:1015: na ca vahneriva dhūmasaṃbandhe ārdrendhanasaṃyogo gurvantavāsinoḥ sāhacarye iva svādhyāyādhyayanamupādhiḥ kṛtakatvānuṣṇatvayoḥ saṃbandhe upalabhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1016: so 'yaṃ śaṅkitaḥ samāropito vā prayatnena punaḥpunaranviṣyamāṇo 'nupalabhyamānastatra tatra ghaṭādāvupādhirnāstīti pratyakṣeṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:1022: kṛtakatvasyānuṣṇatvena svābhāvika autsārgikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sāmānyena yo yaḥ kṛkaḥ sa sarvo 'nuṣṇa ityavadhāritaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1026: tathā ca tatra tatraikadeśe pratyekaṃ vyāptipradarśanamaśakyam, ānanyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1028_1: viśeṣe tejovayavini sādhayitumanuṣṇatonmukhaṃ yanna sādhayet tat kiṃ pratyakṣeṇāpahṛtaviṣayatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:1031: uṣṇe tejovayavini kṛtakatvasya darśanād anaikāntikamapakṣadharmo vā kṛtakatvamiti cet-na,
GSP29nystik_u:1033: pratyakṣeṇa tejo 'vayavina auṣṇyagraheṇa tatra kṛtakatvasya hetorvṛttāvutpannamapi vyāptivijñānaṃ bādhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1036: anyathā tadgatasādhyadharmasandehe tatropalabhyamānaḥ sādhanadharmaḥ sandigdhabyatirekivādanaikāntikaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1040: tadidamuktam--yasmina viṣaye tejaso 'nuṣṇatve etat prayuktam, sa pratyakṣeṇāpahṛta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1041: evaṃ cānumāne dūṣite kṛtamapakṣadharmatvavyabhicārābhyāṃ tadupajīvibhyāmiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:1042: yat punaḥ dignāgena pratyakṣaviruddhamanumānamudāhṛtaṃ tadupanyasyati- apare punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:1043: aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭādivaditi bruvāṇaḥ śabdasvarūpamevāpalapati /
GSP29nystik_u:1054: sati vibhave na jīrṇamalavadvāsāḥ stātakaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1056: tadvadihāpi aśrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti śrutivākyayoḥ sāmarthyāt śrāvaṇatvaviśeṣaṇopasaṃkānto niṣedho na viśeṣyeṇa śabdena saha saṃbadhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1058: vacanārthāvirodhino 'rthasyārthagamyatvānna tadvirodhinaḥ śrāvaṇatvaniṣedhasya cādhikāraṇa śabda iti na śabdābhāve tanniṣedho 'vakalpate /
GSP29nystik_u:1074: uttaram- śuci naraśiraḥ- kapālamiti bruvatā śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇānapekṣeṇānumānamātrasahāyenātra vastuni vayā śucirūpo 'rtho vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1085: kāpalikānāṃ tvāgamavihitamakurvatāṃ kurvatāṃ ca tanniṣiddhamarthaṃ prayatnenānādirapi vyavahāraḥ śākyamallakādīnāmiva na vedānumānamūlamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1089: api cāgamānapekṣo 'numānena śaucaṃ naraśiraḥkapālaṃvyavasthāpayan praṣṭavyo jāyate-- śuci naraśiraḥkapālamiti ko 'rthaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:1090: nanu ca eva vākyāt pratīyate sa evārthaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1091: tat kiṃ pṛcchacata ityata āha--viśeṣavidhānaṃ ca śeṣapratiṣedhaparaṃ loke dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nystik_u:1092: yathā dakṣiṇena cakṣuṣā paśyatīti ukte na vāmeneti gamyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1093: tadiha yadi śuci naraśiraḥkapālam, kimanyadaśucīti vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1095: āgamapramāṇyaṃ ca na manyasa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1096: atha trayīvidveṣād anumānapakṣāpātinā tvayā sarvameva naraviṭkapālādi śaucapakṣe nikṣipyata ityāha--atha sarvameva śuci /
GSP29nystik_u:1100: na khalu pramāṇatvena pratyakṣāgamābhyāmanumānasya kaścid viśeṣo yena tau bādhakāvanumānasya nānumānamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1102: ayamabhisandhiḥ---yat tāvadanumānaṃ pūrvapravṛttaṃ tena bādhitaviṣayaṃ tabdalabhāvi paścattanamanumāna na svakāryāya paryāptam,
GSP29nystik_u:1104: labdhasvarūpaṃ hi vastu kvacit kiścinniṣidhye, na tu jñānākārālīke bahiriti tṛtīye nivradayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1105: tadiha śrāvaṇatvaṃ śabdasya niṣedhatāpūrvaṃ śravaṇamindriyamatīndriya tadgrāhrātvaṃ ca vastunī anumātavye śabdopalambhalakṣaṇena kāryeṇa /
GSP29nystik_u:1106: tathā caitenaivānumānenāpahṛtaviṣayamaśrāvaṇatvānumānaṃ caramamanvayavyatirekasaṃpannamapi na svocitaṃ kāryā janayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1107: eve tanubhuvanādīnāṃ na karteśvaro 'śarīritvānmuktasatmavat prayojanābhāvādityādyāpīśvaradharmigrāhimūlānamānenāpahṛtaviṣayatayā nyāyābhāsaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1109: na hyanayoranyatarad bādhyaṃ bādhaka vā saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1110: kiṃ tu mithaḥ satpratipakṣatayā na pramāṃ kurutaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1112: asamāveśe vā kutaḥ satpratipakṣatetyata āha--na hyanvayavyatirekasampanne iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1114: etaiḥ sampannayoryadi samāveśa ekasmin viṣaye bhavet,
GSP29nystik_u:1115: tata ekatarasya bādhyatvaṃ bādhakatvaṃ vā gamyetāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:1117: upasaṃharati- -tasmānnānumānavirudvam anumānaṃ tulyabalam, api tu satpratipakṣamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1118_1: na pratyakṣeṇa tadviruddhārthopasaṃhāriṇā samāveśa iti na bādhyabādhakabhāva iyabhiprāyeṇa
GSP29nystik_u:1120: tulyabalau hi mithaḥ pratipakṣau bhavataḥ na tu durbalottamabalau /
GSP29nystik_u:1121: na hi bhavati tarakṣuḥ prapikṣo hariṇaśāvakasya,
GSP29nystik_u:1124: pūrvabhāvi pratyakṣamananyathāsiddhaṃ sadasatpratipakṣamanumānaṃ samānaviṣayasamāveśād bādhata iti yuktamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:1126: gosadṛśo gavaya ityāraṇyakasya vākyaṃ śrutvā yadā nāgarako vanaṃ gato gosadṛśaṃ piṇḍamupalabhe,
GSP29nystik_u:1127: tadāsya vākyārthānubhavāhitasaṃskāraprabodhajanitasmṛtyapekṣa gosādṛśyajñānamupamānaṃ puro 'vasthitasya piṇḍasya gavayaśabdavācyatvajñāne pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:1129: pramāṇayet naiṣa piṇḍo gavayaśabdavācyo gopiṇḍasādṛśyād gopiṇḍāntaravaditi,
GSP29nystik_u:1140: prayojanasvarūpopayogābhidhānānantaraṃ dṛṣṭāntapade vyākhyātavye tadullaṅghanena vādajalpayoḥ ko 'vasara ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1144: vādajalpakathayorhi na dvayorvādiprativādinoḥ sādhane samīcīne saṃbhavataḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1146: tasmād dvayorekasya nyāyaḥ, ekasya tu nyāyābhāsa iti vādajalpābhyāṃ vivicyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1147: nyāyābhāsa iti tu sannidhānāduktam, sannihitārthatvāt sarvanāmna iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1148: vitaṇḍā tu parīkṣyataṃ, saprayojanā niṣprayojanā veti /
GSP29nystik_u:1153: tathā vitaṇḍacate vyāhanyate 'nayā pratipakṣasādhanamiti vyutpattyā parapakṣopaghātena pāriśeṣyāt svapakṣasiddhirasyāḥ prayojanaṃ pratīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1154: tadevaṃ sandigdhaprayojanā satī vitaṇḍā parīkṣyate, prayojanavatī na veti /
GSP29nystik_u:1155: tatra yadi niṣprayojanā tato na sarvā vidyāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1157: tanmukhena ca sarve prāṇinaḥ prayojanena vyāptāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1158: vitaṇḍāyā eva karmarūpāyā vidyārūpāyā vā niṣprayojanātvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1160: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? tatra kecid bruvate niṣprayojanā vitaṇḍeti /
GSP29nystik_u:1164: na hi parvatanitambavartiti dhūme asiddhatvādinā dūṣite vahnestatrābhāvo niścīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1169: sa tu svapakṣaseddhacaiva prayojanena pratipakṣasādhanamāhantīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1170: tadaneva (sa) yadi prayojanamanuyukta ityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:1171: atha na pratipadyata ityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭa--atha pakṣamapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:1173: nāstiko hi sadasadubhayānubhayarūpatayā na vicāraṃ sahanta iti prameyāṇi sarvathā dūṣayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1175: na tvasyāsti pakṣo na ca sthāpanā /
GSP29nystik_u:1178: edadvibhajate--etasminnapi pakṣe caturvarga cet pratīpadyate so 'sya pakṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1181: tathāpi tannāntarīyakatayā abhyupagamamātreṇa caturvargo 'pi pakṣa uktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1183: eṣa sādhanavādī jñāpayati--ahaṃ vaitaṇḍiko jāne anena pañcāvayavena sādhānāvākyenedaṃ sādhyaṃ jñāpyata iti caturvargaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1184: tatpratītyā khalvasya vaitaṇḍikasya parapakṣaniṣedhaḥ prayojanaṃ sidhyati /
GSP29nystik_u:1185: tathā ca na viṣprayojano 'yaṃ vaitaṇḍika ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1186: dvitīyaṃ kalpaṃ dūṣayati--atha na pratipadyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1187: caturvarganāntarīyakatvāt dūṣaṇamapi na pratipadyate ityunmattavadupakṣaṇīya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1191: athāsiddhaviruddhādīnāṃ sadbhāvābhyupagame prameyamadhyapātināṃ prameyamātravicārāsahatvābhyupagamo vighaṭata iti svavākyābhihitamevāddhiviruddhādi na pratipadyate, pūrvavaddoṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1193: tasmād vitaṇḍāpi prayojanavatīti nāvyāpakaṃ prayojanamiti siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:1197: na tāvad yo yaḥ pratyakṣaviṣayaḥ, sa sarvo dṛṣṭāntaḥ, adṛṣṭāntasyāpi pratyakṣaviṣayatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1198: nāpi yo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa sarvaḥ pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ, āgamādiviṣayasyāpi dṛṣṭāntatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1203: anyathā yadaprasiddhaṃ laukikānāṃ kevalaṃ paṇḍitarūpavedanīyaṃ paramāṇvādi tasyādṛṣṭāntatā syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1204: atra ca yo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa evam, ta tu ya eve sa dṛṣṭānta iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1207: na kevalaṃ prameyavirodhaḥ sūtravirodhaścetyata āha--tataścodāharaṇasūtraṃ vyāhanyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1208: yat teṣu teṣu śāstrapradeśeṣvatīndriyodāharaṇasūtraṃ siddhānte pūrvapakṣe vā yathā,
GSP29nystik_u:1217: nyāyasya pañcāvayavātmakasya vacanasamūhasya dṛṣṭānto mūlam, atastasya pṛthagupadeśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1223: saṃbandhagrahaṇaṃ ca śābdasyāpi jñānasya nimittaṃ prathamaśrāviṇaḥ śabdādarthajñānābhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1230: idamiti hi dharmiviṣayaṃ siddhāntaṃ darśayati, dharmo sarvatantrasiddhāntaviṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1237: asyāpi prameyāntargratasyāpi sataḥ pṛthagupādānaprayojanamāha--tasya prameya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1240_0: tathā hi yadi ghaṭo nāma na sarvatantrasiddhāntasiddhaḥ kimāśrayā avayavī vā paramāṇusamūho
GSP29nystik_u:1240_1: vā jñānākāro vā pradhānapariṇāmo vā brahmapariṇāmo vā tadvivarto veti pratitantrasiddhāntāḥ pravartante?
GSP29nystik_u:1244: kathaṃ sādhyasāmānyavyāptaṃ sādhanasāmānyamiti sāṇanaviśeṣat sādhyaviśeṣo gamyeta?
GSP29nystik_u:1246: abhyupagamasiddhāntaṃ copariṣṭād vicārayiṣyati vāttikakṛt iti tatprayojanamihāsmābhinogktamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:1248: nanu yathā tantavaḥ paṭasya samavācikāraṇaṃ kiṃ tathaivaite pratijñādayo vākyasya?
GSP29nystik_u:1249: no khalu rāganaguṇā varṇāḥ samavāyikāraṇatāṃ pratipadyanta ityāha-- vākyaikadeśā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1252: yathā hyavayavāḥ samudāyina ekasminnavayavini kārye dhārayitavye ca,
GSP29nystik_u:1253: evamekasmin vivakṣitārthapratipādane pratijñādayo 'vayavā vākyasya samudāyasya samudāyina iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1254: nanu varṇānāmāśutaravināśināṃ kramavatāmekakālatvābhāve samudāyābhāvāt kutastatsamudāyo vākyam,
GSP29nystik_u:1258: kriyā vā kārakaṃ vā prātipadikārtho vā padārthāntaraviśiṣṭo vākyārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1259: yathā somena yajeta godohanena paśukāmasya yasya pitā pitāmaho vā somaṃ na pibet sa vrātya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1265: na ca tadaviditaṃ sattāmātreṇa cakṣurādivad viśeṣyaṃ pratipādayatītyata uktam--pratyaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1268: na hi kramavadvarṇasamudāyaḥ padaṃ śravaṇendriyānubhavagocaraḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1278: ata evādhyayanasamaye gurumukhād gṛhīto vedarāśirvedāṅgopāṅgajñānasaṃskṛtena smaryamāṇa eva tasyārthaṃ bodhayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1279: evaṃ ca yadā padārthapratyāyana eva padānubhavo na kāraṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:1281: yadi tarhi viśeṣyapadameva smaryamāṇaṃ viśiṣṭamarthamavagamayati kṛtaṃ padāntaraiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1285: yadyapi smaraṇāni na saha saṃbhavanti tathāpyekasmṛtisamārūḍhāni vā padāni nirantarasmṛtisaṃtānasamārūsani vā parasparāpekṣāṇi /
GSP29nystik_u:1286: tathā ca smaryamāṇaṃ viśeṣyapadaṃ viśeṣaṇapadāpekṣaṃ viśiṣṭamarthamavagamayatīti //
GSP29nystik_u:1294: tathāpi padārthasmṛtiravāntaravyāpārabhūtā apekṣate kāṣṭhānīva pākapravṛttāni jvalanamavāntaravyāpāram /
GSP29nystik_u:1295: na ca padānyagṛhītasaṅketāti padārthān smārayantīti upapannā padārthasmṛtisaṃbandhasaṃvedanayorapekṣeti /
GSP29nystik_u:1297: hanta daśadāḍimāni ṣaḍapūpā bhavantītyevamādīnāmapi vākyārthabodhakatvaṃ syādityata āha--pratisandhīyamānaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1300: na ca daśadāḍimādivākyādiṣu tadastīti na tato vākyārthāvabodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1301: tadevamekasmṛtisamāroheṇa emārthāvacchedena ca padānāṃ samūho vākyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1310: vāstavo dharmaḥ siddhiḥ, tadgocarastu viniścayaḥ puruṣadharmo niṣpattiriti viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1311: kiyadbhiḥ kimabhidhānaiśca vibhāgaiḥ siddhiḥ parisamāpyata ityāśaṅkya bhāṣyakṛtoktam--tasya pañceti /
GSP29nystik_u:1325: āgamopacārasya ca prayojanamidaṃ yadarthasaṃvādenāgamenānugṛhyate nyāyaḥ saprayojanaśca bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1327: tasmād yadyapi na nyāyamātravartinī pratijñā āgamaḥ, tathāpi prakṛtanyāyābhiprāyeṇaitad draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1328: tathā cāgamārthasaṃbandhena pratijñāyāḥ kalpitaviṣayatvamapi parākṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1333: na ca liṅgadarśanamātramanumeyapratipattihetuḥ, api tu saṃbandhasmṛtisahakāri /
GSP29nystik_u:1335_1: liṅgadarśanamātre dṛśyamāne liṅgarūpe saṃbandhasmaraṇarahite hetūpacārāt anumānatvopacārat
GSP29nystik_u:1345: yat tad dvitīyaṃ liṅgadarśanaṃ śuddhamapyāpātataḥ saṃbandhasmṛtihetubhāvāt saṃbandhasmṛti sahakāryeva /
GSP29nystik_u:1347: evaṃ ca tatpratipādakasya vacasa upapanno 'numānatvopacāra iti siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:1348: evaṃ ca vāstavena liṅgena saṃbandhāt tadvacanasya buddhivikālpitaliṅgaviṣayatvaṃ parāstaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1352: yatra pratyakṣaviṣaye pūrvaṃ vyāptirgṛhītā tasya smṛtiriti smṛtiviṣayasya pratyakṣataḥ punarūpadarśanāt avipratipattyā punaḥ smaraṇāt tatsmārakaṃ vacanamudāharaṇaṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP29nystik_u:1359: upanayo hi tathā caitaditi pravartamāna udāharaṇasthaṃ yathāśabdārthamapekṣata iti yathā tatheti pravartata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1360: kiṃ punarūpamānaṃ yasyāyamekadeśa ityata āha--upamānaṃ khalu tathā gaustathā gavaya ityupadeśopayoge /
GSP29nystik_u:1362: tasmin sati paśvād vanaṃ gato nāgarakaḥ pratyekṣeṇādṛṣṭapūrvaṃ piṇḍaṃ paśyati /
GSP29nystik_u:1364: piṇḍasya ca purovartinaḥ smaryamāṇena gavā sādṛśyaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva paśyati /
GSP29nystik_u:1365: tadevaṃbhūtaṃ sārūpyajñānaṃ gavayaśabdavācyo 'yaṃ piṇḍa iti pratītiheturūpamānam /
GSP29nystik_u:1366: tadetasyopamānasyopadeśārthasmaraṇagavayapiṇḍagosārūpyāpratyakṣarūpasyaikadeśe sarūpye yo yathātathābhāvaḥ sa upanaye 'pyastītyetāvatopamānatvopacāra upanaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1369: na khalvavayavānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ vā vākye samavāyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1375: iha tu vibhajyamānānāmavayavānāṃ nanmūlānāṃ ca pramāṇānāṃ sākāṅkṣatvameva dharmaḥ samārthyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1376: tadatra samastarūpasampannaliṅgapratipādanamekaṃ prayojanaṃ vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvaṃ cāstīti siddhamekavākyatvamavayavānāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1378: so 'yamiti bhāṣyamanubhāṣya pṛcchati--kaḥ punaḥ paramaśabdasyārtha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1381: yadyapi loke pratyakṣādīnāmekaikaśo 'pi vipratipannapuruṣapratipādakatvaṃ tatra tatropalabhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:1388: yata eva vādādipravṛttihetavo 'ta eva tattvavyavasthāyāścāśrayā bhavantīti /
GSP29nystik_u:1397: astu tarhi pramāṇapadasaṃgṛhītebhyaḥ pramāṇebhyaḥ pramāṇāntaramasaṃgṛhītaṃ pramāṇapadena prameyapadenevāsaṃgṛhītāḥ saṃśayādayaḥ prameyā ityata āha--na pramāṇāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:1403: na hi vayaṃ guṇatvenotpattimattvena vā rūpeṇāniścāyakatvaṃ tarkasyācakṣmahe,
GSP29nystik_u:1411: tasya vyāpāramāha--yat tatra yuktaṃ bhavati, saṃbhavati tadanujānāti na tvavadhārayati tarkaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1412: etaduktaṃ bhavati pramāṇaṃ tattvāvadhāraṇāya pravṛttaṃ karaṇatayā itikartavyatāmapekṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:1413: tarkaśca pramāṇaviṣayayuktāyuktavicārātmā pramāṇaṃ yukte tattve pravartamānamanujānan pramāṇamanugṛhṇarati /
GSP29nystik_u:1415: na ca pramāṇaviṣaye cet tarkaḥ pravartate kṛtamasya pramāṇānujñayā,
GSP29nystik_u:1418: asti hi prasaṅgo na prasaṅgo hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1419: tathā hi pratyakṣameva tāvad bhūtale pravartamānaṃ tadviśeṣaṇatayā ghaṭābhāve 'pi pravartamānaṃ yadyatrābhaviṣyad ghaṭo bhūtalamivādrakṣyata,
GSP29nystik_u:1422: tasmānnāstīti tarkeṇānujñāyamānaṃ ghaṭābhāviśiṣṭe bhūtale pravartate kevalamevedaṃ bhūtalaṃ neha ghaṭa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1423_0: evaṃ svargakāmo yajeta iti śabdo 'pi pravartamānaḥ paramāptasya bhagavatar iśvarasya
GSP29nystik_u:1423_1: niyogo nāsvargaphalāyāṃ yāgabhāvanāyāmavakalpata iti samānapadenopatto 'pi duḥkhatayā
GSP29nystik_u:1424: bhinnapadopatto 'pi puruṣaviśeṣaṇamapi svarga eva bhāvanāphalaṃ yukta iti tarkeṇānujñāyamānaḥ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:1425: na ca yadyabhaviṣyad ghaṭa iti vā yadyabhaviṣyad dhātvarthaḥ sāghya iti vā kriyātipattirasti,
GSP29nystik_u:1429: niśvayāya tu pravṛttaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadviṣayavivecanenānugṛhṇan itikartavyātvenopayujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1450: yadyekaṃ nimittaṃ syād vaicitryaṃ na bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:1454: yāgādikā tu kriyā āśutaravināśinī na cirabhāvine svargāya kalpata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1455: avasthitaṃ ced yāgādyāhitamapūrvaṃ dharmo 'stīti sadaiva sukhinā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1456: evamadharmo 'stīti sadaiva duḥkhī syāditi sukhaduḥkhayoḥ kādācitkatvaṃ vyāhanyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:1459: kiṃ tu tāvadanena sthātavyaṃ na yāvadantyasukhaduḥkhasaṃvijñānaṃ janayati,
GSP29nystik_u:1461: nanu bhinnāni santvapūrvāṇi, tathāpi sarvāṇi sarvātmasamavetāti, yathāvayavī svāvayaveṣu /
GSP29nystik_u:1463: ekadravyaṃ cedastu tarhi sarvasādhāraṇe pṛthivyādau yatra kvacit /
GSP29nystik_u:1465: atha pṛthivyādyeva kāraṇa janmavaicitrye kasmānna bhavatītyāśayavān pṛcchati--kiṃ kāraṇamiti kasmāt kāraṇādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1467: mā bhūt pṛthivyādi, pṛthivyādigataṃ kiñcid bhaviṣyatītyata āha-- pṛthivyādigatasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:1474: paramārthatastu tarkapūrvakastattvaviniścayo nirṇaya iti pratyakṣādīnāmapi tarkasahāyānāṃ nirṇayaphalatvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1476: dhūmādigocareṇa nirṇayena vahnyādāvanumīyamāne pramāṇabheva nirṇayo na phalamityāśayavān pṛcchati--kadā punatiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1485: ekasyāpi śāstrakartuḥ pūrvapakṣottarapakṣasādhanadūṣaṇapratipādako vacanasamūho vādaḥ syāditi nānāpravaktṛka ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:1486: siddhāntabhedānavidhānena hi dvāvapi svasiddhāntānurūpaṃ sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ cāhaturityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1489: pratyadhikāraṇa sādhanaṃ yasmin vāde sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1492: tathā ca nānāpravaktṛkatvena tulyatve 'pi vādasya vitaṇḍāyāḥ pratyadhikaraṇasādhanatvena bhadeḥ siddho bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:1495: asti hi jalpasya pratyadhikaraṇasādhanavatvaṃ ca nānāpravaktṛkatvaṃ ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:1512: bhāṣyamanubhāṣya pṛcchati--kaḥ punarviśeṣaḥ? yadyogād viśiṣṭe vādāt jalpavitaṇḍe ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1516: netyāha--etāvatā viśeṣeṇa kathāmārgabheda iti etāvāneva viśeṣo na sarvathā,
GSP29nystik_u:1523: pañcasu caturṣu vā liṅgarūpeṣvanyatamaṃ liṅgaṃ dharmamekaṃ dvayaṃ trayaṃ vānuvidadhānā ahetavo hetuvadābhāsānta iti hetvābhāsā uktāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1529: kiṃ ye ye nigrahasthānebhyaḥ pṛthagupadiśyante, te sarve vāde codyante?
GSP29nystik_u:1530: atha ye ye vāde codyante te sarve pṛthugupadiśyante iti?
GSP29nystik_u:1534: tasmāt nāyamavinābhūto heturvāde codanīyatvaṃ vā pṛthagupadeśo vā bhāṣyakāreṇokta ityupasaṃharati--tasmāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:1536: tadevamekadeśimataṃ dūṣayitvā svamatena bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe--etadeva tu nyāyyāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1537: nigrahasthānebhyo hetvābhāsānāṃ pṛthagupadeśe prayojanaṃ yad bhāṣyākṣarebhyaḥ sākṣāt pratīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1538: sāmānyopadeśena viśeṣa upadiṣṭe viśeṣopadeśaḥ prayojanādhikyaṃ sūcayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1539: yathā brāhmaṇān bhojaya kaṭha ceti kaṭhabhojane viśeṣo gamyate,
GSP29nystik_u:1540: tadvadihāpi nigrahasthānopadeśenaiva hetvābhāseṣu labdheṣu teṣāṃ viśeṣeṇābhidhānaṃ prayojanādhikyaṃ sūcayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1541: etāvāneva sūtrakṛto vyāpāro yat sūtraṇaṃ nāma /
GSP29nystik_u:1542_0: tatra nigrahasthānaviśeṣāṇāṃ hetvābhāsānāṃ svarūpaṃ vādasya ca tattvanirṇayāvasānatvamālocya
GSP29nystik_u:1542_1: vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyanti nigrahasthānatvena hetvābhāsā nāpratibhādaya iti prayojanaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:1544: bhavantu vāde codanīyā hetvābhāsāḥ, mā ca bhuvannapratibhādayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1547: tāsāṃ prasthānaṃ vyāpāraḥ, tasya bhedaḥ, tajjñāpanārthatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1550: yadi vāde hetvābhāsāḥ prayujyeran tato nigrahasthānatvena codyeran,
GSP29nystik_u:1551: na tu teṣāmasti prayogo 'pramāṇatvāt pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhatvācca vādasya /
GSP29nystik_u:1553: tathā ca na pṛthagupadeśaḥ, nigrahasthānopadeśenaiva labdhatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1555: na khaluhetvābhāsan tabduddhyā prayu/jāte vādiprativādinau, api tu hetubuddhyā /
GSP29nystik_u:1556: tathā cāsti teṣāṃ vāde prayoga iti vāde nigrahasthānatvena hevābhāsāścādyantām,
GSP29nystik_u:1560: lakṣyata iti lakṣaṇam, samānāsamānajātīyavyāvṛttaṃ rūpaṃ vādasya ca nigrahasthānānāṃ ca /
GSP29nystik_u:1562: kānicideva nigrahasthānāni vāde na tu sarvāṇīti sāmānyato 'bhidhāya tadeva lakṣaṇaparatantratvamabhimate viśeṣe yojayati--vādasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:1567: na niścayaḥ sarvaḥ pramāṇamūlo 'pramāṇamūlasyāpi tasya darśanāt,
GSP29nystik_u:1571: upāsyopāsakayoḥ parasparaṃ na dhvaṃsanaṃ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1573: hetvābhāsānāṃ ca pṛthakkaraṇaṃ na vāde tanmātrāvadhāraṇārtham,
GSP29nystik_u:1574: api tu yasminnanuddhāvite 'pi nigrahasthāne tattvapratipattivyāghāto bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1576: evaṃ ca nyūnādhikāpasiddhāntā api saṃgṛjītā bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:1580: sāhaṅkāro vijigīṣurapratibhādibhirapi nigrahasthānaistiraskṛto galitāhaṅkārastattvabubhutsutāṃ nītaḥ paścād vādena vyutpādyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:1587: atra hi jāteḥ svavākye parivarjanamuktvā punaḥ svayaṃ prayogo na yuktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1592: tad vibhajate--svayaṃ ca sukaraḥ prayoga iti anena bhāṣyeṇa kimuktaṃ bhavati?
GSP29nystik_u:1593: pareṇa prativādinā jātau prayuktāyāṃ vādī prāśnikān sabhyān bravīti jātiranena prativādinā prayukteti /
GSP29nystik_u:1594: te prāśnikā enaṃ paryanuyu/jīran he vādin kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa jātiḥ catuviṃśatyāṃ jātiṣu katamā jātiriti?
GSP29nystik_u:1602: yadyapītarā vidyāḥ pramāṇikamevārthamabhiniviśante tathāpyetadvidyāpratipādyameva pramāṇādyupajīvya sve sve vyutpādye tattve pravartantra,
GSP29nystik_u:1604: yathā pratyakṣādyupajīvya pravartamānamanumānaṃ na pratyakṣādiviṣayamapi tadānīmeva gocarayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1606: saṃprati vidyānāṃ yāni karmāṇi pratipādyāni sāmāgrihotrakṛṣyādīni tatrāpyānvīkṣikyupāya ityāha--upāyaḥ sarvakarmaṇāṃ vidyāvyutpādyānām,
GSP29nystik_u:1608: na hi vidyāpadebhyo yāvanmātrāgatiḥ, tāvanmātreṇa prekṣavatāṃ paritoṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1612: tasmāt saṃśayaparīkṣāpramāṇaviniveśa dvāreṇa tadarthatattvamavadhāryā tatra trayī viniveśanīyā /
GSP29nystik_u:1614: tasmādānvīkṣikīpariśodhitapramāṇapramāśitaṃ sāmādi itarā vidyāḥ kurvanti viṣayamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1615: api ca dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmabhimatānabhimatopāyatāprajñāpanena yathāyatha sarvā vidyāḥ prekṣāvataḥ pravartayanti nirvayanti vā /
GSP29nystik_u:1616: tatra kimaviśeṣeṇa sādhyasādhanetikartavyatāsu pravartayantu, āhosvit sādhanetikartavyatāmātre?
GSP29nystik_u:1619: atha sādhyāṃśaṃ rāgataḥ prāptamanūdya sādhanetikartavyate eva vidharayete,
GSP29nystik_u:1620: tataḥ śyenādisādhyāyā hiṃsāyā avihitatvena na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni iti pratiṣadhādanarthatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:1624: tadevamānvīkṣikīmāśrayante sarvavidyā ityāha--āśrayaḥ sarvadharmāṇām sarvāsāṃ vidyānāṃ puruṣapravartanā dharmāḥ, teṣāmāśrayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1632: sa ca vidyāntarasādhāraṇa iti vidyāntarādhigamyena niḥśreyasena saṅkaraprasaṅga ityata āha--tadidaṃ tattvajñānaṃ niḥśreyasādhigamaśca yathāvidyaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1633: vidyāntarāṇi tāvad yat tattvajñānaṃ kurvanti tatsvabhāvālocanayā hi tadvidyāsādhye eva niḥśreyasabhade upayujyante nānyatra /
GSP29nystik_u:1641: vādādīnāṃ nigrahasthānāntānāmupadeśaḥ parābhibhavopāyatayā madamānādihetutvena niḥśreyasaparipanthīti manvānaścodayati--madamānādīti /
GSP29nystik_u:1643: nāyaṃ sūtrārthaḥ, sarveṣāṃ tattvajñānaṃ sākṣānniḥśreyasopayogīti, kiṃ tvātmāditattvajñānam /
GSP29nystik_u:1645: tatra jalpādīnā parāhaṅkārapraśamanamavāntaravyāpāra iti na niḥśreyasaparipanthitā,
GSP29nystik_u:1653: tadevaṃ prathamasūtreṇa śāstrasyābhidheyaprayojanasaṃbandhān darśayatā padārthāḥ pramāṇādaya uddhiṣṭāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1654: teṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇamuktvā tatparīkṣā vartayiṣyate, aparīkṣya tattvajñānanirṇayāyogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1656: na ca prayojanasaṃbandhanirṇayaḥ parīkṣāṃ vineti tatparīkṣārthaṃ dvitīyaṃ sūtram /
GSP29nystik_u:1658: dvividhaṃ hi prayojanābhidhānaṃ granthakṛtāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ samīcīnamasamīcīnaṃ ca,
GSP29nystik_u:1661: tatrotsūtreṇa prayojanābhisaṃbandhapratipādanaparaṃ pūrvapakṣabhāṣyam--tat khalu vai niḥśreyasamityādi /
GSP29nystik_u:1665: taccet tattvajñānānantaram, sampradāyocchedo vātaputrīyatā ca śāstrasya syātām /
GSP29nystik_u:1675: dvitīyā tu śrutasya parīkṣya nyāyana vyavasthāpanam, yāmāhurmananamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1686_0: atha pariniṣpannadhyānopāyaḥ sākṣātkāravatīṃ pratipadya caturthau pratītiṃ nirmuktasakalakleśajālaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:1687: na caivamavastho vītarāgo 'pi sahasaiva dehādibhiḥ viyujyate,
GSP29nystik_u:1689: na ca prāyaśvittenevātmajñānenādattaphalānyeva karmāṇi kṣīyanta iti yuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:1699: yogārddhivaśāccāniyatavipākakālānyapi dīrghakālaphalānyapi karmāṇi piṇḍīkṛtya bhūtendriyadavijayitayā yugapadeva bhuṅkte /
GSP29nystik_u:1701: na cācintyatvād vinaivopabhogena karmāśayān prakṣayiṣyatīti yuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:1705: tādṛśaśca munistattvajñānavān śāstrasya praṇeteti na vātaputrīyaṃ śāstramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1706: paraṃ tu riḥśreyasaṃ yogarddhiprabhavasampadā yugapadupabhogenopāttakarmāśayasya kṣayāt sarvaduḥkhoparama ityupapannaṃ niḥśreyasadvaividhyamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:1712: vidyamānakāraṇe api sukhaduḥkhe 'śakto 'dviṣaśca bhu/jano na sukhaduḥkhatayā manute /
GSP29nystik_u:1713: na hyasti saṃbhavo na tatra tṛpyati tacca tasya sukham, na ca tad dveṣṭi tacca tasya duḥkhamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1718: atha aparaniḥśreyasotpādasamaya eva paraniḥśreyasotpādo 'pi kasmānna bhavatītyāha--paraṃ tu niḥśreyasaṃ tattvajñānāt krameṇa bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:1721: na hi kaphodbhāvajvarapraśamanāya kaphanivṛttau satyāṃ yatnāntaramātiṣṭhate, tata eva tatsiddheḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1722: paraṃ tu niḥśreyasaṃ na tāvad bhavati, yāvadupabhogādupāttakarmāśayapracayo na kṣīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1724: tathā ca na tulyakāla utpādaḥ parāparayorniḥśreyasayoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1730: tasmāt janmaduḥkhocchedakramasamabhivyāhṛto mithyājñānādyucchedakramaḥ parasyaiva niḥśreyasasya śāstraprayojanasya /
GSP29nystik_u:1736: na cāsau duḥkhādīnāṃ mithyājñānāntānāmapradarśite kāryakāraṇabhāve sidhyati /
GSP29nystik_u:1740: kāryeṇa kāraṇaṃ yuktam, kāraṇena ca kāryamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1741: ataḥ siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve uttarottarāpāye tadanantarābhāvādapavarga ityanena yogena kāraṇocchedakrameṇa kāryocchedakramapratipādanenāpavargaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1749: evanivṛttyā anyanivṛttyaiva kāryakāraṇabhāva ākṣipta iti nāsau sūtre darśanīyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1765: śāstrasya niḥśreyasādhigamalakṣaṇena prayojanena yaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pūrvamākṣiptaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1769: yadyapi sāmabhedādau halaśakaṭadau ca mithyājñānamanekaprakāraṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1770: tathāpi na tat saṃsāraheturapi tvātmādidvādaśavidhaprameyaviśeṣaviṣayamiti sūtrasthaṃ mithyājñānaṃ viśeṣṭumāha--tatreti /
GSP29nystik_u:1774: na khalu yathā kuṇḍe vadaraṃ paṭe vā śauklyam,
GSP29nystik_u:1778: yāvaduktaṃ bhavati pramayaviṣayaṃ mithyājñānamiti, tāvaduktaṃ bhavati prameye vartata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1781: tadāha--tatrāyaṃ bhedaḥ tatrātmani tāvat pradhāne prameye nāstīti /
GSP29nystik_u:1786: sarvatra hi rajatodakādivibhrameṣu śuktirajatayorvā marūmarīcisalilayorvā sārūpyameva nimittaṃ pratīmaḥ na hi jātu rūpaṃ rasādiṣu hastinaṃ vā maśakādiṣu āropayanti /
GSP29nystik_u:1789: pītaḥ śaṅkhastikto guḍa iti ca dṛśyata iti cet--na,
GSP29nystik_u:1792: śaṅkhaṃ ca doṣācchāditasitimānamanubhavan pītagaṇasya ca tadasaṃbandhamananubhavaṃstadasaṃbandhāgraheṇa pītacīravilvādisāmānādhikaraṇyena sārūpyāt śaṅkha pīta iti viparyasyati /
GSP29nystik_u:1795: na ca brūmo yatra sārūpyaṃ tatra bhrama iti,
GSP29nystik_u:1797: api tu yatra bhramastatrāvaśyaṃ kathañcit sārūpyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1804: yadi sadasatoḥ samānatvaṃ nāsti, tarhi bhedaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1805: tathā ca kasya kutrāropa ityata āha--kriyāguṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:1806: so 'yamasaddharmān kriyāguṇarahitatvādīn satyātmani samāropya asattayā viparyasyati--nāstyātmeti,
GSP29nystik_u:1815: astu nāstitāsamāropa eva tāvad yato na pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:1817: sukhī bhaveyaṃ duḥkhī vā mā bhūvamiti tṛṣyataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1831: na hi jātu kaściccetanaḥ sukhamāpsyāmīti madhuviṣasampṛktamannamupabhuṅkte /
GSP29nystik_u:1842: tāṃ khalvayaṃ śarīrādiṣvāropya eta evāhamiti śarīrādiṣvātmabhāvamāropayati //
GSP29nystik_u:1844: saṃprati sandihāno viparyayasvarūpaṃ pṛcchati--kaḥ punarayaṃ viparyayaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:1852: idamatrākūtam--na tāvat svākāraṃ rajatādi bāhyatayā ālambante vibhramāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1853: tathā hi jñānākāratvaṃ rajatāderanubhavād vyavasthāpyet, anumānād vā?
GSP29nystik_u:1854: anubhavo 'pi rajatapratyayo vā svād, bādhakapatyayo vā?
GSP29nystik_u:1857: ahamiti hi tadā syāt, pratipattuḥ pratyayādavyatirekāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1858: bhrāntaṃ hi jñānaṃ svākārameva bāhyatā ālambate /
GSP29nystik_u:1861: hanta cakṣuṣī nimīlya vaitālikapakṣapātaṃ parityajyālocayatvāyuṣmān ki purovartidravyākāratāmātraṃ pratiṣedhati rajatasya,
GSP29nystik_u:1863: tatra jñānākāratopadarśanavyāpāraṃ bādhakapratyayasya brūvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃpriyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1866: āntaratvaṃ tvasyānupalabdhacaraṃ kutastyam? na cānumānamatra prabhavatīti caturthenivedayiṣyate //
GSP29nystik_u:1867: santu tarhi bādhakapratyayānurodhād asatprakāśanaśīlā eva mithyāpratyayāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1868: tathā hi bādhakaṃ vijñānaṃ nedaṃ rajatamiti rajatajñānagocarasyāsattvaṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP29nystik_u:1870: na hi viṣayatvaṃ nāma kāraṇatvaṃ yenāsati na syāt, kiṃ tu svakāraṇadhīnaḥ sāmarthyātiśayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1876: āhosvit sadeva sadantarātmanā gahṇāti sataśca sadantarātmatvena asattvādasadviṣayamucyate?
GSP29nystik_u:1878: rajatātmanā cet asadālambeta na satī śuktikām,
GSP29nystik_u:1879: kathaṃ punarasau rajātartho śuktau pravartate na punā rajatābhāve /
GSP29nystik_u:1880: kaskāccedamiti purovarti dravyamaṅgulyā nirdiśya tasya rajatatvaṃ niṣedhati nedaṃ rajatamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:1881: yadi tatra na prasañjitaṃ rajatatvaṃ pūrvavijñānena?
GSP29nystik_u:1882: atha śuktireva rajatātmanā asatīti tadākāratayā tāmālambamānaṃ mithyājñānamasadālambanamucyate?
GSP29nystik_u:1892: na caivaṃbhūtasyāsataḥ prathā nopapadyate, tasya sadasadbhyāmupākhyeyatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1893: yaḥpunaḥ advaitavādinā prapajco vaināśikānāṃ vā sāmānyādirno bahiḥ ki tvalīkam /
GSP29nystik_u:1894: tadviṣayaṃ ca jñānaṃ mithyājñānamityapi na saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1898: tasmāt prapañcaśca sāmānyādi ca vastusatī nāmamīcīnavijñānagocarau /
GSP29nystik_u:1902: anyadanyathā prakāśata iti saṃvidviruddham/na tāvat sadbhāvamātreṇālambanatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:1903: tanmātrasya sarvapratyayasādhāraṇyena sarve 'rthāḥ savarpratyayaviṣayā iti savarsarvajñatāpattiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1906: atītānāgataviṣayatvaṃ ca vijñānasya na syāt, atītānāgatayorasattvenākāraṇatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1909: api ca cakṣurādīnāṃ samīcīnajñānopajananasāmarthyamiti kathamebhyo mithyājñānaṃ bhavitumarhati?
GSP29nystik_u:1910: na hi śyāmākabījaṃ parikarmasahasreṇāpi kalamāṅkurāya kalpate /
GSP29nystik_u:1911: doṣasahāyā locanādayo mithyāpratyayamādadhata iti cet--na doṣā hi kāraṇānāṃ sāmarthya nighnanti,
GSP29nystik_u:1913: na khalu bhṛṣṭaṃ kuṭajabījaṃ nyagrodhadhānāyai kalpate,
GSP29nystik_u:1915: api ca svagocare vyabhicāre vijñānānāṃ sarvatrānāśvāsaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1917: tathā hi rajatamidamiti dve jñāne smṛtyanubhavarūpe /
GSP29nystik_u:1919: tāvanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajate smṛti janayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1920: sā ca gṛhītagrahaṇasvabhāvāpi doṣavaśāt gṛhītatāṃśapramoṣeṇa grahaṇamātramavatiṣṭhate /

GSP29nystik_u:2327: na ca dharmo svarūpeṇārthyate, kiṃ tu jijñāsitadharmaviśiṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2332: anumānajñānasya phalāvasthāyāmevārtho mita iti meyaṃ nāvaśiṣyate,
GSP29nystik_u:2334: tatra phalaviśeṣaṇapakṣamāsthāya yata ityadhyāhṛtya sāmadhatte---naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2338: atha kasmāt hānādiviṣayaṃ pramāṇamucyate, na svagocaraṃ pratītyata āha--sarva ca pramāṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:2339: yadyapi vahnijñānasyānumānasya sato heyatvādikaṃ viṣayaḥ, tatraiva vyāpārāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2341: na hi panasaviṣayeṇa paraśunā khadire dvaidhībhāvo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2342: tathāpi phalāntarānapekṣamutpattāveva vijñāne yat prakāśate sa tasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2343: tatra tu na tat pramāṇam, phalāntarājanakatvādapi tu phalamevetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2346: bhāvasādhanaścet pramāṇaśabdaḥ phalamasyārtho na tu phalaṃ svaviṣaye karaṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:2348: na ca svaviṣayādanyad viṣayāntaramasya saṃbhavati, atiprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2351: tathāpi yatrānena pramāṇena satā hānādibuddhayo janayitavyāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2354: parokṣārthāvagāhitayā heyādibuddhayaḥ pratyakṣaphalaṃ na bhavanti, bhavanti tvanumānasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:2359: neyamupamānaśabdasya phalena nirūktiḥ, api tu pramāṇena nirūktiriti na vayāghāta ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2366: yadā hyetat pramāṇaṃ tadā vākyārthavijñānaṃ phalam /
GSP29nystik_u:2367: yadānumānavad vākyārthavijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadā hānopādānādibuddhayaḥ phalamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2368: atra pratyakṣādīnāṃ kramoddeśaprayojanaṃ prati ekadeśimatamupanyasyati---kecit tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:2369: pratyakṣaparā hi pramāṇāntarajanyāḥ pramitaya iti pratyakṣasya prādhānyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2378: ato mahāviṣayatvaṃ prāthamya eva heturna caramatva ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2380: etāvatā kramamātraṃ bhavet, na tu tadviśeṣaniyama ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2391: tathāpi śāstre vyutpādyatvenānumānasyāpi tadastīti sādhāraṇatayā na heturiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2396: na cānumānaviṣaye sāmānyarūpe saṃbandhini pratyarkṣa pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:2399: etena śabdopamāne api parāste, tayorapi saṃbandhasaṃvedanādhīnajanmatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2400: tasmāt nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti vibhāgavacanamanupapannamiti śaṅkāmapanetuṃ vimarśapūrvakaṃ vicārayati sma bhārūyakāraḥ---kiṃ punaḥ pramāṇānīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2405: āhita utpāditaḥ pratyayo niścayo yasya, saṃsargopadhānaṃ varhi prati sa tathā /
GSP29nystik_u:2411: tadanena dhūmavyāpakatvopadhānena dhūmād gamyamāno bahniḥ parokṣa iti darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:2415: upadhānānapekṣastu pratyakṣeṇāvyavahitaṃ sākṣād varhina viṣayīkṛtya nirākāṅkṣo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2419: so 'yaṃ guṇapradhānabhāvo bhedāśrayo vyavasthāyāṃ nāsti, vyavasthitānāṃ pratyekamekatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2420: tasmād vyavasthāyāṃ guṇapradhānabhāvo na cintya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2426: tatra teṣu madhye prāthamyāt pratyakṣalakṣaṇam indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam ityādi sūtram /
GSP29nystik_u:2432: yaḥ khalu kutaścid vyāmohāt samānāsamānajātīyavyāvṛttaṃ tadrūpaṃ na śakroti grahītum,
GSP29nystik_u:2436: itastvavagatalakṣaṇaḥ tenaiva vivicya pratyakṣatattvaṃ gṛhṇātīti samānāsamānajātīyavyavacchedaḥ sūtrārtha ukta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2437: atra ca yaha ityadhyāhṛtya yattadonityābhisaṃbandhāt tat pratyakṣamiti pramāṇavāci pratyakṣapadra yojanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2438_0: evaṃ ca jñānapramāṇyapakṣe 'pi yat tadviśeṣyajñānaṃ pratyakṣaphalaṃ liṅgaparāmarśo
GSP29nystik_u:2443: saṃyogapadopādāne hi na samavāyo labhyate, samavāyapadopādāne vā na saṃyogaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2446: na cāsāvaṇvākāśādīnāmastīti satyapi saṃyogādau nāsāvarthasannikarṣa iti tadvyudāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2449: anyathā kuḍyādisaṃyuktenendriyeṇa kuḍyādivyavahitasya tatsaṃyuktasya ghaṭādeḥ tatsamavetasya ca rūpāderapi grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2450: na caitāvatā trividha eva sannikarṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ samavāyaśceti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:2452: ye hi dravyaguṇakarmāśrayaṃ sāmānyātiriktaṃ sādṛśsayamarthānataraṃ rocayante,
GSP29nystik_u:2453: teṣāṃ kathaṃ rūpādibhedānāmanyonyasya sādṛśyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhavet ?
GSP29nystik_u:2459: tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu parasparavyāvṛttimatīṣu ete nānubhūyeran asati sannikarṣāntare /
GSP29nystik_u:2461: tadā prativaktavyaṃ kutastyo 'yamanantāsu rūpagandhādivyaktiṣu rūpamiti vā gandha iti vā vyapadeśabhedaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:2465: tasmādastīndriyeṇa rūpatvādisāmānyānubhavo yannibandhanāḥ kāsucideva kecideva vyaktiṣu vyapadeśebhedā iti siddhaṃ sannikarṣāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:2466: viśeṣaṇabhāvena ca saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇaṃ samavetaviśeṣaṇa ca saṃgṛhītam //
GSP29nystik_u:2467: yasyendriyeṇa yādṛśaḥ sannikarṣaḥ tādṛśaṃ tatra darśayati--tatra cakṣuriti /
GSP29nystik_u:2471: santānena śrotre samutpādaḥ samavāya ityādi dvitīye nipuṇataramupapādayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2472: avayavāvayavinau guṇaguṇinau kriyākriyāvantau jātijātimantau ca mithaḥ saṃbaddhāvanubhūtete /
GSP29nystik_u:2477: śuklaḥ paṭa ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇyajñānaṃ na tu saṃbandhijñānamiti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:2483: tasmād bhinne eva vastunī saṃbaddhe sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhāsete,
GSP29nystik_u:2487: na hi jātu dadhiśabdaḥ kuṇḍe vartate kuṇḍaśabdo vā dadhni /
GSP29nystik_u:2488: vartante tu surabhimadharaśuklādiśabdāḥ svābhidheyaṃ nimittīkṛtya paṭādiṣu,
GSP29nystik_u:2489: evaṃ paṭādiśabdā api jātyādi nimittīkṛtya dravye pravartante iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2491: nāpi dravyeṇa, kiṃ tu taistainvitamekaṃ dravyaṃ pratīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2492: śabdānāṃ tu tatraikasmin dravye pravṛtteḥ tadvācyānāmaikātmyabhramaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2493: ayutasiddhyā tu kuṇḍe dadhītivat na sphuṭataro vivekaprakāśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2502: tat kimatra saṃbandhāntaraṃ kalpyatām? tathā cānavasthā ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2504: tasmād vinā saṃbandhāntaraṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva eṣitavya iti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:2505: evamabhāve 'pi yadindriyasaṃyuktaṃ vā yadvendriyasamavetu yathā bhūtale ghaṭo nāstīti vā nāstyakāre 'nudāttasvara iti vā tasya saṃyuktasya vā viśeṣaṇabhāvena,
GSP29nystik_u:2507: na ca bhūtalādirūpameva ghaṭābhāvo nārthāntaramiti sāṃpratam, satyapi ghaṭādau bhūtalasya bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2508: na ca kaivalyaṃ tasya dharmo ghaṭabhāvavirodhī ghaṭābhāvādanyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2509: na ca dṛśye ghaṭādau bhūtalopalambhaḥ kaivalyamabhāvavyavahāraheturiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2510: evaṃ hi ghaṭasaṃsṛṣṭabhūtalagraho 'pi kaivalyamiti ghaṭābhāvavyavahāraṃ pravartayet /
GSP29nystik_u:2512: dṛśye 'nupalabhyamāna iti tu viśeṣaṇe kimaparāddhamupalabhyābhāvena yena tadapākaraṇāyopalambhābhāvo 'bhyupeyate?
GSP29nystik_u:2515: na ca pratiyogismaraṇavyavahita indriyārthasannikarṣo nālamabhāvadhiyamupajanayitumiti sāṃpratamityagra darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2521: kasya punaḥ pratiyogī ghaṭaḥ? tadabhāvasyeti ced bhavatu /
GSP29nystik_u:2522: ghaṭābhāvānubhavasya tu ghaṭasmaraṇaṃ heturiti na pratiyogi, kiṃ tvanuyogyeva /
GSP29nystik_u:2523: nanu svarūpamātraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ veśmādyarthaṃ smaranneva bahirnitaśrcaitro yadā pṛcchyate kenacit--vayasya,
GSP29nystik_u:2524: tava gṛhe tadā kimāsīt maitra iti ?
GSP29nystik_u:2525: sa caitraḥ pratiyogismaraṇavirahāt pūrvamapratipannamaitrābhāvo 'pi tatpraśnajanitamaitrasmṛtiḥ kṣaṇaṃ dhyātva tadabhāvamavagamyāha,
GSP29nystik_u:2530: saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇalakṣaṇena manaḥsannikarṣeṇa smartavyasya smaraṇābhāvaṃ maitrasya gṛhītvā tena liṅgena tadabhāvasya tadānīmanumānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2533: yad yasya jñānārhasyājñāne jñāyate tat tadabhā vavat /
GSP29nystik_u:2537: na ca yat kadācidānumānikaṃ tenenidrayagamyena na bhavitavyam, pramāṇasaṃplavavyavasthāpanāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2540: tadanena prabandhena indriyasyārthena sannikarṣād yadutpadyate jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣamiti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:2546: ātmīyena hi rūpeṇālokacakṣuṣī dravyaṃ darśayata iti sthitiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2550: tasmādanyonyanirapekṣatvaṃ mahattvānekadravyavattvayoriti vikalpa eva nyāyya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2551: satyapyevaṃlakṣaṇakatve cukṣuravayavinastaijasasya na cākṣuṣatvamityata uktam--upalabdhikalaḥ saṃskāra iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2555: pratyakṣalakṣaṇakaraṇapravṛtto hi sūtrakāraḥ tadeva brūyāt yadasyāsādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:2571: yadyapīndriyamanaḥsannikarṣe 'pīndriyam asti pratyakṣajñānasya viśeṣakam indriyeṇa vyapadeśādindriyajñānamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:2572: tathāpi manasā vyapadeśāmāvāt manasastatrāviśeṣakatvam indriyārthasannikarṣe tūbhayamapi viśeṣakam,
GSP29nystik_u:2576: yu/jānasya hi yogino yadātmamanaḥsayogādātmani buddhayo bhavanti tāḥ khalvātmanā vyapadiśyante ātmabuddhaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2581: yadevāsādhāraṇaṃ tad vyapadeśabhāgbhavati, kāraṇatvena jñānaṃ vyapadiśyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2582: etaduktaṃ bhavati---yathā cukṣuṣā indriyatvena jñānaṃ vyapadiśyate cākṣuṣamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:2584: evaṃ yathā rūpeṇārthena vyapadiśyate jñānaṃ rūpajñānamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:2587: yatra tvindriyāntaramevāsādhāraṇam, liṅgādi vā tatra cātmā nārtho 'pi tu pramātaiva /
GSP29nystik_u:2588: yathā rūpādijñāne 'numānādijñāne vā na tatra jñānaṃ mānasamiti vā ātmajñānamiti vā vyapadeśaḥ sa kasya hetāḥ, tayoḥ sādhāraṇyāt?
GSP29nystik_u:2591: yadā hi nāgarayoṣitaḥ kutūhalāt praṇihitamanaso vikasitaniḥspandanayanotpalāḥ saudhamālāgavākṣakairavanipatiṃ sabalavāhanamaticiraparāvṛttaṃ gopureṇa niviśamānamālokayanti,
GSP29nystik_u:2592: tadā khlvāsāmekenaivendriyamanaḥsaṃyogena kramavadanekendriyārthasannikarṣasahakāriṇā bhinnāni kramavanti hāstikāśvīyādipratyakṣajñānāni jāyante /
GSP29nystik_u:2595: yadā hi mandaṃ gacchati gavi dūrataḥ saṃyuktasamavāyenendriyārthasannikarṣeṇa śuklo gaurityajñāsīt,
GSP29nystik_u:2596: atha pratyāsīdan gacchatītyapi vijānāti tenaiva saṃyuktasamavāyena sannikarṣeṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:2597: tena pratyakṣajñānasya śukla iti ca gacchatīti ca bhede 'pi indriyārthasannikarṣo na bhidyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2602: nanu bhavatūktamuttaraṃ bhede 'bhedādityasyākṣepaḥ samādhātavyaḥ ityata āha--anabhyupagamācca /
GSP29nystik_u:2605: tat kimidānīṃ bhidyamānasya pratyakṣajñānasya nāyaṃ bhidyata iti samānatvānnokta iti bhāṣyam anupapannameva?
GSP29nystik_u:2609: punaḥ pṛcchati--kiṃ punaḥ samānatvam, uttaram--vyapadeśābhāva ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2611: pratyakṣajñānasya rūpajñānasya rūpajñānamiti vā cakṣurvijñānamiti vā vyapadeśena bhidyamānasya ātmamanaḥsaṃyoga iva ayam indriyamanaḥsaṃyogo na bhidyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2615: na tvasti indriyamanaḥsannikarṣādhārābhyāmindriyamanobhyāṃ pratyekamasya vyapadeśo yathendriyārthasannikarṣādhārābhyāṃ indriyārthābhyāṃ vyapadeśo rūpajñānamiti cakṣurjñānamiti vā /
GSP29nystik_u:2619: lakṣaṇaṃ hi prasiddhaṃ bhavati yathā dhūmo vahneḥ na cātīndriyadvayādhārasannikarṣastathā prasiddho yathendriyārthasannikarṣo 'rthasya saṃbandhina ekasnaya prasiddhatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:2621: ātmā tu yadyapi yu/jānasya śarīrādyatiriktaḥ pratyakṣaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2623: tadanenātīndriyādhāratvaṃ svarūpeṇoktvā tadevaṃ viṣayāvṛttitvamanovṛttitvābhyām atīndriyādhāratvaṃ sāmānyamāha--viṣayāvṛttitvaṃ veti /
GSP29nystik_u:2624: upasaṃharati--tasmāditi samānatvāditi bhāṣyokto hetuḥ, caritārthatvāditi svoktaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2627: nanu nārtho viprakṛṣṭaḥ, cakṣuṣastatra prāpterityata āha--na tu cakṣuṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2630: tasya prasāda indriyāvyavadhāyakatvam kuḍyādibhyo viśeṣaḥ yaḥ khalu kācābhrapaṭalādiṣu svaccheṣu samasti /
GSP29nystik_u:2635: etaduktaṃ bhavati--bhūtaviśeṣaḥ karmāpekṣo rūpaṃ caṣṭa iti cakṣurityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2636: karmakṣāyāt tu prasannāndhasya na rūpaṃ caṣṭa iti na cakṣuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2640: kecit tu sāntaramiti grahaṇaviśeṣaṇaṃ hentu bruvate, tanmatamupanyasyati---apare tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:2641: sādhyaviparyayādasya vyatirekaṃ darśayati--na hi prāpyakāriṣviti pakṣadharmatāmāha--dṛṣṭaṃ tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:2643: dvyāśrayo hi saṃyogo 'lpameva saṃyoginamanurudhyate, na mahāntam /
GSP29nystik_u:2644: na jātu rathādisaṃyogā nabho vyaśnuvate, mā bhūt sarvatra rathādīnāṃ tatsaṃyogādīnāṃ copalabdhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2645: tena yāvanmātra rāṣṭravanādergolakena vyāptaṃ tāvanmātrasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2649: yadyapi gatikṣaṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ spāśrayasya deśāntaravibhāgasaṃyogopajananaṃ prati kṣipratayā na viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2650: svāśrayapratyāsattau cāviśeṣaḥ tathāpyā cāpādānavibhāgāt ā ca prāpanīyadeśaprāpterantarālavartī yāvān gatikṣaṇapracayaḥ pūrvāparībhūto gatiriha vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2651: tasya sāntaratvaṃ mandatvaṃ vilambaḥ nairantaryaṃ tu pāṭavaṃ kṣipratā /
