GSP29nystik_u:2652: tāmimāṃ gatimabhindad nairantaryeṇa kurvadapi sannikṛṣṭamāśu prāpnoti /
GSP29nystik_u:2653: na viprakṛṣṭena tulyakālam, kiṃ tu viprakṛṣṭaṃ cireṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:2655: sāntaragrahaṇaṃ na syāt prāptau jñāne 'dhikasya ca /
GSP29nystik_u:2662: yadi ca syāt tadā paśyedapyunmīlya nimīlanāt //
GSP29nystik_u:2663: yadi ca syāt unmīlya nimīlitanayano 'pi rūpaṃ paśyet, unmīlanādasti bahirindriyamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:2664: tatra vārttikakāraḥ sāntaragrahaṇāditi hetuṃ vikalpya dūṣayati--yat tāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:2670: yat tu prasādasvabhāvaṃ tejaḥ tanna gṛhyate, kiṃ tu tasya rūpamātraṃ visphāritākṣaṇa dṛśyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2673: mā bhūd gandhādibhirantaraṃ dravyasya, mā na bhūtāṃ ca nirantare dravye, svaguṇābhyāmantaritatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2674: na cāpātajanmālocanaṃ vā vikalpo vā dravyānumānaṃ pratīkṣate yena rūpajñānānumitaṃ dravyam indriyarthayordravyayorantaraṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2675: api ca rūpamātramagṛhyamāṇe dravye svatantraṃ gandhādivad gṛhyamāṇaṃ kathamantarā svāśrayamanumāpayet,
GSP29nystik_u:2677: tasmād viṣaktāvayavatejodravyāpratyakṣatvasamāropamātreṇa dūṣaṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ tvanyathāsiddhatvadūṣaṇaṃ pāramārthikaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2678: athābhāvo 'ntaraśabdavācya iti, nāsmākaṃ mūrtadravyābhāvādanyat ākāśamastīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2679: dūṣayati--sa svatantraśrcakṣurviṣayo na bhavati indriyaṃ cārthaṃ cāntarā abhāvo grāhyaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2681: na cendriyārthayormadhyate kasyacit saṃyuktasya vā samavetasya vā grahaṇamasti,
GSP29nystik_u:2684: mā bhūdāntarālikaṃ saṃyuktaṃ vā samavetaṃ vā viśeṣyaṃ gṛhyamāṇameva tu rūpādiviśeṣyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:2687: pratīyate hi tvagādibhiḥ apīndriyaiḥ prāpyakāribhirauṣṇyābhavaviśeṣaṇa śiṣirataraṃ pāthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2692: na ca taijasaṃ rūpamantaram, yena sāntaragrahaṇaṃ syādityāha--na cānyā gatirati /
GSP29nystik_u:2694: ye tu sāntara iti grahaṇamiti hetumāhuḥ, tān prati dūṣaṇamāha---yairapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2697: tatra ya eva śarīrāsaṃbaddha ityanubhūyate tameva sāntara iti manyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2700: śarīrasaṃbandhena tasya sparśādau na sāntaratvābhimāna ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2708: na caitat niryatā vinā pṛthvagratāṃ bhavatīti pṛthvagratā sūcitā /
GSP29nystik_u:2709: yathā vartideśe piṇḍitamapi tejaḥ prasarpat prāsādodaraṃ vyāpnoti /
GSP29nystik_u:2716: dehamarthaṃ cāntarāvasthitasya pṛthivyādeḥ saṃyuktasaṃyogālpīyastvaṃ bhūyastvaṃ cāpekṣamāṇasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:2718: sa ca tādṛgālokāvayavī pratyakṣo 'nyathā na rūpamātreṇa tadanumānaṃ śakyamityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2719: na ca khagānāmuparyupari saṃcaratāṃ dūrantikapratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2720: na ca patati patatriṇīha prāpto neheti bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:2724: acintyo hi tejaso lādhavātiśayena vegātiśayo yadudayagiriśikharam ārohatyeva mārtaṇḍamaṇḍale bhavanodareṣvāloka ityabhimāno laukikānām /
GSP29nystik_u:2725: tādṛśaṃ cākṣuṣamapi teja iti krameṇāpi gacchad yugapattatra tatra lakṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2726: na caikasmādeva karmaṇo yugapad durāntikasaṃyogā bhavantīti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2728: anyathā madhurāsthasya devadattasya karma pāṭaliputreṇa devadattaṃ yojayet /
GSP29nystik_u:2729: vegākhyasaṃskārajamapi karmana sahasā śaramantarāladeśena ca lakṣyeṇa ca yojayati /
GSP29nystik_u:2733: na cāyamasati bādhake mithyeti vaktuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2737: kimasya kuḍyakaṭādyāvaraṇamapakuryāt yena tadāvṛtaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2738: gatau tu sparśavatā prasādarahitena saivāsya pratibaddheti na prāpnoti viṣayam,
GSP29nystik_u:2740: prāyogastu, cakṣuḥśrotre prāpya svaviṣaye kāryaṃ kurutaḥ, janakatve sati tadaprāptāvajanakatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2741: yajjanakaṃ sad yadaprāptau yanna janayati tat tatprāptāveva tajjanayati,
GSP29nystik_u:2742: yathā kumbhajanakaḥ kumbhakāro mṛdo 'prāptāvakurvan kumbhaṃ tatprāptāveva karoti /
GSP29nystik_u:2749: prāptau tu dūraṃ gacchat prakṣīṇaṃ sat prāptamarthaṃ na gṛhṇāti ataijasam,
GSP29nystik_u:2754: yogyo hi tādṛśa indriyakṣaṇaḥ svakāraṇādupajātaḥ pariṇato vārthakṣaṇaśrca,
GSP29nystik_u:2760: tena sthemabhājāṃ bhāvānāṃ svarūpayogyatā vā mahattvādirviṣayībhāvaḥ sahakārisākalyaṃ vā jñānopajananaṃ prati pariśiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2762: tadā yadevāvyavahitaṃ sannihitaṃ sad ajanayad vijñānaṃ viprakṛṣṭamapi vyavahitamapi tadeveti tathaiva tena jñānaṃ janayitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2763: asti hi tasya tadāpi svarūpayogyateti, sahakārisākalyaṃ tu prāptireva /
GSP29nystik_u:2764: tasmāt na saṃbandhamantareṇa viṣayībhāva iti sūktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2767: kulālādau prāpyakāriṇi dṛṣṭaṃ yathā viprakṛṣṭo vyavahitaśrca na karotīti,
GSP29nystik_u:2768: tasmāt aprāpyakāriṇi cācaskāntādau dṛṣṭaṃ yathā viprakṛṣṭo vyavahitaśrca lauhaṃ maṇirākarṣati,
GSP29nystik_u:2769: tasmāt tatra pramāṇaṃ vaktavyamiti uttaram--indriyatvameva pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:2771: yadi tu kaśrcit dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavikalatvam ubhdāvayet tvagādīnāmaprāpyakāritvāditi,
GSP29nystik_u:2780: sa ca vyastānāmapyastīti yatra tatra vyavasthitebhyo 'pi kāryotpādaprasaṅkaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2785: prāptereva tatra tatra kāryotpādaṃ prati upayogasya viditasvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2793: ata eva bahirnisṛtāpyacchinnamūlā dṛṣṭiḥ kāryāya samarthā na chinnamūleti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:2795: pratyakṣasamākhyātalakṣaṇānuvādena lakṣaṇe vidhīyamāne jñāyata evaitajjñānameveti loke sākṣātkārijñānahetoḥ pratyakṣatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2802: na khalu yaiva candanasparśajñānasyotpattau sāmagrī saiva sukhasyāpīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2803: asti hi śītārtasyāpi candanendriyasaṃyogāt śītasparśajñānam iti tadvadevāsya sukhamapi bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:2809: api copādānābhedaśrca kutaśrcit kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaśceti ko virodhaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:2810_0: ata evāsmākamabhede apyupādānasya piṭharasyauṣṇyāparākhyasya ca vahinasaṃyogasya
GSP29nystik_u:2810_1: pūrvarūpādipradhvaṃsānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ bhedād bhinnajātīyā jāyante gandharūparasasparśā iti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2814: yatrāpīndriyārthasannikarṣastatrāpi jñānamastīti tadeva sukhaduḥkhayoḥ kāraṇaṃ kluptasāmarthyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2818: sukhaduḥkhabuddhyutpāda eva cātra dharmādharmopayogo na tu susaduḥkhotpāde /
GSP29nystik_u:2819: na cāsatīndriyārthasannikarṣe jñānamanyanmanorathādi vā tādṛśaṃ sukhabhedaṃ vidhatte yādṛśo viṣayopabhogajanmā /
GSP29nystik_u:2824: iśvarasyāpyasti tatrabhavato yogarddhisaṃpannānāṃ ca mahādhiyāṃ samastavastusākṣātmāra iti teṣāmapi sukhaduḥkhotpādapracayaḥ prasajyet,
GSP29nystik_u:2827: sa ca satyapyarthasākṣātkāre nāsti siddhānāmiti na teṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhotpādaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2828: api ca caramabhāvi kāraṇaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvabhāvināmakaraṇatvāpādane tantvādīnāmapi paṭādīn pratyakāraṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2829: saṃyogabhedādeva tādṛśapaṭātpatteḥ tantvādīnāṃ ca saṃyogabheda evopayogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2834: tatrobhayyapi indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānamavyabhicārīti lakṣaṇena saṃgṛhītāpi svaśabdenopāttā,
GSP29nystik_u:2837: tatra vyapadeśo viśeṣaṇamupalakṣaṇaṃ vā nāmajātyādi, tat karma vyapadeśyaṃ viśeṣyamiti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:2838: tadyathā ḍittho 'yaṃ gaurayaṃ śuklo 'yaṃ kamaṇḍalumānayaṃ gacchatyayamiti sarvaṃ hi savikalpakaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena vastuṣu pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:2840: na tu jātyādīnāṃ mitho viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāvagāhīti yāvat //
GSP29nystik_u:2841: tatra nāmarahitamavikalpakaṃ nāstīti ye vipratipadyante tanmatamapacikīrṣurūpanyasyati bhāṣyakāraḥ yāvadarthaṃ vai nāmadheyaśabdāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2843: nāsti so 'rtho yaḥ kadācit kvacit kathañcit nāmadheyena viyujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2846: arthā hi pratīyamānāṃ nāmadheyairūpetāstatsāmānādhikaraṇyenāvagamyante gaurityartho 'śva ityartha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2850: na hi bhavati dhūmo 'yaṃ vahinariti kiṃ tu dhūmo 'yaṃ dhūmatvāt vahinamāniti /
GSP29nystik_u:2851: api cāśabdopāye 'numeyādau na śabdasaṃbhedenādhigamo bhavet, asti tu /
GSP29nystik_u:2852: tasmāt tairnāmadheyaiḥ saha samānādhikaraṇasyārthasya pratyayo yata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2854_0: kiṃ ca gavādiṣu ṣaḍjādiṣu ca śabdāpakarṣe 'rthapratyayāpakarṣāt tadutkarṣe tvarthapratyayotkarṣāt
GSP29nystik_u:2855: tadidaṃ samaḥ prayojanaṃ saṃpratyaya iti samadhikaḥ pratyaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2856: astyarthasaṃpratyayo nāmadheyasāmānādhikaraṇyena, na tvetāvatā nāmadheyātmatā sidhyati /
GSP29nystik_u:2857: asti hi purovartidravyasāmānādhikaraṇyena rajatapratyayo na caitāvatā śuktī rajatātmikā bhavatītyata āha---arthasaṃpratyayācca vyavahāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2859_1: viṣayajñānaṃ rūpamiti vā rasa iti vā evaṃ rūpādyarthasāmānādhikaraṇyena bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2862: uktamapi vyapadeśaṃ savyākhyānamāha--rūpamiti jānīte rasa iti jānīte iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2863: tathā cārthānāṃ nāmadheyātmakatvāt tadgocaramālocanamapi nāmadheyagocaramityarthavat nāmadheyena vyapadiśyamānaṃ śābdaṃ prasajyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2864: na śabdapramāṇakatayā śābdam, api tu śabde jātaṃ śābdam /
GSP29nystik_u:2868: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte /
GSP29nystik_u:2875_1: iti parīkṣāparvaṇi vacanārhamapi subhāṣitarucitayā tadvilambamasahamāno bhāṣyakāro
GSP29nystik_u:2880: sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabdātmakatvaṃ rūpādīnāmabhidhīyānaṃ śabdabrahmātmakatvaṃ vocyeta śreyamāṇagaurityādipadabhedātmakatvaṃ vā? na tāvadādya /
GSP29nystik_u:2882: na salvasmadādisamastadarśanapathātivṛttena śabdabrahmaṇā rūpādīnāmasti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītiḥ laukikānām /
GSP29nystik_u:2883: śrūyamāṇaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyena tu tādātmyaprasādhane anupayuktaśabdasaṃbandhasya bālamūkādeḥ rūpādijñāneṣu nāsti śrūyamāṇaśabdagandho 'pi,
GSP29nystik_u:2885: na ca teṣāmapi prāgbhavīyaśabdabhāvanānugamena tatsāmānādhikaraṇyamiti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:2886: na khalu rūpādyātmanaḥ śabdasya rūpādivaiśadyaināvaiśadyaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2888: veśadye tu vyutpannavadavyutpanno 'pi śabdaiḥ vyavaharet, na tu saṃbandhagrahaṇapekṣeta /
GSP29nystik_u:2889: na ca tādātmyādanyad vācakatvaṃ śabdānāṃ yatra saṃbandhagrahāpekṣā bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:2892: na hyasti saṃbhavo bhedakalpanā ca sāmānādhikaraṇyaprathā ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:2894: na kevalamabyutpannānām, vyutpannānāmapyastītyāha--gṛhīte 'pi ca śabdārthasaṃbandhe iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2895: ārddhekta eva sāmānādhikaraṇyanirāsāya saṃbandhagrahaṇasvarūpamāha--asthārthasya sāsnādimadrūpasya ayaṃ gakarādyokāro nāmadheyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:2897: tathā ca yo ḍittho nānādeśakālāvasthāsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ piṇḍabhedaḥ so 'yamiti sannihitadeśakāla ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2898: na tvayaṃ piṇḍo ḍitthaśabda iti pratyayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2899: autsargikaṃ hi śabdānāmarthaparatvaṃ kvacit punarityādibhiḥ śabdaistadapodyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2901: tatrāpi śabdo vācyatvaparo na svarūpaparaḥ yathā gaurvāhīka iti lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogaparaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2902: na ca tanmātreṇa vāhīkasya gotvaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2903: tasmād bhinnayoreva śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhagrahāt tanmūlatvācca śabdavyavahārasya na śabdapuraḥsaramapi jñānaṃ śabdasāmānādhikaraṇyamātmano 'rthasyāvagamayati /
GSP29nystik_u:2904_0: yattu śabdānupāye 'pi jñāne śabdaḥ pūrvaṃ bhavati tadgṛhītasaṅketasya prathamamindriyārthasannikarṣādālocanena
GSP29nystik_u:2906: tena vyutpannasya nirvikalpakāt parāñcaḥ pratyayāḥ śabdānupāyā api śabdapuraḥsarā jāyante /
GSP29nystik_u:2909: piṇḍa eva hi dṛṣṭaḥ san saṃjñāṃ smārayituṃ kṣamaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2910: tasmād vyutpannasyāpi nāmadheyasmaraṇāya pūrvameṣitavyo vinaiva nāmadheyamarthapratyayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2911: tadidam uktam--gṛhīte 'pi śabdārthasaṃbandhe asyārthasyāyaṃ śabdo nāmadheyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:2912: yadā tu so 'rtho gṛhyate nāmadheyarahito nāmadheyasmaraṇāt pūrvamavikalpena tadā pūrvasmād avyutpannāvasthāyām arthajñānāt na viśiṣyate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2913: yato na viśiṣyate tasmāt tadarthajñānaṃ tādṛgeva bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2914: nanu parapratipādanādilakṣaṇavyavahārāya svarūpeṇa jñāne vyapadeṣṭavye yadarthavyapadeśena vyapadiśyate tadavagacchāmo 'rthavyapadeśākāramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:2916: yadyarthavyapadeśayornābhedaḥ, tasmāt punarapi tādātmyaṃ prasaktamityata āha--tasya tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:2917: arthākārameva tu jñānamarthavyapadeśena vyapadiśyate anyathā aśakyatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2920: tadevamarthajñānakāle # sa # na samākhyāśabdo vyāpriyate pratīyamānatayā,
GSP29nystik_u:2921: vyavahārakāle tu parapratyāyanakāle tu vyāpriyate kāraṇatayā /
GSP29nystik_u:2922: tadanena gopālāvipālādīnāṃ saṃjñāniveśanaṃ tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu vyavahārotkarṣahetuḥ
GSP29nystik_u:2927: cākṣuṣaṃ hi rūpajñānaṃ rūpa eva niyataṃ na śabde pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:2928: evaṃ śrautramapi śabda eva niyataṃ na rūpādau pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:2929: yadi punaridaṃ śabdātmakaṃ rūpādi bhavet, śrotrajaṃ jñānaṃ śabdagrāhīti rūpādāvapi pravarteta /
GSP29nystik_u:2931: api ca śrūyamāṇaśabdātmatve rūpādīnām, teṣāmapi śravaṇagrāhyatvamityandho 'pi rūpu gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2932: asti hi tasya śrotraṃ ca śabdajñānaṃ ca /
GSP29nystik_u:2934: asti hi tasya locanaṃ ca rūpajñānaṃ ca /
GSP29nystik_u:2935: aśabdo 'bhāva iti ca vivakṣitaviparītāpattiḥ śabdābhāvasyārthasya śabdatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:2936: aśabdatve vā sa evāsyārthaḥ śabdād bhinnaḥ prasajyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2944: indriyārthasannikarṣeṇa hi liṅgena yadindriyagātijñānaṃ tadapi pratyakṣalakṣaṇopetamiti pratyakṣaṃ prasajyata iti tannivāraṇāya avyapadeśyapadam /
GSP29nystik_u:2950: nanvindriyagatijñānamapi indriyārthasannikarṣālliṅgādutpannamityata āha---na hyanumeyasyeti naitadindrayārthasannikārṣādupajāyate, kiṃ tu tajjñānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2951: ata evātīte 'pi dhūmādau liṅge tatsmaraṇamātrādevānumeyajñāna bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2952: na ca sannikarṣapadasya mukhyatve saṃbhavati jñānalakṣaṇā yuktetti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2955: kramaprāptasyāvyabhicāripadasya tātparyaṃ brūvāṇo bhāṣyasyāpi tātparyamāha--grīṣme marīcaya itīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2956: yadyapi sāmānyalakṣaṇenaiva vyabhicāriṇo nirastāḥ pratyayāḥ tadapekṣaṃ ca viśeṣalakṣaṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:2961: na hi cakṣurādīnāṃ grahaṇamupayujyate, api tu sattaiva /
GSP29nystik_u:2963: na khalvagṛhītaṃ liṅgaṃ vā śabdo vā āgamasahitaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vā yathāviṣayam ādadhāti pramām /
GSP29nystik_u:2966: śabdādau tu yadyapi pramopajananaṃ prati nārthāvyabhicāragrahāpekṣā,
GSP29nystik_u:2972: evaṃ yathā mudgastambastathā mudgaparṇīti āptavākyaśravaṇādeva mudgastambasādṛśyajñānasyānupajanitaphalasyāpi śakyaṃ tadarthāvyabhicāritvaṃ niśrcetum /
GSP29nystik_u:2973: pratyakṣasya tu pramāṇasyātyantaparokṣasvarūpolambha eva tāvat pramopajananāt prāg durlabhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2975: yadyapi ca saṃvedanaprāmāṇyapakṣe 'pi tatsaṃvedanaṃ manasā sulabham, tathāpi na tanmātraṃ pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:2976: api tu asādhāraṇendriyārthasannikarṣasahāyamiti tatsahāyasya tasya parokṣatvameva /
GSP29nystik_u:2978: na svarūpataḥ ityetat pramāṇāntarebhyo vyāvṛttamasādhāraṇaṃ pratyakṣasya rūpamādarśayitumavyabhicāripadopādānam /
GSP29nystik_u:2980: na hyasti saṃbhavo 'vyabhicaritapratyakṣagṛhītapakṣadharmatākaṃ tarkasahāyapratyakṣagṛhītāvinābhāvaṃ cānumānaṃ vyabhicāratīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2982: tadapi yadyapi prathamaṃ vyāptigrahaṇadoṣeṇa na khaṇḍitam,
GSP29nystik_u:2984: tathā ca vyāptigrāhi pratyakṣaṃ tatrāpi vyabhicārīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2985: evamāgamo 'pi sākṣāt kvacit pāramparyeṇa pratyakṣapūrvakastadvyabhicāreṇaiva vyabhicarati /
GSP29nystik_u:2987: tadevaṃ pratyakṣāvyabhicāre pramāṇānāmavyabhicāro 'stīti pratyakṣasyaiva viśeṣaṇamavyabhicāripadaṃ cakāra,
GSP29nystik_u:2989: na hyasti saṃbhavastanmūlaṃ pratyakṣam avyabhicāri, tāni ca vyabhicārīṇīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2995: tasmāt suṣṭhūkaṃ grīṣme marīcaya iti bhāṣyam, tatpratiṣedhārthamidamucyate---avyabhicārīti //
GSP29nystik_u:3002: atra ca na nirvikalmakaṃ bhrāntam, kiṃ tu savikalpakamityāha--tāṃstu marīcīniti /
GSP29nystik_u:3003: indriyeṇālocya marīcīn uccāvacamuccalato nirvikalpakena gṛhītvā paśrcāt tatropaghātadoṣād viparyeti,
GSP29nystik_u:3006: yathāhuḥ niruktakārāḥ, naiṣa sthāṇoraparādho yadenamandhe na paśyati /
GSP29nystik_u:3009: no khalu saṃśayajñānaṃ vikalpyamānavastugocaraṃ tadrūpaṃ vastu prāpayati /
GSP29nystik_u:3010: aprāpayaccopadarśitaṃ kathaṃ saṃvādam, asaṃvādakaṃ ca kathamavyabhicāri?
GSP29nystik_u:3013: na ca tadevāsya preṣiturvi dhitsitam, tathehāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:3015: tathā hi vyavasāyo viniśrcayo vikalpa ityanarthāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:3016: sa evātmā rūpaṃ yasya tat savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:3017: tadetadatisphaṭatvāt śiṣyairgamyata eveti bhāṣyavārttikakārābhyām avyākhyātamapi asmābhiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3023: na cendriyārthābhyāṃ labdhajanma vijñānamarthāvabhāsaṃ śakyamabhilāpena yojanayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:3029: na hi rūpāt jāyamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ rasasahitametadādarśayati /
GSP29nystik_u:3031: tat siddhametat, yadarthasāmarthyalabdhajanma, na tat śabdakalpanānugatam, yathā nirvikalpakam /
GSP29nystik_u:3039: tathā hi yadabhilāpakalpanānugataṃ na tadarthasāmarthyajaṃ yatheśvarapradhānādivikalpavijñānam /
GSP29nystik_u:3040: tathā caite vivādādhyāsitā vikalpā iti vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3041: niṣedhyamarthasāmarthyajatvaṃ tadabhilāpakalpanānanugatatvena vyāptaṃ tadviruddhaṃ ca sadanugatatvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3042: na ca sandigdhavyatirekitā, arthasāmarthyena hi tadutpadyamānamartharūpam anukuryād na śabdarūpam /
GSP29nystik_u:3043: na hyarthe śabdāḥ santi tadātmāno vetyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3046: yatra tarhi te kṛtasaṅketāḥ tadeva smārayedetān /
GSP29nystik_u:3047: tatraiva ca te kṛtasaṅketā yadanugataṃ sāmānyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3048: na ca taddṛṣṭam, kiṃ tu svalakṣaṇaṃ darśanagocaraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3049: tadeva hi paramārthasadvijñānasya kāraṇam, na tu sāmānyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3051: tasmād yad dṣṭaṃ na tena śabdānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ, yena ca saṃbandho na taddṛṣṭam /
GSP29nystik_u:3052: api ca dṛṣṭasya śabdavācyatve darśanādiva vahinaruṣṇa iti vākyādapi pratīyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:3053: tathā ca śabdādapi tasmin pratīte śītāpanopanaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3055: tādṛśaṃ ca taddarśanasya kāraṇamiti nirvikalpakena prathamākṣatannipātajanmanā jātimadvastuvedanāt tatropalabdhacarasaṃbandhasya śabdasya smaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:3056: tathā ca tacchabdābhidheyajātiviśiṣṭadravyāvagāhīndriyārthasannikarṣajanmā vikalpapratyayo gaurayamityevamākāro jāyata iti cet? yathāhuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3063: na hi jātijātibhantau vā kriyākriyāvantau va guṇaguṇinau vā tatsamavāyo vā vivekena cakāsati /
GSP29nystik_u:3064: na ca vivekenāpratibhāsamānaḥ śakyā mitho yojayituṃ kṣīrodakavadatadvedinā /
GSP29nystik_u:3072_0: api ca vastuniveśe jātyādīnāmupādhīnāmekasya vastunaḥ sattvaṃ ca dravyatvaṃ ca pārthivatvaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3072_1: ca vṛkṣatvaṃ ca śiṃśapātvaṃ copādhaya iti dūrādekopādhiviśiṣṭasya grahe sarvopādhiviśiṣṭagrahaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3074: patanadharmaṇo hi badarasyottarasya kuṇḍamadharaṃ pratayāsannamapatanadharmakaṃ badaraṃ vidadhadādhāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3078: tasmāt svabhāva eva svakāraṇādhīnajanmā dravyasya sa tādṛśo yena bahūnāmupādhīnāmupakarotīti vācyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3079_0: tathā ca sattvopakārasamartheṃ tasmin dravye gṛhyamāṇe dravyatvādyupakārasamartho
GSP29nystik_u:3079_1: 'pi sa evāsya svabhāva iti tatsvabhāvāvacchinnāḥ sattvavikalpakena paramārthasaddravyāvagāhinā
GSP29nystik_u:3079_2: sarva eva dravyatvapārthivatvavṛkṣatvaśiśapātvādayo viṣayīkṛtā iti vikalpāntarāṇāmānarthakyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3087: asmākaṃ tu anādivikalpavāsanopādānā vikalpā yacca gṛhṇanti,
GSP29nystik_u:3088: yacca adhyavasyanita tayorūbhayorapyanyanivṛttirūpatayā avastutvāt matāgapi na paramārthasad vastu gāhante,
GSP29nystik_u:3089: pāramparyeṇa tu vastupratibandhāt tatra pravartayantaḥ prāpayantaśca na visaṃvādayanti lokam /
GSP29nystik_u:3091: api cālocite vastunīndriyeṇa tadanantarotpannaṃ śabdasmaraṇavyavahitavyāpāramindriyamarthaśrca na savikalpikāmapi dhiyamupajanayitumarhataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3095: na ca yadevālocanamajījanadindriyaṃ tadeva smaraṇasahakāri vikalpapratyayamādhatte /
GSP29nystik_u:3107: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca saṃbandhaṃ laukikīṃ sthitim /
GSP29nystik_u:3111: jātiguṇakriyāvatāṃ caitanna saṃbhavatyeva rūpavivekasaṃbandhayorapratibhāsanena ghaṭanāyogāt kṣīrodakavadatadvedinetyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3115: syād virodho yadi svalakṣaṇamevārthaḥ, na tvetadasti /
GSP29nystik_u:3117: tena tajjanitaṃ jñānamarthasāmarthyajaṃ cābhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ ceti na virodhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3119: na ca dravyādyabhinnaṃ jātyādi bhinnaṃ kalpayanto vikalpā nārthasāmarthyajanmāna iti sāṃpratat /
GSP29nystik_u:3121: yathā ca bhede 'pi teṣāṃ tadvācakānāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tathopapāditamadhastāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3122: na ca bhinnena śabdena ḍittho 'yamityabhedakalpanādarthasya vikalpānāmanarthajatvamiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3128: śabdastu saṃpātāyāto na niveśayatyātmānam indriyaje vikalpe /
GSP29nystik_u:3131: cakṣuṣāpi sa evāyaṃ piṇḍaḥ saṃprati dṛśyate //
GSP29nystik_u:3135: saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na bādhate /
GSP29nystik_u:3140: na ca prāgavasthāsmaraṇasāpekṣatayā nendriyārthasannikarṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ vikalpasyeti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:3146: na hi nājījanat kuśūlasthaṃ bījamaṅkuramiti na samavahitakṣityādisahakārigrāmamapyasyājanakaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3147: na ca janakatvājanakatvalakṣaṇo viruddhadharmasaṃsargo bhedaheturityupapādayiṣyate kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge //
GSP29nystik_u:3150: na ca vartamāno 'rthaḥ smaraṇagocaraḥ smaraṇasyānubhavajanitasaṃskārodbodhajanmanaḥ pūrvānubhavagocaraṃ prati niyamāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3152: na hi rūpaviṣayāḥ sahasramapi nayanapradīpādayaḥ śabdaviṣayasya śravasaḥ sahakāritāmāpadyanta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3153: tat kiṃ bhavatāṃ yatra gandhajñānānantaraṃ cākṣuṣaṃ rūpajñānaṃ jāyate tatra gandhajñānam na samanantarapratyayaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:3154: tatrāpi hi cakṣūrūpaviṣayaṃ na gandhaviṣayasya jñānasya sahakāri bhavitumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:3160: tathā satyākāśaparamāṇvādayo 'pi tatsaṃyuktā iti te 'pi pratyakṣāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP29nystik_u:3163: nanvasaṃbaddhamindriyaṃ kathaṃ tatra jñānaṃ janayati? tacca jñānaṃ kathaṃ pratyakṣam?
GSP29nystik_u:3172: tathā hi taditi pārokṣyam, idamiti ca sākṣātkāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3175: yathā hyekasmin padmarāgamaṇau gṛhyamāṇe tadabhāvo vyavacchidyate,
GSP29nystik_u:3176: yadi punarnaṃ vyavacchidyeta tadā bhāvo na paricchidyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:3178: tadabhāvāvinābhāvinaśrca puṣparāgādaya iti te 'pi sarve vayavacchinna bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:3180: sa eva puṣparāgādyatmeti tadavinābhāvī padmarāgābhāvaḥ padmarāgaśrca syāditi durghaṭamāpadyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:3187: tasmāt pūrvadeśakālasaṃbandhādanyo 'paradeśakālasaṃbandha iti siddho viṣayabheda iti //
GSP29nystik_u:3194: tasmād viṣayabhodāt virodha iti cet---na tvihāpi tadekaṃ jñānaṃ tasyaivaikasya vastunaḥ pūrvadeśakālasaṃbandhe parokṣamaparokṣaṃ vā paradeśakālasaṃbandha iti ko virodhaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:3195: yo 'pi kāladeśasaṃbandhabhedena viṣayabheda uktaḥ, so 'pi ayuktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3196: yato yuktaṃ yat padmarāgasvarūpagrahe tadabhāvo vyavacchidyata iti,
GSP29nystik_u:3198: kasmāt punaḥ puṣparāgādayo vyavacchidyante, padmarāgābhāvāvinābhāvāditi cet?
GSP29nystik_u:3200: tayoḥ kadācidapi tādā tmyenānupalambhāditi cet---yatra tarhi tādātmyamupalabhyate na tatra tadabhāvāvinābhāvaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3201: tathā ca pūrvāparadeśakālasaṃbaddhastādātmyenānubhūyamāna indriyajena vikalpena padmarāgo na bhinno bhavitumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:3202: tasmāt parvāparadeśakālau tatsaṃndhau vā kāmaṃ bhidyeyātāṃ parasparābhāvāvinābhāvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:3204: na tu tadāliḍrigatasvabhāvaḥ padmarāgamaṇi/, tasya tābhyāmanyatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3206: na cendriyārthasannikarṣābhāve 'pi pūrvāparāvasthāparāmarśātmano vikalpasya bhāvādanindriyajayatvamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP29nystik_u:3207: tathā satyavikalpakamapi kāmāturasya kāminīṃ bhāvayataḥ tadviṣayamindriyārthasannikarṣaṃ vināpi dṛṣṭamiti nīlādyanubhāvātmāno 'pi avikalpakā anindriyajāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP29nystik_u:3208: yadi tu nīlādyanubhavānāṃ kāminyanubhavāt kathañcid viśeṣaṃ brūyāta,
GSP29nystik_u:3209: tadā asmākamapi anindriyajebhyo vikalpebhya utprekṣāvyāpārebhyo 'stīndriyajānāṃ darśanavyāpārāṇāṃ bhedaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3210: na ca vikalpagato darśanavyāpāro 'nubhūyamānaḥ sati saṃbhave nirvikalpakopādhiriti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3211: sarvā eva hīndriyajā buddhayo vikalpikā avikalpikā vā dhārāvāhinyo 'mahamikayā parasparānapekṣā ekamarthamavagāhamānā udayante vyayante ca /
GSP29nystik_u:3213: tasmāt indriyārthasannikarṣalabdhajanmāno vikalpā darśanavyāpārā nānya iti yuktamutpaśyamaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3214: na ca śabdapratyakṣayorvastugocaratve satyapi pratyayābhedaḥ kāraṇabhedena pārokṣyāpārokṣyabhedopapatteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3217: na caikopādhinā sattvena viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte upādhyantaraviśiṣṭatadgrahaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3218: svabhāvo hi dravyasyopādhibhirviśiṣyate, na tūpādhayo va tairviśiṣṭatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3219: na ca yat svabhāvasaṃbandhi sa svabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3222: api ca rūpajñānaṃ viṣayagrahaṇadharma nānāparamāṇuviṣayaṃ na paramāṇusvabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3223: tatsvabhāvatve vā teṣāṃ sarvān pratyaviśeṣāt sarvaireva te paramāṇavo viditāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3224: na cāsaṃbaddhā eva svajñānena rūpaparamāṇavo viṣayāstasyeti vācyam,
GSP29nystik_u:3226: svabhāva evārthajñānabhedayoḥ saṃbandho yadartho viṣayo jñānaṃ ca viṣayīti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:3227: hantopādhyupādhimatorapi svabhāva eva saṃbandho 'stu tathāpi vijñānārthavanna svarūpābhedaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3233: evaṃ viśeṣyajñānamapi viśeṣaṇāviṣayaṃ kena svaviṣayamavacchindyāt, tayoḥ parasparavārtānabhijñatvāt?
GSP29nystik_u:3234: tābhyāṃ vāsanā, tato mānasapratyayo viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvākara utpadyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3235: na tvasti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo vāstava iti cet? astu tāvad vāstavāvāstavacintā /
GSP29nystik_u:3239: tathā sati darśanavyāpāratvamasya sākṣāt samarthitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3242: hanta bhoḥ kiṃ mānasamapi jñānaṃ saṃkalayitumarhati?
GSP29nystik_u:3244: yadi pūrvakaṃ vijñānaṃ manaḥ, kathaṃ tasya sarvaviṣayatā?
GSP29nystik_u:3245: asmākaṃ tu manaḥ sarvaviṣayamapi acetanatayā na vicārakam /
GSP29nystik_u:3246: tasmādātmaiva sakalajñānatajjanitavāsanādhāraḥ smartā ca pratisandhātā ca /
GSP29nystik_u:3248: ātmanyeva sthitaṃ jñānaṃ sa hi boddhātra gamyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3249: smaraṇe cāsya sāmarthyaṃ sandhānādau ca vidyate //
GSP29nystik_u:3250_0: # ślo. vā. pratyakṣa. 122 # sa salvindriyārthasannikarṣādālocya jātimantaṃ saṃmugdhamartham
GSP29nystik_u:3252: karaṇaṃ cendriyaṃ buddheḥ kartā cātma sacetanaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3257: arthau hi rūparūpibhāvena sthitāvapi nāpātajanmanā jñānena tathā gṛhītau, api tu svarūpamātreṇa /
GSP29nystik_u:3258: na hi yāvadasti tāvad grahītavyam, tena tadekadeśagrahe 'pi nāpramāṇatā /
GSP29nystik_u:3259: savikalpakaṃ tūktasāmagrījanma jātyādirūpatayā dravyaṃ ca rūpitayā kalpayat paścājjāyamānamapīndriyārthasannikarṣaprabhavatayā pratyakṣaṃ bhavatyeva /
GSP29nystik_u:3261: tat siddhametad vivādādhyāsitā vikalpāḥ svagocare pratyakṣā avyabhicāritve sati indriyārthasannikarṣajatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3262: yo ya evaṃbhūtaḥ sa sarpaḥ pratyakṣo yathālocanam, tathā caitat /
GSP29nystik_u:3268: nanu satīndriyārthasannikarṣe purovartini dravye dhūma iti vā reṇuriti vā jñānamutpadyamānaṃ kathamanindriyajamityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:3270: saṃpūrvo hi śīḍ bhāvapratyayānto viśeṣāpekṣe vimarśe vartate sa caikādhikaraṇau smaryamāṇau mitho viruddhau dharmāvāropayan anyatarannāvadhārayati /
GSP29nystik_u:3273: ata eva visphāritākṣāḥ saudāminīsaṃpātāt sakṛdālocya kañcit samānadharmavantaṃ dharmiṇaṃ samandhakāre sandigdhe,
GSP29nystik_u:3274: tasmānmānasa evaiṣa saṃśayo na tvindriyaja ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3275: tadetat pariharan na caitadityādi bhāṣyaṃ vcācaṣṭe---tacca naivam /
GSP29nystik_u:3281: indriyeṇopalabdhaṃ sannikṛṣṭaṃ sannikarṣapūrvakatvāduparladheḥ manasopalabhate jānīte cakṣuḥsahāyenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3282: atra bhāṣyaṃ yacca tadindrayānavadhāraṇapūrvakaṃ manasānavadhāraṇaṃ tadviśeṣapekṣaṃ vimarśamātraṃ saṃśayaḥ, na parvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3288: yaduparatendriyavyāpārasya saṃśayajñānaṃ dṛṣṭāntatayā hṛdi sthitaṃ śaṅkiturityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3292: nanu smaraṇavyavahitavyāpāramasya kāraṇaṃ nendriyamityata āha--tasya hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:3293: upapāditametadadhastāt yathā smaraṇaṃ nendriyavyāpāraṃ vyavadhatta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3298: anyathā ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti jñānaṃ nirnimittaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3302: yadi ca ghaṭādau bāhye na manaḥ pravartena, kathaṃ ghaṭamiti bhavet? jānāmītyeva syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3305: tathā ca sarva eva saṃśayo mānasa ityāśaṅkyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3309: tathā ca saṃśayajñānotpāde apīndriyārthasannikarṣo 'pekṣaṇīya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3316: taddhi bāhyendriyalakṣaṇam, āntaraṃ ca mana ityata āha--pṛthak ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3320: tat kimatra prameyārthena pramāṇena ityata āha---na ca teṣāmiti nanūktaṃ svasaṃvedanatayā na pramākarmabhāva eṣāmityata āha--na cānyā gatiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:3321: saṃvedanatvena hi teṣāṃ svasaṃvedanatā, na caite saṃvedanamiti uktamadhastāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3326: na sukhādi prameyaṃ vā mano vāstvindriyāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:3327: na ca tat saṃbhavati, ghrāṇādisūtreṇa vibhāgapareṇa niṣedhāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3333: nedaṃ vibhāgaparaṃ ghrāṇādisūtram, api tu lakṣaṇaparam /
GSP29nystik_u:3334: tatra cendriyamapi mano na lakṣitam, vaidharmyādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3338: kāryasya hi viśeṣau bhautikatvābhautikatve, bhūtakāryaṃ bhautikam /
GSP29nystik_u:3344: api ca vaidharmyāt manovat śrotramapi na vaktavyamityāha--śrotre ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3346: bhūtāni hi ghrāṇādīni śrotrāntāni, manastu na bhūtamiti vaidharmyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3348: darśayiṣyati hi vārttikakāro yathā svārthiko na kaśrcidapi pratyaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3351: tadadena sati cendriyārthasannikarṣe ityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:3352: yaccāparaṃ vaidharmyaṃ ghrāṇādibhyo manasa uktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa tadapi siṃhāvalokanena dūṣayati---saguṇānāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3353: ghrāṇādīni yathā svasvaguṇena gandhādinā bāhyaṃ gandhādi bodhayanti ,
GSP29nystik_u:3354: naivaṃ svaguṇena śabdena śrotraṃ bāhyaṃ śabdaṃ bodhayati,
GSP29nystik_u:3357: bhūtatvābhūtatvalakṣaṇaṃ vaidharmyaṃ na bhautikatvābhautikatvagrahaṇena śakyaṃ vaktumityavadhāraṇābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3360: tabhdāvānavagame ca nendriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ sukhādijñānaṃ śakyaṃ vaktumityata āha--tantrāntareti /
GSP29nystik_u:3361: tantryate vyutpādyate anena tattvamiti tantraṃ śāstram /
GSP29nystik_u:3368: sarvasya tantrāntare loke ca siddhatvādavaktavyatāyāṃ svamatamiti nāsti /
GSP29nystik_u:3369: vacanaliṅgaṃ hi matājñānaṃ na cānanumate niṣedhamātraṃ śakyaṃ vaktum,
GSP29nystik_u:3376: indriyārthasannikarṣotvannaṃ jñānamavyabhicārīti hi pratayakṣalakṣaṇamanavayavena samānāsamānajātīyebhyo vyāvṛttaṃ śakyameva lakṣayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:3377: na khalvayamasāvaśva iti jñānamindriyajaṃ śabdajaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3378: taddhi dravyagocaraṃ vā ucyeta, vācyatvagocaraṃ vā, vācyatvaviśiṣṭadravyagocaraṃ vā /
GSP29nystik_u:3379: tatra dravyamaindriyakameva na śābdamityaśakyaṃ hi jñānaṃ vyavacchettum, anabhimataṃ ca /
GSP29nystik_u:3385: atha na vācyatvaṃ nāma mīmāṃsakānāmiva kiñcidatīndriyam,
GSP29nystik_u:3388: athāyamapyaindriyaka eva, tatra gurupadiṣṭā gāthā paṭhitavyā,
GSP29nystik_u:3393_0: vyavasāyātmakapadena tu savikalpake jñāne 'varuddhe nirvikalpakasyāpratyakṣatā mā
GSP29nystik_u:3398: dvipadaparigraheṇa daśa--indriyārthasannikarṣotpannapadaṃ dhravaṃ kṛtvā jñānādyekaikapadasaṃbandhena carastraḥ koṭayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3399: jñānaṃ ca ghavaṃ kṛtvā avyapadeśyādi ekaikapadasaṃbandhena tistraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3400: evamavyapadeśyapadaṃ dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyabhicāryādyekaikapadasaṃbandhena dve koṭī,
GSP29nystik_u:3403: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānamiti dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyapadeśyādyekaikapadasaṃbandhe tistraḥ koṭayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3404: jñānamavyapadeśyamiti dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyabhicāryādipadasaṃbandhena dve koṭī,
GSP29nystik_u:3406: avyabhicārivyavasāyātmakapadayostu dhruvayorindriyārthasannikarṣotpanna padena jñānapadena ca pratyekaṃ saṃbandhe koṭidvayam,
GSP29nystik_u:3409: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānamavyapadeśyamiti dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyabhicāryādyekaikasaṃbandhe dve koṭī,
GSP29nystik_u:3414: na hyatra tadvyavacchedavācakaḥ kaśrcidasti śabda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3420: tadevaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ samarthya vāsubandhavaṃ tāvat pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitum upanyasyati--apare punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:3423: yadi tata eva tabhdavati nārthāntarād vyapadeśāsaṃbandhinaḥ tat pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:3424: ata eva vyapadeśāsaṃbandhino 'rthāntarāt śuktirūpāt rajatena vyapadiśyāmānaṃ śuktijñānaṃ na pratyakṣam,
GSP29nystik_u:3427: etasya pratyakṣābhāsasya vyāvṛttiḥ suprasiddheti tāmupekṣyānumānavyāvṛttim āha--eteneti /
GSP29nystik_u:3429: na hi tata eva vyapadeśakādeva vahneḥ tad vijñānamanumānaṃ bhavati, kiṃ tu yatra vahnirasti tatra /
GSP29nystik_u:3430: tataśca yatra tu dṛṣṭamātra eva vahnerūparamāduparato dhūmaḥ tatrānyataśrca tabhdavati smaryamāṇād dhūmādasati vyapadeśake vahnau /
GSP29nystik_u:3431: tato 'rthāt ityatra hi arthaviśeṣaṇaṃ tata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3432: tatsaṃgataśrca evakāro 'yogavyavacchede vartate, yathā caitra dhanardhara eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:3435: na hi jñānavyapadeśa ātmanā vā indriyeṇa vā saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3439: asati cārthapade kasyedaṃ viśeṣaṇam iti viśeṣaṇasaṃgato naivakāro 'yogaṃ vyavacchindāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3442: anyathā abhidhānāparyavasānād yasya tad vyapadiṣyata iti vyapadeśasaṃbandhī viśeṣyaḥ prāpyata eveti sidhyatyeva viśeṣaṇatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:3444: anyavyavacchede apihi tadevānyadvyavacchidyeta yadvirodhi, na punaranyamātram /
GSP29nystik_u:3450: tathā cānumānādyapi liṅgajñānādestata upajāyate iti pratyakṣaṃ prasajyeteti tannivṛttyarthamarthāditi vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3453: yasya tad vyapadiśyate ityapekṣya tataḥśabdasāmarthyenānumānādivyudāso 'pi pratyuktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3456: tat pratyakṣaṃ tato ghaṭa ityapi jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prasajyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:3459: tasya vicārāsahatayā paramārthasattvābhāvena saṃvṛtisato vijñānaṃ prati kāraṇabhāvābhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3463: rūpādiparamāṇava eva nirantarotpādāḥ paramārthasanto bhinnāḥ svavijñānasyāvikalpakasya janakāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3464: teṣāṃ tu nānātvaṃ svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛṇvatī nirvikalpakapṛṣṭhabhāvinī ghaṭa iti vikalpikā buddhiḥ tāneva rūpādīn ekodakāharaṇādikriyākāriṇo bhedina iva darśayantī saṃvṛtirityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3467: nirākaroti--manomodaketi bhavantu vyatiriktāḥ kimetāvatāpītyata āha--sarvaṃ ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3468: yatsaṃvṛtitvena bhavatāmabhimataṃ yaccāvikalpakaṃ tatsarvaṃ svaviṣayād bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3471: mithyājñānanivṛttyarthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti codayati---nanu ca mithyājñānamatasmādapi bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3472: yathā purovarti dravyamidamiti vyapadiśyate rajatamiti na,
GSP29nystik_u:3474: tena yadyapi sāmānyarūpeṇa tasya vyapadiśyate jñānam,
GSP29nystik_u:3476: tathāpi yena viśeṣaṇarūpeṇa tasya vayapadiśyate na tatastabhdavati iti atasmādapītyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3477: tasmāt tata eva yabhdavati tat pratyakṣam, na caivaṃ mithyājñānam /
GSP29nystik_u:3479: pariharati--na hyatasmāt āropitādrūpāt tatrāsataḥ tat mithyajñānaṃ bhavati, kiṃ tu tato bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3480: yasya sāmānyarūpasya vyapadiśyata idamiti tata eva /
GSP29nystik_u:3486: yato bhavati jñānaṃ sa grāhyo 'rthaḥ kāraṇam, grāhakaṃ ca vijñānaṃ kāryam /
GSP29nystik_u:3487: tayorayugapabhdāvāt vartamānābhaṃ jñānamatīte mithyeti na pratyakṣaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3491: kṣaṇikatvād bhāvānāṃ kāraṇasaya nāśaḥ kāryasyotpāda ityekaḥ kālaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3495: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti ced grāhyatāṃ viduḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3498: na caitāvatā mithyātvam, arthāhitasya nīlākārasya vartamānatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3503: anahaṅkārāspadamasātādirūpaṃ vijñānād bhinnaṃ nīlādyanubhūyate, na tu vijñānātmakam /
GSP29nystik_u:3505: tathā sati jñānametasmin mithyeti kathaṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP29nystik_u:3508: na ca gauṇamukhyalakṣaṇā girāṃ gatayo jñāneṣuśakyā niyojayitum bhinnaprasthānatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3509: tasmāt nirākāraṃ jñānamātmano bhinnaṃ gocarayatīti vācyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3510: sa cet kāraṇaṃ vinaṣṭasya pratyakṣateti tathā ca vartamānābhamavartamānaṃ gocarayati mithyātvamapratyakṣatvaṃ ca syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3511: yaugapadye 'pi nāstyudāharaṇam, sarvasya kṣaṇikatvapakṣanikṣepāditi codayati--tulyamiti cet /
GSP29nystik_u:3516: yadṛcchāśabdeṣu hi nāmnā viśiṣṭo 'rtha ucyate ḍittha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3521: seyaṃ kalpanā yatra jñāne nāstyarthataḥ svarūpato vā tatkalpanayā apoḍhaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:3522: tadidamāha--yat kila na nāmnā abhidhīyate arthataḥ svarūpataśrca na jātyādibhirvyapadiśyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3535: tasmānna avikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ tadgocaraṃ vā paramārthasad gocarayanti vikalpāḥ śabdāścetyayamabhisandhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3540: na hi yathā samyagjñānam adhikṛtya pratyakṣādilakṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ kīrtinā tathā dignāgena yenādhikārāt jñāne vyavatiṣṭheta kalpanāpoḍhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3541: nanu yadi svarūpato nābhidhīyetānabhidheyaṃ tarhi vastu prasajyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:3542: tathā cāvāstavaḥ syāt śābdo vyavahāra ityata āha--sarvasya ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3548: viśeṣamākāramabhipretya svarūpato na vyapadeśyamityuktam, na tu sarvatheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3551: athāścakarṇādivadavyutpannaḥ kalpanāpoḍhaśabdaḥ pratyakṣasvarūpasya vācaka iti śaṅkate--atheti /
GSP29nystik_u:3553: bhavatu kalpanāpoḍhaśabdaḥ avyutpanno mā vā bhūt,
GSP29nystik_u:3559: sā ca mithyāpratyaye 'pi tulyā, vyatyaye 'pi buddhyā boddhasyopasthāpanāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3561: asti ca mithyājñāne 'pi bodhyena saṃbandha indriyāṇām, bodhyaṃ hi purovarti dravyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3562: atha yathā bodhyaṃ tādṛśo nāsti saṃbandha indriyāṇām, rajatatvasya prakārasyāsannidhānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3566: api ca prābhākare darśane anumānādijñānamātmani pratyakṣaṃ na bhavet, na hi tat satsaṃprayogajam /
GSP29nystik_u:3573: NyS_1,1.5: atha tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānaṃ pūrvavaccheṣavatsāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ ca //
GSP29nystik_u:3575: atrānumānamiti sidvavat pramāṇāviśeṣarūpalakṣyānuvāda eva nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamityaprāmāṇyamanumānasya sudūdaṃ pratikṣipati /
GSP29nystik_u:3576: dṛṣṭaprāmāṇyāprāmāṇyavijñānavyaktisādharmyeṇa hi kāsāṃcid vyaktīnāṃ prāmāṇyamaprāmāṇyaṃ vā vidadhīta /
GSP29nystik_u:3577: dṛṣṭasādharmyaṃ cānumānam eveti kathaṃ tenaiva tasyāprāmāṇyam?
GSP29nystik_u:3578: api cānumānamapramāṇamiti vākyaprayogo 'jñaṃ vipratipannaṃ sandigdhaṃ vā puruṣaṃ pratyarthaṃvān /
GSP29nystik_u:3579: na ca parapuruṣavartino dehadharmā api sandehājñānaviparyāsā gauratvādivat pratyakṣamīkṣante /
GSP29nystik_u:3580: na ca tadvavacanāt prattīyante, vacanasyāpi pratyakṣādanyasyāprāmāṇyopagamāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3581: puruṣaviśeṣamanadhikṛtya tu vacanamanarthaṅkaṃ prayu/jāno nāyaṃ laukiko na parīkṣaka ityunmattavadanavadheyavacanaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3595: anumānādipūrvakaṃ cānumānaṃ na pratyakṣapūrvakamiti nānumānaṃ syāt, anumānalakṣaṇenāvyātatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3598: tatra prathame vigrahe tānītyanantaraṃ sūtram uvallaṅghya vibhāgasūtragatāḥ pratyakṣādayaḥ saṃbandhanīyāḥ yogyatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3604: pāramparyeṇa hi pratyakṣapūrvakatvamuktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā, tasmānna virodha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3606: te iti vigrahe anantarasūtragatameva pratyakṣapadaṃ saṃbadhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3607: yathā ca dve pratyakṣe pūrve yasya pratyakṣasya liṅgaparāmarśajñānasya pratyakṣaphalasya /
GSP29nystik_u:3608: tadidaṃ tatpūrvakaṃ pratyakṣam, taddhi svaviṣaye pratyakṣamapyanumeyārthapratyayaṃ kurvadanumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:3613: atha tadarthaviṣaye dvitīye pratyakṣe sati yā tatpadaviṣayā smṛtirutpadyate sāpi pratyakṣadvayapūrvā /
GSP29nystik_u:3614: evaṃ liṅgalliṅgsiṃbandhasmṛtirapi pratyakṣadvayapūrveti tadavasthaivātivyāptirityāśayavān pṛcchati--- katare dve iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3619: vyāptisaṃskārobdodha samayajanmanā svajanitena saṃskāreṇāsya vyāptismaraṇasamaye vināśāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3620: vinaśyadavasthasya dvitīyaliṅgadarśanasya vyāptismaraṇena saha yaugapadye 'pi tayoḥ parasparavārtānabhijñatayā mitho ghaṭanāyogaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3623: na svarūpataḥ / tasmād ubhābhyāmutpannaṃ parāmarśajñānamindriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pratyakṣam eṣitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3629: tatra yo buddhau sākṣādātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ niveśayati sa pratyakṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3630: sa hi svaviṣayāyā buddheḥ janaka iti tamantareṇa buddhirātmānamanāsādayantī tasya sattā niścāyayatīti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3634: sa hi pratibaddhasvabhāvo yathāvidhaḥ siddhaḥ tathāvidhasannidhānaṃ sūcayati /
GSP29nystik_u:3636: tathā sati sa śyāmo maitanayatvāt paridṛśyamānamaitratanayastomavadityapyanumānaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3639: yathāha kāryakāraṇabhāvād vā svabhāvād vā niyāmakāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3641: tathā ca liṅgavikalpaṃ vinā na liṅgivikalpaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3644: na cāvinābhūtaṃ liṅgaṃ vinā liṅginamiti liṅgisvalakṣaṇāpratibhāsyapi pāramparyeṇa tatpratibandhāt tatrāvisaṃvādako 'numānavikalpa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3646: asmin sati bhavati satsvapi tadanyeṣvasminnasati na bhavati evamākāro nānvayavyatirekābhyāmatiricyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3648: tathā hi satyagnau dhūma iti pratyakṣameva vikalpānugatavyāpāramadhyavasyati /
GSP29nystik_u:3649: asati cāgnau na dhūma ityapi pratyakṣameva, na hyagnidhūmānupalambhāvānyau /
GSP29nystik_u:3652: yathā sattvasya kṣaṇikatayā saha tādātmyaṃ vipakṣai'kṣaṇike kramākramayorvyāpakayoranupalambhanniścīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3656: tasya yatra pratibandhaḥ tadvidastasya tadgamakaṃ tatretyanujānīmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3657: sa eva tu pratibandho na tāvat tadutpattyā saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3660: sa tādṛśo 'sti rāsabhasyāpīti tatpratibaddho 'pi dhūmaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3662: na ca rāsabhānantaraṃ bhavannapi tadanantarameva bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:3664: asatyapi tasmin sati ādrendhanavati vahnau tadbhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3665: atha yadyapi dhūmasya vahnibhāvābhāvānuvidhānaṃ tatropalabdhaṃ tathāpi deśāntarādiṣu tadbhāvo 'sya kutastyaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:3666: tathā hi bhūyo bhūyo rāsabhe dṛṣṭe dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ, tadabhāve cādṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3668: tajjātīyasyaiva dhūmasya rāsabhaṃ vinā sati vahnau bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3669: evaṃ satyapyagnau piśācena janito dhūmaḥ kvacit deśādau tajjātīya eva rāsabhavad vahnyabhāve 'pi piśācādeva bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP29nystik_u:3671: na ca sati bhāvamātraṃ niyāmakam, tasya rāsabhādiṣvaṣyaviśeṣāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3675: yo yo dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ sa sarvastāvadārdrendhanasahitavahnyanantarameva na piśācānantaram /
GSP29nystik_u:3676: sa ca kādācitkatayā nimittamapekṣamāṇo yadanantarameva gamyate tadevāpratītavyabhicāraṃ nimittīkaroti,
GSP29nystik_u:3679: yadi na tannimittaṃ kasmāt vināpi vahni kvacid dhūmo nopalabhyate?
GSP29nystik_u:3680: athāsau sarvathā vahnisahitaḥ, tathā satyādrendhanavat kathaṃ vahnirapi na kāraṇam?
GSP29nystik_u:3682: akāraṇasya hi kāryasya nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt, anapekṣatvāt, na kādācitkatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:3684: vahnyanantarameva bhāva iti hi dhūmasya vahnikāryatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:3685: sa cet avahnerapyanantaraṃ naivakārārthaḥ syāditi na vahneḥ kāryam /
GSP29nystik_u:3687: na hi anyānantarameva bhavati, vahnerapyanantaraṃ bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3691: tadeva tu tadanantarameva bhāva ityevaṃrūpaṃ nāsti /
GSP29nystik_u:3692: yadyapi ca vinā vahni nopalabdho dhūmo yadyapi ca piśācānantaraṃ nopalabhyate teṣāmanupalabdheḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3693: tathāpi piśācakārya eva dhūmasyatra tatra vahniḥ kutaścit svahetorūpanipatito rāsabha iva na tu dhūmasya janamaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3694: tena tadabhāve 'pi tajjātīya eva kāraṇabhedajanmā kadācit kādācitko dhūmaḥ syāditi anivṛttireva śaṅkāyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3695: na dṛṣṭasaṃbhave nādṛṣṭaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktamiti śakyaṃ bhavadbhirvaktum,
GSP29nystik_u:3699: na ca yad yadanyasahitānantaram mupalabdhaṃ tat tadanyarahitāt tasmād bhavad bhinnajātīyaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3700: uktaṃ hi rāsabhasahitād vahneryādṛśo dhūmaḥ tādṛśa eva tadvirahitād vahneriti /
GSP29nystik_u:3701: tasmādevaṃvidhā śaṅkāpiśācī svanivārakaṃ tadutpattiniścayamāskandantī na śakyā nivārayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:3702: api cāstu tadutpattiniścayaḥ, tathāpi kasmāt kāraṇamantareṇa na kāryaṃ bhavati?
GSP29nystik_u:3707: astu tarhi saṃbandhaḥ svābhāvikatayā anyānapekṣo 'vyabhicārī gamakāṅgam /
GSP29nystik_u:3708: sa ca yo vā sa vā bhavatu, kṛtaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇāyāsena /
GSP29nystik_u:3710: api ca kāryāt kāraṇamanumīyamānaṃ tataḥ pūrvamevānumīyeta, na tu vartamānakālam /
GSP29nystik_u:3711: na hi hetusattā kāryakālā kāryotpādāṅgam, api tu tatpūrvakālā /
GSP29nystik_u:3712: na hi nadīpūrabhedaḥ svasattāsamayavarti varṣaṃ gamayatyapi tu tatpūrvakālam /
GSP29nystik_u:3714: ata eva sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvena tatkālavartina varṣe sandihānā na tadarthinaḥ pravartante /
GSP29nystik_u:3715: evaṃ dhūmādapyagniḥ tatpūrvakāla evānumīyeta, na tu vartamānakālaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3716: tathā ca sati na tadarthinaḥ tatra niḥśaṅkaṃ pravarteran /
GSP29nystik_u:3718: na cānayorasti kā kāraṇabhāvaḥ tādātmyaṃ vā /
GSP29nystik_u:3720: sa svakāraṇaṃ pūrvarūpakṣaṇamanumāpayan yādṛśā tena janitaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3722: sa cānumāpakarasakṣaṇasamānakālarūpakṣaṇāntarajanaka eva svakāraṇam iti tādṛśameva gamayati /
GSP29nystik_u:3731: sa kiṃ tajjanakasya rūpakṣaṇasya svabhāva ata tatsvabhāvāvacchedako 'svabhāvabhūtaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:3732: na tāvat svabhāvaḥ, ekasminnabhinne janyajanakabhāvānupapatteḥ, tasya bhedāśrayāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3735: nanu naitāvatāpyasya tulyakālasya rūpasya kāraṇabhāva iti kathaṃ kāryaṃ hetorgamyeta?
GSP29nystik_u:3738: sa kiṃ kāraṇānumiteḥ prāgathānumitisamaye paścād vā?
GSP29nystik_u:3739: na tāvat prāk na hi sattāmātreṇa kāraṇaṃ tad gamayatyatiprasaṅgāt, kiṃ tu svajñānena /
GSP29nystik_u:3743: tathā ca rasāt kāryāt tatkāraṇaṃ rūpamanumātavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3744: tathā ca kāraṇāt kāryānumānaṃ tādātmyatadutpattibhyāmanyata iti nābhyāmeva pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3745: laukikānāṃ cedaṃ rasād rūpānumānam, na caite piśitacakṣuṣaḥ kṣaṇānāmanyonyabhedamadhyavasyanti /
GSP29nystik_u:3747: na ca lakṣaṇānurodhena lakṣyasyānyathākaraṇaṃ yuktaṃ parīkṣakāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:3758: api ca tādātmye 'pi kathaṃ gamyagamakabhāvaḥ? na hi tadeva karma ca kartṛ ceti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3760: yadyapi ca vṛkṣatvaśiṃśapātve paramārthato na bhinne tathāpi bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepābhyāṃ kalpitabhedayorgamyagamakabhāva iti cet---na,
GSP29nystik_u:3762: api ca kālpanikamapi rūpaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ na yathā bhinnamevamabhinnamapi na bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:3772: uktaṃ hi yathā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na bhāvānāmabhedasādhakam /
GSP29nystik_u:3773: jātyādiśabdā hi jātyādīn nimittīkṛtya dravye vartante /
GSP29nystik_u:3774: taccādhikaraṇamekamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyam aśnuvate, na punarjātyādīnapi mitho miśrayanti /
GSP29nystik_u:3776: tasmād yatra gamyagamakabhāvo na tatra tādātmyam,
GSP29nystik_u:3777: yatra tādātmyaṃ na tatra gamyagamakabhāva iti saddhim /
GSP29nystik_u:3779: tasmāduccatvameva vṛkṣaśabdapravṛttinimittamiti manyamānaṃ mūḍhaṃ prati śiṃśapātvena vṛkṣavyavahāramātraṃ sādhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3780: vāmanāyāmapi śiśapāyāṃ vṛkṣa iti vyavahartavyam, śiṃśapāmātrānubandhitvād vṛkṣatvasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:3781: tatrāpi ced vyavahāraḥ sādhyaḥ sa śiṃśapāyā bhinna iti, na tādātmyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3782: vyavahārayogyatā cet? sā śiṃśapāyā abhinneti na gamyagamakabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3786: asyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃbandhyekāryasamavāyi virodhi ceti laiṅgikam # vai. sū. 9/2/1 # //
GSP29nystik_u:3787: iti, atrāpi saṃbandhipadenaiva sarvāpasaṃgrahāt śeṣābhighānaṃ vyartham /
GSP29nystik_u:3789: tathā sati śeṣapadānyeva santu kṛtaṃ saṃbandhipadena, tebhya eva saṃbandhibhedānāmadhigateḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3793: api ca bhūtaṃ varṣam abhūtasya vāyvabhrasaṃyogasya kathaṃ virodhi?
GSP29nystik_u:3794: taddhi tadanukūlameva evam abhūtam varṣaṃ bhūtasya vāyyabhrasaṃyogasyāpratikūlam /
GSP29nystik_u:3795: evaṃ bhūto nakulajayo na bhūtasya sarpaparājayasya virodhī /
GSP29nystik_u:3797: yeṣāṃ punarvirodhaḥ, teṣāmanyatamadanyatamasya na liṅgamapi tu pratikṣepakameva //
GSP29nystik_u:3802: tasmād yo vā sa vāstu saṃbandhaḥ kevalaṃ yasyāsau svābhāviko niyataḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3803: sa eva gamako gamyaścetaraḥ saṃbandhīti yujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3804: tathā hi dhūmādīnāṃ vahnyādisaṃbandhaḥ svābhāvikaḥ, na tu vahnyadīnāṃ dhūmādibhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3806: yadā tvādrendhanādisaṃbandhamanubhavanti, tadā dhūmādibhiḥ saha saṃbadhyante /
GSP29nystik_u:3808: tato na niyataḥ svābhāvikastu dhūmādīnā vahnyādisaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3810: kvacid vyabhicārasyādarśanāt māno 'pi darśanānarhatayā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhovana sandihyamāna upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatva pratibadhnātīti sāṃpratam //
GSP29nystik_u:3812: iti dattāvakāśā khalviyaṃ laukikapramāṇāmaryādātikrameṇa śaṅkāśicī labdhrapasarā na kvacit nāstīti nāyaṃ kvacit pravarteta /
GSP29nystik_u:3821: tasmādupādhi prayatnenānviṣyanto 'nupalabhyamānā nāstītyavagamya svābhāvikatvaṃ saṃbandhasya niścinumaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:3823: anyenānyasya sahakāreṇa cet svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho bhavet, sarvaṃ sarveṇa svabhāvataḥ saṃbadhyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:3825: athānyasya cedanyat kāryam, kasmāt sarvaṃ sarvasya na bhavati, anyatvāviśiṣāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3830: nanveṣa svabhāvānāmanuyogo bhinnānāmakāryakāraṇabhūtānāmapi svabhāvapratibandhe tulya eva /
GSP29nystik_u:3832: kaḥ punaḥ pramāṇena svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyate?
GSP29nystik_u:3834: yadā tāvat prathamaṃ vahnidhūmayoḥ sahādrendhanayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ paśyati tadā dvayorapi kiṃ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha aupādhiko vā?
GSP29nystik_u:3836: vahnervaupādhiko dhūmasya tu svābhāvika iti na śakyaṃ nirdhārayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:3837: tatra vahneranārdrendhanasya vinādhūmamayogolakādau darśanād ādrendhanopādhirasya dhūmena saṃbandho,
GSP29nystik_u:3839: dhūmaviśeṣasya tu vinā vahnimanupalabhbhād upādhibhedasya cādṛśyamānasya kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvād viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣasya ca saṃśayasyānupalabdhapūrve anutpādāt,
GSP29nystik_u:3840: utpāde vā atiprasaṅgāt prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyucchedāt svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ avadhāryate /
GSP29nystik_u:3841: tadidamavadhāraṇaṃ na mānasam, anapekṣasya manaso bāhye pravṛttāvandhabadhirādyabhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3843: na hi mano nimittam ityeva mānasaṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3844: tathā sati na kiñcinmānasam, pratyayamātrasya manonimittatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3845: tattadasādhāraṇakāraṇāpekṣayo tu tatpramāṇavyapadeśe atrāpi bhūyodarśanam asādhāraṇamiti pramāṇāntaraṃ jātam /
GSP29nystik_u:3847: evaṃ mānāntaraviditasaṃbandhiṣu mānāntarāṇyeva yathāsvaṃ bhūyodarśanasahāyāni svābhāvikasaṃbandhagrahaṇe pramāṇamunnetavyāni /
GSP29nystik_u:3848: svabhāvataśca pratibaddhā hetavaḥ svasādhyena yadi sādhyamantareṇa bhaveyuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3849: svabhāvādeva pracyaveranniti tarkasahāyā nirastasādhyavyatirekavṛttisandehā yatra dṛṣṭāḥ tatra svasādhyamupasthāpayantyeva /
GSP29nystik_u:3851: annapānapariṇatibhedasyopādheḥ śyāmatāyā maitratanayasaṃbandhaṃ prati vidyamānatvena maitratanayatvasyāgamakatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3852: etena pakvānyasya vṛkṣasyāgravartīni phalāni etadvṛkṣaprabhavatvāt patitaphalavadityādayo 'pyaupādhikasaṃbandhā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3854: nanvantimapratyakṣamatītābhyāṃ pratyakṣābhyāṃ kathamanugṛhyate ityata āha---smṛtyā ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3859: saṃbandhasamṛtisahakāriṇā indriyeṇa svasādhyāvinābhūtaliṅgavijñānaṃ yadupajanyate tat parāmarśa
GSP29nystik_u:3861: tathābhūtaliṅgagocara eva caturtho vākyāvayava upanaya ityākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3866: sa ca liṅgaviṣayaḥ kriyā ca liṅgiviṣayeti viṣayavaiṣamyāt na kriyākaraṇabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3872: vṛkṣoddeśena pravartitaḥ paraśuḥ kartrā na tadavayavoddeśena,
GSP29nystik_u:3874: dvaidhībhāvaścāvayaveṣu na vṛkṣe, tasya tato vināśāt iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3879: na kevalaṃ samānaviṣayatvāniyamaḥ kartuḥ karaṇaṃ bhinnamityapi niyamo nāstītyaniyamābhidhānaprasaṅgenāha-kvacit punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:3880: sthitiḥ sāvayaveṣu samavāyo vā pradeśaviśeṣe saṃyogo vā /
GSP29nystik_u:3881: evamaniyamaṃ dṛṣṭānta uktvā dārṣṭāntike yojayati---evamanyaviṣayasyeti dhūmaviṣayasya pramāṇasyāgniviṣayā kriyā pramitiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3882: yadā agniviṣayameva jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tatrāha---kvacit punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:3889: yadi anyaviṣayaṃ karaṇamanyaviṣayā kriyā bhavet tataśchedane khadiraṃ prāpte panasādāvapi cchidā syādityatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3890: yadyapi vṛkṣoddeśena kartrā paraśuḥ prayuktastathāpyayaṃ vṛkṣamiva tadavayavānapi prāpta iti tadviṣayo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3891: tena tadavayavadvaidhībhāvamukhena vṛkṣaviṣayāmapi dvaidhībhāvakriyāṃ janayatīti na vaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ karaṇaphalayoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3895: na tu liṅgajñānaṃ liṅginaṃ vinā na nirūpyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3896: tasmāt pratipattayanubandhitayā viṣayo na liṅgajñānasya liṅgī, kiṃ tu liṅgameva /
GSP29nystik_u:3899: tasmād dvividho viṣayabhāvaḥ pratipattyanubandhitayā, pratipādyatayā ca /
GSP29nystik_u:3900: tatra pūrvaḥ phalasya, uttarastu prāmāṇyasyeti vivekaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3902: sthitau tu bhedo darśayiṣyate kartuḥ karaṇasya ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3903: tadevaṃ tāni te iti vigrahadvayaṃ parasparāpekṣamupapādya tāni taditi vigrahadvayaṃ parasparāpekṣamupapādayati---yadā punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:3904: liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhadarśanaṃ ca anantaraliṅgadarśanaṃ ca tatsmṛtiśceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3907: nanu yadi pramāṇaphalayorekaviṣayatvaṃ tarhi parāmarśajñānaviṣayīkṛta evārtho viṣayīkartavyo nānyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3908: sa ca pratyakṣapramāṇaviṣaya eveti kṛtamanumānenetyāśayavān pṛcchati---kiṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:3911: pratyakṣapramitāt liṅgādanyo liṅgī tadviṣayatvaṃ ca liṅgaparāmarśasyoktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3915: na tvanumitiranumānaṃ pramāṇavyāpāratvenātannimittatvāt karaṇakārakādanyatvād atatpūrvakatvācceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3918: na dravyādīnāmeva kārakatvam, api tu vyāpārasyāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:3921: saṃbhavati hi tasyāpi siddhasya phalabhāvanāyāṃ nimittatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:3923: etasmiśca kalpe tatpūrvakamityatra tadā hānādisaṃbandhāvadhāraṇasamaye prathamaṃ vahnitvasya liṅgasya darśanam,
GSP29nystik_u:3926: tatpūrvako hi tathā cāyamanumīyamāno vahniriti liṅgaparāmarśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3939: anvayavyatirekābhyāmaśakyo guṇapradhānabhāvo vivektum, tayoḥ sarvatra tulyatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3940: tat kimidānīṃ nāstyeva guṇapradhānabhāva ityata āha---pradhāneti /
GSP29nystik_u:3941: nānvayavyatirekāvatra prabhavato na tu nyāyāntaramiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3949: viśiṣṭajñānaṃ vijñānam viśaṣaśca smṛteranyatvam, na hīndriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānaṃ smṛtiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3951: tena ca jñānena svakāraṇaṃ viśeṣitam, pratyakṣasūtre yata ityadhyāhārāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3953: na ca saṃskāraḥ pratyakṣapūrvo 'pi tādṛśajñānakāraṇamiti na tasya prasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3955: vibhāgasūtrākṣiptapramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇapūrvakaṃ viśeṣapramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ tadapekṣaṃ pravartamānaṃ nānupajanitaphale 'pramāṇe nirṇayamātre pravartitumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:3964: anvayimātrāt vyatirekimātrācca vyāvṛtto 'nvayavyatirekī darśanīya iti hetutrayasādhāraṇe abādhitaviṣayatvātsatpratipakṣatve satī api heturūpe na darśite /
GSP29nystik_u:3971: tathā cāyaṃ nityebhya ākāśādibhyo ghaṭādiṣu cānityeṣvanvita iti bhavatyanvayavyatirekī /
GSP29nystik_u:3975: tena hetoryato vipakṣānnivṛttiḥ sa eva nāstīti kuto nivartatām,
GSP29nystik_u:3978: astu tarhi hetostatra vṛttiḥ, nivṛttiniṣedharūpatvād vṛtteriti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:3979: yasyābhāvādhikaraṇatvamapi na saṃbhavati nirūpākhyasya tasya bhāvādhikaraṇatvaśaṅketi subhāṣitam /
GSP29nystik_u:3980: na khalu mumurṣosatoyābhyavahāre 'pyasamarthasya śaṣkulībhakṣaṇaṃ śaṅkate cetanaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3981: tat kimidānīṃ bhāvābhāvau na parasparābhāvātmānau yadekaniṣedhenānyavidhiḥ syāt?
GSP29nystik_u:3982: satyam, yatraikatara etayorniṣidhyate vidhīyate vā tatra taditaravidharniṣedho vāvaśyaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:3985: nanu nirūpākhyo niṣedhādhikaraṇamiti ca vacaḥ svacaritaviruddham /
GSP29nystik_u:3986: na caitat tattvato nirūpākhye hetorvyatirekaṃ vā hetuṃ vā vyāsedhāmo nāpyanvayaṃ vidadhmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3990: atha nirūpākhye hetorvyatireka ityasya bhavadbhāṣitasya ko 'rthaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:3991: ahṛdayavācāṃ khalayahṛdayā eva prativāco bhavanti bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:3996: svābhāvikarūpasaṃpannaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ tattvajñānarūphalāya kalpate na kalpitarūpasaṃpadā,
GSP29nystik_u:3999: tasmādanupākhye vipakṣe hetorvyatirekanivṛttau vā vyatireke vā hetupravṛttau vā sahṛdayānāṃ mūkataivocitā /
GSP29nystik_u:4002: mā bhūdasādhāraṇasyāpi gamakatvam, kiṃ tu svasādhyena saha svābhāvikasaṃbandhaśālitayā /
GSP29nystik_u:4004: vipakṣasaṃbhave tu tatrāpi hetuvṛttiśaṅkānirākaraṇāya vyatirekagrahaṇam upāsanīyamiti sarvamavadātam //
GSP29nystik_u:4007: paramāṇvākāśādayaḥ kasyacit pratyakṣāḥ prameyatvāt ghaṭavadityādayo draṣṭavyāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4010: tamimaṃ vyatirekiṇaṃ hetvavayavalakṣaṇavyākhyānāvasare vārttikakṛd upapādayiṣyatīti nehopapāditaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4011: tadevaṃ trividhamityavacchidya vyutpādya saṃprati pūrvavadityādinā ekavākyatayā vyācaṣṭa---atha vā trividhamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4012: tisṛṣvapi vidhāsu sādhyavacanasya pūrvamapapādanāt pūrvaṃ sādhyaṃ tad yasyāstyadhikaraṇatayā tatpūrvavat /
GSP29nystik_u:4013: tathāpyanityāḥ paramāṇavo gandhavattvād ghaṭavadityapi hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4014: asti hi sādhyaṃ tasyāpi, pārthivānāmapyaṇūnāmanityatvena siṣādhayiṣitatvādityata āha---vyāptyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:4015: asti gandhavattvasya sādhyaṃ na tu vyāptyā, pṛthivīmātravṛttitatayā caturṣu paramāṇuṣu tadabhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4016: sādhyasyopayuktatvāt tato 'nyastajjātīyaḥ śeṣaḥ, sādhyasāmānyena samāna iti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:4020: tathā ca bādhitaviṣayaṃ prakaraṇasamaṃ cānumānaṃ syādityata āha---caśabdāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4023: nanvevaṃ trividho 'pi hetuḥ pañcalakṣaṇaḥ syādityata āha---evamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4024: etaduktaṃ bhavati abādhitaviṣayamasatpratipakṣaṃ pūrvavaditi ca dhruvaṃ kṛtvā śeṣavadityekā vidhā,
GSP29nystik_u:4030: tadevaṃ svamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya bhāṣyakṛnmatena vyācaṣṭa---atha veti /
GSP29nystik_u:4033: tad yasyāsti viṣayatayā parāmarśajñānasyānumānasya tat pūrvavadityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4041: kiṃ tarhi abhyupeyate ityata āha--kāryaṃ tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:4049: tathāpi yādṛśaṃ na vyabhicarati tatra nipuṇena pratipatrā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4050: anyathā dhūmamātramapi vahnisattāṃ vyabhicaratīti na dhūmaviśeṣo gamako bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:4052: api cāntyatantusaṃyogānantaraṃ paṭo jāyate tatrāpi śakyaṃ kāraṇāt kāryānumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4053: yadā khalvayamanyata evodbuddhasaṃskāro vyāptismṛtimān aviraleṣvitareṣu tantuṣu antyatantāvutpannāyāṃ kriyāyāmindriyasannikarṣāt prathamameva parāmṛśati tathā ceyamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:4056: tadā parāmarśāt tasmādavaśyaṃbhāvipaṭaviśiṣṭeyaṃ kriyetyanumānotpāda ityekaḥ kālaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4060: atha pratyakṣadarśanam ityanumānotpādasya parastāccaturthe kṣaṇe pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:4062: tathāpi tṛtīye kṣaṇe pratyakṣasya utpāda iti nānavasaramanumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4063: api ca badhiro murajamukhamabhihatya svapāṇinābhighātādeva śabdakāraṇāt tatkāryaṃ śabdaṃ niḥśaṅkamanumimīte /
GSP29nystik_u:4069: na tu vṛṣṭiranumīyamānā pūraviśeṣāt nātītā śakyānumātum,
GSP29nystik_u:4074: kāraṇasya hi kāryāt pūrvakālatā śakyā niścetum kāryeṇa liṅgena /
GSP29nystik_u:4077: sa ca kāryasya purastāt tato niścayavyāpta ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4079: atrāpi kāryeṇa saviturdeśāntaraprāptyā tatkāraṇasya vrajyāyā anumānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4080: na caitāvatā anumānasya traividhyaṃ bhavati, udāharaṇamātrasyānantyenānantyaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4082: sādhyadharmāvinābhāvinā viśeṣaṇena sādhanadharmeṇa viśiṣyamāṇo dharmo gamyate gamakatvena /
GSP29nystik_u:4083: hetuviśiṣṭo hi dharmo gamakaḥ, jijñāsitadharmaviśiṣṭaśca gamyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4085: sa eva cobhayātmāṣa gamyo gamaka iṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4090: sāmānyenāvinābhāvinā hetunā avacchinnaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dharmirūpamanumānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭamanumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4092: tadetat pūrvavaccheṣavatorapi prāpakamapi tatpadasannidhānāt gobalīvardanyāyena te parityajyānyatra niviśate /
GSP29nystik_u:4100_0: deśāntaraprāptimānādityaḥ dravyatve sati kṣayavṛddhipratyayāviṣayatve ca prāṅmukhopalabhyatve
GSP29nystik_u:4100_1: ca tadabhimukhadeśasaṃbandhād anutpannapādavihārasya parivṛtya tatpratyayaviṣayatvāt maṇyādivat,
GSP29nystik_u:4102: so 'pi hi pratyabhijñāviṣayo bhavati tatraiva sthitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4111: sā cehātītā vivakṣitā, anyathā pūrvāparajaladhivelāvagāhinā tuhinaśailena vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4114: mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalaṃ tvastācalacūḍāvalambi na prācyāṃ kasyacidupalambhagocara iti vaiṣamyam,
GSP29nystik_u:4115: tathāpi yadi draṣṭaiva puro 'vasthitasya paścimābhimukhasaya prāsādasya svayumupanipatya pṛṣṭato bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:4120: tamuddiśya khalvayaṃ padbhyāṃ saṃcaramāṇaḥ prāsādasya pṛṣṭato bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4130: anyathāsiddhatayā aṅgulyā nirdeśasya dikpratyakṣatvena na svābhāvikaḥ pratibandha ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4132: apratyakṣāyāṃ diśi digdeśasaṃbandhiṣvityetadeva kuta ityata āha---ādityeneti /
GSP29nystik_u:4134: tat punaridaṃ pratyakṣam ā codayāt ā cāstamayād deśāntaraṃ sañcaraṇaṃ mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalasya anākalitadravyatve satītyādidaṇḍakānumānānāmindriyavyāpārāntaramupajāyamānatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4136_1: mayukhabhāgabhedāḥ pratyakṣadeśā iti teṣāṃ pratyakṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa savitṛmaṇḍalena
GSP29nystik_u:4137: idaṃ tvatisphuṭatayā nābhidhāya śiṣyavyutpādanāyākṣuṇṇaṃ mārgāntaraṃ darśitamiti mantavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4139: śiṃśapātvena śrutena vṛkṣatvānu mānamityādi sāmānyatodṛṣṭena saṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyam //
GSP29nystik_u:4142: pakṣaikadeśe sadapi siddham, pakṣavyāpakaṃ tu prakarṣeṇa siddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4143: yadyapi avinābhāvaḥ pañcasu caturṣu vā rūpeṣu liṅgasya samāpyate ityavinābhāvenaiva sarvāṇiliṅgarūpāṇi saṃgṛhyante,
GSP29nystik_u:4144: tathāpīha prasiddhasacchabdābhyāṃ dvayoḥ saṃgrahe gobalīvardanyāyena tat parityajya vipakṣavyatirekāsatpratipakṣatvābādhitaviṣayatvāni saṃgṛhṇāti /
GSP29nystik_u:4145: atrāpi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ caturṇāṃ pañcānāṃ vā rūpāṇāṃ liṅgeṣu saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4151: tannirākaraṇāya traividhyamanumānasya ucyate iti trividhapadasyatātparyāntaramāha--atha veti /
GSP29nystik_u:4157: tatra sapakṣe sadeva, yathā paramāṇvādayaḥ kasyacit pratyakṣāḥ prameyatvād ghaṭādivaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4158: tathā sapakṣe sadasad yathā tatraiva sādhye sattvād ghaṭādivaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4167: tasyārthaḥ, pūrveṇa tulyaṃ vartate iti pūrvavat /
GSP29nystik_u:4172: evaṃ sādhyadharmiṇi anyataradharmadarśanena sādhanadharmadarśanenānyatarasya sādhyadharmasyānumānamanumiti darśanamiti bhavati kriyātulyatā /
GSP29nystik_u:4174: atra dignāgena dhūmādagnirūpadharmāntarānumānam agnideśayoḥ saṃbandhānumānaṃ ca dūṣayitvā agniviśiṣṭadeśānumānaṃ samarthitam /
GSP29nystik_u:4178: liṅga dharme prasiddhaṃ cet kimanyat tena mīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4180: saṃbandhe 'pi dvayaṃ nāsti ṣaṣṭhī śrūyeta tadvati /
GSP29nystik_u:4182: na hi saṃbandhadharmatayā liṅgaṃ pratīyate, api tu deśasaṃgatamityarthaḥ, iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4185: tatra dignāgadūṣitān kalpān anyāṃśca vikalpān dignāgasamarthitaṃ ca kalpamupanyasya dūṣayati---anye punariti dharmadharmibhāvānupapatteriti /
GSP29nystik_u:4186: dharmeṇa hi dharmipratipattavyaḥ, anyathā atiprasakteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4190: yaḥ kaścid vā deśo 'gnimān sādhyo, dhūmavān vā deśabhedaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:4192: yaḥ kaścidagnimattayā deśaḥ sādhyate na tasyāvaśyaṃ dhūmo dharma ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4197: na hyayamevaṃvādī dignāgo dhūmādhāraṃ deśaviśeṣaṃ paśyati /
GSP29nystik_u:4198: na hyasya mate parvato nāma kaścidavayavī yadādhāro dhūma upalabhyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:4199: kiṃ tu paramāṇavaḥ paramasūkṣmā atīndriyāḥ parvataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4210: dhūmena hi vahniranumīyate, na ca kāryasattā nimittakāraṇasattāyā vyāptā /
GSP29nystik_u:4211: na hi yadā yatra vā paṭaḥ, tadā tatra vā kuvindaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4212: nāpyasamavāyikāraṇasattayā, na hi yadā yadā saṃyogastadā karma /
GSP29nystik_u:4216: ekārthasamavāya iti hi dvedhā, ekasyārthasya samavāyaḥ, ekasmin vārthe samavāya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4218: yadi hi vahnimābhyāmeko 'rthaḥ kaścit ārabhyeta tato 'sau tayoḥ samaveyāt, na tvetadastītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4220: tat kimasaṃbaddhāveva vahnidhūmau, tathā ca pratītivirodha
GSP29nystik_u:4232: na hi bauddharāddhānte dravyaṃ nāma kiñcidasti yatra rūpasparśai samavetau,
GSP29nystik_u:4241: yatra tāvat parvatanitambavartinī dhūmalekhā santatamudgacchantī dṛśyate,
GSP29nystik_u:4242: tatrāsau deśa eva tadviśiṣṭo 'numīyate iti lokaprasiddhameveti kimatra vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4243: yatra tu bhūyiṣṭhatāyā tasya dhūmasya dūratvena deśo na dṛśyate,
GSP29nystik_u:4245: tatra deśānumānaprayāsālasatayā dṛśyamāno dhūmaviśeṣa evāgnimattayā sādhyate dhūmatvaikārthasamavāyibhiḥ tadgataiḥ saṃtatyerdhvagamanādibhirityāha--dhūmaviśeṣeṇa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4247: tena dhūmamātrād vahnivyabhicāriṇo vahnyavinābhāvī dhūmo viśeṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4250: dravyatvakarmatvayoḥ śabde nirākāryatvena upayuktatvāt tābhyāmanyad guṇatvaṃ śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4261: yat samānajātīyārambhakaṃ na tat karma, yathā rūpādaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4269: na ca vaktṛvaktrāvaruddhaṃ nabhaḥpradeśaṃ tat prāpnoti /
GSP29nystik_u:4270: na cādravyaṃ śabdo gatvā śrotreṇa saṃbadhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4271: tasmād vīcītaraṅgarītyā svadeśānantaradeśe śabdāntarārambhaṇaparamparayā śrotradeśotpannaṃ śabdaṃ gṛhṇātīti siddhaṃ sajātīyārambhakatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4274: eṣa punaranvayavyatirekī dravyakarmānyatve sati sadādyabhedasya sapakṣe rūpādau sattvād,
GSP29nystik_u:4282: sa khalvatyantāparidṛṣṭaḥ svarūpato vā sādhyeta, dṛṣṭadharmiviśeṣaṇatayā vā?
GSP29nystik_u:4283: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe nānupalabdha iti vyāghātaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4285: viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣo hi saṃśayo nātyantānupalabdhapūrvadharmavattayā kvacid bhavitum arhati /
GSP29nystik_u:4286: na khalu saptamarasavattayā kecid dravye saṃśerata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4288: na tāvat svarūpeṇānumīyate yena nānupalabdha iti vyāhanyeta, kiṃ tu dṛṣṭasya dharmiṇo viśeṣaṇatayā /
GSP29nystik_u:4291: tajjātīyena tu dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇordṛṣṭena pratyakṣato vā mānāntarād vā sādhanadharmasya svābhāvikapratibandhagrahasaṃbhādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4293: tadevaṃ vibhajate--icchādayaḥ khalu dharmiṇo bhavanti mānasapratyakṣadṛṣṭāḥ, teṣām ātmā viśeṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4294: kutaḥ? guṇabhūto 'vacchedakatayā yataḥ, tasmādātmaviśiṣṭā icchādayaḥ sādhyā ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4297: anupalabdhacaraścātmeti kathaṃ tadviśiṣṭā icchādayo nyāyaviṣayā iti śaṅkāmurīkṛtyata prayogaṃ sūcayati--paratantrā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4298: mā tatra saitsīdātmapāratantryam, pāratantryamātraṃ tu siddham ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4303: icchādīno hi bādhakairapanīte dravyāṣṭakaguṇatve guṇatvameva vyatirekī hetuḥ ātmapāratantrye pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4305: tathāpi dravyāṣṭakavyatirekādiśabdairadūraviprakarṣeṇa parāmṛṣṭaḥ śaknoti viśeṣṭuṃ dharmiṇi ca nyāyapravṛttyaṅgaḥ saṃśayam āpādayitumiti niravadyam //
GSP29nystik_u:4306: atra bhāṣyaṃ vibhāgavacanādeva trividhamiti saddhi iti,
GSP29nystik_u:4308: trividham iti vibhāgavacanādeva trividhe pūrvavadādau siddhe kimarthaṃ pūrvavadādyupādānaṃ sūtreṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:4310_0: mahataḥ trividhasya mahāviṣayasya atītānāgatavartamānaviṣayasya laghīyasā sūtreṇa
GSP29nystik_u:4310_2: 'nādaraḥ sūtrakārasyeti śiṣyān vyutpipādayiṣoḥ atraiva nidarśanam--tathā cāyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4311: asya samācāraḥ---itthaṃbhūtena vakyavikalpena vaicitryeṇa pravṛtta iti yojanā //
GSP29nystik_u:4312: evaṃ tāvat lakṣaṇabhedānumānaṃ bhinnaṃ pratyakṣād darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:4313: bhāṣyakārastu viṣayabhedādapi bhedamāha---sadviṣayaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ sadasadviṣayaṃ cānumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4319: yadyapi pratyakṣamapyatītānāgatayoḥ saṃprati niṣedhyaniṣedhayorniṣedhe pravartamānamasadviṣayaṃ tathāpi na pratiṣedhyayoḥ pravartate ityetāvatā sadviṣayamuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4320: anumānaṃ tu tayorapi pravartate ityetāvatā asadviṣayamuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4322: na hyanupalabdhasāmānye iti sāmānyata upalabdho viśeṣataścānirṇīto dharmo nyāyapravṛttāvadhikriyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4331: tathā ca na viśeṣaṇatayā gṛhyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4333: na viśeṣaṇatvaṃ svātantryeṇa nirākurmaḥ, kiṃ tu vṛttimasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4334: kasmāt punarasya na samavāyāntaramabhyupeyata ityata āha---atheti /
GSP29nystik_u:4340: ayaṃ pañcapadārthavṛttiśabdo bahuvrīhiṇā paramāṇau vartate, ṣaṣṭhīsamāsena tu samavāye /
GSP29nystik_u:4342: mā bhūd gośabdasāmyena vāgādīnām api viṣāṇitvamityaparitoṣāt nyāyāntaramāha--anāśritaḥ samavāya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4346: tacceha pratyayakāraṇe ātmāni ca samavāye cāvilakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4350: bhavatu vṛtteḥ prāganāśritaṃ kāryaṃ paścāt samavaiṣyati,
GSP29nystik_u:4351: turīsaṃyuktebhya iva tantubhya utpadya paṭaḥ paścāt turyā ityata āha--samavāyaśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4354: pramāṇavattvāt prāptā samavāyasya vṛttirna śakyā anavasthābhiyā parityaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4356: saṃyoge prāptitvasya nivṛttyā svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kāryatvasyopādheḥ tatprayojakasya vidyamānatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4357: atha prāptidharmo 'pi kasmāt na bhavatītyata āha---yadi punariyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4358: nanviyamanavasthā kasmād bījāṅgurādiṣvivehāpi nābhyupeyate ityata āha---na caināmanavasthāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4363: tattvamekatvaṃ samavāyasya bhāvena sattvayā vyākhyātamiti śāstramāha,
GSP29nystik_u:4367: vinaṣṭe ca tasmin yo dṛśyate sa tato 'nya utpanna iti siddhaṃ samavāyasya nānātvamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4372: kārya svāpādānena akṛtakasaṃbandhavad ādhāravattvāditi vyatirekī hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4374: utpadyamānaḥ khalvayaṃ samavāyaḥ sahakāryeṇa, na kāryasya /
GSP29nystik_u:4375: na hi sahotpannau rūpasparśau mithaḥ saṃbadhyete /
GSP29nystik_u:4381: kāryāt pūrvamutpannaḥ samavāyaḥ paścādutpadyamānaṃ kāryamupādānādhārakaṃ kariṣyati kāryahetubalādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4383: tribhyo hi kāraṇebhyaḥ kāryaṃ bhāvarūpaṃ jāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4385: kāryāt prāg jātasya ca samavāyasya na kāryaṃ kāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4388: tasmāt samavāyasya samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇābhāvat na kāryāt prāg utpāda iti suṣṭhūktam--tathāpi kasyeti vācyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4391: na ca paṭaturīsaṃyogavat samavāyasya paścāt kāryakāraṇasamavāya iti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4392: saṃyogajasya saṃyogasya kāraṇatrayasaṃbhavād asya tu samavāyāntaramantareṇa kāraṇatrayāyogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4395: tataśca na jñāyate kimabhipretyata asadviṣayamityuktamityākṣepa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4398: tanniṣedhastu bhavatu pratyakṣagocaraḥ, tathāpi siddho viṣayabheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4399: atra caiṣa dharmatraividhyakramo dvedhā tāvat, vidhīyamānaḥ pratiṣiśyamānaśca /
GSP29nystik_u:4404: visphāritākṣo hi tadā ghaṭo bhavatīti pratyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:4405: na cāsau tadā san, sato bhavanaṃ pratyakartṛkatvāt, gamanavaditi śaṅkate---bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:4410: dhaṭo jāyata iti tu laukikaḥ prayogo ghaṭaśabdaṃ ghaṭārtheṣu tadavayaveṣūpacarya teṣāṃ ca siddhatayā kartṛtvādupapādanīya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4415: yathāsaṃbhavaṃ samāsaṃ vikalpya dūṣyati--nāntarīyakārtha iti ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4424_0: ityatra viśeṣaṇapadopādādamātreṇa vā viśeṣyapadopādānamātreṇa vā anyatarasyārthāt
GSP29nystik_u:4424_1: prāpterūbhayapadopādānasyaitat prayojanam---yatrobhayoḥ pratyekaṃ vyabhicāraḥ samudāye tvavyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4432: kiṃ pṛthivītvaṃ sāmānyamasya vivakṣitaṃ yathā paśunā yajeta iti,
GSP29nystik_u:4437: evaṃ dravyamityapyukte dravyatvaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ vyaktirveti vimarśe pṛthivītyetadupatiṣṭhate /
GSP29nystik_u:4438: na dravyatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ kiṃ tu pṛthivī /
GSP29nystik_u:4444: na hyasti saṃbhavo nāntarīyakaśca syāt na cārtha iti,
GSP29nystik_u:4447: na hi dignāgasya mate kiñcidasti vastu yannāntarīyakaṃ saddheturbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4449: sarvo 'yamanumānānumeyabhāvo buddhyārūḍhena dharmadharmibhāvena na bahiḥ sadasattvamapekṣate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4450: avyāpakaṃ ca, na hi vastveva nāntarīyakamasato 'pi nāntarīyakatvāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4454: atastrirūpaliṅgadarśanasya siddheḥ kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadavarodhāya tadvida ityupādīyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4458: na hyasmin lakṣaṇe tadvida ityasti, tena tadatiricyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4461: tadanena dignāgasya lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā anyeṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣitam //
GSP29nystik_u:4462: saṃprati dignāgasya svakīyalakṣaṇaprapañcārthaṃ vākyam anumeye 'tha tattulya ityādyupanyasya dūṣayati--apare tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:4465: na hi yo 'numeye saṃścāsaṃśca sa śakyaḥ sanniti vaktum
GSP29nystik_u:4468: yadyevaṃ syātad yo vipakṣe dvedhā sa vipakṣāvṛttiriti hetureva syāt na savyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4471: anumeye sadbhāva evetyavadhāraṇenānumeye sadbhāvasya niyatatvāt kutaḥ pakṣaikadeśavṛtteḥ prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4475: yathā nīlaṃ sarojaṃ bhavatyeva nātyantaṃ na bhavatīti gamyate,
GSP29nystik_u:4490: na hyasti saṃbhavo 'numeya evāsti tattulye ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4493: anumeya eva sadbhāva iti pakṣaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ dūṣayitvā anumeye sadbhāva eveti dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati---athottaramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4495: sadbhāva eveti kila viśeṣaṇasaṃgatamavadhāraṇamayogam avyāpti vyavacchindat vyāpti darśayati /
GSP29nystik_u:4497: dūṣayati---tathāpyanumeyamavadhāritaṃ saṃbhavasya vyāptyā na dharmaḥ sadbhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4501: anumeyaṃ khalvavadhāritaṃ saddhetusaṃbhavaṃ parityajya nānyatra vartate,
GSP29nystik_u:4503: hetusaṃbhavastvanavadhāritaḥ sarvatraiva tattulye ca vipakṣe ca prasṛtaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4504: sa ca kaścit tattulyavipakṣau vyāpnoti, kaścit tadekadeśavṛttiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4505: tadasya hetusaṃbhavasya vipakṣe 'pi prasaktasya pratiṣedhāya yuktamasati nāstīti /
GSP29nystik_u:4506: tattulye tu prasaktamapratiṣiddhamanumatameveti tattulye sadbhāva iti vyarthamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4508: tulyahetu sadbhāvasiddhāvapi tattulye vyāptyā hotoḥ sadbhāvo bhavatvityetadarthaṃ tattulye sadbhāva
GSP29nystik_u:4510: yadi punarvyāptirvivakṣyeta kṛtakatve sādhye prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ na hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4515: pūrvapadena saha virodhe nidarśanamāha---na hi bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:4516: anumeye sadbhāva ityanenānumeye vṛttau hetārlabdhāyāṃ tattulya eva sadbhāva iti samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇaṃ vipakṣamātrād vṛtti vyavacchinatti, na tvanumeyāt,
GSP29nystik_u:4517: naraṃ ca nārāyaṇameva cādau svataḥ sutau dvau janayāṃ babhūva /
GSP29nystik_u:4519: samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇe hi tattulyena yathānyayogavyavacchedenaivakāraḥ saṃbadhyate tathānumeyenāpi saṃbadhyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:4521: na khalu naraṃ ca nārāyaṇameveti nipāto nārāyaṇena sahānyayogavyavacchedena saṃbadhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:4524: tathā tattulye 'yogavyavacchedena saṃbandha ucyeteti śaṅkate---atha tattulya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4528: na ca yasyānumeye sadbhāva evetyanūdya tattulya eva sattvamiti vidhātuṃ śakyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4530: tathā sati tadviśeṣaṇāya prayatnāntarāsthāne sati vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4533: ityatra hi yadyapi svarūpeṇārteraśakyapratipattitvena haviṣā viśeṣaṇaṃ mṛgyate,
GSP29nystik_u:4534: tathāpi na śakyaṃ havirūbhayatvena viśeṣṭuṃ vinā prayatnāntarāditi vākyabhedabhiyā pratīyamānamapi ubhayatvamavivakṣitam,
GSP29nystik_u:4536: atha tadvivakṣayaiva vākyabhedamabhyupetya paścād vākyaikavākyatayā abhimatārthasiddhirāsthīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4540: tathā hi anumeye sadbhāva ityatrānumeya eva nānanumeye, sadbhāva eva nāsadbhāva iti padārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4542: evaṃ tattulye sadbhāva ityatrāpi tattulya eva nātattulye, sadbhāva eva nāsadbhāva iti padārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4548: na ca samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇaṃ dignāgo mene, yadevamūce vaiśeṣikalakṣaṇadūṣaṇāvasare---
GSP29nystik_u:4549: yadi rūpameva cākṣuṣaṃ tato na dravyaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4552: atra hi rūpavaddravyasahitaṃ rūpameva cākṣuṣaṃ na gandharasādīti śakyaṃ samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4556: kasmāt? yadasat tattucchaṃ svayameva nāsti, tanna saditi śakyaṃ vyavahartum asaditi vā /
GSP29nystik_u:4557: bhavatu, tathāpi kasmāt tasmānna hetoḥ vyāvṛttirbhavatītyata āha---na hyasaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4559: svarūpeṇa dūṣayitvā etadgatamavadhāraṇaṃ dūṣayiṣyannanūdya vikalpayati--kimavadhāryata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4561: tattulya eva sadbhāva ityanena gamyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4563: tattulya eva sadbhāva ityanena gamyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4565: gaurayaṃ viṣāṇītvādityayaṃ heturvipakṣa eva nāsti, pakṣasapakṣavyāpakatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4566: na tu nāstyeva, vipakṣaikadeśe mahiṣādau vṛtteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4567: ato vipakṣa eva nāsti ityayamapi hetuḥ syāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4569: tatraikapadaparyudāsena trayaḥ pakṣāḥ, dvipadaparyudāsenāpi traya iti paṭkam /
GSP29nystik_u:4571: yathānumeye sadbhāva ityucyamāne yasya tattulye nāstitā vipakṣe ca vṛttiḥ so 'pi hetuḥ syāt yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4572: tattulye astītyucyamāne vipakṣavṛtterapakṣadharmasya ca hetutvaṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:4574: nāstitāsatītyucyamāne yo 'pakṣadharmastattulye ca nāsti sa hetuḥ syāt yathā nityaḥ śabdo 'sattvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4575: anumeye tattulye cetyucyamāne, anityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvāditi vipakṣavṛttirhetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4576: anumeye 'styasati ca nāstītyetāvatyucyamāne nityaḥ śabdo jātimattve sati śrāvaṇatvādityayaṃ tattulyavṛttihīno 'pi hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4577: tattulye 'sti asati ca nāstītyetāvatyucyamāne anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kṛtakatvādityayam apakṣadharmo hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4584: tathāpi yatrāvinābhūte liṅge bhavata ekasmin dharmiṇi virūddhāvyabhicāriṇī,
GSP29nystik_u:4590: yadi pratyakṣaśabdo jñānavacanaḥ jñānaṃ caikatvena viśiṣyate, tadaitad dūṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4595: saṃbandhasya pratyakṣatoktā pūrvam, na tvanumānakāla ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4600: tathā ca gṛhītāvinābhāvāt liṅgāt saṃprati pratyakṣādityupapannamityata āha---na cānyā gatirasti /
GSP29nystik_u:4603: tatra prathame kalpe mā bhūd viruddhāvyabhicārī, bādhitaviṣayastu hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4604: dvitīye tu kalpe na sarvarūpasaṃpanno heturviruddhāvyabhicārī saṃbhavatītyekasmāditi atiricyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4609: na ca pratikṣaṇapariṇāmavāde kuṇḍavadarādīnāmapi kaścidasti saṃbandha ityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4612: na hi sāṃkhyānāṃ bauddhānāṃ vā rāddhānte 'sti saṃbandhaḥ samavāyo nām /
GSP29nystik_u:4617: tathā ca yatra rūpaṃ tatra sparśa ityata āha--yatra rūpamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4623: na ca bhedābhedāvekatra saṃbhavato virodhāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4625: yathā hyāsandikāṅgāni bhinnānyanauttarādharyavyavasthitānyapi parasparāśrayatayā na patanti,
GSP29nystik_u:4628: kutaḥ? na rūpaṃ sparśo rūpe iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4630: rūpasparśādīnāṃ tu sthitirna parasparahetukā, api tu bhogāpavargalakṣaṇapuruṣārthahetuketi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4642: sādharmyaṃ ca sāmānyamabhidadhatā na sāmānyātiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ nāma padārthāntaramastītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4643: sādharmyaṃ cāprasiddhaṃ na sādhyasāghanāyālamiti sādharmyaprasiddhirapi draṣṭavyā /
GSP29nystik_u:4644: sā ca yathā gaustathā gavaya ityāptavākyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4647: piṇḍasya hi gavayaśabdavācyatāṃ puruṣo 'tideśavākyasmaraṇasahakāriṇaḥ pratayakṣād gavayagatād gosādṛśyāt prajānan tena prajñāpyata iti pramāṇasya vyāpāraḥ prajñāpanamuktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4648: tatra vārttikakāraḥ prathamaṃ tāvat sūtratātparyamāha---sūtrārthaḥ pūrvavat /
GSP29nystik_u:4656: vārttikakāreṇa bahuvrīhidvayasaṃbhavo darśitaḥ, na tu tṛtīyāsamāso bhāṣyakārīyo nirastaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4657: bhāṣyakāreṇa hi saṃjñitayā gavayapratipattiḥ phalaṃ sādhyasādhanapadavācyamuktā,
GSP29nystik_u:4665: na hi yo yatsadṛśaṃ yaṃ pratipadyate,
GSP29nystik_u:4666: sa tasya samākhyāmapyavagacchati ityāśayavān pṛcchati---kimuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4675: pratyakṣamayī ca yathā gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭo 'yamīdṛśaḥ piṇḍa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4677: yadyapi yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya ityetasmādapi gosadṛśasya gavayaśabdaḥ samākhyeti śakyamavagantum,
GSP29nystik_u:4680: tacca yadi mānāntareṇāpi tathāvagamyate, kastatra saṃjñākarma nivārayet?
GSP29nystik_u:4681: gosādṛśyena copalakṣitaḥ piṇḍo ya iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭaḥ śakyo ghaṭādibhyo 'samānajātiyebhyo mahiṣādibhyaśca samānajātīyebhyo vyavacchinno 'vagantuṃ gavayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4682: tathāpi yāvadayamasau gavaya iti sākṣāt pratīte saṃbandhini saṃjñāṃ na niveśayati,
GSP29nystik_u:4683: tāvadayaṃ pariplutamatiḥ pramātā kaccit khalu drakṣyāmi tādṛśaṃ piṇḍaṃ yatra gavayasaṃjñā pratipatsya iti pramotsuka evodīkṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:4684: na cāsau vākyamātrasahāyo 'pratyakṣīkṛtagosadṛśagavayatvajātimatpiṇḍo 'sau gavayākhya iti pratipattumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:4688: dhik karabhamatidīrghavakragrīvaṃ pralamboṣṭhaṃ kaṭhoratīkṣṇakaṇṭakāśinaṃ kutsitāvayavasanniveśamapasadaṃ paśūnāmiti,
GSP29nystik_u:4689: tadupaśrutya dākṣiṇātya uttarāpathaṃ gatastādṛśaṃ vastūpalabhya nūnamasau karabha iti pratyeti,
GSP29nystik_u:4693: yadyucyeta nindāparaṃ vākyaṃ karabhasya tādṛśatve na pramāṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:4695: yatra tarhi tādṛktve paryavasyati vākyaṃ tatra kā gatiḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:4696: atha tatrāpi tādṛk karabha āgamāvagataḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratyabhijñāyate,
GSP29nystik_u:4697: karabhaśabdavācyatā tu tasya tatpūrvaṃ tādṛkvarabhaparatve apyāgamasya prayogamātrādavagatā anumānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4698: yo hi yatra prayujyate śabdo 'sati vṛttyantare sa tasya vācakaḥ, yathā gośabdo gotve /
GSP29nystik_u:4701: tadidaṃ prāgeva prayogānumitaṃ vācakatvamasya pratyakṣasamaye kevalaṃ smaryate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4703: upamānavākye 'pi tatrāpi vākyādavagataḥ sādharmyavān piṇḍaḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4704: prayogānumitaṃ ca gavayapadasya vācakatvaṃ smaryate iti na phalāntaramavaśiṣyate yatropamānaṃ pramāṇamiti //
