GSP29nystik_u:4706: na tāvadākāśādiśabdavadeṣa gavayaśabdaḥ sākṣāt piṇḍasya vācakaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4707: kintu gavayatvaṃ nimittīkṛtya piṇḍe vartate iti paramārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4708: na ca yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti vākyād gavayatvamavagatam,
GSP29nystik_u:4712: na khalvanupalabdhacareṇa gavayatvena gosādṛśyaṃ saṃbaddhaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP29nystik_u:4715: tasmāt saṃbandhino gavayatvasya sarvathānupalabdheḥ kuto vākyād vā anumānād vā vācyavācakasaṃbandhāvasāyaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:4717: gavayatvasāmānyaviśeṣavati tu piṇḍe pratyakṣe yuktaḥ saṃbandhāvagamaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4718: saṃbandhino gavayatvasya pratyakṣatvāt vākyārthasya ca smaryāṇatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4719: tathāpi kiṃ gavayatvajātimān piṇḍo vācyaḥ, uta gosādṛśyavāniti kuto vinigamaneti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:4720: vākyārthasmaraṇasahakāri gavayatvajātimataḥ piṇḍasya gāsādṛśyadarśanameva tarkasahāyaṃ gavayatvābhidhāne pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4721: tarkaśca gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭapiṇḍābhidhāne kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgaḥ tathā hi sādṛśyaviśiṣṭa piṇḍābhidhāne,
GSP29nystik_u:4723: na ca śabdādanyatastadavagama iti śabdaśya tatra vācakatvaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4724: na cāviśiṣṭaṃ sādṛśyamapi piṇḍaviśeṣe gavayapadam avasthāpayitumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:4725: yasya kasyacid yena kenacit saha sādṛśyāditi tadapi gavā viśeṣaṇīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4726: na cānyato gotvasyāpi pratipattiriti tadapi gavayapadenābhidhātavyam iti kalpanāgauravam /
GSP29nystik_u:4730: ata eva bahunyudāhaṇānyuktvāpyāha sma bhagavān bhāṣyakāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4733: tadīdṛśamupamānaphalamavidvān sādṛśyaviśiṣṭavastujñānaṃ copamānaphalamiti bhrānto bhadanto dignāga ākṣipati---pratyakṣeti /
GSP29nystik_u:4741: hanta bhoḥ kimabhimataṃ sādṛśyamāyuṣmato yadapratyakṣāyāṃ gavi na pratyakṣam?
GSP29nystik_u:4747: tat kimidānīṃ karṇatvādisāmānyaṃ gogavayagatakarṇādibhedena bhinnamityapi vaktumadhyavasito 'si? tasmād
GSP29nystik_u:4748: yathā kālākṣyāṃ gavi gotvamīkṣitavataḥ svastimatyāṃ pratyabhijñāyamānaṃ tadevedamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:4751: tasmāt na sādṛśyapratītiphalamupamānaṃ pratyakṣād vākyād vā vyatiricyate iti sūktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4757: yadi tu na tebhyo vilakṣaṇamabhaviṣyad na tadvilakṣaṇāṃ pramāmakariṣyat, tathā tānyeva /
GSP29nystik_u:4767: upadiśyate 'neneti upadeśo vākyajñānaṃ vā tadarthajñānaṃ vā abhighīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4781: āptānāṃ ṛṣyāryamlecchānāmupadeśaḥ śabdo na tvanāptānāṃ māyāmohanirmitānāṃ buddharṣabhādīnāṃ pramāṇaviruddhakṣaṇikasarvadharmanairātmyavādināmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4784: sudṛḍhena pramāṇenāvadhāritāḥ sākṣātkṛtā dharmāḥ padārthā hitāhitaprāptiparihāraprayojanā yena sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4785: tathāpi tattvaṃ vidvān akārūṇikatayā vā alasatayā vā anupadiśan,
GSP29nystik_u:4786: matsaritayā vā viparītamupadiśan nāptaḥ syādityata āha---yathādṛṣṭasyārthasya cikhyāpayiṣayā prayuktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4790: tathāpi sthānakaraṇapāṭavābhāvena varṇaniṣpādanāsāmarthyenāptaḥ prasajyeta, ityata āha---upadeṣṭā /
GSP29nystik_u:4792: āpta iti prakṛtipratyayasamudāyāt prakṛti niṣkṛṣya tadarthamāha--sākṣātkaraṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4798: ārād yātaḥ pātakebhya ityāryo madhyamo lokaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4800: mlecchā api hi paripathamavasthitāḥ pānthānāmapahṛtasarvasvānāṃ mārgākhyāne hetudarśanaśūnyā avantyāptā iti pareṣāmāptalakṣaṇamavyāpakamityuktaṃ bhavati //
GSP29nystik_u:4803: ākṣeptā bhāṣyam ākṣipya sūtraṃ samādhatte tasmāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4805: apauruṣeyo vaidika upadeśaḥ svargāpūrvadevatādiviṣayaḥ svataḥprāmāṇye siddhe nirdeṣatayā yukta upapannaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4810: tasmāt puruṣasyaivāptasyopadeśa āptopadeśa iti sādhu vyākhyānaṃ bhāṣyakārīyamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4813: yogipratyakṣaṃ na svargādiviṣayaḥ pratyakṣatvāt asmadādipratyakṣavaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4816: atra yāvati pakṣe yo hetuḥ siddhaḥ, tasya tanmātre pakṣīkāryam /
GSP29nystik_u:4817_0: yogaje ca pratyakṣe siddhe tatsādhakādeva pramāṇāt tasya svargādiviṣayatvamapi siddhamiti
GSP29nystik_u:4817_1: dharmigrāhakapramāṇaviruddhaṃ mīmāṃsakānām anumānaṃ nodetumapyutsahate prāgeva tad bādhitum /
GSP29nystik_u:4818: asiddhe tu yogaje pratyakṣa āśrayāsiddho heturābhāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4819: asmākaṃ tu samyañco bahavaśca nyāyā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4823: atra trayaḥ kalpāḥ, kimekamapūrvaṃ sarvapuruṣasādhāraṇam, āho asādhāraṇam?
GSP29nystik_u:4824: yadāpi asādhāraṇaṃ tadāpi kiṃ pratipuruṣamekaikamapūrvam, āho pratipuruṣamanekamiti?
GSP29nystik_u:4826: na hi kadācidapyayamapūrvaṃ paśyati laukikaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4832: tad yathā mahati darpaṇatale mahanmukham, tadeva kanīnikāyām aṇviti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4835: svābhiprāyeṇa nirākaroti---na dṛṣṭa iti brūma iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4836: śaṅkitā pṛcchati--kiṃ punastat yadi na dṛṣṭam? tatra yadi bhedena na dṛṣṭam, dṛṣṭirnāsti /
GSP29nystik_u:4837: kiṃ punastat, yad bhedena bhedadarśanamiti bhāsate? samāghātā svābhiprāyamāha--mithyāpratyaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4838: na bhedadarśanamapajānīmahe, kiṃ tu pāramārthikaṃ bhedam /
GSP29nystik_u:4839: na ca kalpito 'pūrvabhadaḥ pāramārthikāya kāryāyālamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4844: aśvamedhakriyayā tāvat tadapūrvaṃ svakāla evābhivyaktaṃ phaladānābhimukhīkṛtam,
GSP29nystik_u:4847: tathāpi phalaṃ tāvat na datte, yāvat kriyā na nivartate /
GSP29nystik_u:4850: tat khalu pūrvaṃ sadapi phalaṃ nākārṣīt caramabhāvinyāḥ kriyāyāḥ tajjanyāyā ābhivyakteranutpādāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4851: utpannāyāṃ tu kriyāyāmabhivyaktau vā kasmāt na karoti? na hi kriyāyā vināśasya kaścidupayogaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4852: tasmādakāmenāpi tvayā asatyā eva kriyāyā vya/jakatvamanugrāhakatvaṃ cāṅgīkartavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4855: tathā sati asattāyāḥ sarvatra sulabhatvāt na kiñcidapūrvaṃ nābhivyaktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4857: atra śabdaṃ pramāṇāntaramasahamāno dignāgaḥ tallakṣaṇaṃ vikalpyākṣipati---āptopadeśa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4861: tasmāt na sākṣāt śabdādarthaniścayaḥ, vivakṣākāryantayā tu vivakṣāṃ gamayet /
GSP29nystik_u:4864: tatra yaḥ pramāṇaniścitamarthaṃ vivakṣati, yathāvivakṣaṃ coccārayati sa āptaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4865: tasya vacanāt kāryāt kāraṇaṃ vivakṣā anumīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4869: te ca prāyeṇa visaṃvādakā dṛṣṭā ityāptagrahaṇena teṣāmavisaṃvāditvam /
GSP29nystik_u:4874: tathā hi yad yannirdeṣasattvīyaṃ vacanaṃ tatsarvamarthavat,
GSP29nystik_u:4881: atra hi upadiśyata ityupadeśa iti vyutpattyā artha ucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4882: āptaḥ prāpta upadeśo yasmāt sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4883: etaduktaṃ bhavati yasmāt śabdādavagamyārthaṃ pravartamānaḥ prāpnoti tamevārtha sa āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4884: evaṃ ca yathā śabdena yo 'rtho darśitaḥ, tasyāptyā tathātā darśitā bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4888: āptyā hi tathātvaṃ viniścanvan arthasya nāpratipannatayā niścetumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:4898: nāpyāgamaḥ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ na bhidyate, kiṃ tu upadeśaḥ śabda ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4899: upadeśa iti ca kārakapadam, upadiśyate jñāpyate prayojanavānartho 'neneti /
GSP29nystik_u:4902: tadidamuktam---yā śabdollekhena padārthasmaraṇāvāntaravyāpārāt śabdādevārthaṃ pratyemītyanenollekhena pratipattiḥ sāgamasyārthaḥ phalamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4903: āptatvaṃ ca na vākyārthaṃ pratyāyayati api tvāgamasyāvyabhicāritām /
GSP29nystik_u:4904: na ca yataḥ prāmāṇyamavagamyate tataḥ prameyamapi /
GSP29nystik_u:4905: tathā ca sati prāmāṇyajñānahetoranumānādeva pratyakṣādiprameyāvagatiriti pratyakṣādīnāmapramāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4909: yadi hi nārthaṃ pratyāyayet jñānamātramanumāpayet, tathā ca nārthaviśeṣasiddhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4911: tasmāt vaktṛjñānaviśeṣaṇāya pūrvaṃ śabdādeva kevalād vākyārthajñānam eṣitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4912: evaṃ ca kṛtaṃ vaktṛjñānānumānenārthapratipattyarthena kevalaṃ prāmāṇyajñānāya tadupayoga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4913: na cāvinābhāva eva saṃbandho yena śabdārthayorasaṃbandhena gamyagamakatvaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4919: na saṃgatigrahaṇamapi pratīkṣanta iti dūre 'numānād bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:4925: sa dvividho dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthatvāt iti sūtrasya tātparyamāha---niyamārtham /
GSP29nystik_u:4929: yathāha bhāṣyakāraḥ, yasyāmutra pratīyate so 'dṛṣṭārtha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4934: dṛṣṭo 'rtho yena saṃ dṛṣṭārthaḥ pravaktā, evamadṛṣṭo 'rthonumito yena sa tathā /
GSP29nystik_u:4939: asyārthamāha na vigrahaṃ karoti pratyakṣata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4941: sa na manyeta dṛṣṭānāṃ vākyānāṃ prāmāṇyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4953: aparīkṣitaṃ ca na tattvanirṇayāya paryāptamiti parīkṣā vidhāyiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4954: tatparikaraśca saṃśayādaya iti yuktaṃ teṣāṃ paścāllakṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4955: tadiha prameyalakṣaṇāya tadvibhāgoddeśasūtramavatārayituṃ bhāṣyakāraḥ pṛcchati sma---kiṃ punaranena pramāṇeneti /
GSP29nystik_u:4957: tadetad bhāṣyam anūdya vārttikakāra ākṣipati---kiṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:4961: siśiṣṭaṃ tu prameyamadyāpi na sidhyatīti tadarthaṃ praśnaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4962: sa ca viśeṣo yathāvaditi na darśita iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4964: yeṣāṃ tattvātattvajñānābhyām apavargasaṃsārau bhavataḥ, ta etāvanta eva /
GSP29nystik_u:4971: itiśabda ādyarthe tena vṛkṣaṃ paśyati, vṛkṣeṇa candramasaṃ paśyatītyādayo veditavyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4974: kiṃ tu yat tattvato jñāyamānamapavargasādhanaṃ tasmin,
GSP29nystik_u:4977: nanvasmin pakṣe na kadācidapi pramāṇatā syādityasti doṣa ityata āha---kimuktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:4978: nāsya puruṣamātraṃ prati prameyatvaṃ vidhīyate, api tu mokṣamāṇaśiṣṭaṃ prati vidhīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4979: anūdyata iti pramāṇāntaramūlakatvena vidhānasya dārḍhyaṃ darśayati /
GSP29nystik_u:4991: na kevalaṃ pramāṇavidhānākṣiptam, api tvādyasūtragamaprameyapadādapi labdhamityāha---ādyena ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4996: sarvaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhaṃ jānāti, ataḥ sarvajñaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5000: ātmanyayaṃ viśeṣo yadanena rūpeṇa heyaḥ, kaivalyena copādeyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5003: avidyamānaṃ pūrvaṃ śarīraṃ yasya tadapūrvaṃ śarīram /
GSP29nystik_u:5005: prameyatattvamaviduṣa ātmana avidyamānamuttaraṃ śarīraṃ yasya tad anuttaram /
GSP29nystik_u:5007: nanu yathā pūrveṣāṃ śarīrāṇām anāditā evamuttareṣāmapyanantatā,
GSP29nystik_u:5008: tathā ca mokṣamāṇānāṃ pravṛttayaśca tadarthāni śāstrāṇi cānarthakāni prasajyerannityata āha---uttareṣāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5010: nanu sūkhe 'pyuddeṣṭavye duḥkhamātroddeśaḥ kiṃ sukhaṃ pratyācaṣṭe?
GSP29nystik_u:5012: tadetad bhāṣyaṃ vārttikakāra ākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyācaṣṭe---sukhaṃ punariti na cānyata ātmādipadāt,
GSP29nystik_u:5015: nirvidyate ityasya vyākhyānam---tāṃ copāsīnasya tayaiva virodhiguṇena tṛṣṇā vicchidyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5017: tathā ca sukhe 'sya vairāgyaṃ bhavatīti tātparyārthaḥ //9 //
GSP29nystik_u:5022: ahamiti jñānaṃ gaurādyākāraṃ śarīrāvabhāsaṃ na śakyaṃ ghaṭādijñānavad drāgātmani pramāṇayitumityabhiprāyaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5027: tataścātpoktatvānumānasiddhamapi prāmāṇyaṃ śabdasya anena tadarthasaṃvādakenānumānena dṛḍhataraṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5030: tadanena vārttikena anumānācca pratipattavya iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam icchāyā ātmaliṅgatvakathanaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ yajjātīyasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:5037: yaścāsāveko 'nubhavitā ca smartā cānumātā caiṣitā ca sa ātmā /
GSP29nystik_u:5039: nendriyam, indriyāntaragṛhīta indriyāntareṇāpratisandhānaprasaṅgāt yamaham asprākṣaṃ ta paśyāmīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5044: asatyapi ātmani jñātari satyapi ca buddhyādīnāṃ bhede,
GSP29nystik_u:5048: tadabhyupagame vā sa evātmeti siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam /
GSP29nystik_u:5053: nanvekaviṣayāṇāṃ smṛtyādīnāṃ nānākartṛkatve ko virodha ityata āha---na hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5056: yad yasmāt nimittāt tvagindriyāt sparśamahamasparkṣaṃ tat tasmāt nimittāt cakṣuṣo rūpaṃ paśyāmīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5057: nānākartṛtva udāharaṇamāha---na hi bhavati devadatta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5062: tatra kimakāryakāraṇabhāvāt pratisandhānasya vyatireka uta bhinnakartṛkatvāditi sandigdhavyatirekatvādasādhanāṅgaṃ pratisandhānamityāśayavāṃścodayati---kāryakāraṇabhāvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:5074: kaḥ punarasau hetuviśeṣa ityata āha---viśeṣitaṃ caitatpratisaṃdhānam /
GSP29nystik_u:5075: tat kathayati--- smṛtyā saha pūrvāparapratyayayorekaviṣayatvena pratisaṃndhānam yajjātīyaṃ candanavanitādi sukhahetuṃ pratītaṃ smarāmi tajjātīyamimu pratyemīti pratisandhānam /
GSP29nystik_u:5076: tadanena śālibījāṅgurasya paramparayā śālibījāntarajananalakṣaṇāt pratisaṃdhānāt kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamād vyavacchinatti //
GSP29nystik_u:5079: pṛcchati---kasmāt? uttaram---anyena nimittena anubhūtasya anyena nimittena asmaraṇāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5080: na hi bhavati yenaiva cakṣuṣā ghaṭamadrākṣam, tenaiva tvagindriyeṇa taṃ spṛśāmīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5081: nimittabhede pratisaṃdhānābhāvamuktvā viṣayabhede 'pyāha---na hyanyena svabhāvena ghaṭatvādinānubhūtasya anyena vṛkṣatvādinā smaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5082: na hi bhavati yamahaṃ ghaṭamadrākṣaṃ so 'yaṃ vṛkṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5083: kartṛbhede pratisaṃdhānābhāvamāha---na hyanyena devadattena anubhūtamanyo yajñadattaḥ smarati /
GSP29nystik_u:5084: na hi bhavati yo 'haṃ devadatto 'drākṣaṃ so 'haṃ yajñadattaḥ paśyāmīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5085: na cedaṃ satyapi bhede kāryakāraṇabhāvāt pratisaṃdhānaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:5086: na hi yatra sphuṭataraḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tantupaṭayorghaṭakapālayorvā dṛśyate tatra pratisaṃdhānaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:5087: ye tantavaḥ sa eva paṭa iti vā yo ghaṭākṣaṇaḥ sa eva kapālakṣaṇa iti vā /
GSP29nystik_u:5088: vastutaḥ kāryakāraṇabhūtānāmagṛhītabhedānāṃ pratisaṃdhānahetubhāvaḥ sabhāgeṣu kṣaṇeṣu tathā darśanāditi cet?
GSP29nystik_u:5090: āmalakaphalasyaikasyāpanayane tatraiva sthāne āmalakāntarāvasthāpane bhavati pratisaṃdhānam /
GSP29nystik_u:5092: pūrvāparapratyayayoḥ smṛtyā sahaikaviṣayatvaṃ kartari kāryakāraṇabhāvanibandhanaṃ na karmaṇīti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:5094: nairātmyasākṣātkārasātmībhāve 'pyasti vijñānānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāva iti tannibandhanaṃ pratisaṃdhānaṃ pūrvavadeva prasajyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:5095: saiva cātmadṛṣṭirdeṣāṇāṃ nidānaṃ paramiti vyartho nairātmyasākṣātkārasātmībhāvaprayāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5096: athāsadapi pratisaṃdhānaṃ kāryavaśādāharati tathāgato naṭa iva rāmatvamātmanaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5100: sa tarhi tādṛśaḥ śālibījasyotpādaṃ vāstavaṃ na niyantumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:5102: na ca pratyayānāṃ bhedāgrahāt pratisaṃdhānamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP29nystik_u:5105: ahamiti ca sattvadṛṣṭeḥ kṣaṇikatvanirākṛtāvasati bādhake sthiravastuviṣayatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5106: tasmāt smṛtyā saha pūrvāparapratyayayoḥ ekaviṣayatvalakṣaṇasya pratisandhānasyānekakartṛkatvād vyatireko nirūpādhirekakartṛkatvaṃ sādhayati /
GSP29nystik_u:5107: sa caikaḥ kartā śarīrendriyabuddhibhyo bhinna ātmeti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:5109: tasmād yasmin pakṣe smṛtiḥ saṃbhavati tatra pratisaṃdhānaṃ nyāyyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5114: syādetat, yogicittamapi sarvajñasya cetasa ālambanapratyaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5121: tamimamasmadabhiprāyānabhijñaṃ paramanyathāpi bodhayituṃ vibhavāma iti siddhāntī anyathā smṛtyanupapattimāha---na,
GSP29nystik_u:5123: na hyajātānanvayadhyastayorasti kaścid viśeṣa iti pūrvotpanno 'nubhavaḥ kāñcana vāsanāmādhāya dhvaṃsate,
GSP29nystik_u:5125: na cāsthirā buddhiḥ śakyā vāsayitumityātmā sthiro 'bhyupeya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5129_0: nāsmākaṃ kṣaṇikavastuvādināmasti tajjagati yadavasthitaṃ vāsakena vāsyamānaṃ dṛṣṭamiti
GSP29nystik_u:5133: tena saha jātaḥ samānakālaḥ cenāviśeṣaḥ tadālayavijñānamityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5139: upapādayiṣyate hi bhāvānāṃ sarvajanapratītisiddhā stharatā kṣaṇabhaṅganirākaraṇena /
GSP29nystik_u:5140: tathā ca sthirasya saṃbaddhasya ca vastrādeḥ mṛgamadādinā vāsyatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nāsthire 'saṃbaddhe ca bhavitumarhatītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5142: asthirayorapi jñānayoḥ samānakālatayā asti saṃbandha iti kasmāt anyataracittavāsitamanyataraccittaṃ smṛtiṃ nādhatte ityata āha---yaścāsāviti /
GSP29nystik_u:5144: nanu vartamāne cetasi mā kārṣodupakāram, anāgate tu kariṣyati ityata āha---nāpīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5159: sthirameva hi kuṇḍaṃ sthirasyaiva vadarasya gurutvena patato gurutvaṃ pratibadhnadadhaḥpatanaṃ nivārayadādhāro bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5160: yadyucyeta na smṛtirbhāvaḥ, kiṃ tu bhavitrī utpattirasyā bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5161: na tu bhaviturbhavitrantarāpekṣā yuktā anavasthāpātāditi āśaṅkate---athāpīdamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5166: svarūpamutpatterūcyamānaṃ svatantraṃ bādhate yataḥ, tasmād virodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5171: tathā ca na virodho nāpyanabhyupaga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5177: tathā ca smṛteḥ bhāvasya bhavitā ātmaika nityaḥ pariśiṣyate ityāśayavānāha---yadā cotpattiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:5181: yā punarnābhyāmekakartṛkā sā nābhyāṃ tathā pratisandhīyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5185: tadevaṃ vyatirekisamarthanaṃ kṛtvā anvayavyatirekiṇamatrārthe pramāṇayati---atha veti /
GSP29nystik_u:5186_1: tenaiva gandha upalabhyate iti khalu mayeti smṛtyā saha pratisandhānaṃ tasmād bharatamatābhyāsenābhinaye
GSP29nystik_u:5192: na bhrūḥ paramāṇusamūho 'pi tu avayavidravyamekam, tadgataṃ ca recitakamapi kriyaikaiva /
GSP29nystik_u:5196: asti ca teṣāmapi svagocarāvikalpotpādanadvāreṇa paraṃparayā mayeti pratisandhānahetubhāva iti yatkiñcidetadekatvaṃ tasya kalpitamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5197: tadevaṃ pratisandhānadvāreṇecchādīnāmātmaliṅgatvamuktvā saṃprati guṇatayā liṅgatā vārttikakṛd āha---atha veti /
GSP29nystik_u:5200: na hyanityo bhāvo dravyāt svatantro bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5201_0: tasmād guṇatvaprasādhakādeva hetoḥ pāratantryasiddheḥ kṛtaṃ guṇatvena pāratantryasādhakeneti
GSP29nystik_u:5201_1: hṛdi nidhāya vārttikakāraḥ tadapi pūrvamuktamiti siddhena pāratantryeṇa guṇatvamapi sādhayati /
GSP29nystik_u:5202: na caitadanityasya pāratantryaṃ dravyeṇa sidhyati, dravyavakarmaṇorapyanityayoḥ pāratantryāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5203: tasmādanityatvasiddhena dravyapāratantryeṇa dravyakarmabhyāṃ vyatirecayati---na dravyaṃ karma vā icchādayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5206: tathāpi dravyakalpanamātreṇaivopapattau tadavayayavakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvena tad dravyamanavayavaṃ tāvat siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:5207: anavayavaṃ ca dravyaṃ dvedhā, vyāpakam aṇu ca /
GSP29nystik_u:5209: kvacidanyatarakarmaṇā kvacit svabhāvataḥ tatsaṃyogopapattau tadgatikalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt siddhamasya vyāpakatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:5211: tadanayā vakroktyā nityatvaṃ paramamahattvaṃ cātmano darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5212: etacca sāmānyatodṛṣṭamanumānaṃ sūtrayatā sarvaṃ darśitamityāha---sāmānyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5213: yat tatpūrvaṃ hṛdi sthitamicchādīnāṃ dravyapāratantrye sādhye 'nityatvahetukānumānam taduddhāṭayati,
GSP29nystik_u:5224_0: ātmānaṃ lakṣayitvātmano duḥkhanidānānāmindriyādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa
GSP29nystik_u:5224_1: ca śarīramāśritya tannidānatvamiti tadevāsya duḥkhamūlakāraṇamityanantaraṃ śarīraṃ
GSP29nystik_u:5231: atra ceṣṭāśrayatvenendriyāśrayatvenārthāśrayatvena ca pratyekaṃ samānajātīyebhya ātmendriyādibhyo 'samānajātīyebhyaḥ pramāṇasaṃśayādibhyaḥ śarīraṃ vyavacchidyate //
GSP29nystik_u:5235: sa cātivyāpakatayā avyāpakatayā ca na lakṣaṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:5241: na ca vyāpāramātraṃ ceṣṭā abhimatā, api tu viśiṣṭo vyāpāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5244: tathāpi mūrtāntarāprayoge satīti viśeṣaṇāt na vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5248: pāṭite pāṣāṇe tādṛśasya tadvyāpārasya darśanāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5255: yadyapi gandhādayo viṣayā na svarūpeṇa śarīramāśrayante tathāpi yadeṣāṃ sukhādyupalambhahetutvaṃ kāryaṃ prayojanaṃ tadarthamāśrayante ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5262: atra prathame pakṣe ceṣṭāśabdo vyāpāraviśeṣe spandādivanmukhyārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5263: tadetat---lokastāvadityādinā tathā cāyaṃ ceṣṭāśabda ityantena darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:5267: sā ca na kriyāmātra ityanena darśitā /
GSP29nystik_u:5269: evaṃ bhāṣyānusāreṇa svamatena ca pratyekaṃ ceṣṭāśrayatvādi śarīrasya lakṣaṇamiti varṇayitvā samastamevedaṃ śarīralakṣaṇamiti ye varṇayāṃbabhūvuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5271: yadyādyaṃ padaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ceṣṭāśraya iti, tadā ghaṭena vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5273: tathāpi tenaiva ghaṭādinā vyabhicāraḥ, prāpyakāritvenendriyāṇāṃ ghaṭādīnāmapi indriyasaṃyogitvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5277: atha samavāyābhiprāyeṇāśrayatvam, tathāpi na samavāya indriyāṇāṃ śarīre /
GSP29nystik_u:5278: ghrāṇasya pārthivatvena samavāyo na viruddha iti cet---na,
GSP29nystik_u:5284: api ca yadā ceṣṭendriyārthasya samavāyena śarīratvam,
GSP29nystik_u:5285: hanta bho indriyasamavāyikāraṇeṣu paramāṇuṣu samastam etadastīti teṣāmapi śarīratvaprasaṅga ityāha---samasteti /
GSP29nystik_u:5290: cakṣurādayastu unmīlanānmūrtena śarīreṇa prayujyante iti na prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5291: śrotraṃ tu ceṣṭādhāra eva na bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5296: na ca viśeṣalakṣaṇamakṛte sāmānyalakṣaṇe śakyamiti bhāṣyakāraḥ prathamamindriyāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ nirvedopayuktamāha---bhogasādhanānīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5297: anena yaccharīrasaṃyuktaṃ satkārakadoṣavyatiriktaṃ sākṣātpratītisādhanaṃ tadindriyamiti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sūcitam /
GSP29nystik_u:5299: pāramparyeṇa ca bhogasādhanatvaṃ ghrāṇādīnām sākṣānmanasa eva tatsādhanatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:5310: jñātaṃ coddiśyate, ajñātaṃ ca vidhīyate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5318: atra ca ghrāṇādiśabdāḥ paṅkajādipadavadavayavārthaṃ nimittīkṛtya kvacit,
GSP29nystik_u:5322: avayavārthage 'pi ca gandhādyupalabdhisādhane sannikarṣādau ghrāṇādiśabdāprayogāt avayavārthānvitaṃ ghrāṇatvādyeva ghrāṇādiśabdapravṛttinimittam /
GSP29nystik_u:5326: na ca sannikarṣeṇa gandhopalabdhisādhanena ca vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5328: tadanena jighratītyādi svaviṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇāni ityantaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:5331: tasyāpi tvaksthāne indriye sparśopalabdhisādhane eva upacāra iti //
GSP29nystik_u:5332: bhūtebhya iti sūtrāvayavatātparyavyākhyānaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ bhūtebhya itīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5336: uttaram---bhūtaguṇaviśeṣagrahaṇasādhanatvam ghrāṇenaiva hi pṛthivyā yo guṇaviśeṣo gandhaḥ sa gṛhyate, na rasanādinā /
GSP29nystik_u:5337: evaṃ rasanenaivāpāṃ yo mādhuryaṃ guṇaviśeṣaḥ sa gṛhyate, na ghrāṇādinā /
GSP29nystik_u:5340: evaṃ śrotreṇaiva śabdo nabhasa iti hi niyamaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5341: atra ca prayogaḥ, gandhopalabdhiḥ karaṇasādhyā kriyātvāt chidikriyāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:5342: evaṃ sā tadanyakriyākāraṇātiriktakaraṇaniṣpādyā, tadanvayavyatirekānanuvidhāne sati kāryatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5350: tacca pārthivam, dravyatve sati rūpādiṣu madhye gandhasyaiva vya/jakatvāt, pārthivāntaravat /
GSP29nystik_u:5353: tasya pṛthivyāḥ pāthaso vā yo guṇaviśeṣo gandho vā madhura eva vā rasabhedaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5357: na caive rasanā apāmiva pṛthivyā api rasabhedaṃ gṛhṇātīti pārthivī bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5359: tena tenaivendriyeṇeti niyamo guṇaviśeṣamavadhārayati, na tvindriyamimi /
GSP29nystik_u:5360: atra ca karṇaśaṣkulīsaṃyogopādhinā śrotrasya nabhasaḥ kathañcid bhedaṃ vivakṣitvā bhūtebhya iti pa/yamyartho vyākhyeyaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5361: anena khalvāhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇi iti yadāhuḥ sāṃkhyāḥ, tat nirākṛtam /
GSP29nystik_u:5372: tathāpi gandhādyutpattau pūrvagandhādidhvaṃsānāṃ nimittānāṃ bhedādutpannaṃ bhedādutpannaṃ kāryanānātvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5373: tadidamuktaṃ ye pūrve rūpādayaḥ teṣāṃ svagato viśeṣaḥ pradhvaṃsa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5374: atha rūpatvādisāmānyameva kasmāt svagato viśeṣo na bhavatītyata āha---evaṃ ca kṛtveti /
GSP29nystik_u:5376: pradhvaṃsānāṃ tu stokabhūyastvaṃ niḥśeṣatve nopadyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5396: gandhar---thāḥ //14// atra coddeśakramasmāritā arthā lakṣyatayā pratipattavyāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5400: etāvataiva lakṣaṇe paryavasite suhṛdbhāvena pravibhāgābhidhānaṃ pṛthivyādiguṇā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5403: pṛthivyādīnāmiti bhāṣyaṃ na ṣaṣṭhīsamāsajñāpanārtham, api tvarthābhidhānamātram /
GSP29nystik_u:5405: yathākramaṃ pṛthivyādiṣvanilānteṣu gandhādayaḥ sparśāntāḥ catustridvyekaniyamena viniyuktāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5408: yena krameṇa ghrāṇādaya indriyasūtre paṭhitāḥ yena ceha gandhādaya, tadanatikrameṇetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5409: atra vārttikakāraḥ pṛthivyādiguṇā ityatrānekasamāsapratibhāsanāt saṃśayaṃ kṛtvā dvandvasamāsamavadhārayati---pṛthivyādiguṇā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5411: nanu kaṇṭhekāla itivad vaiyadhikaraṇyena bahuvrīhirbhaviṣyati pṛthivyādīnāṃ guṇā yebhyo gandhādibhyaḥ, te tathā /
GSP29nystik_u:5413: nabhogataśca śabdo nabhasi samānajātīyaṃ śabdamityata āha---na cānyatheti /
GSP29nystik_u:5416: na ca gandhādīnāṃ pṛthivyādiguṇahetutvapratipādanaṃ kvacit nirvedādāvupayujyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5424: guṇagrahaṇena sarva iti āśritānāśritatvābhiprāyam, guṇaśabdasya dharmavacanatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5437: svasaṃvedanena vā mānasena vā jñānena rūpāddhālambanaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5443: rūpādiparamāṇava eva tena tenākāreṇa utpannā ekayodakāharaṇakriyayā vyavacchinnā ghaṭa ityucyante /
GSP29nystik_u:5445: yathāha ghaṭa ityapi ca rūpādaya evaikārthakriyākāriṇastathā vyapadiśyante iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5452: na tāvad rūpādikṣaṇa eko ghaṭaḥ, kṣaṇāntare tatprayogābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5456: yathāsaṃsthānāṃ rūpādayo 'rthā anubhūyante, tathā sanniviṣṭebhyo ghaṭādipratyayā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5466: yastu bhinnalokamaryādatayā brūte ādimān mithyāpratyayaḥ samyagjñānaṃ nimittīkaroti, ayaṃ punaranādi /
GSP29nystik_u:5480: rūparasagandhasparśā iti catvāri dravyāṇi, pṛthivyaptejovāyava iti catvāri /
GSP29nystik_u:5487: mā bhūvan vastutaḥ, ubhaye 'pi sāṃvṛtā bhaviṣyantītyata āha---saṃhanyamānasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:5489: na khalu saṃyujyamānānāmabhāve saṃyogaḥ śakyābhyupagama ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5493: nāpi saṃhanyamānā iti kimanayā svarūpeṇāvriyeteti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5494: tadevaṃ tadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvād ityasya vyāghātadoṣaṃ darśayitvā svasāmarthyālocane na vivakṣitaliṅgābhidhāyitā,
GSP29nystik_u:5496: evaṃ kilātrābhimatam, pṛthivyādayo rūpādibhyo 'bhinnā, rūpādyagrahe pṛthivyādibuddhyabhāvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:5497: tannṛ tadettatadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvādityanena na śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP29nystik_u:5499: pṛthivyādayaśca dharmitayā pradhānamiti ta eva parāmarṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5501: tathā ca pratijñātasteṣāṃ rūpādyabhedo na sidhyedityasaṃbaddham /
GSP29nystik_u:5502: atha rūpādayaḥ pakṣīkriyante, tathāpi rūpādyagrahe rūpādibuddhyayabhāvāditi syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5504: evaṃ śabdāntareṇāpi pratijñāprayoge tulyaḥ prasaṅga ityāha---evaṃ rūpādimātramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5515: samānārthānāmapi prakṛtīnāṃ rūpabhedena tatparasya pratyayasya sāmarthyabhedāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5516: yathāptoyaśabdayostulyārthatve 'pi toyaśabdāt parā vibhaktistoyānīti toyasamavetāmeva bahutvasaṃkhyāmāha /
GSP29nystik_u:5517: āpa iti na toyagatām, api tu tatsaṃbaddhagatām /
GSP29nystik_u:5519: tadgatarūpādayo vā bahava ityekasyāmapi pāthaḥkaṇikāyāṃ bahuvacanopapattirāpa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5520: na ca sorastāḍaṃ krandato 'pi lokasyāvinivṛtternaivamiti sāmpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:5521: loko hi dṛṣṭavyavahāramātraprayojano na vivecayati, parīkṣakāstu tadanusāriṇo vivecayantyeva /
GSP29nystik_u:5530: na ca nīlasya sphaṭikalakṣaṇasyotpattiriti tṛtīye nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5537: sa ca saṃyogabheda eva toyamāṃsayoḥ, na tvavayavī vijātīyayoranāmbhakatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5538: nāpi yūṣajātīyaṃ toyasaṃyogi dravyaṃ kṣīrajātīyamiveti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:5540: iha tu kāṭhinye na yūṣabuddhivyapadeśāviti saṃyogabheda eva toyamāṃsayoryūṣa iti nyāyyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5545: na ca parakīya sādhanadoṣodabhāvanamātrāt svapakṣasiddhiriti siddhāntinaṃ sādhanaṃ pṛcchati---atha rūpādibhyo 'rthāntare dravye kiṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5546: yato 'yaṃ paro rūpādibhyo 'rthāntaraṃ dravyaṃ pratyakṣeṇa vidvānapi svasiddhāntābhyāsāhitavyāmohāpasmāro na tathā vyavaharati,
GSP29nystik_u:5548: asti hi sarveṣāmeva laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ brāhyaṇasya kamaṇḍaluritivat candanasya rūpādaya iti vyapadeśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5550: anyathā tadbuddhyabhāvādityetāvanmātre vaktavye kathamāha tadagraha iti?
GSP29nystik_u:5561: tathāpi rūpādīnāṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ pradhānamityasti sāṃkhyānāṃ vyapadeśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5563: tathāpi rūpādīnāṃ parasparabhinnānāmanyonyaṃ vyapadeśyavyapadeśakabhāva upapatsyata ityuktam---samastairiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5565: upalabhyasyopalabhyeneti vaktavye pratyakṣsya pratyakṣeṇeti vacanaṃ rūpāvagamasamaye 'numeyebhyo rasādibhya ekāntato vyapadeśaṃ vyāvartayitum,
GSP29nystik_u:5569: vidhīyamānaṃ pratiṣidhyamānamiti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ niṣedhasya vidhyadhīnanirūpaṇatayā niṣedhyamekatvam aṅgīkāryam,
GSP29nystik_u:5581: carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti itivad ghaṭādiviṣayanimittavyatirekabhāja ityatrāpi pratyayagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5586: sā yeṣāmasti te gajavājipadātiprabhūtayaḥ sthāninaḥ pratyekaṃ mahāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5588: kvacit punaḥ svajātīyasthānyaṅgāntarasannidhāne satyupacitāḥ sahasraṃ bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:5590: na caitāvatā yatra śataṃ gajādayaḥ yatra ca sahasraṃ tayoḥ senayormahattvāviśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5593: pratyayabhedād dravyādibhyaḥ saṃkhyāyā bhedamuktvā vyapadeśādabhedādapyāha---ata eveti //
GSP29nystik_u:5595: mūrtānāṃ samānadeśatvābhāvāt na parvasu khadiraśca sthāṇuśca samavetau /
GSP29nystik_u:5597: yasya dravyasya yāvān saṃyogapracayo 'samavāyikāraṇaṃ sa tāvānutpannamātra eva tajjanakaḥ, tasya kṣepāyogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5598: tasmāt parvaṇāṃ saṃsthānaviśeṣa eva sthāṇuriti gamayitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5610: śaṅkate---grāhyābhāvāditi cet? grāhyābhāve satyagrahaṇāditi hetuḥ, na tvagrahaṇamātramityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5617: yastu yogyapramāṇābhāvāditi viśeṣayet taṃ pratyāha---yaśca tadagraha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5627: ātmādīnāṃ buddhihetūnāṃ lakṣaṇasyānantaraṃ hetumatī buddhirlakṣaṇīyetyāha vārttikakāraḥ---atha buddheravasaraprāptāyā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5628: lakṣaṇaṃ tāvat prakṛtatvādapadeṣṭavyameva, tadapadeśadvāreṇānyadapi kiñcit sūcanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5633: api tu lakṣaṇaparādayamapyarthaḥ pratīyamāno 'pekṣitaśca nopekṣaṇīya ityuktaṃ bhavati //
GSP29nystik_u:5637: paryāyaśabdāśca saṃketamātrādhīnapravṛttayaḥ kva nāma na sambhavanti?
GSP29nystik_u:5644: tatra sarvajanīnaḥ śaknoti vyavacchedabuddhi bhāvayitum, tadvivakṣayaivoktam---etaiśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:5652: tena yo 'sau nīlākāraḥ pariṇāmo buddheḥ, sa jñānalakṣaṇā vṛttirityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5655: tadidaṃ buddhitattvaṃ jaḍaprakṛtitayā indumaṇḍalam iva svayamaprakāśaṃ caitanyamārtaṇḍamaṇḍalacchāyāpattyā prakāśate,
GSP29nystik_u:5664: sā ca na tāvad buddheḥ, tasyā acaitanyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5666: tasmāt kṛpaṇadhanamivātmacaitanyaṃ na svaparopakārīti buddheḥ svābhāvikaṃ caitanyamāstheyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5673: gandhādiviṣayatayā sukhaduḥkhaviṣayatayā ceyaṃ buddhirbhāvyamānā nirvedāya kalpata iti //15 //
GSP29nystik_u:5676: bhāṣyakāraḥ kramaprāptaṃ manolakṣaṇasūtramavatārayan utsūtramanyānyapi lakṣaṇāni āha---smṛtītyādi /
GSP29nystik_u:5683: tathāpi ākāśādīnāmapi manastvaṃ māṃ bhūdityata uktam---sahakārīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5688: atra ca ya ātmano viśeṣaguṇāste sarve indriyajanmāno yathā gandhādipratyayāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5691: evaṃ ca saṃskārādiṣu na karaṇatvaprasaṅga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5694: yadā tasyaiva manaḥsaṃyuktasyendriyasya krameṇa nīlādayo 'rthāḥ sambadhyante tadā tatkramāt krama
GSP29nystik_u:5696: bubhutsākramaṃ gṛhītvā siddhānte 'pi manaḥparityāgo mā bhūditi bhiyā uktam---satyāṃ bubhutsāyāmayugapadgrahaṇa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5697: na hi kiñcitkaraṇaṃ sambaddhamapi saditi syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5699: dvitīyādijñāneṣvapi saiva sāmagrīti sakṛdeva yāvat kartavayakaraṇāt samarthasya kṣepāyogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5700: kṣepayoge vā paścādapi na janayet, aviśeṣāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5701: na ca karturapyayaṃ kramakāritādharmaḥ sa hyanekakaraṇādhiṣṭhānena yugapannānākāryāṇi karoti /
GSP29nystik_u:5702: yathā yugapanmāṇavako gacchati, paṭhati, panthānaṃ vīkṣate, vahati cācāryasya kamaṇḍalumiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5704: tadidamapimanaḥ smṛtyādisādhanatayā bhāvyamānaṃ nirvedāya kalpata iti saddhim//26 //
GSP29nystik_u:5709: na cāpratipādite manasi śakyā darśayitumiti manaso 'nantaratvaṃ pravṛtterityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5712: tatra yā jñānotpādadvāreṇa puṇyapāpahetuḥ sā vākpravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5714: tena manasā iṣṭadevatādyanucintanaṃ cakṣurādibhiśca sādhvasādhudarśanādi sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5718: na ceyaṃ kṣaṇikā satī āmuṣmikaṃ janma sādhayitumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:5724: prava---ṣāḥ //18// rāgadveṣau mohaprabhavau puruṣaṃ pravartamānaṃ pravartayataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5727: tāvaddhi ayaṃ rāgādivaśaḥ spandate, yāvadasya moho vartate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5731: na pratyātmavedanīyeṣu samānāsamānajātīyavyāvṛtteṣu sphuṭatareṣu tad yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5737: sā ca pravṛttyā kāryeṇa lakṣyata iti karmalakṣaṇā ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:5738: yataḥ karmaṇā pravṛttyā pravartakarāgādiyuktāḥ puruṣā lakṣyante,
GSP29nystik_u:5741: svarūpamātraṃ rāgādīnāmuktaṃ bhavati, na tu pravartanāvatvamapi teṣāmityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5742: tadetat sarvaṃ vārttikakāraḥ praśnapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe---kā punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:5744: sā punariyaṃ pravartanā pravartakānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ kathaṃ gamyate?
GSP29nystik_u:5745: doṣā hi gamyante, na tu teṣāṃ pravṛttihetutvamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5748: mauhaikārthasamavāyo hi rāgādīnāṃ mānasa pratyakṣavedanīya ityarthaḥ //18 //
GSP29nystik_u:5753: nanvātmano notpattiḥ saṃbhavati nityatvādityata āha bhāṣyakāraḥ---utpannasya saṃbaddhasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:5766: tathāpi pravṛttidoṣajanitatvenāpi rūpeṇāmī nirvedopayogina iti tena rūpeṇa lakṣyante //
GSP29nystik_u:5768: atra ca pravṛttijanita iti vaktavye doṣagrahaṇaṃ na kevalaṃ pravṛtti prati doṣāṇāṃ hetubhāvaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5769: api tu pravṛttikārye sūkhaduḥkhe api prati iti darśanārtham /
GSP29nystik_u:5770: doṣasalilāvasiktāyāṃ khalvātmabhūmau dharmādharmabīje sukhaduḥkhe janayataḥ, nānyathā /
GSP29nystik_u:5771: na cāsti sambhavo na tatra tṛṣyati tacca tasya sukham, na ca tad dveṣṭi tacca tasya duḥkhamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5775: avasānamātramasti, na tu paritaḥ punarapi sargahānopādānayorbhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5779: nānukte śarīrādau teṣāṃ duḥkhatvaṃ śakyaṃ lakṣayitumiti tallakṣaṇebhyaḥ paramidanduḥkhalakṣaṇam ---
GSP29nystik_u:5780: bādha---kham //21// atra ca bādhaneti bādhanāviṣayāṃ buddhimupalakṣayati /
GSP29nystik_u:5781: tena bādhanā ca tadanuṣaṅgiṇaśca śarīrādayo gauṇamukhyabhāvena lakṣitā bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:5782: saiva hi bādhanā buddhirduḥkhe mukhyā, śarīrādau gauṇīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5784: vaśitayā yoginaḥ svayamupalabhante svayamupanīteṣvapi viṣayeṣu audāsīnyamupekṣābuddhirvairāgyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5790: viraktaṃmānyā mānyante na sukhaṃ nāmāsti svarūpata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5795: tathāpyadhikādhikotkarṣaphalānāṃ darśapaurṇamāsādīnāṃ sahasrasaṃvatsaraparyantānāṃ vidhāyakebhyo vacanebhyo bhāvaphala eva dharmo gamyate bhāvasyaibotkarṣaśālitvāditi //21 //
GSP29nystik_u:5799: tadar---gaḥ //22// tadityanantaraṃ gauṇamukhyabhedabhinnaṃ duḥkhaṃ parāmṛśatītyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ---tena duḥkheneti /
GSP29nystik_u:5800: mukhyameva duḥkhamiti bhramo mā bhūdata āha---janmaneti /
GSP29nystik_u:5801: anena jāyamānā duḥkhaśabdena sarve śarīrādaya ucyanate ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5805: ye tu brahmaiva nāmarūpaprapañcātmanā pariṇamata ityāhuḥ, tān pratyāha---ajaramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5808: ekadeśapariṇāme tu sāvayavatvāt ghaṭadivadanityatvaprasaṅgaḥ iti sūktam---ajaramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5819: tayā ca brahmaṇo nityatvāt tadapi nityamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5820: ātmana iti ca ṣaṣṭhī rāhoḥ śira itivat mantavyā /
GSP29nystik_u:5824: athātmani duḥkhādikaṃ nityaṃ necchati, tatrāha---anaikāntikatā vā /
GSP29nystik_u:5831: na cātmaiva vijñānasvabhāvaḥ tattadviṣayopadhānenodayavyayadharmeva bhavatīti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:5832: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti mānasyāṃ buddhau trayāṇāmapi jñānajñeyajñātaṇāṃ bhedenānuvyavasāyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5834: na caitadasati bādhake bhedajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:5838: na ca tadā viṣayaśūnyaṃ svaniṣṭhamātmacaitanyamiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:5841: na ca kiñcidapi sava prakāśamastīti caturthe vijñāna vādaṃ nirākurvan vakṣyati //
GSP29nystik_u:5842: tadevaṃ vyavasthite dūṣaṇa bhāṣyavārttikoktaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ yathāyamātmamanaḥsaṃyoga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5843: saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ tāvadayamātmamanaḥsaṃyogo dharmaṃ nimittamapekṣamāṇaḥ sukhajñānam ākārṣīt /
GSP29nystik_u:5844: yadi tu muktyavasthāyāṃ tadanapekṣa eva sukhajñānaṃ karoti,
GSP29nystik_u:5847: na vayaṃ viṣayamātrāpekṣāṃ brūmo yena rūpādiṣvapi jñānamutpādayet,
GSP29nystik_u:5848: api tu saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ yat sukhajñānāyānenāpekṣitaṃ tadapekṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:5849: dharmaśca tadā tenāpekṣita iti muktyavasthāyāmapi dharmamevāpekṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:5851: tathā ca na rūpādivijñāna prasaṅga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5855: evamasmanmate 'pi sukhasaṃvedanahānāya ghaṭiṣyata ityata āha---na cāyaṃ sukhamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5856: asmanmate hi duḥkhahānāyaiva tadanuṣaktaṃ sukhaṃ jihāsitam /
GSP29nystik_u:5857: nityaṃ tu sukhaṃ sarvaduḥkhavinirmuktaṃ sanna duḥkhahānāya jihāsitaṃ saṃbhavati ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5859: pratyuta muktyavasthāyāmapi kalpanīyatā ityāha---nityaṃ śarīrādi iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5870: tasmāt nityānanda eva mokṣa ityata āha---yadi punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:5873: tau ca vītarāgeṇāsaktena satā śakyau bhogena kṣetum, na tu śaktane /
GSP29nystik_u:5874: sa hi saktasteṣu teṣu viṣayeṣu upāttamupāttaṃ bhu/jānaḥ tyaktaṃ tyaktaṃ copādadānaḥ saṃsārāt na mucyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:5877_0: anyathā tu nityasukhāvadhāraṇalāliteyaṃ tṛṣṇāpiśācī labdhaprasarā viṣayasukheṣvapi
GSP29nystik_u:5877_1: pratyāsanneṣu purūṣaṃ pravartayantī mokṣamasya sūdūraṃ pratikṣipediti manāgapi prasaro 'syā na dātavyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5878: tasmāt nityānandapratipādakaśrutirātyantike duḥkhaviyoge bhāktīti yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5881: tasya ca tvayā prasaro datta iti tulayo doṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5883: yathā nityasukhopādānaṃ mokṣam apratikūlayā saktyā sapratikūlaṃ naivamātyantikaduḥkhahānaṃ duḥkhadveṣānuṣaktam /
GSP29nystik_u:5887: alaṃ pratyayo hi sa ityapratikūlaṃ duḥkhahānamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5888: tadanena nityaṃ sukhamātmano mokṣe 'bhivyajyate ityādi tasmin prahīṇe nāsya nityasukharāgaḥ pratikūlo bhavatītyevamantaṃ bhāṣyajātaṃ vyākhyātaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5891: muktasya yadi nityaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati kāmaṃ bhavatu mā vā bhūt,
GSP29nystik_u:5892: ubhayorapi pakṣayoḥ vītarāgasya pravṛttau na mokṣādhigamo vikalpyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5897: na cātmani nitye rāgādayaḥ saṃsāraṃ kartumutsahante,
GSP29nystik_u:5903: cittaṃ tu kāryaṃ rāgādivaśāt saṃsārī, tadviyogācca mucyate iti yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5912: nivṛttiśceyameva tasyā yat tatsantānavartinaścetaso 'nāgatasyānutpāda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5914: utpannasyānutpādo na śakyaḥ, nāpi santānanivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum, antyakṣaṇānupapatteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5915: sa hi antyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ kiñcidārabhate na vā?
GSP29nystik_u:5916: ārambhe nāntya iti na kāryakāraṇapravāhanivṛttiḥ, pravāhaśca santāna iti na santānanivṛttiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5918: tataḥ pūrve sarve 'pi kṣaṇā asantaḥ syuriti kasyoccheda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5926: yathā cākṣaṇikasyopakāryatvaṃ tathā kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge upapādayiṣyata iti saddhim //22 //
GSP29nystik_u:5944: atra ca vimarśaḥ saṃśaya iti saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5945: tatra saṃśaya iti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ, vimarśa iti lakṣaṇapadam /
GSP29nystik_u:5946: ekasmin dharmiṇi virodhinānārthāvamarśo vimarśaḥ, kiṃ sviditi jñānam /
GSP29nystik_u:5947: tadanenāsamānajātīyebhyaḥ pramāṇādibhyaḥ samānajātīyebhyaśca viparyayādibhyaḥ saṃśayo nivartito bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5950: atra viśiṣṭo 'vamarśo vimarśaviśiṣṭaḥ saṃśaya iti lakṣyapadam /
GSP29nystik_u:5953: trividha eveti ye pañcavidhamācakṣate te nirākṛtāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5954: tadanavadhāraṇajñānaṃ sa saṃśaya iti saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---tatra viṣayasvarūpeti /
GSP29nystik_u:5959: jñānatvaṃ ca sāmānyaṃ saṃśayādiṣvapyastīti na virodha iti //
GSP29nystik_u:5963: mā kārṣīd dravye saṃśayam, guṇa eva kasmāt na karotīti praśnārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5972: na ca sadṛśo dharmaḥ sattāmātreṇa saṃśaye hetuḥ, api tūpalabdhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5978: asmadāyatte hi śabdaprayoge kimityavācakaṃ prayokṣyāmaha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5981: apekṣāśabdaśca yadyapīcchāyāṃ vartate, tathāpīha jighṛkṣāyāṃ vākyasāmarthyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5982: na ca sā saṃśayasya hetuḥ, tasyāḥ saṃśaye sati bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5983: tasmād viśeṣāpekṣayā vighṛkṣālakṣaṇayeha viśeṣayoḥ purovartivastusādṛśyāt smaraṇe satyagrahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇīyam,
GSP29nystik_u:5984: yathā gaṅgāśabdastīraṃ saṃbaddhameva lakṣayati, na tu tīramātram /
GSP29nystik_u:5989: tathā ca vinigamanāyāṃ ko heturityata āha---yaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:5990: nanvabhāvaḥ pramāṇālambanamuktaḥ, tat kuto na virodha ityata uktam---svatantramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5993: yathā ca dhūmo na sattāmātreṇa hetustathoktaṃ prāgiti //
GSP29nystik_u:5995: te kila manyante vyavacchedaheturapi dharmaḥ samāno bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5996: yathā kṛtakatvaṃ sādhyadharmiṇi śabde dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi ca ghaṭādau samānam,
GSP29nystik_u:6021: viśiṣyate hyanena purūṣaḥ sthāṇoriti anupalabdhasāmānyasyāpi kvacidupalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāstīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6022: yathā saptame rase, daśame vā dravye /
GSP29nystik_u:6023: na hi tatra sādhakaṃ bādhakaṃ vāsti pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:6026: tad yathā hastinaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatsaṃbandhino sthūṇāhastipakau smarati na ca tatra saṃndigdhe //
GSP29nystik_u:6028: naudolārūḍho hi gacchan vidūre ārohapariṇāvadvastudarśane 'pi satyapi ca sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāve viśeṣasmṛtyamāvāt naga iti vā nāga iti vā na sandigdhe /
GSP29nystik_u:6029: evamupalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāto viśeṣāpekṣa iti padadvaye vidhīyamāna'nyataḥ smaryamāṇād viśeṣāt sadṛśadharmavati dharmiṇyanupalabhyamāne saṃśayaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6031: no khalvanupalabhyamāne samānadharme dharmiṇi tadgatā vakrakoṭarādayo vā śiraḥ pāṇyādayo vā śakyagrahā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6036: asti ca karitarurūpaviśeṣasmṛtiḥ, na tu sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāva iti na saṃśete /
GSP29nystik_u:6042: viśeṣaṃ bubhutsamāna iti viśeṣāpekṣa ityasya vivaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:6046: kathaṃ bubhutsamānaḥ saṃśeta ityata uktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā, samānamanayoriti /
GSP29nystik_u:6048: seyaṃ sādhakabādhakapramāṇānupapattau satyā samānadharmopalabdhirvinaśyadavasthā viśeṣasmṛtyā sahāvinaśyadavasthā ekasmin kṣaṇe satī saṃśayajñānasya heturiti siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:6051: anekadharmopapatterityatra bhāṣyakṛto vyākhyāṃ grahītum ekadeśivyākhyānamupanyasya dūṣayati---aneketi /
GSP29nystik_u:6053: saṃyogajatvaṃ hi kārye dravye guṇe ca rūpādau śarīrādikriyāyāṃ cāstīti dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samānam /
GSP29nystik_u:6055: evaṃ śabdagato 'neko 'pi dharmaḥ samānatayaiva dravyatvādisandehahetuḥ triṣu,
GSP29nystik_u:6067: tadanena samānajātīyam asamānajātīyaṃ cānekamiti bhāṣyaṃ tasmād viśeṣa ityadhyāhṛtya vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:6076: tadevaṃ lakṣaṇābījadvayopanyāsena asādhāraṇo dharma iti grahaṇakavākyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:6078: ekaṃ cāneka ca tadubhayamanekaṃ tasyānekasya pratyayaheturdharmo 'nekadharmaḥ bhedābhedapratyayaheturityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6081: tadidamāha---yato vibhāgajatvāt eṣa pratyayo bhavatīdaṃ vibhāgajaṃ śabdajātam ekam /
GSP29nystik_u:6083: tatra ya eva ekapratyayahetuḥ dharmo 'bhedaḥ sa eva anekapratyayaheturviśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6087: tadidamāha---yataḥ sadādereṣa pratyayo bhavatīdamekaṃ yataśca vibhāgajatvādepa pratyayo bhavatīdamanekamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:6096: yad yena sahacaritaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tat kkacid dṛśyamānaṃ tat smārayat tadviyaruddhenāpi ca saṃbandhānaniścāyayat saṃśayaheturbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:6098: asādhāraṇastu dharmo vibhāgajatvaṃ narte śabdāt kkacit pṛthivyādau vā utkṣepaṇādau vā gandhādau vā dṛṣṭa iti kathra smārayet,
GSP29nystik_u:6099: asmārayad vā kathaṃ tatra saṃśayaṃ janayet?
GSP29nystik_u:6100: tasmāt ko 'yaṃ bhavedityayo dharmāditi jijñāsāmātramutpādayet na tvayaṃ vāyaṃ veti saṃśayamityata āha---na hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6102: na hi dravyādervibhāgato janma saṃbhavati, tadanvayavyatirekānanuvidhānādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6103: nanvata evoktaṃ na saṃśayaheturityataḥ āha---vibhāgajatvaṃ saṃśarye karoti sarvato vyāvṛtteriti /
GSP29nystik_u:6105: yadyapi vibhāgajatvaṃ na dravyādau kvacid dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nystik_u:6106: tathāpi tadvyatirekaḥ pratyekaṃ dravyādau dṛṣṭa iti vibhāgajatvena sadādyaviśeṣavān śabdo dravyakarmabhyā vyāvartamānaḥ kiṃ guṇaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6108: guṇadravyābhyāṃ vyāvartamānaḥ kiṃ karmeti vyatirekamukhena tattat smārayan asādhāraṇo dharmo bhavati saṃśayakāraṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6115: avayavakriyā hi tadavayavāvaruddhanabhobhāgavibhāgajanikā dravyārambhakasaṃyogāpratidvandvivibhāgajanakatvena vyāptā vikasatkamalakuṅmaladaleṣu dṛṣṭā /
GSP29nystik_u:6116: na hi tatra tatra mukulitād vikāsi kamalamanyat,
GSP29nystik_u:6120: tathā ca dravyaṃ kāryamapi na naśyet /
GSP29nystik_u:6126: anabhyupagamabījaṃ ca kutaḥ punarevadevamavagataṃ padmapatrāvayavakriyā vibhāgadvayajaniketi,
GSP29nystik_u:6131: athaṃ viparyayaḥ kasmāt na bhavatīti vaṃśadaladvayakriyaiva vibhāgadvayajanikā,
GSP29nystik_u:6138: kriyāvailakṣaṇyāt tu svahetuvailakṣaṇyajanmanaḥ kāryasya vibhāgasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:6140: tathāpi caitadvailakṣaṇyaṃ kriyāyā abhyupetavyam yadekā vibhāgamekaṃ janayati /
GSP29nystik_u:6149: tasmāt hastāditaruvibhāgaḥ kriyato 'saṃbhavannaṅgulyāditaruvibhāgameva kāryaikārthasamavāyalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā nimittīkarotīti vibhāgajavibhāgasiddhiṃ manyate,
GSP29nystik_u:6152: tathāpi vibhāgajatvamīdṛśamasādhāraṇamevetyata āha---astu vā tasya abhyupagatavibhāgasya api vibhāgajatvamasādhāraṇaṃ viśiṣṭam /
GSP29nystik_u:6154: pāṭyamāne hi vaṃśe śabdotpattau vaṃśadalayormitho vibhāgo nimittakāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:6169: tathāpi kāraṇamātravibhāgajavibhāgāsamavāyikāraṇakatvāditi hetuḥ bhāṣyakāreṇa vibhāgajatvāt ityanena sūcitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6171: sa hi kāraṇākāraṇavibhāgapūrvako, na tu kāraṇamātravibhāgapūrvakaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6174: na tu yo vyāvṛttaḥ tena sahāsyāsāhacaryāditi śaṅakāmapanetuṃ bhāṣyakārīyamuttaramāha---tulyajātīyeṣvitiṃ /
GSP29nystik_u:6177: yat khalu sadādirūpasaṃpannaṃ viśeṣavat tatsamānajātīyebhyo 'samānajātīyabhyaśca vyāvṛttam,
GSP29nystik_u:6179: abādibhyaśca dravyāntarebhyāṃ guṇakarmabhyaśca vijātīyebhyo gandhavattvena vyāvṛttaṃ dravyajātīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6182: tathāvidhaḥ śabdaḥ sadādirūpasaṃpanno vibhāgajatvena samānāsamānajātīyebhyo viśiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:6183: tasmād bhavati dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma veti saṃśaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6185: saṃprati samānaśabdaparyālocanayāpyanekapadamasādhāraṇe vartate lakṣaṇayaivetyāha---samānadharmasya saṃśayakāraṇatvena upayogād veti /
GSP29nystik_u:6186: samānaṃ hi pratigogitayā asamānaṃ buddhau sannidhāpayati /
GSP29nystik_u:6187: tatra dvayasyāpi samānaśabdena śrutyarthābhyāmupāttasya samānasya dharmasyāsamānasya ca,
GSP29nystik_u:6190: asmadāyatte śabdaprayoge kimityavācakaṃ prayokṣyāmaha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6194: sā ca lākṣaṇikānekapadādhīnā nāsamānapadāt labhyata iti prayojanavallākṣaṇikapadopādānam /
GSP29nystik_u:6195: lakṣaṇaiva ceyam anekasmādvyāvṛtto dharmo 'nekadharma iti vigraheṇa nirvarṇyate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6211: nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt śabdatvavadityekaḥ pañcarūpopapanno 'vyabhicārī hetuḥ1 anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavaditi cāyamaparaḥ pañcarūpopapanno 'vyabhicārī heturiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6214: na cāyaṃ prativādinaḥ prayogo 'pi yuktaḥ iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6217: saṃśayasya hi viśeṣādarśanaṃ janakam, viśeṣadarśanaṃ ca nivartakamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6220: na ca yadā nivartakatvamasyāsti tadā janakamapītyāha---na hi viśeṣadarśane satīti //
GSP29nystik_u:6222: pratyakṣameva sa evāyaṃ gakāra ityevamākāraṃ pratyabhijñāsamājñātaṃ śabdasya sthemānamākalayat,
GSP29nystik_u:6224: iti nityatvaṃ paricchetsyatītyata āha---nāyamarthaḥ pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6225: tadeva hi pratyakṣaṃ saṃśayasya nivartakaṃ yadananyathāsiddham, yathauṣṇyagrāhi vahneḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6226: idaṃ tu sādṛśyenāpi saṃbhavāt svayaṃ sandigdhaṃ sanna saṃśayocchedāyālamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6227: mā bhūt pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ, bhavati tvāgamasya /
GSP29nystik_u:6236: tathāpi svasvasāmānyaviśeṣagatvādyupahitā gavādivyaktaya iva gotvādyupadhānāḥ śakyasaṃketā iti na nityatāmākṣipatyāgama ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6238: na khalu candramasaḥ parabhāge hariṇasadasadbhāvasandehaḥ śakyaḥ kadācidapyucchettumasmadādīnāmityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6240: sandigdhanityānityabhāve śabde kṛtakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nānityatvena svabhāvataḥ pratibaddham /
GSP29nystik_u:6245: yadi ca pañcarūpo 'pi hetuḥ, saṃśayakāraṇaṃ sarvamevānumānamiti sarvamapramāṇaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6250: sautrāntikamate hi rūpaṃ sapratighamiṣyate mūrtaṃ ca,
GSP29nystik_u:6251: nitya eveti vā anitya eveti vā abhilāpo nopapadyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:6252: sthāṇureveti vā puruṣa eveti vā abhilāpaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6263: tathā ca bahu vyāhataṃ bhavatītyāśayavān pṛcchati---yadā punarevaṃbhūtāviti /
GSP29nystik_u:6265_0: nanu kṛtakatvasya sādhyatvāt śrāvaṇatvasya ca siddhatvāt prathamabhāvinā nityatvānumānena
GSP29nystik_u:6266: siddhamapi śravaṇatvamanumānasikatādyanityadharmasādhāraṇatayā savyabhicāraṃ sannityatvasya sādhanaṃ na bhavitumarhatoti /
GSP29nystik_u:6271: tathāpi tasyā vādiprativādigatāyā atyantaparokṣatvāt saṃśayakāraṇatvānupapatteḥ svakāryaṃ pravādaṃ lakṣayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6272_0: atra bhāṣyakāraḥ upalabdhyavyavasthāyā anupalabdhavyavasthāyāśca pṛthak saṃśayakāraṇatvaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:6272_1: matvā samānadharmopapatterityanena gatārthatāṃ pariharannāha sma---purvaḥ samāno 'nekaścetyādi /
GSP29nystik_u:6275: satyāṃ ca viśeṣasmṛtau sādhakabādhakapramāṇāsadbhāve saṃśayo bhavatītyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6279: tat kimidānī sarveṣāṃ jñātṛsthatvāviśeṣaṇa trayāṇāmapi saṃśayakāraṇānāṃ samānānekavipratipattīnāmabhedaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6283: asādhāraṇo hyadṛṣṭapūrvaḥ kvacidapi na saṃśayaṃ kartumutsahate,
GSP29nystik_u:6284: yat punarasādhāraṇavattvaṃ saṃśayahetutvenopavarṇitaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā tat samānameva, na tvasādhāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:6289: yacca vārttikakāreṇa sarvato vyāvṛttyā asādhāraṇasya saṃśayakāraṇatvamuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:6290: tatrāpi tadabhāvasya sādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutve kimāyātamasādhāraṇasya? yathāhuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6296: sa ca sādhāraṇe niviśate iti sūktam sarva evāyaṃ samānadharma evābhidhīyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6298: na vayaṃ sarvatra sādhāraṇamapajānīmahe anvayavyatirekavyabhicāravaktṛgatatvabhedamātramādriyamāṇāḥ kāraṇabhedena trividhaṃ saṃśayamācakṣmahe ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6301: api caitayoḥ pṛthak saṃśayakāraṇatve 'tiprasaṅgāt niścayapūrvaṃ na pravarteta lokaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6304: na cānabhyāsadaśānne upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthayāṃ saṃśaya iti vācyam,
GSP29nystik_u:6305: anabhyāsadaśāpanne hi dūrād vahnijñāne upalabdhyavyavasthāyā api na nāgo vā nago veti saṃśerate,
GSP29nystik_u:6306: kiṃ tu kiṃśukakusumanicayo vā uṣarbudho veti,
GSP29nystik_u:6310: sāmagrībhedena bhede trevidhyaṃ saṃśayasya sāmagrīniveśikāraṇabhedena tu pañcavidhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6316: upalabdhapūrvāyāṃ vyaktau saṃśaye tadgatā viśeṣāḥ susmūrṣitāḥ tajjātīyavyaktyantarasaṃśaye tvanyagatāste sāmānyadvāreṇopalabdhā eveti---sāmānyapratyakṣāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:6325: bauddhānāṃ hi rāddhānte na rūpādidharmāśrayaḥ kaścidasti dharmī /
GSP29nystik_u:6327: yadi tvāha bhavatu rāddhāntavyākopo na hi śāstrāśrayo vāda iti,
GSP29nystik_u:6335: sāmānyaviśeṣatadvadabhyupagame 'pi tadvato 'śravaṇāt sādharmyasya sāmānyasya viśeṣā iti gamyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:6336: na ca sāmānyasya viśeṣā iti viruddhārthamabhidhānaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6341: tadevaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamekaṃ, trīṇi ca viśeṣalakṣaṇānīti sthitam //
GSP29nystik_u:6343: yadi tāvat saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇe sthite trīṇi viśeṣalakṣaṇāni tataḥ saṃśayatvenopagṛhītānāṃ trayāṇāṃ parasparavyavacchedakamātraṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6347: tathā cānyānyapi saṃśayakāraṇāni santīti tānyapi vaktavyāni /
GSP29nystik_u:6350: so 'yamasyātmanaḥ sannikarṣajanmā saṃśayaḥ āntarasya śamāderviṣayasyeti samādhatte---astu tāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:6353: tathā ca pratipattigauravaṃ syāditi tallāghavāya śeṣāpekṣā yuktā /
GSP29nystik_u:6357: vipratipanno 'pi puruṣaḥ saṃdigdhavat pratipādya evati manvānaścodayati---saṃśayavaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:6359: kiṃ tu jalpavitaṇḍābhyāṃ śiṣyato nītvā sandigdha eva pratipādya ityabhiprāyeṇa pariharati---satyamiti //23 //
GSP29nystik_u:6363: tatra mukhyaṃ sukhaduḥkhāpitaparihārau, gauṇaṃ tu tatsādhanam /
GSP29nystik_u:6367: na ca sukhaduḥkhaprāptiparihārau svarūpeṇa pravṛtti nivṛttigocarāviti tadupāyapravṛttyaiva cetanapravṛttigocarāviti darśayati---tadāptihānopāyamanutiṣṭhatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6373: tat kuto na virodha ityata āha---vyavasāyo 'rthasyādhikāra ityādi /
GSP29nystik_u:6388: yathā ca pramāṇasya pramāṇopapannatā na cānavasthā, tathā dvitīye nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:6389: na ca prasiddhataratayā na prayojanaṃ lakṣaṇīyam iti yuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:6399: yadapyuktaṃ nyāyasyāṅgaṃ prayojanaṃ na bhavati, tasmāt na vaktavyamiti, tanna yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6400: yā khalu niṣprayojaneti na brūmaḥ prayojanaṃ nyāyasyāṅgamityapi,
GSP29nystik_u:6401: mukhyaṃ prayojanameva hi tanna syād yadṛte puruṣādanyārthamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6402: prayojanavāṃstu nyāyo niṣprayojanāṃ tadgatāṃ cintāmaṅgī karoti,
GSP29nystik_u:6404: tasmādanaṅgamapi prayojanaṃ parīkṣāyā mūlaṃ svarga iva setikartavyatākasya yāgādyanuṣṭhānasyeti siddham //24 //
GSP29nystik_u:6406: NyS_1,1.25: laukikaparīkṣadāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6407: kramaprāptaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ lakṣayati---lauki---ntaḥ//25// dṛṣṭānta iti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ, śeṣaṃ lakṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:6414: tadviparītāḥ tadubhayaṃsapannāśca parīkṣakāḥ pratipādakā iti yāvat kathābahutvācca bahuvayanam /
GSP29nystik_u:6415: tadanena vādiprativādinau darśitau, tayorbuddhisāmyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---yathā yamarthamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6420: lakṣitaśca dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇalakṣaṇāya kalpate ghaṭate iti bhāṣyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6426: na khalvasiddhaḥ sādhyena sādhanasyāvinābhāvo dṛṣṭāntena sādhyate ityarthaḥ//25 //
GSP29nystik_u:6429: atra bhāṣyakāraḥ siddhāntasāmānyalakṣaṇamapaṭhitvaiva tātparyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---atha siddhāntaḥ ityādinā /
GSP29nystik_u:6430: tatra idamitthaṃbhūtamiti vārttikakāro vyācaṣṭe---idamiti sāmānyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6431: bhāṣye ca saṃsthitiritthaṃbhāvavyastheti sāmānyopakramasya abhyupagamasya pramāṇato viśeṣaparyantatāparisamāptiḥ saṃsthitirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6435: sāmānyalakṣaṇārtham, na khalu sāmānyalakṣaṇamantareṇa śakyo vibhāga ityuktam//26 //
GSP29nystik_u:6441: tadevādhikaraṇam āśrayo jñāpakatvena yeṣāmarthānāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6443: ābhimānikaṃ ca prāmāṇikatvam, tena siddhāntabhedināmarthānāṃ sarveṣāṃ na prāmāṇikatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6450: sākṣācchāstre nopātto yathā manasa indriyabhāva iti //27 //
GSP29nystik_u:6458: na caivaṃ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ, tasya sarvaireva niścitatvāditi, anumānāgamayoriti /
GSP29nystik_u:6459: saṃbandhagrahaṇāśrayāvanumānāgamau, yatra ca saṃbandhagrahaḥ sa dṛṣṭānta ityarthaḥ //28 //
GSP29nystik_u:6464: naiyāyikānāṃ hi samānaṃ tantraṃ nyāyaśāstram, paratantraṃ ca sāṃkhyādiśāstram /
GSP29nystik_u:6465: cetanā ātmanaḥ niratiśayā apariṇāmino na kenacid dharmeṇopajanāpāyadharmeṇa yujyante /
GSP29nystik_u:6466: prākṛteṣu ca dehādiṣu tatkāraṇeṣu mahadahaṅkārapañcatanmātrabhūtasūkṣmeṣu viśeṣo 'tiśaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6471: yat---ntaḥ//30// yasyārthasya sādhyasya vā hetorvā siddhau iti viṣayasaptamī,
GSP29nystik_u:6476: sa pakṣo vā bhavatu heturvā anena rūpeṇa adhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6478: atra hi pṛthivyādigatenotpattimattena upalabdhimatpūrvakatvaṃ tadgataṃ sādhyamānaṃ svasiddhyantargatānuṣaṅgisarvajñatvādyupetameva sidhyati,
GSP29nystik_u:6483: pūrvo 'rtho yaḥ sākṣāddhikṛtaḥ tasya siddhāvantargata iti bhāṣyārthaḥ//30 //
GSP29nystik_u:6494: evaṃ svamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya bhāṣyakāravyākhyānaṃ dūṣayati---śāstrānabhyupagata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6497: na ca pramāṇānadhīnābhyupagamastadanvetīti nāyamīdṛśo 'bhyupagamasiddhānto bhavitumarhatīti hṛdi nidhāyāyuktāpi darśitā /
GSP29nystik_u:6498: ajñaṃ pratyasadācāratvāt pramāṇikaṃ ca puruṣaṃ pratyaśakyatvāt buddhimato 'vajñānasyāyuktatvāt aśakyatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6503: tarhi siddhāntabhedināmarthānāṃ prāmāṇikatvena viruddhadharmasamāliṅgitā bhāvāḥ prasajyerannityata āha---tatpratyayāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6507: karmatayā vyajyamānatayā vā upādānaṃ svārthasya pakṣa iti padam /
GSP29nystik_u:6510: kriyāviśeṣayukta iti avāntaravyāpārayukte tena hi pradhānakriyāyāṃ kārakāṇāṃ vaicitryaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6514: na ca dharmiṇi anabhyupagate tadāśrayo 'bhyupagato bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6517: yathā daṇḍiśabdena daṇḍasaṃbandhopahitasīmānaḥ samānāsamānajātīyāḥ sarve saṃgṛhyante,
GSP29nystik_u:6518: tathā pakṣaśabdenāpītyarthaḥ ayaṃ tu kalpaḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntāvyāpakatvakathanenaivārthādapākṛta iti na pṛthak nirākṛtaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6520: na ca vyajyamānatvamasti nisargavyakte sarvatantrasiddhānta iti bhāva /
GSP29nystik_u:6522: pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte iti vākyasya divābhojananiṣedho 'rthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6524: sā ca na yathā pramāṇāntarulaṃ tathā dvitīye nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:6532: anyaparādapi vākyāt pratīyamāno 'rtho 'pekṣita svīkriyata eveti śābdāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6536: tasmāt tathāvidhārthapratyāyanameva pratijñādīnāmavayavasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ siddhamiti sūtramityanena darśitaṃ vārttikakṛtā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6542: tasya pravarttikā utpādikā jijñāsā pratyayasādhanānusaraṇadvāreṇa pratyāsattiḥ saṃśayatattvajñānayorviśeṣagatā na tu svarūpagatā,
GSP29nystik_u:6551: yadi śabdo nityaḥ syāt, na syāt kṛtaka iti anityatvasya nityatvaṃ pratipakṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6556: vyudasyate hi tena pramāṇābhyanujñānadvāreṇa itikartavyatābhūtena saṃśaṃya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6557: tadetad bhāṣyajātaṃ praśnapūrvakaṃ vārttikakṛd vyācaṣṭe---kathaṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:6559: atha mā bhūvan parapratipādakāḥ, svapratipādakā eva kasmāt na bhavantītyata āha---niścitatvācceti /
GSP29nystik_u:6560: sādhanādeva gamyate prāpyate, prāptaṃ ca jñāyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6562: tat kiṃ sarvathaivānaṅgaṃ jijñāsādaya ityata uktaṃ bhāṣyakatā,
GSP29nystik_u:6567: te ca jijñāsādaya utpannāḥ prakaraṇasyotthāpakāḥ svarūpeṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:6568: na punaḥ svajñānena yena śabdapratipādyāḥ santaḥ prakaraṇe 'pyaṅgaṃ bhaveyuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6582: sa ca parvate 'gnimati sādhyamāne viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhalakṣaṇo niyamo 'rthāt sidhyati /
GSP29nystik_u:6583: na tu sākṣādayogavyavaccheda eva sādhyaḥ, liṅgasyānyāpohaviṣayatvānabhyupagamāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6585: atrānyayogavyavacchedaṃ vākyārthaṃ manvāno bhadantaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇamativyāptyavyāptibhyām ākṣipati---ubhayeti /
GSP29nystik_u:6586: ubhayoravadhāraṇayoḥ prāptau saṃśayena kimidamavadhāryate kiṃ cedamiti prasaktāvityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6588: yata evakaraṇaṃ na tato 'nyatrāvadhāraṇam iti hi śābdā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6594: yathendriyārthasannikarṣotpannamityukte jñānaṃ sukhādi ca sāmanyena prāptam /
GSP29nystik_u:6599: tat kri loke na kpacidavadhāraṇam ityata āha---yatra ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:6606: tasya nivṛttiḥ sādhyaśabdādavagamyate, na tu prajñāpanīyo 'rtha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6615: prajñāpanīyena dharmaiṇa dharmiṇo viśiṣṭasya parigrahavacanam iti sūtrārthaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6620: ito 'pi nāsiddhayorhetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅga ityāha---sādhyanirdeśa iti ca pratijñāyāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6622: na ca cākṣuṣatvādiṣu pramāṇamūlatā, tadabhimāno 'pi bādhakādapākṛta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6623: nanu yadi sarvatantrasiddhāntātiriktānāṃ siddhāntāntarāṇāṃ sādhyatvaṃ tarhi sādhyenaiva caritārthatvād apārthakaṃ pṛthagabhidhānameteṣāmiti,
GSP29nystik_u:6627: dhibhāgasūtreṇa prakaraṇotthānahetavo vākyāvayavatayā nirākāryatvena jijñāsādayo buddhisthīkṛtāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6629: na ca cākṣuṣatvādiṣu pramāṇabādhiteṣu santi ta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6632: evaṃ tāvad vyutpattyādyālocanayā sādhyaśabdasya na hetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6635: anyatarāsiddhayorhetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅgo mā bhūditi karmatayā te upādīyanta ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6643: tathā ca na sākṣāt tatpratyāyanāya te vibhavantīti tadarthaṃ sādhane vyāpriyante /
GSP29nystik_u:6644: tena siṣādhayiṣitadharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī teṣāṃ pradhānaṃ viṣayaśca /
GSP29nystik_u:6645: pradhānaṃ ca prathamaṃ buddhau viparivartate iti sādhyaśabdena sa evocyate,
GSP29nystik_u:6647: tadevamaduṣṭamasmallakṣaṇamiti yadasmallakṣaṇamanena doṣeṇa bhaṅktvā bhadantena anyathā lakṣaṇaṃ praṇītam,
GSP29nystik_u:6649: nanu yatra sādhyapadam asti bhavatu tatreṣṭagrahaṇamanarthakam,
GSP29nystik_u:6653: tadapi hi pacyamānaṃ vyajyamānaṃ sādhyamevāha---tacca karma,
GSP29nystik_u:6655: codayati---athāpyaniṣṭeti, nanvaniṣṭaḥ pakṣa iti vipratiṣiddhamityata uktam---arthataḥ kileti /
GSP29nystik_u:6662: no khalu mahatī pradīpe ghaṭo mahān alpe vā alpa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6663: mahati tu kāraṇe mahān śabda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6664: tasmāt kāraṇato vikārāt kāryaḥ śabdaḥ, yathā mahadbhiḥ sthūlapiṇḍairārabdho 'vayavī mahāniti /
GSP29nystik_u:6665: tadanena pratyayabhedabheditvaṃ heturupalakṣito bhavati, ādiśabdena ca sataḥ śabdasya
GSP29nystik_u:6670: yadyapyāgamo 'pi śabdānityatve 'sti yathā somaṃ rājānamasṛjata tatastreyo vedā asṛjyanta //
GSP29nystik_u:6672: tathāpi nāsadāsīnno sadāsīdāmnāya eva khalvayamagra āsīt //
GSP29nystik_u:6675: prasiddhivirodhaṃ tu na budhyamāhe pramāṇavirodhād bhedena /
GSP29nystik_u:6682: asmākaṃ tu mānasapratyakṣavirodha iti sarvathā na pramāṇādanyā prasiddhiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:6685: vastu hi yādṛśaṃ svakāraṇādutpannaṃ tādṛśameva tat /
GSP29nystik_u:6686: na tasyānyathābhāva iti na tatra doṣo niviśate /
GSP29nystik_u:6688: yā punaḥ ṣauruṣeyī dṛṣṭamanyatrārthamanyatra samāropya bhrāntyā vā paravipralambhāya vā pratijñādirūpeṇa vākyakriyā,
GSP29nystik_u:6690: taddvāreṇa puruṣo nigṛhyate, nārtho na padānīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6691: svārthāpavādaḥ svavacanavirodhaḥ kartṛdoṣo bhramo vā vipralambho vā kriyāyāmupacaryate /
GSP29nystik_u:6692: na ca kriyāyāṃ bhramo vā vipralambho vā,
GSP29nystik_u:6693: tayorabhiprāyabhedatayā puruṣadharmatvāt kriyāyā vastubādhanāt puruṣābhiprāyāvagatiriti kriyādvāreṇetyuktam //
GSP29nystik_u:6698: sa triṣu rūpeṣvanyatamena rūpeṇa rahito nyūno 'siddho vā viruddho vā anaikāntiko vā bhavatīti so 'yaṃ nyūnatādoṣo hetoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6704: sa hi vādino vā prativādino vābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6707: pratijñāgatā hi doṣā yadi tadgatatvena udbhāvyamānā na vādino nigrahamāpādayeyuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6709: pārayanti tu pratijñāgatāni dūṣaṇāni nigrahituṃ vādinamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6711: kasmāt punarmañcasthā ityevaṃ na prayu/jate ityata uktam---laukikaprayuktavākyānvākhyānam /
GSP29nystik_u:6714: iṣṭagrahaṇamanakṣarārūḍhamapyabhiprāyavyāptaṃ sādhyaṃ tathā syādityevamarthaṃ yathā parārthāścakṣurādaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6716: na ca tanmātramasya sādhyam, api tvātmapārārthyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6717: tacca noccārayati mā bhūdananvayo hetuḥ saṃghātatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:6724: tātparyaṃ cāsya kvacid vācye kvacillakṣya iti sarva evāsau vacanārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6727: na ca kvacidapi pakṣaḥ pratijñāpadavācyaḥ, tasya vākyārthatvena lakṣyatvād eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:6732: tataśca saṃśayaviṣaya iṣyamāṇo jijñāsyamānaśca sādhya eva bhavati, na sādhanādirityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6742: ata evaṃ vaktavyaṃ pakṣo yaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6744: tathāpi tumunā ya eva sādhayitā vādī sa evaiṣitetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6745: na punarvādino niyoktā sādhayitā vādī caiṣiteti /
GSP29nystik_u:6750: sa hi sidhyantaṃ sādhyaṃ vādī tasminniyaṃ sādhanā samavetā /
GSP29nystik_u:6751: yastu tasyāpi prayojakastṛtīyasthānapatito na tasmin sādhanā samavaitīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6752: yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeveti kathañcidasya bhaktyā kartṛtvam,
GSP29nystik_u:6757: yastāvat śāstrāviruddho 'rthaḥ pramāṇasiddhaḥ sa śāstrīya eva śāstrābhyupetapramāṇasiddhatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:6759: yastu pramāṇīkṛtavaiśaṣikatantraḥ śabdanityatvaṃ sādhayati so 'navadheyavacanaḥ na hetvabhidhānaṃ yāvat pariṣatprativādibhyāṃ nīyate,
GSP29nystik_u:6761: yastu vaiśeṣikatantrādhyayanamātrād vaiśeṣikatvamātmano darśayitvā śabdanityatāṃ pratijānīte nāsau pramāṇīkṛtavaiśeṣikatantra iti na nigṛhyate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6771: tathā hi parapratyāyanāya vacanam uccārayanti prekṣāvantaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6772: tadeva ca pare bodhayitavyā yad bubhutsante /
GSP29nystik_u:6774: no khalvāmrān pṛṣṭaḥ kovidārānācakṣāṇaḥ praṣṭuravadheyavacano bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6776: yathā ca māṭhara samidhamāhareti guruṇā preṣita eṣohamāharāmītyanuktvā tadarthaṃ tadaryaṃ yadāyaṃ dātrāya gṛhaṃ praviśati,
GSP29nystik_u:6777: tadāsmai kupyati guraḥ āḥ śiṣyāpasada chāndasavacara māṭhara māmavadhīrayasīti bruvāṇaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6778: evamanityaṃ śabdaṃ bubhutsamānāyānityaḥ śabda ityanuktvā yadeva kiściducyate kṛtakatvāditi vā,
GSP29nystik_u:6780: kṛtakaśca śabda iti vā tat sarvamasyānapekṣitam āpātato 'saṃbaddhābhidhānabuddhyā,
GSP29nystik_u:6782: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvamanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6787: na ca pariṣatprativādinau pramāṇīkṛtavādinau yadetad vacanaṃ saṃbandhāya pratīkṣete,
GSP29nystik_u:6790: anityaḥ śabda iti tvapekṣita ukte kuta ityapekṣāyāṃ kṛtakatvāditi heturupa tiṣṭhate /
GSP29nystik_u:6791: so 'yaṃ pañcāvayavaprayoge ca tallakṣaṇe ca pratijñānantarakāla evāvasaro hetoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6795: sa ca vibhāgoddeśe vākyāvayava iti vacanarūpaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6796: tasya sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyasādhanamiti sādhyate 'neneti vyutpattyā yadyapi pārārthyāpannaṃ kṛtakatvādikamartham āha,
GSP29nystik_u:6798: yadi ca vacanaṃ heturityucyeta tatsādhyena samabhivyāhṛtaṃ pratijñā syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6802: kiṃ tu prātipadikārthapradhānatayā svaniṣṭhamiti na tatrāpi prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6808: heturiti yadyapi sāmānyapadam, tathāpi prakaraṇādanvayavyatirekihetuviśeṣaparaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6814: sādhyasyeti dharmimātre buddhirmā bhūdityata uktaṃ dharmasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:6821: yo dharmo dhūmādi---sādhye bhavati sa tathābhūta evodāharaṇe 'pīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6822: udāhniyata ityudāharaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmī tasmin na punaḥ sa eva /
GSP29nystik_u:6824: yadi tarhi nānyasya dharmo 'nyatra vartate, kathaṃ tarhi samānatā?
GSP29nystik_u:6825: sā hi tattvānyatvavirodhinītyata āha---kiṃ tu tattulyaḥ sa evetyucyate,
GSP29nystik_u:6826: yathā tāneva śalīn upayuṅkte tāneva tittirīnīti tadanena sāmānyād iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam //
GSP29nystik_u:6828: sādharmyamātratvaṃ hi viruddhe cāsādhāraṇe savyabhicāre cāstīti teṣāmapi vacanaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6830: nanu tathāpi savyabhicāre 'pyudāraṇasādharmyamiti kathaṃ nivartyate ityata āha---udāharaṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:6833: sādharmyādityato viśeṣeṇa sarvasādharmyaprāptau udāharaṇasādharmyamapi prāptameveti vidhānānarthakyaṃ parisaṃkhyāyakaṃ sadavadhāraṇārthameva bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6834: tadavadyotanāya ca evakāraḥ sādharmyameva ityatra sādhyapadaṃ yojanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6839: sādhyaṃ khalvatra prakṛtaṃ pradhānam, taduddeśena avayavānāṃ pravṛtteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6840: sādhyasādhanamiti ca padena sannidhāpitamiti tadeva dvitīyam avadhāraṇaṃ sphuṭīkaroti---atrāpi ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:6849: etat kila hetulakṣaṇa bhadanto dūṣayāṃbabhūva sādhanaṃ yadi sārdhmyaṃ na vākyāṃśaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6851: yadi sādhanasādharmyayoratyantābhedo yadi vā sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena kathañcid bhedaḥ ubhayathāpi na pañcamī,
GSP29nystik_u:6857: na hi vākyamevārthādutthitam, api tu vivakṣādyapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6861: na tatrāpi dvidhā doṣāt sākṣād vā sādhanaṃ pāramparyeṇa vā?
GSP29nystik_u:6863: vaktṛjñānaṃ tarhi sākṣāt sādharmyasamutthaṃ pāramparyeṇa ca śrotuḥ sādhyavijñānasādhanaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6864: atha sākṣāt sādhanam, tarhi śrotṛjñānaṃ pāramparyeṇa sādharmyasamutthaṃ sākṣāt sādhanaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6874: yadi punararthātmakasya sādharmyasyārthātmakameva sādhanaṃ sāmānyamucyate, tatrāha---atha punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:6880: yadā hi sādhyasādhanaṃ nāmodāharaṇasādharmyādatiriktaṃ nāsti kiṃ tu śabdamātramavaśiṣyate,
GSP29nystik_u:6882: tathā ca sādhyanirdeśaḥ pratijñā ityanena virodhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6889: tadetallakṣaṇaṃ vyācakṣāṇairasmābhiḥ parihṛtamiti na parihārāntaraṃ prayojayatītyāha---tatra tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:6890: uktaṃ yathā hetupadasannidhau sādhanapadaṃ hetupade pravartate,
GSP29nystik_u:6894: sādharmyasya liṅsya kṛtakatvādihetupadavācyasya vyabhicāritvādiyogādudāharaṇaviśeṣaṇayogo na punaḥ sādhyasādhanapadavācyasya kṛtakatvādityāderhetuvacanasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6904: tathā prātisvikamapi bhedaṃ sarveṣāmeva śabdānāmitikaraṇo darśayatītyāha---dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:6907: anabhyupagato 'rthāntaraṃ vipakṣo yasya hetoranityatve sādhye kṛtakatvādeḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6908: yadabhyupagataṃ bhadantena tasmāt ṣaṣṭyastviti tad dūṣayati---yadapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6911: na tu ṣaṣṭhī vā hetupañcamī vā kārakavibhaktiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:6912: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa śuddhaṃ hetuvacanamudāhṛtam---utpattidharmakatvāditi tasya codāharaṇasādharmyasamutthatvajñāpanāyodāharaṇamapi darśitam utpattidharmakamanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:6916: sato vināśo vā anityatvam, tadyogo vā?
GSP29nystik_u:6917: taccebhayamayuktam, na hi sadasatoḥ kaścidasti saṃbandhaḥ, asamānakālatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6918: tataścānityaḥ śabda iti samānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6919: api ca śabdasya bhūtvā yadabhavanam, na tadeva piṭharasya /
GSP29nystik_u:6920: na hyabhavanatvaṃ nāmāsti sāmānyam, yena dṛṣṭānto na sādhyavikalaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6921: na ca sāmānyātiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vastvantaraṃ dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ vā /
GSP29nystik_u:6926: aparānteti vaktavye ubhayāntagrahaṇena pūrvāntaniveśanaṃ hetorutpattimattvasyātyantiṅkīṃ pratyāsattimavinābhāvopayoginīṃ darśayitumiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6928: taccāparāntasya bhinnakālasya saṃbaddhasyāpi virodhitayā buddhisthasya saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6929: tathā ca yaivāparāntāvacchinnasya sattā piṭharasya saivāparāntāvacchinnasya śabdasyāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:6940: tenāsadviśeṣaṇasya sata ityetāvataiva pūrvāntaparicchinnasya sattāsaṃbandhaḥ sattā vā tadviśeṣaṇotpattirdarśitā /
GSP29nystik_u:6944: na caivaṃ labdhotpattini vastuni utpadyata iti pratyayaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6946: tasmāt pūrvāntāvacchinnavastusattayā tatsaṃbandhena vā tasyaiva vastuno 'parāntāvacchinnā sattā vā tatsaṃbandho vā jñāpyate iti sarvaṃ ramaṇīyam //
GSP29nystik_u:6947: nanu bhāṣyakṛd abhūtvā bhavatītyasya vākyāsyārthamutpattiṃ vakṣyati,
GSP29nystik_u:6949: ataḥ kuto na virodha ityata āha---vākyārtheti /
GSP29nystik_u:6953: api svasadviśeṣaṇasya sataḥ sattā vā tatsaṃbandho vetyuktamityarthaḥ//34 //
GSP29nystik_u:6957_1: yadā viṣāṇitvena sādhyate tasyāsti pakṣavaidharmyamiti hetuḥ syādityata āha---udāharaṇena vaidharmyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6959: tathāpi yadā śarīramātraṃ pakṣīkṛtya sātmakatvaṃ sādhyate prāmādimattvena,
GSP29nystik_u:6960: tadāsti tasyodāharaṇena vaidharmyamiti so 'pi hetuḥ syādityata āha---eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:6963: tathāpi anvayavyatirekiṇo hetāranaikāntikasya vipekṣaikadeśavyāpinaḥ saṃgrahaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6965: utpattidharmakatvād anityo mūrtatvādityata āha---vaidharmyameva codāharaṇeneti vipakṣodāharaṇenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6973: prāṇādinā ca svakāraṇaṃ prayatnecchādyupalakṣayati---yadubhayapakṣasaṃpratipannaṃ nirātmakaṃ ghaṭādi tatsarvamaprāṇādimad dṛṣṭam iti vyatyāsena yojanā /
GSP29nystik_u:6977: yaścāsau icchādisamavāyikāraṇaṃ pṛthivyādivilakṣaṇo dravyāṇāṃ navamaḥ, sa ātmetyucyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6978: anvayivyatirekiṇastadvivekasya ca tantrāntaraprasiddhena nāmnā tantrāntaraprasiddhatāṃ darśayati---so 'yamavīta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6986: gṛhītāvinābhāvo hi hetuḥ sādhyena tasya paricchedakaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6987: sa ca dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi hetusādhyadharmayordarśane satyavinābhāvo dṛṣṭo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6990: darśane vā nāvītaḥ kiṃ tu vīta evetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6999: atrāpi yāvannirātmakaṃ tat sarvam aprāṇādimad dṛṣṭamiti vyatyāsena yojanā,
GSP29nystik_u:7003: yadi punarevamucyate nivartatāmaprāmāṇādimattvaṃ jīvaccharīrāt prāṇādimattvasya pramāṇata upalabdhermā nivartiṣṭa nairātmyam, tasmād
GSP29nystik_u:7006: kiṃ jīvaccharīre sādhye nairātmyaniścayād vyabhicāra uta tatsandehāt?
GSP29nystik_u:7007: yadi niścayāt, kṛta vyabhicāreṇa, bādhitaviṣayatvenaiva hetorapākaraṇāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7008: atha sandehāt, tathā satyanvayino 'pyahetutve sarvānumānocchedaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7014_1: gṛhītvā jīvaccharīre vyāpakasyāprāṇādimattvasya nivṛttyā nairātmyasya vyāpyasya nivṛtterātmā avagantavyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7015_0: evaṃ ca sati kalpanākoṣasyāparimeyatvāt yad yadeva kalpyate tattadabhāvasyadhaṭādau
GSP29nystik_u:7021: akṣaṇikatve ca vyavasthite kāryaṃ samavāyikāraṇāpekṣamitīcchādīnāṃ samavāyikāraṇena bhavitavyam,
GSP29nystik_u:7023: śarīrendriyādīnāṃ ca samavāyikāraṇatvaniṣedhe sati yad icchādīnāṃ samavāyikāraṇaṃ pariśiṣyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7024: tad dravyamātmeti ca kṣetrajña iti ca jīva iti cākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7025: tadasya viśeṣato 'navagatasyāpīcchādisamavāyikāraṇatayā sāmānyarūpeṇāvadhāritasya śakyaḥ prāṇādirahiteṣu ghaṭādiṣvabhāvaḥ pratipattum /
GSP29nystik_u:7028: so 'yaṃ jīvaccharīre kāryasyābhāvo vyāpako nivartamānaḥ svavyāpyaṃ tatkāraṇābhāvamādāya nivartate iti siddhaṃ jīvaccharīre prāṇakāraṇam, sa cātmeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7029: yadi ca ḍitthādayo 'pi tādṛśāḥ, tadā ātmano nāmāntarāṇi nārthāntarāṇi /
GSP29nystik_u:7032: sa eva svabhāvo yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7036: ye 'pi hi nairātmyavādino buddhiṃ vā bhūtapatiṇāmabhedaṃ vā icchādikāraṇamācakṣate,
GSP29nystik_u:7040: so 'yaṃ jīvaccharīre kāryābhāvo vyāvartamānaḥ kāraṇābhāvaṃ vyāvartayati /
GSP29nystik_u:7041: na ca kāryeṇaiva kāraṇamanumīyatāṃ jīvaccharīre, kiṃ vyatirekiṇā,
GSP29nystik_u:7042: ṛjumārgeṇa sidhyantaṃ ko nu vakreṇa sādhayet
GSP29nystik_u:7044: pariśeṣād viśeṣasiddhiriti cet? sa eva vyatirekītyuktam //
GSP29nystik_u:7045: yadi hi pṛthivyādisamavāyikāraṇā icchādayo bhaveyuḥ, ghaṭādiṣvapi prasajyeran /
GSP29nystik_u:7047: na caiṣāṃ buddhireva samavāyikāraṇam, dravyasyaiva samavāyikāraṇatvaniyamād buddheścādravyatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7048: yathā ca bhūtānāṃ pariṇatibhedo na kāraṇaṃ tathā hi tṛtīye upapādayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7049: vyatirekamukhenāpi prāmādeḥ sātmakatvenānvayasiddhau na kevalavyatirekīti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:7051: kiṃ tu sapakṣābhāvena vidhimukhenāsya pratibandhaṃ nirākurmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7053: na ca pakṣa eva sapakṣaḥ, jijñāsitaviśeṣasya jñātaviśeṣādanyatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7054: śarīrādiṣu ca satsu nairātmyaniṣedha evātmasadbhāvaḥ, asanniṣedhasya sadbhāvalakṣaṇatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7055: sapakṣābhāvastu nairātmyenāpyavyapadeśya iti kathaṃ nairātmyaniṣedhena vyapadiśyatām?
GSP29nystik_u:7063: vipakṣavyatirekamātreṇa vyatirekiṇo gamakatvaṃ matvā codayati---yadi tarhīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7067: nanu mā bhūd gandhavattvaṃ heturvyatireka vyabhicārād anityādivannityādapyasya vyatirekāt,
GSP29nystik_u:7068: tasya tu pakṣa eva kevalaṃ na tu sapakṣavipakṣau,
GSP29nystik_u:7069: na tasaya vyatirekavyabhicāro 'stīti sa kasmāt na heturiti codayati---yaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:7075: yadi hi pakṣaikadeśavṛttirapi vipakṣābhāvāt na vyatirekī hetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7076: tarhi tasya pakṣaikadeśavṛtterapi sato vipakṣanivṛttirasti sa hetuḥ prasajyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:7080: atra ca yena pakṣaikadeśavṛttervyatirekyābhāsasya nirākaraṇaṃ tadavadhāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:7082: asya tu pakṣeṇāpīti vyatirekyapi na hetuḥ, na punarvaidharmyameveti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7083: tathā sati savyabhicāramātrasya nivṛttiḥ syāt, na tu pakṣaikadeśavṛtterityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7089: yadā tu sapakṣādisādharmyanirākaraṇam, tadā aniṣṭasya viruddhādeḥ saṃgrahaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7096: tatra pūrvayoḥ prakārayoryathākramamasādhāraṇasya cāsiddhasya ca hetutvaprasaṅga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7100: sa cāyaṃ viśeṣe cāviśeṣe ca prasṛta iti vipakṣekadeśavṛtterapi pakṣasapakṣasādhāraṇasya hetutvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7105: viśeṣa evetyavadhāraṇena vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ gaurayaṃ viṣāṇitvāditi hetutvena pratiṣiddhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7107: tathā ca vipakṣādeva yo viśeṣa eva sa hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7108: sapakṣāttu yo viśeṣa eva sa na heturityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7109: yathā ca aśvo 'yaṃ viṣāṇitvāt iti sapakṣād viśeṣa eveti hetutvena pratiṣiddho bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7110: yastu sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ prayatnanāntarīyakatvādiḥ sa sapakṣād viśeṣa eva na bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:7114: yadi sapakṣādapi yo viśeṣaḥ sa sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvādirhetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7115: evaṃ sati vipakṣādeveti avadhāraṇaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7117: na vipakṣādevetyetanmātramavadhāryate yena sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ prayatnāntarīyakatvādinarna hetuḥ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:7118: api tu yo viśeṣa eva sa heturiti prāpte vipakṣādeveti niyamyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7119: tena sāvadhāraṇasya viśeṣasya vipakṣavṛtterhetutvaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati yathā aśvo 'yaṃ viṣāṇītvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7120: yaḥ punarviśeṣaścāviśeṣaśca sapakṣe hetuḥ, tasya hetutve 'pi na vipakṣādeveti bādhitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7121: yadyapi caivaṃ satyapi sapakṣaikadeśavṛtterhetutvaṃ na śrutam,
GSP29nystik_u:7128: pakṣadharmatve sati viśeṣa eva vipakṣādeveti niyame kutaḥ pakṣaikadeśavṛtteḥ prāptiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7140: atyantāyogo niṣiddho bhavati, na tvayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7148: heturvipakṣād viśeṣa iti ca yadā sautrāntikapakṣamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7149: yadā tvanityatvahetau lakṣye lakṣaṇaṃ vicāryate iti vipakṣaśabdārtho vācyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7150: nanu ca nityo vipakṣa ityata āha---na hyasatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7152: na cāsyāpādānatvaṃ nāpyadhikaraṇatvaṃ yena pañcamī vā saptamī vā prayujyeteti āha---na cāsatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7153: na cāsato vipakṣād vyāvṛttyabhāvena viśeṣo 'pītyāha---vipakṣāsaṃbhave ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7156: pakṣasyaiva dharma iti hetulakṣaṇe asādhāraṇa eva hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7157: samāna eva siddha iti tu hetulakṣaṇe aśvasya viṣāṇitve sādhye gotvādirhetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7159: tathā ca pakṣasya dharmaḥ samāne ca siddhaḥ ityatra savyabhicāro hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7160: pakṣasya dharmo vipakṣe ca nāstītyatrāsādhāraṇo hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7161: samāne ca siddho vipakṣe ca nāstītyatra anityaḥ paramāṇuḥ kṛtakatvāditi hetuḥ syāditi trayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7164: atra dignāgena sapakṣe sannasan dvedhā pakṣadharmaḥ punastridhā /
GSP29nystik_u:7166: iti nava pakṣadharmān hetutadābhāsān darśayitvā tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvedhā cāsaṃstadatyaye /
GSP29nystik_u:7170: yaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ sa sapakṣe san asan dvedhā iti trividhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7171: sa punarasapakṣe sadasaddvividhatvataḥ pratyekaṃ tridhā bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7182: tadeteṣu hetutadābhāseṣu heturnirdhārito yena tadupanyasya vārttikakāro vyācaṣṭe---tatra ya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7184: tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvedhā cāsaṃstadatyaye ityetāvanmātrāt na labhyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7189: na punaḥ pakṣadharma evetyarthaḥ, avadhāraṇam abuddhvā śaṅkate---athāpīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7196: hetuhetvābhāsāveva pakṣadharmau nānya iti niyamajñāpanārthamavadhāraṇamiṣṭaṃ bhavadbhirityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7202: san sajātīya iti nopādātavyamiti yaduktam, tatra śaṅkate---atha manyeteti /
GSP29nystik_u:7204: yadyavadhāraṇaṃ yujyeta avadhāraṇārtho yukta ārambhaḥ syāt, tadeva tvayuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7206: pakṣasya dharma eva ityetasmin pada ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7211: sajātīye dvedhā ceti padopādāne cānupādāne cetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7212: sajātīya eva dvidhetyanenaiveti hetutadābhāsayorautsargike pakṣadharmatve sthita ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7213: śaṅkate---atha mā bhūditi sajātīya eva dvidheti nāvadhāraṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7220: yadi ca tadatyaya eveti nāvadhāryeta tato 'naikāntiko 'pi hetuḥ syāditi doṣaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7222: tadaṃśena tasyaiva pakṣasyāṃśena sādhyadharmasāmānyena, vyāpto heturiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7226: tadaṃśena vyāpta ityasya vivaraṇālocanena sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣācca vyāvṛttirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7237: yastu tādṛśavinābhāvīti vipakṣe sattāpratiṣedhāt sapakṣe sattvaṃ gamyate eva,
GSP29nystik_u:7244: vauddhānāṃ rūpatvādijāternityāyā abhāvād na cākṣuṣatvamanityatvena vinā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7246: tathā copadarśanapadena pakṣe hetoḥ sattopadarśanaṃ bhavatīti taṃ pratyupetyāha---upetya veti /
GSP29nystik_u:7250: prayatnanāntarīyakatvaṃ prayatnakāraṇakatvaṃ tat sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā?
GSP29nystik_u:7256: na hi boddharāddhānte kiścidupalabhyamānaṃ nityamasti, yenopalabdhirviśeṣyeta ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7258: yat tāvadupalabdhikarma tatsarvaṃ prayatnādeva puruṣavyāpādādevopalabhyate nānyathetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7268: pāramparyeṇāpi prathama eva varṇaḥ prayatnānantarīyakaḥ, na dvitīyādayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7269: atipāramparyāśrayaṇe tvatiprasaṅgaḥ, prāyeṇa tasya tatra tatra sulabhatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7274: na hi bhavatāmasmākamiva viśeṣātiriktamasti sāmānyaṃ vastu sad yo hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7275: na ca kalpanāropitaṃ hetuḥ samyagjñānasya bhavitumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:7283: yasya tu janmaiva nāsti tasya tadviśeṣaṇaṃ dūrotsāritamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7286: tasyāpi hi prāgasataḥ savakāraṇena samavāya iti janma nāstīti na tadviśeṣaṇayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7293: dṛṣṭānto 'rtharūpo nodāharaṇasya vacanātmakasya svarūpato lakṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7294: tasmāt svābhidhāyakavacanopalakṣakatvena lakṣaṇatvaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca bhajata ityabhisandhinoktam---udāharaṇopalakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7295: anena ca samānajātīyebhyaḥ pratijñādibhyaḥ asamānajātīyebhyaśca pramāṇādibhya udāharaṇaṃ vyavacchinnaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7297: tasyārthaḥ, sādhyena dharmiṇā śabdena, sādharmyaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya sthālyādeḥ, kṛtakatvaṃ hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7298: kaddhyanityatvena sādhye ca śabde dṛṣṭānte ca sthālpādau samānam /
GSP29nystik_u:7300: taddharmabhāvī tasyaiva sādhyasya śabdasya yo dharmo dharmāntaram,
GSP29nystik_u:7306: tatra vārttikakāraḥ sūtrapadaṃ vyācakṣāṇa eva phalato bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---sādhyeti /
