GSP29nystik_u:7313: yasmāt sādhyasādharmyāt saddharmabhāvī bhavati, so 'yaṃ dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:7314: yāvad vākyaṃ na samāpyate, tāvadardhokta eva pṛcchati---kiṃ kutaściditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7315: avadhāraṇadvayayoginaḥ sādhyasādharmyād dṛṣṭānto 'vaśyameva taddharmabhāvī bhavatīti gatārthaṃ taddharmabhāvītyetaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7317: yathā nitye śabde sādhye amūrtatvādeḥ sādhyena śabdena karmaṇaḥ sādharmyāt karma na taddharmabhāvi bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:7322: atra ca sādhyasādharmyagrahaṇena sādhanavikalamanudāharaṇaṃ bhavatītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7328: pañcamyupādānena ca sādhyasādharmyaprayuktaṃ taddharmabhāvitvaṃ yatra vacane pradarśyate tadevodāharaṇaṃ nānyaditi darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7329: prayojakatvaṃ ca sādhyasādharmyasya hetoḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho vyāpyatvamiti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:7333: yo yo 'nityaḥ sa sarva utpattimān yathā ghaṭa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7334: samākhyānirvacanasāmarthyāt sāmānyalakṣaṇamapyanena sūcitamityāśayavatā bhāṣyakṛtā samākhyāyā niruktiḥ kṛtā /
GSP29nystik_u:7344: tadetad bhāṣyam anubhāṣya vyācaṣṭe---tasya dharma iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7345: tasya dharmastaddharma iti hi dharmasya saṃbandhitvena pṛthagvacanam /
GSP29nystik_u:7346: na ca dharma eva dharmasya, nāpi dharmāntaraṃ dharmasya, kiṃ tu dharmiṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7347: anena bhāṣyakārīyāmanupapattimuktvā vārttikakāraḥ svakīyāmapyāha---dharme ca sādhya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7356: vaidharmyodāharaṇasya lakṣaṇam---tadvi---tam //37// anuvṛttena pūrayitvā savyākhyānaṃ sūtraṃ paṭhati---sādhyavaidharmyādataddharmabhāvī ca dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7357: sātmakatayā sādhyena jīvaccharīreṇa vaidhamyād ghaṭāderdṛṣṭāntasya sātmakatvasādharmyavirahāditi yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:7358: yasya sādhyasya jīvaccharīrasya dharmaḥ prāṇādimattvaṃ taddharmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7361: na taddharmabhāvī ataddharmabhāvī, prāṇādirahito ghaṭādiriti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:7366: sūtrasthaśca vāśabdaḥ samucceye veditavyaḥ, vyatirekaviṣayatvād vaidharmyodāharaṇasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7370: tatra tatpūrvakatvād vaidharmyapratīteḥ ṛjumārgeṇa sidhyato 'rthasya vakreṇa sādhanāyogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7372: anyathā sapakṣaikadeśavartī na hetuḥ syāditi manyamāno vārtikakāra āha---udāharaṇamavītahetāviti /
GSP29nystik_u:7374: atra ācāryadeśīyāṇām anārṣasūtrapāṭhadūṣaṇaṃ nāsmākamārṣasūtrapāṭhe 'stiti pratipipādayiṣurācāryadeśīyānāṃ pāṭhamabhiprāyaṃ cāha---anye tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:7375: ārṣe hi pāṭhe sāmānādhikaraṇyād dṛṣṭāntasyārtharūpasya, śabdarūpeṇodāharaṇenaikyaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7376: yadā tu dṛṣṭāntasyodāharaṇamiti pāṭhaḥ, tadā nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7386: na ca jñāpanādanyā kriyā saṃbhavatīti gamakatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:7389: anye tu taddharmabhāvītyetad vikalpya dūṣayantītyāha---anye tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:7392: tasmāt na kiñcidetat taddharmaṃ bhāvayituṃ śīlamasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7396: tadidaṃ pareṣāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ daṇḍinyāyamālambya pariharati---na vaktavyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7400: sā ca bahuvrīhiṇai labhyata iti kṛtamatreninetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7401: suhṛdbhāvena ced, ata evāha---athāvaśyamiti prayojanāntaraṃ bhāvīgrahaṇasyānvācinoti---santīti //
GSP29nystik_u:7402: atra ca vasubandhunā pratijñādayastrayo 'vayavā durvihitā akṣapādalakṣaṇenetyuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:7404: tadevamudāharaṇalakṣaṇamupapādya pareṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasya vyācaṣṭe---yathā siddha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7405: yathā ca sa eva sādhyo viśiṣṭaḥ pratyayabhedabheditveneti,
GSP29nystik_u:7409: prāgabhāvo hi sthālyāḥ kṛtakatvaṃ pradhvaṃsābhāvaścānityatā rāddhānte bauddhānām /
GSP29nystik_u:7410: na caivamubhayaṃ sthālyāmasti, tasyāḥ svābhāvavirodhitvāditi dūṣayati---atra visphūrjatāpīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7414: asmadrāddhānte tu yathā tayoḥ sthālyādau saṃbhavaḥ tathoktaṃ hetulakṣaṇasūtra iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7417: NyS_1,1.38: udāharaṇāpekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7418_0: svapratipattau vyāptismaraṇānantaraṃ tathā cāyaṃ na tatheti vā parāmarśajñānotpādādudāharaṇavacanasya
GSP29nystik_u:7419: udāharaṇānantaramupanayaṃ lakṣayati---udā---yaḥ //38// apekṣāpadaṃ bhāṣyakṛd vyācaṣṭe---udāharaṇatantra iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7421: vaśyata iti vaśaḥ, vaśina udāharaṇasya vaśya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7422: etadeva karmaṇo bhāvaṃ niṣkṛṣya vivṛṇotti---vaśaḥ, sāmarthyam /
GSP29nystik_u:7426: tathā cānupapannaḥ sādhyasyopasaṃhāra ityata uktam---sādhyasya śabdasyotpattidharmakatvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7429: tathā na tatheti sāmānyalakṣaṇāpekṣe viśeṣalakṣaṇe iti bodhyavyam //
GSP29nystik_u:7430: atra kecit āhuḥ hetuvacanādeva sodāharaṇāt sādhyasiddherasādhanāṅgamupanaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7433: tadanena vyutpannāvyutpannatayā pareṣāmaniyatapratipattisādhanatvāt svapratipattyanusāreṇa pare bodhayitavyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7443: tathāpi tannāsiddhaṃ tatra sādhanatvena vyavatiṣṭhata iti svasiddhimākṣipati sāmarthyāditi bhāva /
GSP29nystik_u:7445: yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti śābdāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7448_0: asyāpi sādhanasāmarthyādākṣepāt avyāptasya sādhanatvāyogāt tadvidhasyāpi prameyatvādeḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7452: sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa dvividhānāmapi hetūdāharaṇopanayānāṃ samānaṃ nigamanalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7454: hetvapadeśāt taddhetukam anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāyā punarvacanam /
GSP29nystik_u:7458: tasyaiva nigamane siddhatvamityavasthāvantamekamāśritya samānaviṣayatayā nigamanaṃ pratijñetyupacaryate /
GSP29nystik_u:7463: atra prathamasūtravadeva yathāsvamavayaveṣu pramāṇānāṃ paramanyāyaṃ stotuṃ saṃbhavamāha---avayavasamudāye ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7467: nanu kasmāt pratijñaivāptopadeśo na bhavati, kṛtamasyā āgamāntaraviṣayatvenetyata āha---anṛṣeśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7474: sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratibandhaṃ saṃdṛśya samyag dṛṣṭvā liṅgasya pratīteḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7476: tathāpi tadekadeśe madhyame 'pi liṅgadarśane samudāyopacārādanumānavyapadeśa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7478: kasmāt? dṛṣṭena udāharaṇe pratibandhena adṛṣṭasya sādhyadharmiṇyanumeyasya siddheḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7479: yadi punarna mūlaṃ pratyakṣamāsthīyeta, avyavasthayā nādṛṣṭaṃ sidhyediti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7481: pratijñādīnāmupanayāntānāmeko 'rthaḥ svabhāvapratibaddhaṃ liṅgaṃ vā anumeyaṃ vā,
GSP29nystik_u:7491: taduttarakālaṃ hi sādhanākāṅkṣāyāṃ pratijñāmāśritya hetupadaṃ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:7497: avayavānāṃ prātisvikaṃ prayojanamuktamapi śiṣyahitatayā bhāṣyakāraḥ pratipādayati---atheti /
GSP29nystik_u:7500: vyavasthāpite tu na jāteravasara ityāha---vyavasthite hīti //
GSP29nystik_u:7503: tanmatam apākartuṃ vārttikakāraḥ saprayojanaṃ nigamanaṃ darśayati---pratijñāviṣayasyārthasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7504: caturbhiḥ khalvavayavairhetostrīṇi rūpāṇi dve vā pratipādite,
GSP29nystik_u:7506: pañcasaṃ vā caturṣu vā rūpeṣu hetoravinābhāvaḥ parisamāpyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7510: so 'yaṃ pratijñāviṣayārthasya aśeṣapramāṇamūlāvayavopapattau satyāṃ pratijñeyasyārthasya siddhatayā punarvacanena nigamanena pratiṣidhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7511: na ca pratijñāvacanādeva tatsiddhiḥ, tasya sādhyaparatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7515: yathā ca trairūpyātiriktametadrūpadvayaṃ tathopapāditam asmābhiḥ prathamasūtre /
GSP29nystik_u:7517: etasmin sūtrārthe parasya pratijñāyāṃ nigamanaṃ gatārthaṃ manyamānasya avakāśo nāstīti //
GSP29nystik_u:7518: yastu manyeta na hetoravinābhāvasiddhimantareṇa siddhanirdeśo nigamanaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:7534: sidhyatyekaprayojanatve sādhye hetoravirodhaḥ, hetustu na pratijñārthādatiticyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7539: yacca paraiḥ upanaye dūṣaṇaṃ vikalpyābhyadhāyi tat tāvadupanyasyati---yadapi yathā tatheti /
GSP29nystik_u:7540: sarvasāmānyayoge hi tadeva syāt, na tu tatheti /
GSP29nystik_u:7542: na hi yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtakaḥ, tathā śabdo 'pi kṛtakaḥ, ghaṭaśabdayorabhedaprasaṅgādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7543: tasmāt sāmānyapratiṣedhe viśeṣapratiṣedhe ca kṛtakatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ pariśiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7545: tathā ca na hetorvyatireka upanayaḥ syādityāha---pariśeṣāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7551: sādhye śabde sādhanasya kṛtakatvasya sthālīgatasya yaḥ sarvathābhāvaḥ sthālītvādyekārthasamavāyaḥ tamāśritya na pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:7552: tathā ca śabdasthālyoḥ abhedaprasaṅgād yathā tathetyeva na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7556: tathā ca na hetoratireka ityuktamityata āha---kṛtakatvasāmānyaṃ tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:7557: na hi jātu śāvaleyasannidhau gotvasāmānyamātraṃ bhavati, api tu viśeṣasahitam /
GSP29nystik_u:7559: etena yat parairupanayasya dṛṣṭāntādabhinnatvaṃ varṇitam, tadapi parāstamityāha---gatārthatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7562: vyāptipradarśanaviṣayo dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭāvyāptikasya hetoḥ sādhyadharmiṇyupasaṃhāra upanaya iti mahān bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7563: etena nigamanaṃ pratijñāyāḥ samānābhidheyatve 'pi pratijñārthatvena pratyuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:7566: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa ekasminnanvayavyatirekiṇyeva vītāvītavākye pañcāvayave udāhṛte /
GSP29nystik_u:7567: tatra kadācid bhrāntiḥ syādekodāharaṇatayā dve api vākye parasparāpekṣe eveti,
GSP29nystik_u:7575: //40// tarkapravṛttikramamāha---avijñāyamānatattve 'rthe iti yadyapi saṃśayasya paścādeva jijñāsā bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:7578: tarkeṇa hi prasaṅgāparanāmnā dvayoḥ pakṣayorekataraniṣedhenaikataraḥ pramāṇaviṣayatayā abhyanujñātavya iti viṣayapratyāsattyā tarkapravṛttiṃ pratyaṅgatā saṃśayasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7585: yasmin viṣaye pramāṇaṃ pravartitumudyataṃ tadviparyayāśaṅkāyāṃ na tāvat pramāṇaṃ pravartate,
GSP29nystik_u:7587: tadapanaya eva ca svaviṣaye pramāṇasaṃbhava iti copapattiriti vyākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7588: tayā pramāṇasyopapattyā itikartavyatayā pramāṇaviṣayamabhyanujānatyā viśodhite viṣaye pramāṇāmapratyūhaṃ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:7589: na copapattirevāstu niścayahetuḥ kṛtaṃ pramāṇeneti vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:7593: svakṛtasya karmaṇa ityādinā pūrvasya kāraṇamityantena saṃsāro darśitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7595_0: tena saṃsārāpavargāvicchantau vādiprativādinau prati ātmanityatvaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:7595_1: pravartamānamanena tarkeṇānugṛhyata iti pramāṇaviṣayaviparyayānanujñaiva ca pramāṇaviṣayābhyanujñā,
GSP29nystik_u:7597: ata evānte bhāṣyakāra upasaṃjahāra---yatra kāraṇam anupapadyamānaṃ paśyati, tat nānujānātīti //
GSP29nystik_u:7600: kathaṃ punarayaṃ tattvajñānārtho na tu tattvajñānameveteti deśayati---kathaṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:7603: bhāvitāt cintitāt, ata eva prasannāt nirmalānditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7606: hanta bhoḥ kimarthaṃ tarhi vāde pramāṇatarkasādhanetyuktamityata āha---so 'yaṃ tarka iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7613: tathāpi na kāraṇopapattita iti tayorvyavaccheda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7625: yuktamiti pratijñāmātreṇocyate, na tvatra hetuḥ abhidhīyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7628: jñeyena hi jñānaṃ nirūpyate na jñātrā, tasya sādhāraṇyāditi sāmarthyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7632: nādyāpi anena svābhiprāyo darśita iti mattvā punaścodayati---anukte 'pīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7635: sāmarthyaprāptasyānabhidhāne 'tiprasaṅga iti na sāmarthyamāśritya lakṣaṇe saṃśayo nirākaraṇīya iti tannirākaraṇārthamarthagrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:7637: na hi tattve jñāte tattvajñānārthitā bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7643: yadyapi nāsmākaṃ rāddhānte śuśrūṣādayo buddhidharmā buddhitattvasyaivābhāvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:7648: tato vijñāte 'pi tattve ya ūhaḥ pūrvānubhūtaparicchedātmā jāyate punastattvajñānārthaṃ so 'pi tarkaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7652: tathā hi adhigataparicchedātmāpyūhaḥ kāraṇasyopapattyā saṃbhavena jāyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7655: tathā ca sati pramāṇamapi tarkaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7657: ukte sati prayojanānusaraṇam, na tviha lāghavādaraḥ sūtrakārasyeti mantavyam //
GSP29nystik_u:7664: nityatvādayo viśeṣāḥ samavāyino vahnyādayaśca dhūmādisaṃyogina iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7668: anye tvanumānameva yuktyapekṣaṃ viparyaye 'niṣṭaprasaṅgāpekṣaṃ tarka iti varṇayanti /
GSP29nystik_u:7670: ākṣipta ākṣiptahṛdayaḥ, na tu tarkapratyayasvarūpaṃ cetayata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7671: viśeṣadarśanāditi viśeṣadarśanāt niścayaḥ pramāṇena bhavati na tarkeṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:7675: tarhi tasya svarūpaṃ vaktavyamiti pṛcchati---kiṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:7686: nanu yadeva kiścit svaviṣayādhigame anumānamapekṣate saivāpekṣaṇīyā yuktiranumānasya bhaviṣyatītyata āha---svaviṣayadhigame ceti //
GSP29nystik_u:7695: anumānabhedasya cedṛśasya pramāṇa evāntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7702: yuktaṃ vyatirekiṇi jīvaccharīre dharmiṇi prāṇādimattvasya sādhanadharmasya darśanāt,
GSP29nystik_u:7704: na saṃsārāpavargāvupapatsyetāmityatrātmani dharmiṇi sādhanadharma utpattirasti yaddarśanataḥ saṃskārodbodhe sati liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhasmṛtirbhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7705: na kevalaṃ prasaṅgasādhanaṃ sādhyadharmiṇyasiddham, api tvanyagatameva prasaṅgahetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7706: na tvanumānamanyagatād dharmāt pravartate, tasmādanumānādasya sphuṭo bheda ityāha---anumānaṃ ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7711_1: nirṇayabhedalakṣaṇamiti nāvyāpakaṃ tatra tallakṣaṇamiti darśayituṃ bhāṣyakāro nirṇayalakṣaṇamavatārayati---etasmiśca tarkaviṣaye //
GSP29nystik_u:7712_0: vimṛ---yaḥ //42 // atra pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ karmatayā na nirṇayasādhanatvamityanupapattyā
GSP29nystik_u:7712_1: sādhanopālambhau vādasūtragatau lakṣaṇīyaviti tāveva tāvad bhāṣyakṛd vibhajate---sthāpanā sādhanam,
GSP29nystik_u:7715: yadyapyupālambho na pratipakṣāśritaḥ, tathāpi taduddeśena pravṛttastadāśrita ityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7721: tasya sādhanasya vā upālambhasya vā yo 'rthaḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣo vā tasyāvadhāraṇamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7722: atra pakṣapratipakṣaprayogād vāde saṃśayo 'stīti vādabhrāntyā codayati---nedamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7725: dvitīyasya prativādinaḥ pratiṣiddhaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ vādyuktasya hetordūṣaṇamiti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:7727: dvitīyena tu prativādinā vādyuktasya hetoḥ sthāpanāhetutvaṃ pratiṣidhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7729: sa vādino vā prativādino vā heturvopālambho vā nivartate /
GSP29nystik_u:7730: tasmin nivṛtte yo 'vatiṣṭhate ekaḥ, tenārthanirṇayaḥ, na dvābhyām /
GSP29nystik_u:7732: na tāvat saṃśayaviṣaye nirṇaye vādiprativādinau staḥ, tayorniścitayoreva pravṛtteḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7734: vādinaḥ sādhanasya saṃbhavaḥ prativādina upālambhasya asaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7735: evaṃ prativādinaḥ sādhanasya saṃbhavo vādina upālambhasyāsaṃbhava iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7742: na nirṇayamātrasyedaṃ lakṣaṇamapi tu parīkṣāviṣayasyetyāha---na cāyaṃ nirṇaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7745: na hi jyotiṣṭomādīnāṃ svargādisaṃbandhanirṇaye āgamena kartavye vimarśo 'sti,
GSP29nystik_u:7753: nanu bhavatu pakṣaśabdalakṣitasya sādhanasya nirṇayaṃ prati karaṇatvam,
GSP29nystik_u:7754: pratipakṣalakṣitasya tu taddūṣaṇasya na sākṣātsādhakatvamityata āha---pratipakṣācceti hetutvaṃ pāramparyeṇetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7759: tadā hi yata evakāraḥ tato 'nyatrāvadhāraṇamiti nirṇaye niyamo bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:7760: nirṇaya eveti dvitīyaḥ kalpaḥ, tadā hi pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmityatra niyamaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7761: vimṛśyaiveti ca tṛtīyaḥ, tadāpi nirṇaye niyamaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7763: tasmin vikalpe nirṇayaḥ pakṣapratipakṣavimarśātilaṅghanenānyatra na pravartata iti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ nirṇayaphalaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7764: na hi tatra pakṣapratipakṣau, nāpi vimarśa iti pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7768: tadā nirṇayasyāniyamāt pakṣapratipakṣau ca tadabhāvaśceti tadubhayam, tadāśrayaḥ nirṇayaḥ prāptoti /
GSP29nystik_u:7771: na nirṇayamātrasyedaṃ lakṣaṇam, api tu nirṇayaviśeṣasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7772: na nirṇaya iti na nirṇayamātra ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7776: pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmeva vāde nirṇayo na tu vimarśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7777: śāstre tu nirṇaya eva na tu tatra śāstrātiriktaṃ sādhanāntaramāśrīyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7779: lakṣaṇāyāṃ hi yena yat lakṣyate tadavacchedakatayā tadapi buddhau sannidhīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7780: tataśca tena niyamo bhavati lakṣyamāṇasya, yathā gaṅgāyāṃ dhoṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7788: pṛcchati--etasminniti, prathamaṃ sādhanam, dvitīyaṃ dūṣaṇam, tṛtīyaṃ samādhānam /
GSP29nystik_u:7790: kadācit prathame kadācid dvitīye kadācit tṛtīye ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7794: taṃ nivartyaṃ vādinaḥ sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇena nivartya prativādī svapakṣe sādhanaṃ bravīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7800: yadi nirṇayamātramanumānamucyeta, tadā na tasya sarvasya liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhasmṛtyapekṣatvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7801: yadi tu liṅgaparāmarśo nirṇayaḥ, tasya cāsti liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhāpekṣeti tatrāha--pramāṇaphalatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7802: sāmānyavyāpto viśeṣaḥ sāmānyanivṛttyā nivartate, śiṃśapātvamiva vṛkṣatvanivṛttyā /
GSP29nystik_u:7803: na ca phale pramitirūpe nirṇaye pramākaraṇatvaṃ phalatve nāstīti nānumānatvaṃ tadviśeṣa
GSP29nystik_u:7805: itaścānumānāt nirṇayo bhidyate ityāha--nirṇayaḥ svaviṣaya eveti na hi nirṇayo nirṇayatvena pratipattyanubandhibhūtād viṣayādanyatra,
GSP29nystik_u:7808: yadā tu dhūmajñānenāgniranumīyate tadānyatra ceti gamayitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:7817: uddeśakramaprāptaṃ vādalakṣaṇaparaṃ sūtram avatārayituṃ bhāṣyam---tisraḥ kathā bhavantīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7820: vādādayaśca kathāviśeṣā ityata āha vārttikakāraḥ---tisraḥ kathā bhavantīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7822: akathātvaṃ syāt, api tu yannānāpravaktṛke vicāre vasati tad vicāravastu /
GSP29nystik_u:7824: tasyāḥ kathāyā eṣa niyamaḥ tisra eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:7825: tathā ca nānāpravaktṛkavicāraviṣayā vākyasaṃdṛbdhiḥ katheti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraha
GSP29nystik_u:7827: yad vastu vicāryate ityarthābhidhānamātram, na tu vicāravastvityasya vivaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:7844: tathāpi na pramāṇamūlairavayavaistarkeṇa ca sādhanopālambhāviti jalpavitaṇḍabhyāṃ pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhagrahaṇena vyavacchedaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7848: tarkasyetikarttavyatārūpasya pramāṇānugrāhakatayā pramāṇamūlā avayavāstarkamūlā api bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:7849: tathā ca tarkasyāpi sādhanopālambhahetubhāvaḥ siddho bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7853: na ca te pramāṇatarkābhyām, tayoḥ svapratipattihetutvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7863: dharmī dharmaviśiṣṭaḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣo vā karma, tasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7864: tasya dharmiṇo vāstavaṃ tādṛśatvamatādṛśatvaṃ vā karaṇasya tu karmaiva viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7865: tatra ca karmakaraṇe samarthe eva, nāsamarthe /
GSP29nystik_u:7868: yathā ākāśe niśātamasiṃ vyāpārayataḥ puruṣasyāparādho nākāśasya śabde samarthasya,
GSP29nystik_u:7873: vacana upacaryate na tu pakṣe pakṣadvāreṇānudbhāvanāditi siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:7874: yathāyamarthaḥ sūtrapadebhyo labhyate tathā praśnapūrvakaṃ darśayati---kathaṃ punariti //
GSP29nystik_u:7882: chalādisādhanopālambhatvaṃ vādasya vyavacchidyate, tathā ca jalpavitaṇḍābhyāṃ vyavacchedaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7883: etaduktaṃ bhavati, tarkānugṛhītapramāṇamūlā avayavāḥ paramārthato bhavantu mā bhūvan,
GSP29nystik_u:7886: jalpavitaṇḍayostvapramāṇamūlatvaṃ viduṣāpi prativādinā chalādibhiḥ pratyavastheyam, ekāntaparājayād
GSP29nystik_u:7888: yathā cāsya śāstre vyutpādanaṃ nāsadṛśaṃ yathā caiṣa satāmācāraḥ, tathā jalpalakṣaṇe vakṣyāmaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7892: upālambhagrahaṇādeva vāde 'pi nigrahasthānasya labdhatvādityata āha vārttikakāraḥ---chalajātīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7897: hanta bho na jalpād vādasya viśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7906: bhāṣyamate dūṣite pṛṣṭvā svamatena vyācaṣṭe---atha kimidaṃ padamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7910: adhikaṃ tu na yadyapi tattvapratipattiṃ sākṣād
GSP29nystik_u:7912: tathāpi tatprayojanānusaraṇe paraḥ pratipattā samākulitabuddhirna tattvaṃ pratipattumarhatītyadhikasyāpi tattvapratipattividhātahetutvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7913: tattvabubhutsuriti jigīṣutāṃ nirākaroti, na hi gurvādiṣu jigīṣāsaṃbhavaḥ, trividhaṃ phalamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7915: pratidvandvini tu na vādaḥ, api tu jalpavitaṇḍe /
GSP29nystik_u:7917: pāramārthikāt tarkasahitāt pramāṇādekasmin viṣaye sādhanopālambhayoḥ saṃbhave viruddhadharmasamāliṅgitamekadā vastu prasajyata
GSP29nystik_u:7920: vāde 'bhiprāyo niyamyate vādiprativādinoḥ prāmāṇikadhiyā sādhanopālambhau tābhyāṃ prayoktavyau,
GSP29nystik_u:7924: tathā ca vāde abuddhipūrvaṃ chalādiprayoge tadudbhāvanamapi saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:7931_0: na hi pañcāvayavopapannatvaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca tadanugrāhakaṃ ca tarkamantareṇa bhavatīti
GSP29nystik_u:7932: anyathaikaḥ svasthānasthita eva śabdasyānityatvaṃ prati pañcāvayavopapannaṃ vākyaṃ prayuṅkte,
GSP29nystik_u:7933: aparo 'pi tādṛśaḥ śabdanityatā prati tādṛśameva vākyaṃ prayuṅkte iti so 'pi vādaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:7944: vādagato nigraho na jalpe, jalpagataśca nigraho na vāda iti sa mā vijñāyati /
GSP29nystik_u:7948: tadevaṃ svābhimataṃ vādalakṣaṇaṃ vyākhyāya vāsubandhavaṃ lakṣaṇa dūṣayitumupanyasyati---apare tviti svapakṣasya siddhiḥ parapakṣasya cāsiddhiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7952: pūrvaḥ pakṣo 'yuktaḥ, pakṣa uttarastu yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7953: ekasya vā śabdasya dharmino 'nekanityānityaviśeṣaṇābhisaṃbandhinaḥ puruṣābhisandhibhedāt anekaśabdābhidhānam,
GSP29nystik_u:7957: tāvad bhūmidhanādiṣviva svocitāsu arthakriyāsu yatheṣṭaviniyogayogyatvaṃ svatvamarjanāpāditamanityatvādinā pratijñāte śabdādau saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7963: api copakārakatvena vyāptaṃ satvaṃ goghaṭādiṣu tathā darśanāt,
GSP29nystik_u:7964: pakṣāt nivartamānamupakārakatvaṃ svatvamapi svavpāpyaṃ nivartayati vṛkṣatvamiva śiṃśapātvamityāha---yacca yasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7968: api cedaṃ viśeṣaṇapadaṃ viśeṣyaṃ sāmānyataḥ prasṛtaṃ viśeṣe 'vasthāpayati na vā?
GSP29nystik_u:7974: tataśca śaknoti samānamarthaṃ vaktumiti codayati---sāmānyaśabdā apīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7977: varuddhopadarśanena sphuṭā pratītirbhavatīti ayuktapratipādanārthaṃ yuktasyāpyupanyāsa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7978: yadi na pakṣeṇa dūṣaṇaṃ saṃbadhyate kastarhi tasya viṣaya iti śaṅkate---atha dūṣaṇasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7990: lakṣaṇe tato varamevaṃ kriyatāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ lāghavāyetyāha---yadi ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7997: nanu na dūṣaṇamātraṃ saṃbadhyate, asiddhyarthamiti ca dūṣaṇamātrābhidhānam,
GSP29nystik_u:8003: iti sūtre hi niyameva svapakṣe sādhanaṃ parapakṣe dūṣaṇamuktam, tathā cottarapakṣe dūṣaṇīya
GSP29nystik_u:8005: evaṃ pūrvapakṣo 'ti sādhanīya eveti, uttarapakṣavādino 'pi sādhanīyo na dūṣaṇīyaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8006: api cāyuktasya pūrvapakṣasya sādhaṇaṃ yuktasya cottarapakṣasya dūṣaṇamiti viparītaprasaṅga
GSP29nystik_u:8016: na kevalaṃ viśeṣyāt pṛthak svārtho viśeṣaṇaṃ nāvadhāryate,
GSP29nystik_u:8019: na kevalaṃ patyurviśeṣyāt senā na bhidyate 'pi tu tato 'nyebhyo 'pi hāstikāśvīyarathapadātibhya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8021: na kevalaṃ tadaṅgebhyo jīrakādibhyaḥ, api tvanyebhyo 'pi phalasalilādibhya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8023: uktaṃ nismṛtya śaṅkatī---atha manyase svārtha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8027: api ca svaḥ pakṣo yasya sādhayituḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8031: sādhanīyārthatā tu bhaviṣyati, yathā ca samāsopapattiriti codayati---nanu ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:8033: api ca pakṣāt svapakṣabhede sūtrāntaravyāghāto 'bhede vā etasya vyāghāta
GSP29nystik_u:8035: api ca vākyasamāsayoḥ samāso jyāyān lāghavādityāha---āstāṃ tāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:8037: siddhyasiddhyarthamityayaṃ samāsaḥ svaparapakṣayoḥ pratyekaṃ na saṃbandhārtha ityarthāt kasyacit siddhiḥ kasyacidasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8042: anityatve 'pi samāsavidheḥ samāsa eva vigrahāt jyāyāniti codyasamādhānābhyāṃ darśayati---anitya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8047: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet /
GSP29nystik_u:8049: iti atarthakaprayogaścānapekṣitaḥ śiṣyairiti teṣāmaśāsanāt na śāstraṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:8058: siddhirjñānaṃ tasya pakṣo viṣayaḥ, āśrayāstu prāśnikā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8060: na tāvat jñānaṃ pakṣaviṣayaṃ prāśnikādhikaraṇaṃ ceti bauddharāddhānte saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8070: yasmāt so 'rthastathā bhavati tasmāt tathābhāvādadhikaraṇapratyāyanaṃ bhavatīti dvitīyaṃ kalpamāśaṅkate---athāsiddha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8071: yāvat pakṣaviṣayaṃ sādhanaṃ na prayujyate tāvadyadyadhikaraṇapratyāyanaṃ tataḥ sādhanaprayogāt prāgadhikaraṇapratyāyanamastīti vādavaiyarthaṃ sādhanadūṣaṇaprayogo 'narthakaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8077: mañcasthāḥ krośantīti vaktavye vināpi prayojanaṃ mañcāḥ krośantītyupacāro dṛṣṭa ityata
GSP29nystik_u:8080: nanvihāpi vināpi prayojanaṃ pramāṇāsaṃbhavamātreṇopacāro mañcāḥ krośantītivadbhaviṣyatītyata āda---lokaprayukteti lokaprayuktaśabdārthavat /
GSP29nystik_u:8081: upacāro 'pi laukiko na prayojanābhāvena śakyo 'pavadituṃ na lokaḥ paryanuyojyo yataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8082: idānīntanastu asmadādiprayogaḥ prayojanābhāve na śakyaḥ paryanuyoktumityāśayenāha---na cedaṃ laukikamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:8089: yataḥ tayoḥ pakṣadharmatvāt etadbhavati siddhaḥ pakṣo 'siddhaśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:8092: naiva draṣṭrādhāratā jñānasya viṣayatā ca bauddharāddhānte saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8094: asti khalvālayajñānaṃ yadupāśritya ṣaḍapi pravṛttijñānāni jāyante /
GSP29nystik_u:8097: na pakṣasya tadviṣayatvāt tasyāpīti cet, kaḥ punarayaṃ viṣayabhāvaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:8101: jñānaprakāśyatvaṃ viṣayatvamiti cet---na, jñānenārthe prakāśājananāt tasmāt jñānasya tadasamavāyinaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8104: punaḥ śaṅkate---atha tathātathāne iti pramāṇayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8110: tathāpi prameyasya prādhānyāt tatraivābhidhānapratyayāviti prameyadharmāvucyete vyaktyavyaktī,
GSP29nystik_u:8115: iha sūtre dhananimittādivacanatārthaśabdasya na saṃbhavatīti trayamavaśiṣyata iti tredhā pravartata ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:8116: sādhanaṃ sādhanābhāso dūṣaṇaṃ dūṣaṇābhāsa iti caturvidhaṃ vākyam /
GSP29nystik_u:8119: granthāntare yuktāyuktatvena viśeṣaṇāt caturvidhavākyasaṃgrahārtho hyuddeśe arthaśabdo vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8120: na ca yuktāyuktatvaviśeṣaṇe caturvidhavākyasaṃgraho bhavati sādhanābhāsasaṃbandhinaḥ pakṣasya yuktatvābhāvāt dūṣaṇābhāsaṃbandhinaśca pratipakṣasyāyuktatvābhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8121: atha na sādhanādiyogo 'pi tu sādhyadharma eva sādhanānapekṣo yuktāyuktatvamiti śaṅkate---atha punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:8125: yadi pratyāyanaṃ siddhiḥ pratītiḥ, tathāpi sā pratyāyyā na saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8126: atha karaṇam? tathāpi karma karaṇaṃ na saṃbhavatīti vyāghāta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8131: na hi vahniriti gṛhītaḥ khadyoto dahati pacati vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8141: na hi siddhirdhanaṃ vā svaparapakṣayoḥ sādhanaṃ vā nivṛttirvā saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8150: avācakapadaprayogāt sādhanadūṣaṇābhāsavādinaśca vāditvena lokasiddhasyāvāditvāpādanāt siddhyasiddhiśabdayośca vādatvāpādanārthatvādityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8155: pakṣavyatirekeṇaṃ pakṣādhāraṃ sādhyaṃ jñānamanyad vā siddhiśabdābhidheyaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8157: pakṣasya tu bhavet kenacit saṃbandhena yādṛśatādṛśenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8162: api ca yuktāyuktārthābhyāmabhede sādhanadūṣaṇapadamanarthakaṃ te ityanenaiva yuktāyuktatvāvamarṣiṇā gatārthatvādityāha---yuktāyuktatvaśabdābhyāṃ ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:8163: atha na paryāyatā, api tu sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8164: yuktāyuktatve sāmānyam, sādhanadūṣaṇe ca viśeṣa iti śaṅkate---atha manyase iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8168: na khalu yogo nāma bauddhānāṃ sādhyasādhanavṛttirdūṣyadūṣaṇavṛttirvā kaścidastītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8169: api ca sāṃvṛto 'pi yogaḥ sādhyasādhanajñānādhīnanirūpaṇatayā nānirūpite sādhye nirūpito bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8170: nirūpaṇaṃ ca nirṇaya iti yoganirūpaṇāt prāk sādhyanirṇayāt kṛtaṃ yoganirūpaṇena sādhyanirṇayārtheneti /
GSP29nystik_u:8175: yuktāyuktatvenādhikaraṇapratyāyanamiti yuktāyuktatvayoḥ karaṇatvaṃ darśitam tat tathātvātathātvapakṣe na saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8178: na tu vyavacchedasya paricchedasya sādhane iti //
GSP29nystik_u:8188: na khalvādhyātmikaśaktisaṃpannaḥ samāhitaḥ samagre sādhanaprayoge sati santamarthaṃ na pratipadyata iti saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8196: na cāyamunajñāniṣedho na pratipadyate iti vāde vītarāgakathātvena jigīṣāyā abhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8203: vādasya jalpavitaṇḍābhyāmabhedam abhipretya codayati---yadā tu nāyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8211: sūtroktaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ vṛttau āha---tadarthaṃ vacanaṃ siddhyasiddhyarthamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8214: prāśnikā eva tāvad vāde na santi, abhyupetya
GSP29nystik_u:8222: na hi daivamilitaṃ kāraṇam, mā bhūd gardabho 'pi dhūmasya kāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8223: codayati, yadi prāśnikā na santi tadvāda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8224: tayorvādiprativādinorvādasya parīkṣā kā kasya ca tayorvādasya kva ca,
GSP29nystik_u:8227: vītarāgau hi vādiprativādināveva vādasvarūpajñānaṃ ca tatparīkṣāṃ ca kartuṃ śaknutaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8229: sādhanaprayogaḥ pakṣaviṣayaḥ, dūṣaṇaprayogaḥ sthāpanāviṣayaḥ iti vādasvarūpam /
GSP29nystik_u:8231: tadarthaṃ parīkṣārthaṃ tasmin vāde 'dhikāro vītarāgayoreva vādiprativādinoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8233: tasmāt saptamyartho 'dhikaraṇārthaḥ parābhimataḥ prāśnika iti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:8235: yadapi vṛttau coditaṃ yadi siddhyasiddhyarthaṃ vacanaṃ vādaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8236: tataḥ prāśnikaprativādinoḥ priyāpriyavacasi rathyāvāde prasaṅga iti tadapyatinirbījamityāha---yadapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:8237: na hi priyāpriyavacasaḥ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā siddhyasiddhyarthatā,
GSP29nystik_u:8246: yadi tvavaśyam uttaraṃ vācyam, tato varamevaṃ vaktavyamityāha---yadi tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:8247: seyaṃ sūkṣmekṣikā parairiha kṛteti tadanubandhena vārttikakṛtāpi kṛteti//1 //
GSP29nystik_u:8251: atrāpi samānajātīyābhyāṃ vādavitaṇḍābhyāmasamānajātīyebhyaḥ pramāṇādibhyo vyavacchedo jalpasya sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8262: api tu tadarthe pratīte tasyānyataḥ siddhau satyāṃ gamyata iti pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambha ityetadatidiśyata
GSP29nystik_u:8264: tena pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambha pañcāvayavopapannaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraha ityetasya vādapadavarjaṃ samastasya lakṣaṇasyātideśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8268: na niyamārthe pade ityupalakṣaṇam, na pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhapadalabhyo 'bhiprāyaniyama
GSP29nystik_u:8271: yathā gobhiryukto ratho goratha iti yuktapadalopa
GSP29nystik_u:8274: iha vādalakṣaṇaṃ paṭhatā bhāṣyakāreṇa niyamo 'pyatidiṣṭa iti manvānaścodayati---bhāṣyam
GSP29nystik_u:8277: jalpalakṣaṇānukūlo yaḥ pāṭhakramaḥ, tato 'rthasvarūpamātraṃ pratīyate na tvārtho 'rtha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8279: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa chalādīnāṃ niṣedhārthatayā sādhanāṅgabhāvamākṣipya parapakṣavighātena svapakṣarakṣaṇādaṅgabhāva
GSP29nystik_u:8282: tat kiṃ nigrahasthānānyapyayuktāni, ca caitacchakyamityata āha---chalaṃ tāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:8287: na hi sahasreṇāpyandhaiḥ pāṭaccarebhyo gṛhaṃ rakṣyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8291: tathāpi teṣāṃ tattvam avidvān ebhirahaṃ sādhanaṃ vihaniṣyāmītyanayā buddhyā upahṛtaḥ vyāmohitaḥ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:8293: yatra tveṣāṃ tattvaṃ vidvān pravartate, na sa vādaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8296: nanu jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ prayogāt sādhanamaṅgaṃ vā syādata
GSP29nystik_u:8298: nanu yadi na sādhanamaṅgaṃ vā, kasmāt tarhi jalpavitaṇḍayoreṣāṃ prayoga
GSP29nystik_u:8300: sādhusādhanopādāne ca vādinā kṛte pareṇa prativādinā jigīṣuṇākulitabuddhirdrāk pāramārthikamuttaramapratipadyamānaścchalādīni prayuṅkte /
GSP29nystik_u:8314: pūrvavādipakṣāpekṣayā prativādina ātmīya eva pakṣaḥ pratipakṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8321: tayorekataraṃ prativādī ātmīyaṃ pakṣaṃ na sthāyapatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:8330: prathamapakṣavādino hi sthāpanāyā abhāve kiṃ vaitaṇḍika
GSP29nystik_u:8331: āhanti? na ca pakṣaḥ śakya āhantum /
GSP29nystik_u:8332: tasmāt prathamapakṣavādino 'sti sthāpaneti dvitīya eva pakṣaḥ sthāpanāhīna iti samārthyād yuktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8338: vaitaṇḍiko 'pi hi vādī pāriśeṣyāt matpakṣaḥ setsyatīti buddhyā svapakṣamasthāpayan parapakṣasthāpanāmāhanti /
GSP29nystik_u:8339: tasmāt parapakṣapratiṣedhalakṣaṇaṃ vākyam asya pakṣaḥ parapakṣaniṣedhena pāriśeṣyāt pakṣasiddhihetutvādupacārataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8350: na tāvadasthāpyamānasyāpi sthāpanārhatālakṣaṇā pakṣatā na yujyate,
GSP29nystik_u:8353: tathā ca caturvargābhyupagame virodho 'nabhyupagame vā nāyaṃ laukiko na parīkṣaka iti prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8355: yastu manyate caturvargābhyupagame 'pi dūṣaṇamātraṃ vitaṇḍetyeva vaktavyaṃ lāghavāyeti,
GSP29nystik_u:8359: tadanenārthato yad vai khalvityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam //3 //
GSP29nystik_u:8362: uddeśakramānurodhena vitaṇḍānantaraṃ hetvābhāsesu lakṣayitavyeṣu arthākṣiptasāmānyalakṣaṇameṣāṃ vibhāgoddeśaparaṃ sūtram---savya--sāḥ // 4 //
GSP29nystik_u:8363: tadvyākhyānaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ samākhyāniruktivaśena sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayan vārttikāraḥ paṭhati---hetulakṣaṇābhāvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:8365: na hyanyasyānyatvamātreṇa sādṛśyam, mā bhūt sarvasya sarveṇa sādṛśyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8377: catuḥṣaṣṭidvitayamaṣṭāviṃśaṃ śataṃ pūrvayā triṣoḍaśyā saha ṣaṭsaptaṃ śatam /
GSP29nystik_u:8392: yadi bāhyakaraṇapratyakṣe vāṅmanase iti sādhyeta tadā nānityatvaṃ sapakṣavyāpakaṃ syāt, sāmānye
GSP29nystik_u:8397: tajjātīyaikadeśavṛttitvamamūrtatvasya darśayituṃ yatra na vartate tatpuraḥsaramudāharaṇaṃ rūpādivaditi //
GSP29nystik_u:8416_0: vyāpakāvyāpakabhedena tu dviṣoḍaśī yadā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāsiddhyā cobhayasaṃpratipannayā
GSP29nystik_u:8416_2: vikriyate tadā catuḥṣaṣṭhitrayeṇa dvānavataṃ śataṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8420: te punarvyāpakāvyāpakā vyadhikaraṇaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyavyadhikaraṇasandigdadhaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyavyadhikaraṇāsamarthaviśe ṣaṇaviśeṣyabhedena catuḥṣaṣṭitrayeṇa dvānavataṃ śatamaparam //
GSP29nystik_u:8424: te punaraprasiddhāśrayāḥ pūrvavadbhedena vyadhikaraṇaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasandigdhaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasamarthaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhedena catuḥṣaṣṭitraye sati dvānavataṃ śatam /
GSP29nystik_u:8425: tadevamanantarābhyāṃ dvānavataśatābhyāṃ śatatrayaṃ caturaśītaṃ yat tadevāṣṭāviṃśakaśatābhyāṃ dvānavatena ca śatena saṃpiṇḍitaṃ dvātriṃśaduttarāṣṭaśatī vikārabhūtā bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8429: uktaṃ hi prāg yathā na deśo 'gnimattayā sādhyo 'pi tu dhūmaviśeṣa eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:8434: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatve sati kṛtakatvāditi kṛtakatvasyaiva viśeṣyasya sāmarthyādasamarthamanityatve prayatnānantarīyakatvam,
GSP29nystik_u:8436: vyadhikaraṇatayā asiddhaṃ ca koṣṭhavāyutālvādikriyāyāṃ eva prayatnānantarīyakatvam,
GSP29nystik_u:8437: na tvādyasyāpi śabdasya, prāgeva tu śrotrasamavāyina
GSP29nystik_u:8448: candanaśabdādatyantaṃ vibhinnārthāḥ samudāyasamudāyyasaṃbhave sati rūpādīnāmarthānāṃ rūpādiśabdānāṃ ca tena candanaśabdena vyapadiśyamānatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8449: candanasya rūpādaya iti samudāyasamudāyyasaṃbhavo rūpādiṣu vyapadeśaśca rūpādiśabdeṣviti vyadhikaraṇaṃ viśeṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8452: seyaṃ kriyābhyāvṛttiryathā śabdānityatve 'pyupapadyate tathā dvitīye darśayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8454: viśeṣaṇaśabdaḥ tantreṇa viśeṣaṇe viśeṣye ca karmakaraṇasādhanatayā prayukto vartate /
GSP29nystik_u:8455: tena sandigdhaṃ viśeṣaṇam aprasiddhaṃ vyadhikaraṇatayā viśeṣyaṃ yeṣāṃ teṣāmudāharaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8456: yathā sandihyamāne dhūmādibhāve 'gnimān deśo dhūmavattve sati prakāśakatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:8464: ye ye sandigdhāsiddhā vyāpakāvyāpakabhedena dvātriṃśat ta
GSP29nystik_u:8465_0: evobhayānyatarāsiddhyā catuḥṣaṣṭirbhavanti tataḥ kimityata āha--te catuḥṣaṣṭitāmāpannāḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8480: dvātriṃśaduttarayā aṣṭaśatyā sahasramekaṃ caturaśītisahitā ca navaśatī /
GSP29nystik_u:8481: tadevaṃ prakṛtibhūtāṣṭā catvāriṃśatprakṣepeṇa saṃpiṇḍitaṃ dvātriṃśe dve sahasre bhavata iti //
GSP29nystik_u:8488: vyatirekyekaḥ, anvayavyatirekyapi sapakṣavyāptpavyāptibhyāṃ dvedheti pañca hetavaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8489: pañcānāṃ hetūnāṃ sarūpāsarūpapratibandhāt pañca pañcakā bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:8495: anvayyādāvekaikasmin sarūpāsarūpāḥ pañca hetavaḥ pratibandhakā iti pañcabhiḥ pañcakaiḥ pañcaviṃśatirviruddhāvyabhicāriṇa
GSP29nystik_u:8500: samānāsamānajātīyavyavacchedakaṃ ca lakṣaṇasūtramiti tatraiva pramāṇam na tviyattāyāmatatparatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8510: yasya tu savyabhicārapadārtho 'prasiddhaḥ prasiddhaścānaikāntikapadārthastaṃ prati savyabhicāra iti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ, anaikāntika
GSP29nystik_u:8512: tatra savyabhicāra iti lakṣaṇapadaṃ kakṣīkṛtyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ vyabhicāra
GSP29nystik_u:8517: tad vārttikakāraḥ paryudāsābhiprāyeṇa vyācaṣṭe---ekasminnante niyata aikāntika iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8518: na heturaikāntiko yena tadanyatvena hetvābhāsamātrasaṃgrahādekajātīyatvena hetvābhāsānāṃ vibhāgasūtravirodhaḥ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:8519: kiṃ tvekasminnante yo niyataḥ sa aikāntikaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8520: tadviparyayādanaikāntiko 'niyato 'nityatve ca nityatve cānvayena ca vyatirekeṇa cobhayapakṣagāmīti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:8522: tadevam anaikāntikaḥ savyabhicāraḥ iti sthite pṛcchati---kaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:8524: avagata eṣa vyabhicāra iti, anaikāntikapadavācyatāsya kathamityata āha--anyatra sarvo 'yamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8527: atra bauddhaiḥ yad vikalpya dūṣaṇamuktam, tadupanyasyati--anaikāntika
GSP29nystik_u:8535: bhāvadharmau hi vyabhicārāvyabhicārau nābhāve sarvopākhyāvirahiṇi yujyete ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8538: kevalamayaṃ prasajyapratiṣedhavallabhastamāsthāya sarvaṃ dūṣayatīti tamevāṅgīkṛtya sarvatra brūma
GSP29nystik_u:8540: na punarabrāhmaṇādāvapi vārtikakārasya prasajyapratiṣedho 'bhimataḥ, kiṃ tu paryudāsa
GSP29nystik_u:8544: api tu kasyacid vastuno 'bhāvena viśiṣṭaṃ kiñcideva vastvityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8549: vaidharmye vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasya vaiparītyāditi vaidharmyavyabhicāramāha---dṛṣṭānte sparśavattvamanityatvaṃ ca dharmau na sādhyasādhanabhūtau gṛhyete /
GSP29nystik_u:8550: na hi yadanityaṃ tat sarvaṃ sparśavad buddhyādibhirvyabhicārāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8556: tathāpi yadasparśavanna bhavati tannityamapi na bhavatīti vaidharmyaṃ vyabhicarati,
GSP29nystik_u:8559: atra vārttikakāro 'sparśavattvasya hetoḥ praśnapūrvakaṃ svarūpaṃ niṣkarṣati---kiṃ punastat asparśatvaṃ śabdād
GSP29nystik_u:8566: yadi hi kvacit śāstrapradeśe anaikāntikaḥ kathitaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8567: taddeśātilaṅghanena atrātidiśyamāno viditarūpa iha savyabhicāraṃ lakṣayet,
GSP29nystik_u:8580: no khalūdāharaṇamādriyante parīkṣakāḥ kiṃ tu lakṣaṇamityarthaḥ// 5 //
GSP29nystik_u:8585: yaścābhyupagacchati cetano nāsāvanyatamena hetulakṣaṇena yujyate iti na hetvābhāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8586: na ca pakṣaḥ siddhānta iti tadvirodhī na viruddhaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8588: abhyupagamaviṣayamātravivakṣayā ca siddhāntaśabdaḥ prayukto na punaḥ siddhānta
GSP29nystik_u:8590: tena pekṣo 'bhyupagamaviṣaya iti tadvirodhī hetvābhāsaḥ saṃgṛhīto bhavati viśeṣaviruddhasya ca na hetvābhāsatetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8604: abādhe vā na hetvābhāsā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8607: yathā pramāṇādīnāṃ prameyatvena tulyatve 'pi pramāṇaprameyādīnāmavāntarabhedavivakṣayā ṣoḍaśatvam,
GSP29nystik_u:8619: tasya vyākhyānam---na nityo vikāra upapadyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8621: so 'yaṃ nityatvapratiṣedhāditi heturvyakterapeto 'pi vikāro 'stītyanena svasiddhāntena virudhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8623: virodhasya dvyāśrayatvāt siddhāntena virudhyate ityabhisaṃghāya siddhāntaṃ vyāhantītyuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8625: nanu nityatvapratiṣedhāditi heturvināśapratiṣedhena siddhāntena viruddha iti bruvāṇaḥ śāstravirodhamāpādayati /
GSP29nystik_u:8626: tathā ca kālātyayāpadiṣṭo hetvābhāso na viruddha ityata āha---ete te vākye parasparārthabādhite iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8628: yathā brāhmaṇena surā peyā dravadravyatvāt kṣīravadityayaṃ hetuḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8629: gauḍī paiṣṭī ca mādhvī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā /
GSP29nystik_u:8630: yathaibaikā tathā sarvā na peyā brahmavādibhiḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8632: prakṛte tu vākye parasparaviruddhārthatayā na pratiṣṭhāṃ labhete,
GSP29nystik_u:8633: na punaranyataradanyatareṇa śakyaṃ bādhituṃ dvayostulyabalatvāt tasmāt nāyaṃ kālātyayāpadiṣṭa ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8635: so 'yaṃ vikāro vyakterapaitīti pratijñā nityatvapratiṣedhāditi hetunā virudhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8637: na tu vinaśyatīti hi pratijñārthaḥ apeto 'pyasti vināśapratiṣedhādityanena vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8638: tathā ca vyakterapaitītyenana vikārasya nityatvaṃ pratijñātaṃ nityatvapratiṣedhādityanena hetunā viruddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8647: hetvāśritatvaṃ tu tasyaiva virodhasya vivakṣitvā hetvābhāse 'ntarbhāva iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8649: pratijñayā hetuvirodha iti hetorapyanyatarāsiddhatayā pratijñāyā tulyabalatvābhiprāyam /
GSP29nystik_u:8650: yadā tu heturubhayasiddho bhavati, tadā hetorvā pratijñāvirodhakatvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8664: samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogāditi tu ubhayasiddhameva pratijñārthaṃ vyāhantītyetāvatā bheda ityarthaḥ// 6 //
GSP29nystik_u:8666: NyS_1,2.7: yasmāt prakaraṇacintā saḥ nirṇayārthamapadiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8672: cintāparaṃ vyācaṣṭe---tasya prakaraṇasya cintā vimarśāt prabhṛti prāg nirṇayāt samīkṣaṇam ālocanaṃ jijñāsā /
GSP29nystik_u:8674: no khalvayaṃ nityadharmān nityatvāvinābhāvino 'nityadharmān vā anityatvāvinābhāvina upalabhamānastatra sandigdhe tad vā jijñāsate /
GSP29nystik_u:8675: saiva nityadharmānupalabdhiranityadharmānupalabdhirvā vicitrābhisandhitayā vādinā nirṇayāyāpadiśyamānā prakaraṇasamo hetvābhāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8688: na hi nityadharmānupalabdhirubhayasiddhe nitye 'sti yena savyabhicāro bhavet,
GSP29nystik_u:8700: tathā ca sādhyasamāt hetvābhāsāt na pṛthag
GSP29nystik_u:8705: na ca tattvānupalabdhiḥ svayamasiddhā, sā hyupalambhanābhāvena sulabheti bhāva //
GSP29nystik_u:8712: na hyakāraṇānāṃ samūhaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavitumarhati, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8716: na ca yasmin sati bhavatyeva tat kāraṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:8717: api tu yasmin satyeva na tvasatīti lakṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge vakṣyāma iti //
GSP29nystik_u:8722: ubhayaviśeṣānupalabdheḥ prakaraṇasamatvena abhidhānāśakyatvāt prakaraṇasamasyodāharaṇāntaraṃ dūṣayati---śarīrādanyatvaṃ tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:8726: tatra śarīrādanyatvam upalabhamāno yadā tattvaṃ nityatvamātmanaḥ pratyeti,
GSP29nystik_u:8727: na hi tadā jijñāsituṃ nityatvaṃ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:8728: yadā tu tattvaṃ nityattvaṃ nopalabhate śarīrādanyatvamupalabhamāno 'pi tadā pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:8743: atra cāsiddhaḥ sādhyasama iti vaktavye sādhyāviśiṣṭagrahaṇamanyatarāsiddhasyāpi siddheḥ prāgahetutvajñāpanārtham /
GSP29nystik_u:8745: eva sādhyasamo nānyatarāsiddhaḥ tasya kadācit siddheriti bhrāntiḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8750: yadi hi sādhyaṃ nāsiddhaṃ bhavet sādhyatvādeva cyaveta, na khalu siddhaṃ sādhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8752: sā ca kasyacit sarvadā, kādācitkī kaściditi sarveṣāmaviśiṣṭatvamiti nāvyāptiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8757: atra vārttikakāraḥ sūtrārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe---sādhyenāviśiṣṭo ya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8759: āha---sādhanadharma iti hetvābhāsasāmānyalakṣaṇayoge sati etallakṣaṇamiti na vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8760: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa svarūpāsiddhāśrayāsiddhānyathāsiddhānāṃ sādhāraṇamudāharaṇamuktam---dravyaṃ chāyā gatimattvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:8764: āśrayāsiddhatāmavatārayituṃ gatimattaṃ chāyāyāḥ pañcāvayavena vākyena sādhyati---gatimattvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8766: satyā eva chāyāyā deśāntare darśanād yo 'syā gatimattvamanubhinoti taṃ pratyāśrayāsiddhaṃ deśāntare darśanam,
GSP29nystik_u:8770: na tāvat chāyā sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyāntarbhūtā tasyā nityatābhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8783: tasmiṃstu sati na gṛhyate iti durghaṭam /
GSP29nystik_u:8784: nāpi dravyam, taddhi pṛthivyādīnāmamanyatamad bhaved anyad
GSP29nystik_u:8788: tadguṇānāmanupalabdadheḥ, nāpyanyad rūpavaditi yujyate, tasyādravyasya pratyakṣatvānupapatteḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8790: tasmād bhābhāva eva chāyā na tu satīti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:8793: bhavatu bhābhāvaḥ tathāpi nāśrayāsiddhatā deśāntaradarśanasya bhābhāvāśrayatvādeveti taṃ pratyabhyupetyānyathāsiddhatayā sādhyasamatvamāpādayati---abhyupetyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:8794: svābhāviko hi saṃbandho hetoḥ sādhyena sahānumānāṅgaṃ naupādhika iti vivecitamanumānalakṣaṇe /
GSP29nystik_u:8798: na caitāvatā savyabhicārādīnāmapi hetutvāsiddherasiddha evāntarbhāvaḥ savyabhicāratvādiviśeṣaṇena teṣāmato bhedāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8802: ta ete 'siddhabhedā udāharaṇabhedeṣvapi draṣṭavyāḥ, yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8809: atra bhadantena idaṃ sādhyasamalakṣaṇamudāharaṇāntaraṃ kalpayitvā dūṣitam /
GSP29nystik_u:8813: tadetat tridhāpyasiddhaṃ na bhavatīti dūṣayitvā bhadantena śaṅkitam,
GSP29nystik_u:8814: atha sādhyenāviśiṣṭo dṛṣṭānto yasmin sa sādhyāviśiṣṭo hetvābhāsa iti buddherdṛṣṭāntasya nityatvenāsiddhatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:8816: tadetat sarvamanabhyupagamena vārttikakāro dūṣayati---nityaḥ śabda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8817: yadyetat nodāharaṇaṃ kimudāharaṇaṃ ko vā sūtrārtha ityata āha---yathā tvasmābhiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:8820: na hi savyabhicāro 'nena lakṣyate yena savyabhicāramasparśavattvamasyodāharaṇaṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:8823: nāpi buddhivaditi dṛṣṭāntābhāsameva hetvābhāsaṃ kurvatā hetvābhāsadṛṣṭāntābhāsau jñātau bhadantenetyarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8837: anuṣṇo 'gnirdravyatvāditi ca aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdo guṇatvāditi ca,
GSP29nystik_u:8839: sa sarvaḥ pramāṇato viparītanirṇayena sandehaviśiṣṭaṃ kālamatipatatīti so 'yaṃ kālasyātyayenāpadiśyamānaḥ kālātīta
GSP29nystik_u:8843: ityatra vārttikakṛtā bādhāvinābhāvayoḥ sahāsaṃbhava iti cātra bauddhānāmākṣepo 'smābhiḥ samāhitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8844: evaṃ vyavasthite bhāṣyakāraḥ sūtraṃ svaparamataśliṣṭaṃ vyācaṣṭe---kālātyayena saṃśayakālātyayena yukto yasya hetorapadiśyamānasyāthaiṅkadeśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8847: sa hi dharmiṇi balabalā pramāṇena tadviparotadharmanirṇayaṃ kurvatā saṃśayakālamatipātitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8852: paramate ca kālātyayena yukto yasya hetorartharūpa ekadeśo hetuviśeṣaṇamiti yāvat,
GSP29nystik_u:8859: tadetat pañcāvayavaṃ vākyamupanyasya saṃyogavyaṅgyatvasya hetorekadeśasya viśeṣaṇasya saṃyogasya vyaktikālātyayena hetvābhāsatāmāha---ayamaheturiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8860: sa punarayamasiddhaviśeṣaṇatayā hetvābhāsaḥ sādhyasama eveti na pṛgvācya
GSP29nystik_u:8861: iti sthūlatayā eṣa doṣo bhāṣyakāreṇa nodbhāvitaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8862: yat punaḥ bhadantena kālātītasaya vyākhyānaṃ kṛtaṃ pratijñānantaraṃ hi hetoḥ kālaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8865: ghaṭādivadityukte kasmādityanuyukto hetuṃ brūte kṛtakatvāditi sa kālātīta
GSP29nystik_u:8867: taccaivaṃ tena dūṣitam---kiṃ nirākāṅkṣe vādini eṣa prativādinaḥ praśnaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8868: āho sākāṅkṣe? yadi nirākāṅkṣe tadā nyūnamevāsya nigrahasthānam, na hetvābhāsastasyāprayogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8871: atha sākāṅkṣa eva vādini prativādinaḥ praśnaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8890: sa hyavayavaviparyāsa ucyate yatraikagranthenaiva vādī pratijñodāharaṇādi prayujya paścāt
GSP29nystik_u:8891: hetuṃ prayuṅkte, eṣa tu pratijñodāharaṇe prayujya virataḥ prativādinānuyuktaḥ paścāt
GSP29nystik_u:8895: pakṣamātratāṃ nīte siddhāvasthātaḥ pracyāvite paścādabhidhānāt hetāreṣa kālātīto hetvābhāsaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8899: yadi hetvabhidhānena nyūnatayā samīkṛtaḥ pakṣaḥ kimatrahetorasāmarthyam?
GSP29nystik_u:8903_0: nyūnatayā nigṛhīto yadi paścādabhidhānena nigrahītavyaḥ tato vādyeva nigṛhyatāṃ na
GSP29nystik_u:8903_1: tvayaṃ paścādabhihita iti samarthaḥ śakyo heturnigrahītumiti nāyaṃ samīkṛtābhihitatvenāpi hetvābhāsa
GSP29nystik_u:8908: uddeśakramānurodhena lakṣaṇakramasya hetvābhāsānantaraṃ chalasyoddeśāt chalalakṣaṇasyāpi hetvābhāsalakṣaṇānantaryamāha bhāṣyakāraḥ---atha chalam //
GSP29nystik_u:8910: tato viruddhaḥ arthaḥ tasya kalpaḥ kalpanā, saivopapattiḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8912: atha lakṣaṇāntara iva chalasya sāmānyalakṣaṇe kasmādudāharaṇaṃ na dīyata ityata āha---na sāmānyalakṣaṇe iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8916: vibhajyata iti vibhāgo viśeṣalakṣaṇam, tasmin udāharaṇāni// 10 //
GSP29nystik_u:8918: NyS_1,2.11: tat trividhaṃ vākchalaṃ sāmānyacchalamupacāracchalaṃ ca //
GSP29nystik_u:8928: nava kambalā asyeti aparatra iti vigrahe viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8929: vākchalamiti śabdārthaṃ vyutpādayati---vāci nimitte chalaṃ vākchalamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8933: tadatra yathā paryanuyogaḥ, tathā darśayati śiṣyahitatayā bhāṣyakāraḥ---asya pratyavasthānamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8936: atha prayoktāpi kathaṃ sādhāraṇena śabdenārthaviśeṣaṃ bodhayati?
GSP29nystik_u:8937: abodhayaṃśca kathaṃ pratipādako nāma ityata āha---prasiddhaśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:8939: tatra yaḥ puruṣasya niyogaḥ asmādayameva boddhavya
GSP29nystik_u:8945: na saṅketakaraṇāvasthāyāṃ vṛddhavyavahāre vā kaścit śabdaḥ kañcidartha śṛṅgagrāhikayā bodhayati, api tu
GSP29nystik_u:8947: tasmāt naiṣa pratipādayituraparādho yadeṣa viśeṣaśabdairviśeṣaṃ na pratipādayati,
GSP29nystik_u:8948: kiṃ tu saṅketasyāparādho yo viśeṣamapahāya sāmānye śabdānāṃ vartate /
GSP29nystik_u:8949: tasmād yathāsaṅketaṃ bodhayan nāparādhyaḥ prayokteti siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:8952: aviśeṣābhihite 'rthe iti na yuktam na hi navakambala iti padaṃ prakaraṇādinirapekṣaṃ kañcidarthamaviśeṣeṇābhidhatte gavādiśabdavat /
GSP29nystik_u:8953: na hi saṃkhyāviśeṣe ca navīnatve cāsti kaścit sāmānyaviśeṣo bāhuleyādiṣviva gotvaṃ yamabhidadhītetyata
GSP29nystik_u:8958: aśva iti nāmapadamaśvatvasya vācakam, ākhyātapadaṃ yadā kasyacidabhimukhaṃ prayujyate aśva iti,
GSP29nystik_u:8961: samāno hi śabdo 'bhidheye saṃśayamādhatte na tvarthamabhidhatta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8963: śveto dhāvatīti itaḥ sārameyo drutataraṃ yāti,
GSP29nystik_u:8974: saṃbhava---lam // 13 // saṃbhavato 'rthasya brāhmaṇaviśeṣasya vidyācaraṇasaṃpadviṣayatvena vidyācaraṇasaṃpadamatyeti yat sāmānyaṃ brāhmaṇatvaṃ vrātye brāhmaṇe,
GSP29nystik_u:8977: aho na khalvayaṃ brāhmaṇo vidyācaraṇasaṃpanna iti hi stutyarthaṃ vākyamabhyanujānatoktaṃ saṃbhavati brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṇasaṃpaditi tadetadapi vākyaṃ stutyarthameva,
GSP29nystik_u:8980: tatra paro hetvarthamasyā vivakṣitamāropya vacanaṃ vihantīti tadidaṃ sāmānyacchalam /
GSP29nystik_u:8995: tatrāpi pradhāna autsargikaḥ, tasya tu kutaścidapavādād
GSP29nystik_u:8997: tadetadāha bhāṣyakāraḥ---abhidhānasya śabdasya yathārthaṃ prayogo dharmaḥ autsargikaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8999: ko 'sau dvitīya ityata āha---utsargasya tu kutaścidapavādād anyatra dṛṣṭasyānyatra prayogaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9000: tadevaṃ vyavasthitena dharmavikalpena nirdeśe vākye, nirdiśyate 'neneti vyutpattyā /
GSP29nystik_u:9001: tatra bhāktavivakṣāyāṃ mañcāḥ krośantīti, atrārthasadbhāvena pratiṣedhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9002: tamevārthasadbhāvamāha---mañcasthāḥ puruṣāḥ krośanti, na tu mañcāḥ krośantīti /
GSP29nystik_u:9005: hanta sarvaṃ sarvatra prayujyetetyata āha---upacāro nītārthaḥ prāpitārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9006: sahacaraṇādinā nimitteneti, anyatra dṛṣṭasyāpyanyatra prayogaḥ saṃbandhādeva bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:9019: abhidhānaṃ prayogaḥ śabdasya dharmo bhavan dvidhābhidhīyate dvaividhyamāha---pradhānamiti so 'yam
GSP29nystik_u:9026: parīkṣāparvaṇaḥ sannidhānāt tadarthaṃ lakṣaṇaparvaṇyapi yogyāyai sūtrakāraḥ channalakṣaṇaṃ parīkṣate---vākcha--t//15 //
GSP29nystik_u:9027: sthānyartho guṇaśabdo yo vastutaḥ sa eva pradhānaśabdaḥ sthānārtha iti kalpayitveti yojanā /
GSP29nystik_u:9028: yathā hi vākchavale navīnārtho navaśabdaḥ saṃkhyā bhede kalpitaḥ, tathehāpīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ // 15 //
GSP29nystik_u:9031: siddhāntasūtram---na ta--t // 16 // tasya upacāracchale arthasadbhāvapratiṣedhasya arthāntarakalpanāto vākchalādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9033: vidheyaṃ vastu, mañcāḥ krośantītyatra krośanaṃ vidhīyate, mañcā iti tvanūdyate /
GSP29nystik_u:9040: tadiha vidhīyamānaṃ krośanameva vastu pratiṣidhyate, naiva mañcāḥ krośantīti chalavākyena /
GSP29nystik_u:9041: navakambalo devadatta iti vākye tu devadattamanūdya navatvaviśiṣṭaḥ kambalo vidhīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:9042: tatra na vidheyasya vastunaḥ kambalasya sadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:9043: kiṃ tu tadekadeśasyānekatāyā iti mahān bheda iti siddhāntaḥ // 16 //
GSP29nystik_u:9053: tathā sati chalasya samyagdūṣaṇasya ca jātitvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9056: na ca samyagdūṣaṇaṃ sādharmyavaidharmyamātrāt, api tu prayogāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:9057: prayukte hetau tadābhāse vā yaḥ prasaṅgo jāyate sa jātiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:9058: jalpe hi vedaprāmāṇyaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ prati kuhetunā yadā nāstikairadhikṣipyate,
GSP29nystik_u:9059: saduttaraṃ cāsya yadā sahasā na pratibhāti tadeśvarāṇāṃ janādhārāṇāṃ mā bhūd vedāprāmāṇyabuddhiriti jātyāpi pratyavastheyam /
GSP29nystik_u:9061: kvacit punarabuddhipūrvameva hetau hetvābhāse vā jātiprayogaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:9066: sūtrārthastu yathāśruti, na punarudāharaṇasādharmyeṇa yathābhāṣyaṃ bodhyavyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9076: sthūlaviṣayā ca kutsitā, kathamasau nigrahasthānamityata āha---vipratipadyamāna iti /
GSP29nystik_u:9077: apratipattimāha---ārambhaviṣaya iti lāghavāya vipratipattyapratipattī iti vaktavye kasmādasamāsakaraṇamityata āha---asamāsācceti /
GSP29nystik_u:9083: dūṣyaṃ vā paroktaṃ sādhanaṃ vipratiṣedhahetuṃ vā na pratipadyate /
GSP29nystik_u:9085: svārthottarāpratipattisatu sādhanapratiṣedhahetū parakīyau pratipadya tat pratiṣeddhuṃ svakīyamuttaraṃ na pratipadyata
GSP29nystik_u:9087: codayati---svayaṃ prayukte vastutaḥ samarthe sādhane katham
GSP29nystik_u:9096: yadyapi sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ dṛṣṭāntasyāpi bhedaḥ, tathāpi lakṣaṇābhedābhiprāyeṇābheda
GSP29nystik_u:9107: tannivṛttiśca saṃvidā uttarottarāpāye tadanantarābhāvād apavarga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:9109: yaḥ pramāṇādisūtreṇoddeśaḥ, tatparikaro dvitīyaṃ sūtram, dvābhyāmuddeśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9122: kiṃ tu saṃśya eva parīkṣyata ityāha /
GSP29nystik_u:9126: uddeśakramānurodhena hi pramāṇaṃ pūrvaṃ lakṣitaṃ, na tu lakṣaṇe saṃśayasyāsti kaścidupayogaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9127: parīkṣā tu sarvā vimarṣakaraṇiketi parīkṣāparvaṇi sarvathā ārthakrameṇa saṃśayasya pūrvabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9130: saṃśayalakṣaṇaṃ cātra parīkṣyate na saṃśaya iti nānabasthāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:9133: śāstragatā tviyaṃ parīkṣā, sā ca na vimarśapūrvetyārthakramābhāvānnoddeśakramo bādhanīya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9134: pariharati satyaṃ na nirṇaye niyama iti /
GSP29nystik_u:9136: vicāraḥ sarva eva saṃśayapūrvaḥ, śāstravādayoścāsti vicāra iti tenāpi saṃśayapūrveṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:9137: śiṣṭayośca vādiprativādinoḥ śāstre vimarśābhāvo na śiṣyamāṇayoḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:9142: nanu yathā lakṣaṇārthaḥ pūrvanirūpitastathā nirbījaḥ pūrvapakṣa ityata āha /
GSP29nystik_u:9144: parīkṣāsādhyo hyarthastatra vyākhyānena lakṣaṇapadebhyaḥ sākṣādeva gamyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9146: na hi sākṣāt sthāṇupuruṣāvupalabhamānaḥ samānaṃ cānayordharma kaścitsandigdha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9161: NyS_2,1.6: yathoktādhyavasāyādeva tadviśeṣāpekṣāt saṃśaye nāsaṃśayo nātyantasaṃśayo vā //
GSP29nystik_u:9163: yadi nirviśeṣaṇaṃ samānadharmopapattyādi saṃśayakāraṇamucyeta tataḥ paścādakaraṇātpūrvamapi na kuryādityasaṃśayaḥ pūrvaṃ vā karaṇāttpaścādapi kuryādityatyantasaṃśayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:9164: na tvasau nirviśeṣaṇaḥ saṃśayakāraṇamiti nāsaṃśayo nātyantasaṃśaya
GSP29nystik_u:9167: sadṛśārtho hi samānaśabda iti pūrvaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:9170: bhāṣyakāreṇa tu yatsārūpyamuktaṃ tattathā na boddhavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:9171: yadi hi kāryakāraṇayorutpattiḥ sārūpyaṃ tadativyāpakaṃ cāvyāpakaṃ ca /
GSP29nystik_u:9189: saṃśayapūrvakatvātsarvaparīkṣāṇāṃ paricikṣiṣamāṇena saṃśayākṣepahetubhirna pratiṣeddhavyo 'pi tu parairevamākṣiptaḥ saṃśaya
GSP29nystik_u:9196: NyS_2,1.9: pūrvaṃ hi pramāṇasiddhau nendriyārthasaṃnikarṣāt pratyakṣotpattiḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:9198: ārthena hi krameṇa saṃśayaparīkṣāyāmuktenoddeśakramo bādhitaḥ, pramāṇādiṣu tu tadbādhakāraṇābhāvād
GSP29nystik_u:9211: eva nāsti, nāsau laukiko na parīkṣaka ityunmattavadupekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9220: yadyapi mama viśvavicārāsahatvavādinaḥpramāṇaṃ nāma na kiñcidasti vicārasahaṃ,
GSP29nystik_u:9221: tathāpi lokasiddhānyeva pramāṇāni taireva pramāṇaiḥ paryālocyamānāni vicāraṃ na sahante,
GSP29nystik_u:9222: so 'yaṃ pramāṇānāmaparādho yāni svavirodhena vilīyante na mamāparādha
GSP29nystik_u:9224: jñānaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ tadyogātprameyamiti cārtha iti ca bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:9225: tadyadi pramāṇaṃ pūrvaṃ prameyādarthādutpadyate tataḥ pramāṇātpūrvaṃ nāsāvartha iti indriyārthetyādisūtravyādhātaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:9240: yadevaṃ na tatpramāṇatvena vyavahriyate, yathā śaśaviṣāṇaṃ, tathā caitattasmāttatheti /
GSP29nystik_u:9250: yadi pramāṇāni nārthaṃ sādhayanti, pratyakṣādīnītyeva na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:9251: na khalu tāni pramāṇato 'siddhāni pratyakṣādīnītyeva bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9254: api ca prāmāṇyaniṣedhe na pramāṇānāṃ pratyakṣādīnāmasattvam /
GSP29nystik_u:9257: tasya kamaṇḍaluyogo dharmaḥ, tataśca pramāṇānāmasattvaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo 'bhimataṃ na syādityāha /
GSP29nystik_u:9263: pratiṣidhyamāna (188/3) iti mātre vaktavpaye vidhīyamāna iti dṛṣṭāntārtham /
GSP29nystik_u:9274: na hyasato nivṛttiriti (189/3) nāsanū ghaṭo mudgaraprahāreṇa nivarttyata ityarthaḥ // 11 //
GSP29nystik_u:9282: na ca dharmiṇāṃ pratiṣedhe kaścinnyāya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:9284: api ca pramāṇamātramadhikṣipataḥ pratyakṣādīnāmaprāmāṇyamiti pratyakṣādīnāṃ prāmāṇyamiti ca vākyayorarthabhedābhedau vicāraṃ na sahete ityāha /
GSP29nystik_u:9289: yadā satyeva ghaṭe tasyāsāmarthyaṃ vivakṣitvocyate nāsti ghaṭa
GSP29nystik_u:9293: yathā pradhānaṃ nāstīti jagatkāraṇasya sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatvaṃ pradhānatvaṃ tatpratiṣidhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:9306: yadyupādīyate udāharaṇaṃ tatpramāṇenānavadhāritaṃ na śakyamupādātumiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9321: yadi mādhyamiko brūyāt pratyakṣādīnāmaprāmāṇyaṃ traikālyāsiddheriti svavākyāvayavāśritāni pramāṇāni yathālokapratītisiddhāni,
GSP29nystik_u:9324: tatpramāṇye vā avayavāśritapratayakṣādiprāmāṇye na sarvapramāṇavipratiṣedho 'vayavāśritānāmeva prāmāṇyābhyupagamāt /
GSP29nystik_u:9327: tatra pūrvasminkalpe vicārāsahatvena svayaṃ dusthitenānyeṣāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bādhyata iti subhāṣitam /
GSP29nystik_u:9328: tasmāduttaraḥ kalpaḥ, tathā ca na sarvaprāmāṇyaṃ tasyaiva prāmāṇyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:9330: vītyayamupasargaḥ sampratipattyarthe pratiṣedhaśabdārthamanujānāti viśeṣamabhidadhātu na tu tadvyatiriktārtho na vyāghātavacana ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9333: svavākyāvayavāśritānāṃ hi pramāṇānāṃ prāmāṇye sarvapramāṇapratiṣedhavyāghātaḥ pūrvamuktastatpratiṣedhaḥ pūrveṇavirudhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:9339: yāvaduktaṃ bhavati viśeṣeṇa sarveṣu pramāṇeṣu pratiṣedha iti,
GSP29nystik_u:9342: tena na sarvapramāṇavipratiṣedha ityanena vipadasahitena kimuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:9352: svātantryeṇa cedasya sūtrasyārthaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ, kṛtaṃ sūtrapāṭhenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9355: na tadasmābhirutsūtramuktamapi tu sūtrārtha eveti jñāpanārthaṃ sūtrapāṭho 'smākamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9356: niyamena yaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pūrvameva vā paścādeva vā sahaiva veti taṃ pratiṣedhati /
GSP29nystik_u:9365: atha śabdaḥ śrotravivare samavetaḥ kathamātodyamasaṃbaddhaṃ gamayatītyata
GSP29nystik_u:9373: saṃyoginā hi vahninā viśiṣṭo dhūmo 'numīyate na kāraṇena,
GSP29nystik_u:9377: yatpunarākṣipyate yadaniyataṃ na tatparamārthasat--yathā rajjvāmāropitaṃ sarpatvaṃ,
GSP29nystik_u:9381: iti kalpayitvā paścāddhāreti kalpayati, tathā ca pramāṇaprameyabhāvastasmānna paramārthasanniti /
GSP29nystik_u:9387: kṣaṇabhaṅgapariṇāmanirāse sati svakāraṇādutpannaṃ sthiraṃ vastu tattadvastvantarasannidhānāttattaddharmayoge sati tattadabuddhivyapadeśamanubhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:9392: asvaya cārthasya jñāpanārthaṃ sūtraṃ prameyā ca tulāprāmāṇyavaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:9394: yadā punarasyāṃ sanderhe bhavati prāmāṇyaṃ prati tadā siddhapramāṇabhāvena tulāntareṇa yatparīkṣitaṃ suvarṇādi tena prameyā ca tulā, prāmāṇyavat /
GSP29nystik_u:9395: yathā prāmāṇye tulā prameyā ca tathānyadapi sarvaṃ pramāṇaṃ prāmāṇye prameyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9402: sa hi pramātā pramīyamāṇaśca prameyaṃ, tena tu pramitena tadgataguṇānatarānumāne pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:9411: yatra nimittāni tāvatāṃ tatra naimittikānāṃ pravṛtteravaśyaṃbhāvo niyamaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9413: tatra svātantryaṃ pṛcchati vārttikakāraḥ, kiṃ punaḥ svātantryamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:9416: iha tu kārakāntarāṇāmabhāvāttādṛśaṃ svātantryaṃ nāstīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9418: kārakāntarāpekṣasya hi prayojakatayā kathañcitsvātantryaṃ vivakṣyate tadanapekṣasya nitarāṃ svātantryamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9421: yāvaduktaṃ bhavati na gacchatīti, tāvaduktaṃ bhavati tiṣṭhatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:9422: atra ca niṣedhasya niṣedhyādhīnanirūpaṇatayā tadupādhiḥ pūrvāparībhāvo na tu svarūpeṇa niṣedhasya pūrvāparībhāvasambhava iti /
GSP29nystik_u:9427: vṛkṣasya hi mahattve sati rūpavattve sati sattāsamavāya eva sattāvyañjakatvam,
GSP29nystik_u:9430: tadviṣayā kriyā gatividhārakaḥ prayatnastena hi sa tiṣṭhati /
GSP29nystik_u:9434: atha vā tiṣṭhatītyatrāpi kayā cidvivakṣayā kārakāntarāpekṣāstu,
GSP29nystik_u:9443: aneke paryāyavantaḥ pratyayāḥ prāganu tattāśrayasya dharmiṇaḥ punaranubhavaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9447: yadeva daṇḍasaṃyogena cakrabhramaṇaṃ tadevedamuparate 'pi daṇḍasaṃyoge ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9449: nāsati balavati bādhake pramāṇe pratyabhijñānasya śakyaṃ mithyātvaṃ, jvālādiṣu tu tadastītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9450: na ca samastapratisandhānapratyayamithyātve mithyāpratisaṃdhānapratyayo bhavitumarhati bījā (bhāvā) dityāha /
GSP29nystik_u:9454: evaṃ bruvāṇaḥ pratyakṣamapramāṇayanna śakyastena bodhayitumityanumānaṃ pramāṇamāha /
GSP29nystik_u:9467: api tu yuktyā sādhyaṃ, sā ca dṛṣṭāntābhāvādanupapannā /
GSP29nystik_u:9480: kriyānimittaṃ hi kārakaṃ yatpunaḥ kriyāyā eva vyāpyaṃ na tatkriyānimittamiti na kārakam /
GSP29nystik_u:9488: evaṃ ca vikāryaprāpyayorupapannaḥ karmabhāvaḥ nirvartyasya tu padāderyadyapi kriyāyāḥ prāgbhāvo nāsti,
GSP29nystik_u:9489: tathāpi tadavacavānāṃ tantūna prāgbhāvasteṣāṃ tādarthyena paṭatve upacārātpaṭaṃ karotīti yuktaḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9490: tathā hi sahacaraṇādisūtre vakṣyati kaṭārtheṣu vīraṇeṣviti /
GSP29nystik_u:9495: evaṃ caitrasamavetāpīti caitrasyāpi kriyājanikaphalaśālino mā bhūtkarmatvamityata uktamanātmamaveteti /
GSP29nystik_u:9496: ātmaviṣaye 'pi ca mānasapratyakṣe yadyapyātmano na karmatā,
GSP29nystik_u:9497: tathāpi jñānakriyā sakarmikaivātmadharmasyātmavyatiriktasya kasyacitkarmaṇo ḥvabhāsanāditi sarvamavadātam /
GSP29nystik_u:9502: tena na dravyasvabhāvaḥ kārakamiti yaduktaṃ mādhyamikena tadasmākamabhimatameva,
GSP29nystik_u:9503: kālpanikaṃ tṛ kārakaṃ na mṛṣyāmaha ityanenābhisandhinā bhāṣyakāreṇoktam /
GSP29nystik_u:9511: viśeṣalakṣaṇaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ yat kriyāsādhanaṃ svatantramiti, tadvyācaṣṭe yadā tu viśeṣa
GSP29nystik_u:9518: yadyavāntarakriyāmātramucyate tatastasmin sarvasya karttṛtvātkārakavaicitryaṃ na syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:9532: nanu budhdyādayo 'pi śaktivyaktihetavo na caite kriyārūpāḥ, kintu guṇarūpā ityata
GSP29nystik_u:9548: yadāpi sasādhanā tadāpi kimebhireva pratyakṣādibhirāho pramāṇāntareṇa /
GSP29nystik_u:9554: tayaiva vyaktyā tu grahaṇe ātmani vṛttivirodhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9559: nāsādhanā pramāṇasiddhirnāpi pratyakṣādivyatiriktapramāṇābhyupagamo yena vibhāgasūtravyāghātaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:9560: nāpi ca tayaiva vyaktyā tasyā eva grahaṇamupeyate,
GSP29nystik_u:9563: na cānavasthā asti kiṃ citpramāṇaṃ yastvajñānenānyadhīhetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:9566: tatra pūrvaṃ svajñāne cakṣurādyapekṣaṃ cakṣurādi tu jñānānapekṣameva jñānasādhanamitikvānavasthā,
GSP29nystik_u:9567: bubhutsapā ca tadapi śakyajñānaṃ sāca kadācidevakvaciditi tadarthaṃ pramāṇāntarapekṣāyāmanavasthetivācyam /
GSP29nystik_u:9568: dṛṣṭārthe saṃśayādapi pravṛttau satyāṃ pravṛttisāmarthyena tasya sujñānatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:9585: na hyanyaspavaya samavetā jñānakriyā yenātmanaḥ karmatā syāt api tu jñātṛsthaiva,
GSP29nystik_u:9590: manastu yadyapi svajñānaṃ prati karaṇaṃ karma ca,
GSP29nystik_u:9593: svasattayā ca jñānaṃ prati karaṇam, anyaccāsya jñānamanyā sattā, na ca tatsamavetā jñānakriyā,
GSP29nystik_u:9594: kiṃ tvātmasamavetā, tasmāj jñeyatvaṃ jñānasādhanatvaṃ ca manaso na doṣamarhatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:9599: NyS_2,1.19[a]: kvacin nivṛttidarśanād anivṛttidarśanāc ca kvacid anekāntaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:9606: tadevaṃ pradīpadṛṣṭāntāśrayaṇena pramāṇābhāvaprasaṅgamuktvā sthālyādidṛṣṭāntopādāne tu pramāṇasyāpi pramāṇāntarāpekṣetpayāha /
GSP29nystik_u:9609: yathā pradīpaprakāśaḥ sajātīyānapekṣastathā pramāṇāni sajātīyānapekṣāṇi na punaryathā sthālyādirūpaṃ pramāṇāpekṣaṃ tathā pramāṇānyapi pramāṇāpekṣāṇīti /
GSP29nystik_u:9613: kasmādevaṃ sthālīrūpavanna pramāṇāni, tānyapi pramāṇāntareṇa prakāśyantāmityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9614: tadanena pradīpadṛṣṭāntena nirapekṣatvaṃ na tu sthālyādidṛṣṭāntena sāpekṣatvamityatra niyamaheturnāstītyuktaṃ,
GSP29nystik_u:9621: na hi pramāṇānāmeva pradīpo dṛṣṭānto na prameyāṇāmiti niyamaheturasti /
GSP29nystik_u:9622: tadanena yathā prasaṅga iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:9623: pradīpaprakāśo dṛṣṭānto bhavatvi tyanenāyameva dṛṣṭānto nāyamiti niyamo nirākṛtaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:9624: pūrveṇa tu pradīpadṛṣṭāntena nirapekṣatvameva na tu sthālīdṛṣṭāntena sāpekṣatvamityayaṃ niyamo nirākṛta iti na punaruktam /
GSP29nystik_u:9625: prakāśakatvādinā tu hetunā saṃgṛhītaḥ pradīpadṛṣṭānto bhavatīti niyamaḥ śakyo vaktum /
GSP29nystik_u:9629: na hi cakṣurādi pramāṇaṃ svagrahaṇe cakṣurādyantaramapekṣate,
GSP29nystik_u:9632: viruddhaśca heturviṣayajñānamapi viṣayajñānena na gṛhyate kintu jñānaviṣayeṇa jñāneneti nātyantasajātīyamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:9633: tadanenābhiprāyeṇa vārtikakṛtoktamanekānta ityayaṃ doṣo na bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:9641: pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ cānena sūtreṇocyate pratyakṣasvarūpaṃ vā, na tāvatpratyakṣakāraṇamityāha /
GSP29nystik_u:9648: lakṣaṇapakṣa eva siddhānto 'bhimataḥ, kāraṇapakṣābhyupagamaḥ prauḍhivādena draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9650: na hīdṛśamanyatkāraṇamātmamanaḥ saṃyogo vā indriyamanaḥ- saṃyogo vā pratyakṣasyāsti,
GSP29nystik_u:9660: anyathāpa yatra tatra sthitebhyo 'pi kāraṇebhyaḥ kāryamupajāyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:9663: bhavatu vā saṃyogajaṃ jñānam, arthendriyātmasaṃyogajaṃ kasmānna bhavati, kṛtaṃ manaḥsaṃyogenetyata
GSP29nystik_u:9676: tadevaṃ dvābhyāṃ sūtrābhyāṃ pūrvapakṣite sati bhāvamātreṇa
GSP29nystik_u:9690: indriyārthasaṃnikarṣe tvamati viprakṛṣṭe vyavahrite ca jñānaṃ na jāyate,
GSP29nystik_u:9694: yeca sati bhāvāt kāraṇabhāvaṃ varṇayanti pūrvapakṣiṇaśca siddhāntino vā asati na bhavatīti daivād āgato vyatireko /
GSP29nystik_u:9695: na tu prayojakastān prati pārśvastho brūte /
GSP29nystik_u:9714: ato guṇajātīyaṃ jñānaṃ, kāryatve mati vibhudravyasamavāyāc śabdavat /
GSP29nystik_u:9723: tasmāj jñānaliṅga ātmā, na tvasāvasaṃyukto jñānaṃ janayati /
GSP29nystik_u:9735: īdṛśaṃ hi talliṅgaṃ yadanyārthamapi manaso jñānakāraṇatvaṃ pratipādayatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:9736: na hi jñānaṃ svatantraṃ yena svakāraṇaṃ mano nāpekṣeta,
GSP29nystik_u:9737: nāpi cakṣurādi svatantraṃ jñānajanane yena manojñānakaraṇaṃ na syādityāha /
GSP29nystik_u:9748: pratyakṣeti sarvānamidhāne hi pratyakṣaṃ na lakṣitaṃ syāditi tallakṣaṇāya kiñcidvaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:9758: prabodhe nidrāvicchede sati dravyasparśasya saṃjñānaṃ prabodhajñānamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9780: na tvātmamanaḥsaṃyogasyendriyamanaḥsaṃyogasya vā 'kāraṇatvamucyata iti na vyāghāta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9790: bhogo hyadṛṣṭasya pradhānaṃ prayojanaṃ tannāntarīyakatayā janmāyuṣī ākṣipati /
GSP29nystik_u:9792: aprāptaṃ ca mano na tatra bhogaṃ ca bhogaviṣayau sukhaduḥkhe ca tayoḥ kāraṇaṃ ca jñānaṃ janayitumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:9817_0: teṣu ca katipayānavayavān gṛhītvā tatsahacaritānavayavānanumāya pratisandhānajeyaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:9829: kāryasyaikasya kāraṇānāṃ tadekaṃ kāryaṃ kartu parasparapratyāsattibharvati /
GSP29nystik_u:9834: yeṣāṃ tu na kāryakānaparaṇabhāvo naikakāryatvaṃ vā naikakāraṇatvaṃ vā,
GSP29nystik_u:9840: avayavyabhāve tu na parasparopakāriṇaḥ kathamavayavā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9842: svastimatīṃ hi gāṃ gṛhītvā kālākṣyāṃ gavi gauriti pratisandhānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP29nystik_u:9843: na tvaśvaṃ gṛhītvāśvāntare gauriti pratisandhānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, tatkasya hetoḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:9852: nāyamanumātā pūrvamanupalabhyāgnimanumānena ca dhūmaviśeṣaṇamagniṃ pratipadya pratisaṃdhatte ayaṃ dhūmo 'yaṃ cāgniriti /
GSP29nystik_u:9859: sa bhāgavān bhāgo na bhavati kiṃ tu bhāgyeva /
GSP29nystik_u:9862: ( 210 / 4 ) ekāvayavisamavāyena hi parasparasambaddhau syātāṃ, na cāvayavyasti,
GSP29nystik_u:9868: tamabhyupagaya tūttaraṃ-- satyaṃ sambaddhau satyapi sambandha aśakyagraho 'sāvityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9873: samprati tu vṛkṣasyāsattvena nāvayave vṛkṣa iti pratisandhānamrityapaunaruktyam /
GSP29nystik_u:9875: ya evopalabdhā rasapratyayoparañjitaḥ sa eva rūpapratyayoparañjita
GSP29nystik_u:9878: yathā bhrāntamapyanumānamarthasambandhena pramāṇamiti na bhavati, tathā prathame 'dhyāye darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:9884: paramāṇūnāṃ rūpaṃ vā nairantaryaṃ vā saṃyogabhedo vā utpādabhedo vā /
GSP29nystik_u:9885: yadi rūpamātraṃe tad ghaṭādiṣvapīti vṛkṣabuddhiḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:9894: yadi hi kvacidavayavasanniveśo vāstavaḥ pūrvāparabhāgādiśabdapravṛttiheturupalabdhaḥ syāt tatastathāśabdārthaḥ pratīyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:9897: sāmānyatodṛṣṭe dharmiviṣayakamapi pratyakṣaṃ nāstīti bhrānataḥ pṛcchati /
GSP29nystik_u:9902: trikasya tu pratyakṣeṇa prasiddhau pratyakṣatodṛṣṭamiti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9913: ekadeśagrahaṇasya pratyakṣeṇānabhyupagame vā pramāṇāntarasya tatrānupapatterasiddho hetuḥe seyamubhayataspāśā rajjurityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9920: nanvekadeśapratyakṣatve 'pi tanmātraṃ pratyakṣaṃ, na tu sarvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syādityata
GSP29nystik_u:9924: anumānasya hi trayaḥ prakārā yādṛśā na tādṛśāḥ pratyakṣasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:9930: na tvevaṃ pratyakṣasya pramāṇasya, ata utpattau vā kārye vā liṅgaliṅgisambandhasmṛtyapekṣetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9938_1: na tviyamekadeśamātropalabdhirapi tu tasya tatsahacaritasya cāvayavina upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya siddherityāha /
GSP29nystik_u:9947: na caitāvatā kṛtsnagrahaṇasambhavo yata ekadeśagrahaṇanivṛttiḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:9948: na hyavayavigrahaṇe kṛtsnā apyavayavā gṛhītā bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:9952: yatkhalu bahuṣu varttate tatpratyekaṃ samaṣṭyā vā, yathā kalaṃviṅkakaṇṭhaguṇaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9957: na caikatra kṛtsnasamāptāvanyatra tasyaiva sambhava iti, tathā sati kṛtsnasamāpterabhāvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:9959: tathā cāvayavā eveti prāpta mityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:9967: tadekagranthatayā aṅga tu bhavānityādisambodhanopakramaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyavasthitam /
GSP29nystik_u:9972: yadi kusumeṣu sūtrāvayavā varttante kimāyātamavayavinaḥ sūtrasya /
GSP29nystik_u:9976: atha mā bhūtsūtraṃ nāmāvayavi, ekadeśāstu kusume varttanta iti brūmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9977: tathā ca sati naikamanekatraikadeśena varttatte kiṃ tvanekamanekatreti /
GSP29nystik_u:9978: tathā ca kusumaparamāṇāvekasminsūtraparamāṇureko varttatta ityuktaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:9979: na ca vṛttirapi paramāṇubhyāmatiricyate yato bhavati varttate iti,
GSP29nystik_u:9984: tathā ca vṛtterabhāvādekadeśena vā kārtsnyena vā varttata iti rikta vacaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9985: yathālokapratyayaṃ tu vṛtterabhyupagame sūtraṃ kusumeṣu naikadeśena varttate,
GSP29nystik_u:9986: kiṃ tu tadekadeśāḥ sūtraṃ ca kusumeṣu varttata iti laukiko 'nubhavaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9987: tatra sūtrasya vṛttiḥ kusumeṣu naikadeśena vā nāpi kārstnyena,
GSP29nystik_u:9988: kiṃ tu svarūpataḥ, evamavayaveṣvavayavinaḥ svarūpata eva /
GSP29nystik_u:9989: iyāṃstu viśeṣo yatsūtrasya kusumeṣu vṛttiṃ prati santi bhāgā apīti sūtrarūpaṃ ca bhāgāśca kusumeṣu varttanta
GSP29nystik_u:9991: avayavinastu svāvayaveṣu vṛttiṃ prati nāvayavāntarāṇi santīti rūpamātreṇa tatra varttate 'vayavīti /
GSP29nystik_u:9992: tasmānna kiñcitkvacitkārtsnyenaikadeśena vā varttamānaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tayorvṛttiṃ prati vyāpakatvamasiddham /
GSP29nystik_u:9995: yathā ca kṛtsnaikadeśaśabdau nāvayavirūpe varttete tathoktaṃ vārttikakṛteti /
GSP29nystik_u:9996: naikadeśena varttate na ca kārtsnyena varttate atha ca varttata iti eṣa vācoyuktiḥ yadyathābhūtaṃ vastu tattathā nirdiśyata iheti yojanā /
GSP29nystik_u:9998: ( 215 / 4) ekasyānekavṛtteḥ ekadeśena kārtsnyena ca vyāghātapa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9999: sa eva hi dharmo vikalpyate yo vikalpyamāno dharmiṇe na bādhate,
GSP29nystik_u:10001: yo hyadhikaraṇaṃ dharmiṇameva bādhate nāsau dharmavikalponyāyyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10004: yathā vijñānaṃ, saccerda nīlādyanunavāvasitamiti svabhāvahetuḥ, sattāmātravyāpitvādanavayavisvasya /
GSP29nystik_u:10006: tadviruddhaśca viruddhadharmasaṃsargo nīlādīnāṃ sāvayavatve prasajansvaviruddhaṃ viruddharmāsaṃsargaṃ nivarttayaṃstadvyāptaṃ sattvamapi nivartayati /
GSP29nystik_u:10007: tathāhi pāṇyadikampe tatsthāno 'vayavyapi kampata iti tasya jaṅghādiṣvapyavayaveṣvaviśeṣāvasthānasyāpyavayavinaḥ kampata upalabhyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:10009: eva tadānīṃ kampate na kampata iti viruddhadharmasaṃsargaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10025: rakte caikasminnavayave tatsthāno 'vayavyapi rakta iti avayavāntare 'pi tasyābhedādrāgopalambhaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10026: avayavamātrarāge vā tatsthānasyāvayavino rūpamaraktaṃ dṛśyate, so 'yaṃ viruddhadharmasaṃsarga
GSP29nystik_u:10028: tadanenābhiprāyeṇa vārtikakāro grahaṇāgrahaṇalakṣaṇena viruddhadharmasaṃsargeṇa sarvāneva viruddhadharmasaṃsargānupalakṣayati /
GSP29nystik_u:10034: no khalu rūpaviśeṣo nīlādirasmākramapi sāvayavo guṇatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:10036: nanu ghaṭa ityapi ca rūpasagandhasparśā evārthakriyākāriṇastathā vyapaddiśyante,
GSP29nystik_u:10039: atha parasiddhaṃ dravyaṃ rūpādyāśrayaṃ pakṣīkṛta parasiddhenaiva tasya sattvenānavayavatvaṃ sādhayati,
GSP29nystik_u:10041: na hi svayamapratītau sādhyadharmiṇau parapratyāyanāya kalpete /
GSP29nystik_u:10044: bhavettatra pratīkāraḥ svato 'siddhe tu kā kriyā ...
GSP29nystik_u:10051: na ca bahvavayavasthānasya grahaṇe iva katipayāvayavasthānasya grahaṇe tādṛśasthaulyānavabhāsādanavabhāso 'vayavina
GSP29nystik_u:10053: parimāṇabhedo hi sthaulyamavayavidharmo na ca tasya tādṛśasyānavabhāse 'vayavī nāvabhāsito bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:10058: etenārvāgbhāgasahitasya grahaṇe 'pi na madhyabhāgasahitasyāgrahaṇaṃ kathañcidvirodhamāvahatītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:10059: na vāvayavakampe 'pyavayavinaḥ kampo yenāvayavāntare ḥpi kampaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:10076: tatsaṃyoginastu mahārajanasya raktatvāt, tasya ca paṭādaraktādanyatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:10079: tasya mahārajanasaṃyoganimittatvāt tasya ca paṭavṛttitvāt paṭasya ca sarvatrāviśeṣāt,
GSP29nystik_u:10081: na hi sa eva tadaiva tatraiva bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:10089: tena naitayoḥ kadācidapi parasparātmatvaṃ bhavitumarhati, adarśanāt /
GSP29nystik_u:10091: yathā tasyaiva śvaivasya yadā prāsāde sadbhāvastadaivābhāvaḥ kāka iti /
GSP29nystik_u:10092: evaṃ ca evaṃ kumbhaḥ śyāmaḥ sa eva paścādagnisaṃyogādaśyāmaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:10093: yaḥ punarasya parimāṇabhedo na sati kumbhe vinaśyati,
GSP29nystik_u:10095: evaṃ prameyavaicitrye darśanavaicitryavyavasthāpitaṃ yathābhyupeyate tathā tasyaiva saṃyogasya tasminnekadā bhāvābhāvau vyavasthāpanīyau,
GSP29nystik_u:10097: va hi dṛśyamānasya dṛśyamānāntaravaidharmyeṇa rūpamupalabhyamānaṃ śakvamapākartum,
GSP29nystik_u:10101: rūpādīnāṃ tu na dṛṣṭastatraiva tadānīmabhāvo bhāvaśceti teṣāṃ vyāpyavṛttīnāṃ bhāvābhāvau yugapadekatra viruddhāviti siddham-raktāraktayorekatrāvirodhaḥ sahadarśanāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:10106: ekatvānekavṛttitvayoravirodhena nānātvasya vyāpakatvasiddherna prasaṅgo nāpi viparyaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:10109: evaṃ tadabhāvāvinābhāvi pītamapi nīlaparicchedakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyavacchinatti,
GSP29nystik_u:10112: tadavyavacchede tadabhāvo na vyavacchidyeteti sa eva tadānīmeva tatra bhavenna bhavedveti durghaṭamāpadyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:10115: hanta bhāvaparicchede tadabhāvo vyavacchidyat iti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:10122: yatra tarhyekāvayavavṛtterapyekasyāvayavāntareṣu varttamānasya tādātmyaṃ dṛśyate na tatraikāvayavasaṃsṛṣṭābhāvāvinābhāvo 'vayavāntarasaṃsṛṣṭasya,
GSP29nystik_u:10124: api ca ekaṃ vijñānamanekai rūpacakṣurālokamanaskāraiḥ kathaṃ sambadhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:10129: atha kasmādrūpādyeva pratītya rūpajñānaṃ jāyate na punā rasādyapi /
GSP29nystik_u:10130: svabhāva eva tādṛśo yatastāneva pratītya jāyate na punā rāsabhādīniti cet /
GSP29nystik_u:10131: hanta bhoḥ svabhāvān bhinnān pratītya kathameko bhāvo jāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:10132: ko virodho na hi kāryakāraṇayostādātmyaṃ yena kāraṇasvabhāvānurodhaḥkāryasya bhavediti cet /
GSP29nystik_u:10134: yenāvayavabhadeḥ'vayavino vā samavāyasvaya vā bhedo bhevaditi samaḥ samādhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10144: sa khalvevaṃ mene saṃvinniṣṭhā hi viṣayavyavasthitiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10145: sa eva saṃvidā vyavasthāpyate yastasyā viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10149: sthaulyaṃ ca na yadyapi paramāṇūnāṃ pratyekamasti,
GSP29nystik_u:10152: so 'yamamūlyadānakrayīsvākāraṃ ca jñāne samarpayati pratyakṣatāṃ ca svīkartumicchatyavayavīti /
GSP29nystik_u:10156: na sādhyatvaṃ svarūpeṇa saṃśayaheturiti matvā bhāṣyakṛdāha /
GSP29nystik_u:10159: sādhyatvāditi yathāśrutaṃ sūtraṃ gṛhītvā vārttikakāro vikalpyākṣipati /
GSP29nystik_u:10166: satyeva dharmiṇi tasyāvayavebhyo 'bhedo dharmaḥpa sādhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10172: iti na ṣaṣṭhī, tathā ca paṭasyeti viśeṣaṇābhāve avayatvamātraṃ hetuḥ syāt, sa ca viruddha
GSP29nystik_u:10187: na hi paṭākārapratyayastantumātrālambano raṇḍākaraṇḍāvasthiteṣvapi tantuṣu prasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:10188: na ca tantuparimāṇabhedālambanaḥ, tasvaya pūrvamapi sattvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:10191: tasmāttantuṣvapareṣu para ityakāmenāpi mithyāpratyaya iti vaktavyaṃ,
GSP29nystik_u:10200: saṃyoga ādiryeṣāṃ nimittāntarāṇāṃ kumbhakārakuvindādīnāṃ tāni nimittāntarāṇi /
GSP29nystik_u:10204: vayaṃ tu brūmo vibhāga utpanna iti /
GSP29nystik_u:10210: yadā hi paṭaḥ pāṭyate tadā yeṣāmavayavānāmavasthitānāṃ saṃyogānāṃ paṭākhyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ,
GSP29nystik_u:10211: tasya sādhāraṇasya kāryadravyasya paṭasya ca tadasamavāyikāraṇānāṃ ca saṃyogānāṃ keṣāṃ cidvināśottarakālamarddhapaṭārambhe teṣāmanapekṣāṇāṃ kāraṇatvaṃ,
GSP29nystik_u:10212: vibhāgastu karmajanyastatra katipayasaṃyogavināśadvāreṇa sādhāraṇapaṭādikāryavināśamātre vyāpriyate na tu vibhagāpekṣo 'rddhapaṭe janayitavye saṃyogaḥ kāraṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10218: yathā ghaṭapaṭāvākāriṇau bhedena dṛśyete naivamavayavāvayavinau, nāpi samavāyasamavāyināvityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10226: ( 226 / 7 ) tantavo hi pakṣīkṛtāḥ pradhānamiti taditi sarvanāmnā hetugatena parāmraṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10227: tathā ca tantupradeśasya vyapadeśaviṣayatvaṃ na tantūnāmityasiddho heturityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10236: ucyante te ca kāraṇavyāpārātpūrvaṃ nāsanniti janmāpi teṣāmapūrvamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10241: na ca vivādādhyāsitaḥ paramāṇurna mahaddravyamārabhate paramāṇutvād dvyaṇukārambhakaparamāṇuvat /
GSP29nystik_u:10249: nanu yathā saṃyogaḥ saṃyogidvayanirūpaṇādhīnanirūpaṇaḥ tayorekasyaivāpratyakṣatve na pratyakṣa evamavayavāpratyakṣatve nāvayavī pratyakṣaḥ syādityata āha /
GSP29nystik_u:10251: saṃsṛjyamānanirūpaṇādhīnanirūpaṇo hi saṃsargo yuktaṃ yattadanirūpaṇe na nirūpyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:10252: na tvavayavyavayavanirūpaṇādhīno yatteṣvanirūpiteṣu na nirūpyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:10254: evaṃ vidravarttino hastivanaspatyāpaderavayavāgrahaṇe ḥpi grahaṇāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10263_0: mahābhūtānāṃ hi mūlakāraṇaṃ paramāṇavaḥ paramasūkṣmāsteṣāmapratyakṣatve mānasānuvyavasāyagamyaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:10263_1: paramasūkṣmaviṣayaṃ me pratyakṣamiti tadabhāvaścātmani saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇena manaḥsannikarṣeṇa pratyakṣavirodha
GSP29nystik_u:10266: yameva hi tryaṇukaṃ dṛśyaṃ bhavanto dṛśyāvayavamācakṣate tameva vayaṃ paramāṇumācakṣmahe,
GSP29nystik_u:10270: jālasūryamarīcisthameva tadrajaḥ kathaṃ cidupalabhyate nānyatheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10275: mahābhūtamūlakāraṇamanavayavaṃ kalpanīyaṃ na ca dravyamanavayavaṃ vinaśyati ākāśādivaditi nityāḥ paramāṇavastrasareṇavastvanityā iti na paramāṇuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10284: saṃyujyate cāyaṃ vibhajyate cāyamavayavyantareṇeti na vyatireka iti /
GSP29nystik_u:10286: na hi sa eva tantustenaiva tantunāprāpyataityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10287: sattvarajastamāsāṃ na saṃyogaḥ kiṃ tu teṣāṃ svābhāvikaḥ sa ko 'pi paṃriṇatibhedo yataḥ saṃbhūyakāritvamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10299: yadā hi kāryameva rūpādi nāsti tadā kasmāttatra rūpādipratipattiḥ pratiṣidhyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10301: avayavigatānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ kāryaṃ rūpasaṃskārādavayavinaścākṣuṣatā evaṃ dṛśyateti /
GSP29nystik_u:10304: na, tathāpi na śābdī tulāsaṃbandhitāsya pratīyate,
GSP29nystik_u:10316: nanu samāhāraḥ kumbhasya kāraṇaṃ tacca jñāteyadgurutvamevetyata āha /
GSP29nystik_u:10318: ye tvāhuḥ sarvo mṛtkṛṇādiḥ kumbhaparyavasānaḥ kāryasamūhaḥ paramāṇuṣveva samavaiti,
GSP29nystik_u:10327: na ca yathā pradīpādhīnaprakāśāghaṭādayo na tu pradīpaḥ pradīpārdhānaprakāśaḥ tasya svamahimaniṣiddhatamonuṣaṅgatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:10329: gurutvaṃ tu svasya cānyeṣāṃ ca gurutvāntarānapekṣaṃ patanaheturiti vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:10330: na hi pradīpena svātmani prakāśayitavye kiṃ cidanyat kriyate,
GSP29nystik_u:10332: cakṣuṣaḥ punarayaṃ svabhāvabhedo yena ghaṭādau prakāśayitavye pradīpamapekṣate na tu pradīpe prakāśayitavye pradīpāntaramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:10336: svagatasya tu patanakarmaṇaḥ karaṇatve tadeva karma karaṇaṃ ceti svātmani vṛttivirodhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10337: ātmanastu svātmani prakāśayitavye kartṛtvameva na karmatvamityupapāditāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:10338: tasmādguṇādayo vivādādhikaraṇā na patanti adravyajātīyatvādgurutvavaditi siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:10341: rūpādayo na saṃyogarūpaprāptimantaḥ guṇatvāt saṃyogavadityaprāpte rūpādiṣu niścayāttadadarśananimitto rūpādiṣu prāptibhramo dravyeṣu prāptipratyayaḥ parimārthika
GSP29nystik_u:10350: // syādetad yathā 'vayavinaṃ nābhyupaiti paraḥ evaṃ guṇakarmādyapi /
GSP29nystik_u:10351: tatkathamayaṃ prasaṅgaḥ parasya sarvāgrahaṇamityata āha tadidaṃ sūtramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:10353_0: yo 'pi hi tāvad guṇakarmādi necchati so 'pi na tatpratyayamapanhute asti laukikaparīkṣakāṇābhavayavidravyaguṇakarmādipratyayaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:10355: so 'yamasati bādhake svayaṃ ca guṇādibhiśca sahopalabhyamāno na śakyo nirākarttumityadhikaraṇārthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:10366: yo yo 'navayavī tatra tatra dhāraṇākarṣaṇena bhavataḥ yathā vijñānādau,
GSP29nystik_u:10371: paramāṇusamūhe tu pratyekamapi na paramāṇavo 'vayavina ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:10373: evaṃ hi viśeṣahetuḥ syād yadyavayavinamantareṇa kva cidvijñānākāśādau saṃgrahaścoktalakṣaṇo dhāraṇākarṣaṇahetutā vā 'sya dṛṣṭā syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:10377: avayavityena tulyatve 'pi kasmādekatra dhāraṇākarṣaṇe nānyatretyata āha /
